story:
To get more technical, Hush Iced relaxes the nervous system by simulating deep touch pressure therapy -- which increases serotonin and melatonin levels while decreasing cortisol levels -- improving your mood and promoting restful sleep at the same time. 

Hush Iced is unique in that it provides a cooler way to reap the benefits of weighted blankets. 

Did you know that when you’re getting ready to take a snooze, your body temperature decreases to initiate sleep? Science shows that room temperature should be between 68-72 degrees for the optimum sleep benefits. 

Hush Iced can help you get there by preventing you from overheating, even during the nastiest heat wave. 

Hush Iced uses the same advanced weight distribution technology as the classic Hush Blanket, but with a lighter, cool-to-the-touch cover. Hush Iced’s proprietary bamboo and cotton blend helps wick away sweat during hot summer months, while still providing weighted relief.

 At Hush, we believe in love at first sleep! If you do not absolutely love your blanket after night one, we will give you 99 more tries or your money back!

Two years ago, we came up with the idea for the Hush Blanket, a weighted blanket designed for those who wanted to relax and fall asleep, fast. But we noticed one thing, Hush was great during fall and winter, even during spring, but it was admittedly hard to use during the grueling, hot summer months. And we found that was the case with most other weighted blankets.

We set out to change that.

Hush Iced was created for use even when it’s hot out, with an amazing breathable fabric and a lighter, cool-to-the-touch cover, so you can stay cool and calm all summer long.

 

 We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Hush a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a Hush Iced blanket, if you’re a supporter of Hush, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! 

Your Hush Iced blankets will be shipping July 2019! We’re able to get them to you so soon because we are backed with great manufacturers who lead the production of our first Hush blankets. 

You will also be responsible for all international duties. U.S. and Canadian orders will not incur duties.

 

Risks and challenges

There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team of engineers and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfilment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring the Hush collection to your homes, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.

Hush Iced’s proprietary bamboo and cotton blend helps wick away sweat during hot summer months, while still providing weighted relief.

*You don't have to pick your size now. A survey will be sent out for you to choose roughly 10 days after you pledge. 
Two years ago, we came up with the idea for the Hush Blanket, a weighted blanket designed for those who wanted to relax and fall asleep, fast. But we noticed one thing, Hush was great during fall and winter, even during spring, but it was admittedly hard to use during the grueling, hot summer months. Your Hush Iced blankets will be shipping July 2019! We’re able to get them to you so soon because we are backed with great manufacturers who lead the production of our first Hush blankets. You will be able to choose different add-ons and update your shipping addresses 10 days after you pledge a survey. We do ask that you include a physical address -- no P.O. Boxes, please!You will also be responsible for all international duties. U.S. and Canadian orders will not incur duties. Risks and challengesThere are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team of engineers and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfilment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring the Hush collection to your homes, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.

story:
When it comes to making meals for the family, baking pans are one of the must-haves in the kitchen. From prepping meals to roasting vegetables, a good bakeware is essential for an effective and efficient cooking experience. As there are many types of baking pans in the market, some of them can be messy deal with, and sometimes,the edges of the pan mayburn your fingers when taking the pan out.

Thankfully, there a better way now.

Redefine Your Cooking Experience

Introducing Kichware, a safe and innovative non-stick silicon pan with handles for your oven bakes. You could divide your ingredients into several portions and bake them accordingly. Our 100% food-grade silicone is safe to use in the microware, dishwasher, refrigerator and oven. Our high quality material could also withstand temperature from -20 to 470 degrees.

Quick and Safe to Grip

 

 

When using conventional baking pan, removing them out of the oven is usually tricky as you might burned yourself. Kichware comes with heat-resistant silicone handles so you don’t need to use oven mitts or cloth to take it out. Removing baked goods out of the oven is more convenient and safe with Kichware

Sturdy Handles

 

Need a hand? Kichwarecomes with specially designed handles that protects the fingers from touching the food. The 5CM tall handles lets you lift your food out of the oven easily.

Baking Multiple Meals? No Problem

 

Whether it is for dinners or prepping food for the week, Kichware give you the flexibility to make multiple meals at the same time. You can separate the ingredients and use different sauces for each pan. This is great for saving time as you could fit multiple Kichware into your oven. Besides that, if you have family members with different meal preference, the Kichware is ideal to keep everyone happy at family dinners.

 

No Fuss, No Mess

 

 

We know scrubbing and cleaning is always the hardest part after cooking. Since our silicone bakeware is naturally non-stick and dishwasher friendly, cleaning is much easier than ever before.

Product Specification

About Kichware 

About us

We are Quanzhou Shenfu Trading Co., Ltd., a new company focusing on product R&D, product design and development. We are very happy to grow with you. Kichware is completely food safe to high temperatures, naturally non-sticky, durable and resistant to bacteria. In the first stage of development, we tried dozens of different types of silicones and different colors to ensure that our solutions have stain resistance and perfect heat transfer. Then, we started the testing and prototyping phase.

story:
The Disaster Story

"BIRMINGHAM, Alabama - Marquita McCloud's three children excitedly tore open their presents at midnight on Christmas Day, carrying out a family tradition.

An hour later, McCloud smelled smoke but couldn't figure out where it was coming from.  She went to the door and saw flames drawing near the apartment…. They have the clothes on their backs, a gift card from the Red Cross and the keys to a new apartment in the Valley Brook complex. They need to replace clothes, blankets, beds, pots and pans, shoes and more…"

<http://www.al.com/news/birmingham/index.ssf/2014/12/after_christmas_day_fire_destr.html>

"BIRMINGHAM, Alabama - Fire swept through a Birmingham apartment complex early Christmas morning, injuring six people, two of them critically. Four of the injured are children believed to be under the age of 5…. More than 50 firefighters from Birmingham Fire and Rescue and Center Point Fire District responded to the three-alarm blaze…<http://www.al.com/news/birmingham/index.ssf/2014/12/2_adults_4_children_injured_-.html>

In all the McCloud's lost thousands of dollars of possessions in the house fire. To make matters worse, this house fire burnt their apartment on Christmas Day.


The Goal

In response, the One House Movement has decided to start a fundraising drive to help Marquita McCloud and her family recover from this disaster. Our goal is to fundraise at least $700 in 21 days. 


About Our Organization

One House's mission is "To empower families to achieve lifelong successes by contributing and facilitating direct services that provide positive solutions for the black community in the areas of family education, health and wellness and community development."

<https://www.facebook.com/onehousemovement/timeline>

For One House's fundraiser, Magic City Agriculture Project - MCAP has agreed to be a non-profit fiscal sponsor.  This means all donations through this crowd funding page will be tax deductible.

For more information about MCAP, visit <www.MagicCityAg.org>.


Thank you for your support of the McCloud family and the One House Movement.

story:
Final push!

Volunteers are ready to add the finishing touches to the hut. (A certified BC Rec Site)

  • Front entry deck and roof. (posts, beams, roofing materials, decking)
  • Front Door
  • Wood stove installation.
  • Insulation and inside sheeting.
  • Outhouse w/ composting toilet design.
  • Tables, Chairs, Benches
  • Siding materials and trim.

Bonus item push goals

Anything raised above the goal will go towards bonus items.

  • Solar system with lights and charging stations.
  • Gas Range, tank and pipe install
  • Gravity fed water supply
  • Ongoing maintenance fund.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Got anything on the list you can contribute?  Let us know.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Not Your Average Gun Lock

Simple. Safe. Smart.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Step 1: Run safeTstrap™ through loading chamber

Step 2: Connect end of strap into the locking mechanism

Step 3: Plug In Home Gateway

Step 4: Start Active Monitoring

 

Features:

 

We've Got You Covered.

 

Quality

Rugged waterproof plastic enclosure IP67 rating

Cable with plastic covered stainless, not easily cut.

Unique unlock, simple to use with special key

3 year battery life

MADE IN USA

 

Gateway Security

Status of gateway continuously monitored in cloud.

Battery backup to generate alert if tampered or unplugged.

Alert generated in cloud and local alarm if network disconnected.

Gateway software security with encrypted storage and crypto authentication.

Power and battery status detection.

 

SafetyStrap Security

Tamper detection

Electronic spoofing resistance

Battery status

 

User Security

Password login

Passcode to enable/disable alerts.

(2 Factor authentication optional)

Complete history of all alerts and changes stored in cloud.

 

Alerts

Local alarm on gateway (even without power or network connection)

SMS messages, emails, push alerts to application configurable

Enable/Disable all or only individual devices with passcode.

 

Simple 10 minute Installation & setup:

Install safeTstrap™ App on phone

Create or log into account.

Create passcode.

Find Gateway and provide WIFI network info, this will authenticate the gateway to this account automatically.

Scan QR code for each safeTstrap™.

Optionally name each safeTstrap™ to a firearm.

Enable alerts.

 

Mobile App

 

Mobile app for seamless:

   Setup

   Strap Status

   Alerts

 

Why safeTstrap™ Now?

"There are a lot of people looking for solutions to improve gun safety. There are many approaches. This is a problem that will not be solved overnight. While we wait for a legislative, commercial, and mental health solution, we believe the right technology, applied correctly, can make an immediate difference."

-Mitch Bernet, CEO, Vypin

 

Pricing Packages

 

The Vypin Foundation:

Vypin has created the Vypin Foundation to support child gun safety initiatives, our veterans, and first responders by supporting a growing number of organizations.

 

Our Team

     Timeline

FAQs

Q: When will I get my safeTstrap™?

A: Our estimated  shipment time is July 2018

Q: What if my safeTstrap™ breaks?

A: Vypin offers a 1-year warranty on all hardware provided

Q: Will my safeTstrap™ work without the app?

A: The safeTstrap™ will send alerts any time it is within a 300 ft range of the in-home gateway

Q: Can I use my safeTstrap™ anywhere?

A: As long as the safeTstrap™ is within range of the in-home gateway, you will receive alerts to your smartphone or tablet via text, email, or audible notifications

Q: Does Vypin ship anywhere in the world?

A: Currently, Vypin ships anywhere in the U.S and Canada. Please contact Vypin at sales@vypin.com about availability outside of the U.S. and Canada.

Q: Can I order extra straps?

A: Yes, please contact sales@vypin.com, and we will handle your request.

Q: Do multiple straps work with one gateway?

A: Yes, the mobile or in-home gateway reads any and all tags within 300 feet.

Q: Is there a quick release option?

A: Yes, for homes without children, the key may be stored in the safeTstrap™ locking mechanism allowing for fast access in emergency situations while maintaining full functionality.

Q: What guns can I use the safeTstrap™ on?

A: The safeTstrap™ can be used on most handguns, rifles, and shotguns by feeding the strap through the loading chamber and out of the bottom.

Q: Where is the safeTstrap™ made? 

A: safeTstraps™ are made in the northeastern United States.

Q: Are there other applications for the safeTstrap™? 

A: We are concentrating on firearm safety, but our team uses the safeTstrap™  on everything from bicycles to double doors (e.g. ammo containers, gun cabinets, liquor cabinets, tool sheds)

How To Join Referral Program:

 

Joining the referral program to win an Apple HomePod is easy! After backing our campaign, all you have to do is share our page! Remember, the more you share, the higher chance you have to win!

There are two simple ways:

Option 1:

At the top of the page, click the provided links (as shown below) to share!

Option 2:

Click the share links under "Help Us Keep Kids Safe" below!

 

Help Us Keep Kids Safe

 Help Vypin to make gun ownership safer. Share with a friend, a neighbor, and even Brad who sits by you at the office. This all wouldn’t be possible without your support!

 

 

Made in America

Share with a friend, a neighbor, and even Brad who sits by you at the office. This all wouldn’t be possible without your support!  Made in America

story:
It's About Time

This clock is a tastefully mesmerizing timepiece and is great for public spaces, homes, businesses, lobbies, offices.  It is absolutely brilliant in full daylight and captures attention differently in darker environments like bowling allies, restaurants or clubs.  Some wonder if it will be bright enough for their taste?  The answer is yes - it's brilliantly bright, better than any photo can capture!  

The wooden core combines the softness of traditional elements with modern LED back-lit acrylic tiles, perfect for accenting both modern and traditional spaces with unprecedented class.   It communicates simplicity with sophistication.

The clock comes in three quality finishes each of which brings the wood core to life in different ways. We use General Finishes paints, stains and clear coats for their superior durability and quality. 

The clock is designed to either sit on a desk using the included desk stand or hung from a wall with wall anchors.  The cavity in the back of the clock receives the power supply and coiled cord for a flush mount wall configuration or uncoil the cord and it neatly hides behind the stand.  

Rich Variation, Functional and Interesting

Even beautiful things become stale with time. The ability to freshen up the clock with new animations and colors ensures ongoing interest.  Additionally, the ability to precisely choose any color allows you to compliments you decor and spice up that familiar corner of your house or office.

Not only is the enLIGHTen clock beautiful, it's functional.  The clock syncs every minute with a timeserver ensuring that your time will always be perfect. Set your timezone once, enable daylight savings mode and you won't ever need to worry about setting your clock again!  

 

Fifty-two different animations along with adjustable color, variable speed, and situational brightness settings give the user precise control and infinite variation.  Favorite modes are saved in memory so scenes can be recalled quickly and settings are automatically recovered on a power cycle.  

Special holiday modes can add festivity to your house during Halloween, New Years or Christmas. We even have a special mode for pi day where the clock animates the digits of pi for 100 digits every hour (nerdy).

Here's an animation of 15 of the 52 number animations and 12 light ring animations:

Open Source Design

The clock is powered by a web-connected Node MCU ESP8266 and is programmed using popular libraries on the Arduino platform.  The source code for both the software and hardware has already been made public on GitHub for those interested in further development and the build instructions are available here and here.  

Setup

Setup is simple!

Power up your clock, and use a wireless device to search for nearby wireless networks (same process as hopping on the internet at a coffee shop).  You will see a network called, "Clock."  Connect your phone or computer to that network.  A login page will search for your local network and then ask you for your local wireless network password.  After providing it, the clock automatically power cycles.  Now simply visit the address the clock displays on startup (i.e. http://192.168.0.9).  Visiting this address will pull up an intuitive webpage that allows the user to adjust modes, settings, and colors!  

The clock uses web socket technology which means the settings can be adjusted in real-time without the need to press save and refresh the page.  This quick feedback makes the clock settings experience intuitive, interactive and engaging.

 

Tech Specs

  • Weight - 3lbs 
  • Size 18.8" (475 mm) diameter x 1" Thickness
  • 5v, 5A - 2.1mm power adapter
  • Core material - Pine and Spruce
  • 220 LEDs (only 160 actually used) with 120-degree viewing angle and lifespan no less than 50000hrs.
  • Number material - Light diffusing acrylic
  • Production method - Precision CNC machined in the USA for the wood core and laser cutting for the light diffusing acrylic.

 

Customization Options

For those needing precise color matching or custom engraved logos, we have a special package that gives you tier one access to our design artist and CNC operator. Together we will work with you to get a proof approved, a color selected and ship to you the final product.  Choose the reward enLIGHTen Clock & Your Engravings - $499.

Ideas for faceplate engravings include company logos, sports teams (we cannot reproduce copyrighted material), typesetting of important words, etc.  We will help you through every step of the process.

Thank you for your Support!

Sharing on social media is a kindness and we sincerely thank you for those who recommend our product in this way.  We need your help and we thank you for it!

Share on Facebook

Share on Twitter

Risks and challenges

Since the enLIGHTen clock is a web-connected piece of hardware, one of the main challenge is ensuring network compatibility across all network devices in all countries. We are confident we have a stable platform and are leveraging well-tested source code but the environmental variables of the real world do present some unknowns. This is why we have a BETA testing batch of clocks going out 3 months prior to the bulk release to ensure that our source code is bullet-proof prior to release.

The source code is perfectly functional as-is and could be released today; however, we have a desire for some polishing and a few further enhancements. The source is stable and we are excited to release it and have those interested and able continue to improve it.

All our production hurdles have been crossed. Suppliers have been identified and samples purchased to ensure compatibility and quality. We are past prototyping and ready for production.

We have full control over the production process which allows us to identify any problems early on and make quality and efficiency improvements along the way. We are utilizing time-tested techniques in the manufacturing process to ensure consistent, quality results.

It's About TimeThis clock is a tastefully mesmerizing timepiece and is great for public spaces, homes, businesses, lobbies, offices.  It is absolutely brilliant in full daylight and captures attention differently in darker environments like bowling allies, restaurants or clubs.  Some wonder if it will be bright enough for their taste?  The answer is yes - it's brilliantly bright, better than any photo can capture!  The wooden core combines the softness of traditional elements with modern LED back-lit acrylic tiles, perfect for accenting both modern and traditional spaces with unprecedented class.   It communicates simplicity with sophistication.The clock comes in three quality finishes each of which brings the wood core to life in different ways. We use General Finishes paints, stains and clear coats for their superior durability and quality. The clock is designed to either sit on a desk using the included desk stand or hung from a wall with wall anchors.  The cavity in the back of the clock receives the power supply and coiled cord for a flush mount wall configuration or uncoil the cord and it neatly hides behind the stand.  Rich Variation, Functional and InterestingEven beautiful things become stale with time. The ability to freshen up the clock with new animations and colors ensures ongoing interest.  Additionally, the ability to precisely choose any color allows you to compliments you decor and spice up that familiar corner of your house or office.Not only is the enLIGHTen clock beautiful, it's functional.  The clock syncs every minute with a timeserver ensuring that your time will always be perfect. Set your timezone once, enable daylight savings mode and you won't ever need to worry about setting your clock again!   Fifty-two different animations along with adjustable color, variable speed, and situational brightness settings give the user precise control and infinite variation.  Favorite modes are saved in memory so scenes can be recalled quickly and settings are automatically recovered on a power cycle.  Special holiday modes can add festivity to your house during Halloween, New Years or Christmas. We even have a special mode for pi day where the clock animates the digits of pi for 100 digits every hour (nerdy).Here's an animation of 15 of the 52 number animations and 12 light ring animations:Open Source DesignThe clock is powered by a web-connected Node MCU ESP8266 and is programmed using popular libraries on the Arduino platform.  The source code for both the software and hardware has already been made public on GitHub for those interested in further development and the build instructions are available here and here.  SetupSetup is simple!Power up your clock, and use a wireless device to search for nearby wireless networks (same process as hopping on the internet at a coffee shop).  You will see a network called, "Clock."  Connect your phone or computer to that network.  A login page will search for your local network and then ask you for your local wireless network password.  After providing it, the clock automatically power cycles.  Now simply visit the address the clock displays on startup (i.e. http://192.168.0.9).  Visiting this address will pull up an intuitive webpage that allows the user to adjust modes, settings, and colors!  The clock uses web socket technology which means the settings can be adjusted in real-time without the need to press save and refresh the page.  This quick feedback makes the clock settings experience intuitive, interactive and engaging. Tech Specs
Weight - 3lbs 
Size 18.8" (475 mm) diameter x 1" Thickness
5v, 5A - 2.1mm power adapter
Core material - Pine and Spruce
220 LEDs (only 160 actually used) with 120-degree viewing angle and lifespan no less than 50000hrs.
Number material - Light diffusing acrylic
Production method - Precision CNC machined in the USA for the wood core and laser cutting for the light diffusing acrylic.
 Customization OptionsFor those needing precise color matching or custom engraved logos, we have a special package that gives you tier one access to our design artist and CNC operator. Together we will work with you to get a proof approved, a color selected and ship to you the final product.  Choose the reward enLIGHTen Clock & Your Engravings - $499.Ideas for faceplate engravings include company logos, sports teams (we cannot reproduce copyrighted material), typesetting of important words, etc.  We will help you through every step of the process.Thank you for your Support!Sharing on social media is a kindness and we sincerely thank you for those who recommend our product in this way.  We need your help and we thank you for it!Share on FacebookShare on TwitterRisks and challengesSince the enLIGHTen clock is a web-connected piece of hardware, one of the main challenge is ensuring network compatibility across all network devices in all countries. We are confident we have a stable platform and are leveraging well-tested source code but the environmental variables of the real world do present some unknowns. This is why we have a BETA testing batch of clocks going out 3 months prior to the bulk release to ensure that our source code is bullet-proof prior to release.The source code is perfectly functional as-is and could be released today; however, we have a desire for some polishing and a few further enhancements. The source is stable and we are excited to release it and have those interested and able continue to improve it.All our production hurdles have been crossed. Suppliers have been identified and samples purchased to ensure compatibility and quality. We are past prototyping and ready for production.We have full control over the production process which allows us to identify any problems early on and make quality and efficiency improvements along the way. We are utilizing time-tested techniques in the manufacturing process to ensure consistent, quality results.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Craig DeVine, and I teach engineering courses at a local high school. I teach the senior capstone course called Engineering Design and Development (EDD), where students research and develop ideas that help make the world a better place. This campaign comes from an idea that one of my students had called Stove Safe.  Stove Safe is designed with temperature and motion sensors combined with an alarm that will sound when a hot pan has been left unattended on the stove too long, avoiding a possible fire. It is an innovative solution to a potentially dangerous problem. Stove Safe will help many senior citizens and those with short-term memory loss “Live Well,” bringing security and peace of mind while living independently.  Most senior citizens want to live in their own home and remain independent as long as possible.   

What We Need & What You Get

Funding received will allow two EDD students at the high school to design, prototype and test Stove Safe during their senior year. The funds will purchase the necessary components and supplies to construct and program Stove Safe (sensors, raw materials, wiring, software, etc.). As this is also related to education, any remaining funds will go to help other projects in my EDD class and support our engineering program in general at the high school. Even if we don't reach the goal amount, we can still use any funds received to help advance this idea.

 

The Impact

The impact of Stove Safe could potentially be enormous. People across all markets agree that living independently as one ages is important and both younger and senior people are relatively satisfied with products that promote feelings of safety in their home environment. Keeping seniors safely at home longer also reduces medical costs in avoiding pricey and sometimes preventable nursing home admissions and hospitalizations. The average cost for nursing home care in the U.S. is $6,700 a month, so even a modest delay could add up fast. Keeping seniors at home could save billions of dollars a year in medical costs. Functional decline is the main reason elderly people end up in nursing homes. Additionally, researchers at the Harry and Jeanette Weinberg Foundation found keeping seniors at home also makes for more stable communities.  The NGO also found home modifications helped an elderly person live at home for 13 months longer than expected. On the education side, having high schools seniors working on such a meaningful project will develop our next generation of engineers in the best way possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, you can still help this campaign by sharing it with someone who can contribute! Don't forget about the Indiegogo share tools. They can be a great way to help spread the word about Stove Safe. Any and all funds will be greatly appreciated. Thank you.

story:
Are you a fan of Nixie tubes? Are you upset that they are no longer mass-produced?

Millclock has designed and manufactured a new variety of Nixie tubes. We intend to set up their mass production for popular use in technical projects. Nowadays, ZIN18 is the most compact and upgraded Nixie tube on the market. Now, the famous Nixie tube’s shape is elongated, neat, strong, and smart. 

 Meet Reborn ZIN18. The New Super-Compact Nixie tube! 

The name “ZIN” is a blend of the Z class and IN class Nixie lamps. It took us profound research and hard work to transform the two classes into one. Conceptually, first we modernized a beautiful base which is used in the Z class tubes. Then, we elongated a small IN18 Nixie tube with digits measuring 44 mm in height., and mounted it in the base. We strengthened the entire piece to create the modern adaptation of the Reborn ZIN18 super-compact Nixie tube  using modern equipment. Most of the Nixie tubes that are used in technical projects are taken from the 50-year-old storages. We offer a modern Nixie tube which can be used in a wide variety of different projects, providing a modern more widely available alternative to the older original Nixie tube components which are becoming harder and harder to find. 

The Manufacturing Process
 The manufacturing of this beautiful tube is like creating an art piece like mechanical clocks, perfume, or gem jewelry. The process is quite intricate and mesmerizing with all of its milestones elaborated. First, we manually assemble 47 best quality components of the envelope. Then, we form the glass tube and the thread in special machines, and put the whole piece in the “ovens” with temperatures as high as 1,000 degrees °C. Then, we anneal it, infuse mixture of pure gasses, and finally test it on the stand. Such procession results in highly strengthened glass of the tube and leak-free seal at the bottom part of the tube. And those are the two main checkpoints of the tube’s long service lifetime. The service life of a Reborn ZIN18 Nixie tube is about 20 years or 200,000 hours of uninterrupted work 24/7. Owing to such manufacturing process and scientific approach, the tubes components can be only worn out due to the aging of its materials. 

                                                               Energy saving lamps
 ZIN18 is a low energy-consuming lamp with minimum supply voltage of 170V, minimum cathode current of 5mA, and maximum cathode current of 8mA.   

                                                                    3 Stylish Brands 

 Reborn ZIN18 tubes are available with three varieties of bases depending on your style and preference:  

  • polished
  • aluminum,   
  • black anodized, and sand blasted aluminum.    

The tubes with all the three base varieties are very stylish and constitute different brands of the Reborn ZIN18 Nixie tubes - glamorous, deep, and underground.  

                                                                         Smart base
 To make the ZIN18 tubes smarter, the Z class base has been upgraded to a smart-base. Each base has a seating that consists of a programmable circuit mini board to control the nixie tube. Also, it is made as a place-saving base and holds a spare place for under-lighting components. Such construction provides more extra space in your project for additional hardware and technology if required.
 Also, the ZIN18 cathode digits can easily be programmed to display exact time and other valuable data. The digits have a wide variety of visual effects. They can be adjusted to slowly or quickly transform from one digit to another, which looks phantasmagorical, especially in the dark.   
 Happy owners of Nixie tubes are often delighted to observe the mere natural process, when electric current crawls in gas over the cathode numbers while showing data. And managing electric movement in the setting mode, while watching the clock in life, seems to be even more breathtaking for the owners.   
 To create a moody effect throughout your premises, you can switch on the under lighting. The software allows for a vast range of colors and visual effects of under lighting that would create any mood in your premises – parting, romantic, or relaxing. 

 To manufacture Reborn ZIN18, it is pledged for a start-up’s price. 

The packages include 1, 4, and 6 nixie tubes. They can be used in making clocks and other numeric indication devices. For example, one Nixie tube can be programmed to show time consecutively - first displaying hours then minutes. While four Nixie tubes can be used to indicate time digits with simultaneous hours and minutes displayed. Finally, using six tubes you can simultaneously display hours, minutes, and seconds.
 Pledging for one tube is a good choice for your own project or you can used it as a gift since it a new advanced and state of the art piece of technology that carries “As Is” value.
 4 and 6 tube packages can be a special gift for any person who is into electronics and know their way around a soldering iron. They are very simple, reliable, and beautiful to use in new devices. You just have to place them on board, do simplified programming, attach the casing or base of your choice, and enjoy your own creation for many years. If you want a new design, you can always change the casing or base and proceed using these beautiful ZIN18 lamps in a new device. With this compact and elongated shape of the lamps, the devices always look exquisite and neat.

 New ZIN18 Reborn Nixie Clock With Six New ZIN18 Tubes! 

 The elongated, neat, smart, and super-compact ZIN18 Nixie tubes found their new place in our ZIN18 Reborn Nixie clock.   
 Can there be a more ostentatious way to express yourself than with this modern and beautiful, multifunctional and easy, historic and cutting-edge time indicating machine? It is an investment and gift for individuals and companies that sure will make an impression. 

Despite the fact that the nixie tubes are made of steel-glass, they come complete with an additional glass outer casing that not only protects the delicate electronics but also allows the clock to be admired from any angle.   

                                                              Control via Application
 ZIN18 Reborn Nixie clock comes with software and a companion smartphone application that is available for both iOS and Android — allowing users to control the Nixie tubes or clock directly from their smartphone.. The companion application will enable you to tweak the behavior of the clock, and alter visual effects of the Nixie tubes and lighting. In the dark, visual effects are especially expressive, while the clock’s effects look like floating electricity in glass when it’s light.
                                                               Control via Touch pad
 ZIN18 Nixie clock supports censor communication and is fitted with a touchpad. It is located on the front side of the glass casing, allowing you to better view the changes in the clock’s behavior. Many happy owners adore setting their Nixie clock and watching it run from a close distance. It is not surprising, as it is absolutely amazing to watch the 6 stalls 10 digits each in a glass case to chase electric current and make an orange glow from discharged gas. This can fascinate the entire family, your colleagues, or clients. Changing the clock’s behavior is possible by supplying little punches of electricity to one of the digits via a small thread that in its turn is connected to the circuit.
                                                                      Software pack
 The ZIN Nixie clock’s software pack encompasses all the functions that are binding for basic functioning of the clock and a vast variety of other features. You are going to enjoy every moment with this clock. It includes a touch pad, mobile application, time synchronization via the Internet, correction of accuracy, alarm, hourly chimes, spectacular cathode anti-poisoning, pre-defined theme modes, summertime auto-switch, as well as the ability to tweak the clocks appearance and setting modes.. The application is very easy and user-friendly. All you need to do is to authorize the device. And it will synchronize the time automatically. Reborn ZIN18 Nixie tube software is provided free of charge and comes with recommendations from the development team on best practices when tweaking and changing settings. 

You can easily adjust not only the ZIN clock’s behavior but also select its brand to match your expectations. 

 ZIN18 Reborn Nixie clock bases are available in three different hues to match the three types of the Nixie tubes styles available taking the form of fair, dark, and grey. Each design has its own charm. Fans of beautiful technologies would agree that they all ostentatiously contribute to the Renaissance of the Nixie clocks making. The price of the pledge is the same for each design and will contribute to mass production of the super-compact, new type of Nixie tubes. 

 About Millclock
 The Millclock team is based in Ukraine and specializes in electronics and information technology. We have hands on devices and appliances that work on Nixie tubes indication technology and create them manually. Three-four Millclockers started from a small Nixie tube clock for the ones, whom they loved. Now, our range includes diverse series of clocks, watches, and thermometers. What makes Millclock  really different is the fact that we give our customers an opportunity to choose the set of functions in any of the clock models.
 Our team brings together talented ninja developers (developer polyglots), technical dreamers, and agitated managers. We admire adventurers and gigs. We cherish self-development and value of synergy. We are committed to popularizing technologies, just like Nixies, that were filtered by time and preserved by people. Since there appears a great interest in making Nixie devices, we adhere to modernizing Nixie tubes and making their mass production for general use possible. We modernize obsolete technologies and develop in new directions, such as IoT (internet of things). We always offer discounts, and keep our products accessible. We invite you to join our community and share our affections. 

  Warranty and communion 

 We offer a 15-year warranty on the range of Reborn ZIN18 Nixie ltubes and one year on the components in the Nixie tube clock. Also, the clock owners are welcome to refer to our professional Support center any time after the warranty ends. We are always open to communication and will be glad to be of help to our community.   

Risks and challenges

Risks and challenges

We made everything necessary for calculation, organization, and scheduling of the funds, time, and resources for production and delivery of items. So, you are most likely to get them early this spring. We can’t control when Kickstarter transfers us the money, and when the delivery companies deliver you the items.

If there is a delay caused by one of the two things mentioned above or by any other third party, we will keep you informed in the Updates section. This section will also contain manufacturing and delivery progress. We will make sure everything goes as smooth as possible when you order your super-compact Nixie tubes or your beautiful ZIN18 Nixie clock.
If there is a delay with any of this chain pillars, ours or of the third party, we are going to keep you informed and make a note in the Updates section. This section will also contain all the progress that we will be making while manufacturing and sending you your items. We want you to feel calm and happy, when you get your super-compact Nixie tubes or your beautiful ZIN18 Nixie clock.

story:
Bloomengine, a beautiful smart planter, offers the new concept of indoor green life for all plant lovers! 

With Bloomengine’s innovative technology, plants can be monitored, watered, and cared for any time, anywhere. Bloomengine is perfect for the plant-lover looking to experience a seed sprout, bud, and bloom in the convenience of their own home.

 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 You can easily customize environmental conditions for your plants via the Bloomengine application available for Android and iOS devices. Watering and lighting times can be scheduled and even time-lapse settings can be set according to you or your plant's preferences.

 

<Controlled Habitat For Delicate Plant>

 

Bloomengine’s water tank can store up to 40oz of water so that you do not have to worry about re-filling it for anywhere during 1 month. The internal water pump which keeps the water circulating ensures that the water inside the tank always stays fresh.

<A pump in the upper & lower tank circulates the water.>

 Watering the plant in Bloomengine can be done without going through the process of opening and closing the water tank or lid. You can pour the water right over the top and simply enjoy the sight of water flowing down.

 

The compressed soil we provide can be stored for an extended period of time when stored in a dry area before its use. To plant the seed, simply soak the compressed soil with water and place the seed on top of it. The soil is easy to replace even when you need to re-pot a plant and naturally decomposes to ease your burden. 

 

LED lighting chips are installed underneath the top portion of the device and provides an adequate amount of light necessary for plants to grow indoors. The lighting chips also emit a warm light to provide an elegant atmosphere for any interior.

We have applied enough brightness (about 10~25k lux) and light wavelength (about 380nm~780nm) of LED lighting to Bloomengine shown so you can easily grow plants indoors.

The elegant RGB light will change colors (it doesn't affect the plants) to match the atmosphere of the room. You can control the color of light through the Bloomengine smartphone app. 

 

A fan installed in Bloomengine for the ventilation of fresh air. This accelerates the plant growth by supporting the plant’s transpiration process. You will be able to see the leaves waving by the wind created by the fan.

<The micro-fan inside circulates the air.>

<Plants dance with wind>

 

The integrated Full HD camera shows your plant's real-time status by capturing a photo. You can select the time-lapse function to record the unbelievable moments of your plant growing during each stage. 

<Timelapse example of a daisy growing>

 

 

 

 

※ Depending on the seed germination rate and indoor environmental conditions, using Bloomengine may not bud.(Typical seed germination rate about 70 ~ 90%, recommended room temperature 74 ~ 83 ℉ / 22 ~ 28 ℃)

 

 

 

*Selected one of '5 most innovative products - Consumer Electronics show'

 

 

 

 

 

 

Participated Exhibition in 2017-2018

 

Bloomengine aims to provide an environment of indoor cultivation for plants using the latest technology. Why?

Save Plants From Extinction

Across the planet, plants are threatened with extinction and are expected to disappear within several years. Beautiful flowers you see now could be considered historic species for future generations.

To prevent further plant extinction, Bloomengine will continue to develop newer products and share data on plants to safely and effectively cultivate an environment that can save plants from extinction. 

 

Plant Book and Dictionary

Today, we can gather facts about plants from only photos and vague data. It is difficult to understand information about plants or to experience a wonderful moment like a flower's first bloom with such non-descriptive information.

Our plan is for Bloomengine users to share growth information with each other like sprouting times, growth progress, and first blooms with the best environmental condition and time-lapse videos, so people can easily understand the plant's lifecycle. This would be shared in our community or on Wikipedia as text data or GIF files.

 

Share The Moment

Our goal is not only to make better conditions for your plant indoors but also to help build bonds between people and plants.

We believe that Bloomengine will help everyone understand plants better and share the amazing moments of plants with others.

 

For A Better Place

We want to create better interior spaces through Bloomengine.

Bloomengine's design goals are (1) Making it easy to grow plants indoors. (2) It does not make the product stand out, but instead, makes the plant stand out. (3) It uses a simple design that will suit various indoor spaces.

You can make your interior space more special with Bloomengine. Always be with your pet-plants in your own home.

 

 

 

 

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes. As many of you know, our terms of sale for international orders are FOB Destination. This means that we will not be able to cover all freight and duties or taxes.

SHIPPING POLICY

We use a shared post shipping method to have your order delivered at an affordable price. Your order will be handled by either UPS, USPS, or DHL up to the entry point in your country. Once your order enters your country your package will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. International transit will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time. U.S Domestic shipments will take 3-5 business days.

Risks and challenges

Why Indiegogo
- We are developing a new version of Bloomengine Color/Vision based on the first sample (Bluetooth version) which was successful. We hope to introduce our existence worldwide and to find supporters who have the same challenge we want to achieve. The pledges from supporters will be used for development and production.

Challenge 
- What we are planning with Bloomengine is about a future life with plants beyond the Indiegogo campaign, hoping to share planting experience through our community and Wikipedia to prevent plant extinction and to practice plant book. It would be helpful to save the world and also serve as an educational method for future generations. To realize this goal, an Indiegogo campaign is the first step for Bloomengine, to offer more joyful planting with AR and VR, showing insects and butterflies for your plant's condition analysis in the future.

story:
Go Solar

Solar energy is clean, unlimited, and other than popular belief it does not have to be expensive. Unfortunately many people today believe that installing a solar system at home is too costly and that it takes way too long to make up the upfront investment.

The mission of GoSolar is to make solar energy easily available and affordable for everyone, reduce our dependence on fossil fuels and contribute to creating a healthy, sustainable environment.

Our goal is to offer a solar energy system for residential and commercial buildings (that means your home or business) at a small flat monthly payment and at absolutely no upfront costs, neither for the solar panels, nor any other equipment, nor the installation. The monthly payment will be approximately 50% of your current monthly electricity bill, hence saving you about $50 - 100 per month. And did we already mention that it will cost you absolutely nothing upfront? So you can start saving immediately and for a long time. Over 20 years, which is how long the solar panels are guaranteed to work, you'll save approximately $24,000 in electricity costs; that means you and your family can take some beautiful vacations. And if you invest the money you save over this time period at 8% per year, you'll get an additional $27,000. So you'll be able to save over $50,000 towards retirement, just by using our solar energy system instead of buying it from your current utility company.


What We Need & What You Get

This project is to install a prototype system and validate that it works as expected. For this initial phase of the project we need a total $25,000 for the following:

  • $15,000 for solar panels and other equipment (inverter, grid-tie, etc)
  • $10,000 for installation 

We have high confidence that it will work, so we are offering that we will install a system at your home at no upfront cost to you once our company is fully funded. 

Please help us to fund this project and realize our mission to make solar energy easily available and affordable for everyone, reduce our dependence on fossil fuels and contribute to creating a healthy, sustainable environment.

And please help us to get the word out. Tell your friends, family and everyone you know about it. Remember, they too can save a lot of money and help to protect the environment.

story:
Have You Ever Been Bitten by a Bed Bug?

In case you haven't, let me quickly introduce this parasite to you.
Bed bugs are small insects between 4 and 5 cm long which feed on human blood.
They usually prefer warm places and live close to or inside human beds, or sleeping areas. When people go to sleep, they come out and feed on their hosts' blood, who do not even notice.  

Bug crawling over one of the mattresses in the bedroom.


What Would You Do If Your Own Family Was Affected?

Just imagine these nasty little parasites suddenly infest your own family's home.
You wake up one day and find little bite marks all over your body that itch like hell. You don't know where they've come from and you seem to be getting more and more every night. Just imagine saying goodnight, sleep tight to your loved ones, knowing that the bed bugs will bite once again.


Plug socket used by the bugs as a nest.


Why I Need Your Help 

My own family is confronted with a real plague of bed bugs. Since autumn 2012 they have not been able to sleep properly because the attempts to exterminate the parasites have all failed. 
My little sister, my mum and my dad have been suffering from itchy rashes due to continuous scratching for more than two years. 
My parents' landlords have already hinted that they are unwilling to finance any extermination in the future and my family don't have the money to pay for it themselves.


Another nest between the wall and the ceiling.


What You Will Get in Return

  • Pledge €2 and get a Thank You Postcard from my family.
  • Pledge €6 and get a Thank You Photo from my family.
  • Pledge €10 and get a personal Thank You letter and a video message from my little sister.
  • Pledge €25 and get a Water Colour Painting and a video message from my little sister.


Why This is to Do with Social Responsibility 

  • You may think "why should I help those people, I don't even know them."
  • If we want to live in a world in which we stand together and help others in hopeless situations - no matter who they are or where they're from - it is time to start now.
  • People shouldn't be ashamed to speak openly about matters such as this - there's nothing to be embarrassed about if we're all on the same side.
 

Chances and Challenges

In order to finally do away with this plague, we need to raise enough money to afford the costs for a meticulous extermination, also including the clearance of the entire flat. This is not going to be an easy one as the parasites may return again, but we are hopeful that we will manage once we have the financial possibilities.

This is how are going to go about this nerve-wracking issue, once we have enough money:

  • Clear the entire flat, including all furniture and movable objects.
  • Hire a competent exterminator to perform a thorough extermination in the flat.
  • Ask friends & other relatives to host my mum, sister and dad whilst the flat is uninhabitable.
  • Return to the flat once it is ensured that all bed bugs have been killed.


If You Cannot Contribute Financially

If you cannot help financially, it would be amazing if you could declare your solidarity with my family and ask friends or relatives whether they would be willing to contribute. Check out Indiegogo's various features and tools to inform others about my family's situation.

story:
WHAT ARE MICROSCAPE MODELS?

Microscape architectural models celebrate the sculptural beauty of cities in durable panels that make incredibly distinctive gifts, decorative accents for home or office, and mementos of the most important moments -- and places -- in our lives.

 

 


They're 3D-printed from our own accurate, up-to-date aerial scan data, meaning that they can evolve along with the built environment. Because we manually process all of that data to make it printable, they can also include buildings still under construction or still in planning.

We intend to cover major cities across the US and around the world, but our initial proving ground has been the city of New York. (We figure if we can make models of here, we can make models of anywhere...)
 

 

 

YOU CAN OWN THIS TOWN

Our flagship Manhattan Collection is a set of over 200 modular panels that - alone or grouped together - can serve as a beautifully sculptural decorative accent or full-wall treatment, an incredibly unique gift commemorating special events and places, or a functional, fully accurate context model in which to test architectural and urban design concepts. 
 

Designed by architects for architects - and everyone else - the Microscape Manhattan Collection is an elegantly understated way for anyone who has ever visited, lived in or been inspired by the city of New York to show their appreciation for one of the world’s greatest metropolitan centers.
 

 

 


MICROSCAPE HISTORY

We introduced Microscape models to the world with a successful crowdfunding campaign in February, raising over 1000 percent of our goal. 

We’ve already begun delivering models to our original backers and opened up pre-orders via the Microscape website. When we received an invitation to tell the IndieGoGo community about what we’re doing through the InDemand program, we thought it would be a great way to reach even more people.
 

 

 


SOME OF THE PERKS

Individual Microscape models will be sold at a retail price of $125. By placing a pre-order now, you can reserve one or more of the over 200 panels in the Manhattan Collection for only $95. 


Below are some of the most sought after models in the collection - the links below each picture lead to additional images and information:
 

 

 

03-B | The World Trade Center
 

 

09-E | The Empire State Building
 

09-F | The Chrysler Building
 

10-E | Times Square
 

09-D | Madison Square Garden

 

10-F | St. Patrick's Cathedral & Park Avenue
 

11-E | Carnegie Hall
 

11-F | The Plaza Hotel


...and some suggested combinations of panels:
 

06-C | NYU West and 06-D | NYU East
 


07-D | Union Square Park and 07-E | Gramercy Park and 08-D | The Flatiron Building and 08-E Madison Square Park
 

OUR GOAL

By ordering Microscape models now, you’ll get the benefit of substantially discounted pre-order pricing. You’ll also be helping us to expand our production capacity further, speeding up delivery of your pre-orders and all others. With enough support, coverage of other cities, introduction of more material and color options and availability of custom models can all happen more quickly.

Our ultimate goal is to scan and print every inhabited part of the planet. Yes, really.  With your help, we believe we can do it.
 

 

 

 

CONTACT US

http://www.microscape.co/
e. info@microscape.co
p. 212.213.4289
 
https://www.facebook.com/microscape.co/ 
https://twitter.com/microscape_co 
https://www.instagram.com/microscape.co/

story:
Short Summary

My dream is to build a business driven by Love, Light, and Gratitude. 

For the past few years I've been on an exciting adventure, following my curiosity, diving into all areas of personal growth, with an emphasis on self love and a mind body soul connection.
This past year has been both exceptionally challenging and rewarding, and I felt called more than ever to translate my knowledge and experience into service. 

I wanted to create a space that inspires and enables others to find and be their own best self, to feel empowered through love and positivity and liberated from the fears and doubts that hold them back. 
I began growing my brand and online presence, sharing my inspiration, practices and resources, but I wanted to connect deeper.

A major game changer for me was Danielle LaPorte's Desire Map.


It gave me the push to do the work and really figure out what it was that I wanted, based on the simple principle of asking myself "How do I want to feel?" and the permission to live my life in the direction of those feelings. 

I have been sharing her work for years, and finally decided that this was the year to get a Desire Map Licence and to create workshops to help others navigate their way to living a life that feels good. 

These workshops would offer participants the opportunity to be guided through the key steps of the Desire Map and getting clear on how they want to feel.
I will also be incorporating other aspects of my persona practices, with group meditations, aromatheraphy, healthy recipes and more. 


With my move to Australia taking up most of my time and resources, the plan was to get settled, back on our feet and then invest in the Licence Program in March, but circumstance has intervened.
The registration to get my Licence for this year closes January 31st, and so to fulfil my dream and vision for 2016, I need your help! I am ready to invest 100% into this project, but can't comfortably cover the cost upfront, so I am asking for you to invest in me, my brand and my vision.

By supporting my campaign, you will not only be helping to make my dreams come true, but in turn be spreading light to everyone who will be touched and changed through my work. 


What We Need & What You Get

The Desire Map will be the core of the workshops which is why it is vital to obtain access to the the Licence Program.
I am only looking to fund the upfront cost of the Licence program which is $2000 USD. 


Participation in this campaign will get you any or all of the following!

  • Good Vibes and Gratitude 
  • Love, Light & Gratitude/ Desire Map Products 
  • A spot in one of my workshops

*All funds will go directly to obtaining my Desire Map Licence.



Other Ways You Can Help

  • Good Vibes - Seriously, I would fully appreciate you just taking a minute to imagine me reaching my goal! 
  • Share this campaign! If you know anyone that you think would like to be a part of my workshop in the coming year, or any of the other incentives please pass this on!

    Thank you & Big Big Love
    Veronica

I am ready to invest 100% into this project, but can't comfortably cover the cost upfront, so I am asking for you to invest in me, my brand and my vision.By supporting my campaign, you will not only be helping to make my dreams come true, but in turn be spreading light to everyone who will be touched and changed through my work.     What We Need & What You Get The Desire Map will be the core of the workshops which is why it is vital to obtain access to the the Licence Program. I am only looking to fund the upfront cost of the Licence program which is $2000 USD. 
Participation in this campaign will get you any or all of the following!


Good Vibes and Gratitude 

Love, Light & Gratitude/ Desire Map Products 
A spot in one of my workshops


*All funds will go directly to obtaining my Desire Map Licence.   
    
    Other Ways You Can Help  Good Vibes - Seriously, I would fully appreciate you just taking a minute to imagine me reaching my goal! 

Share this campaign! If you know anyone that you think would like to be a part of my workshop in the coming year, or any of the other incentives please pass this on!Thank you & Big Big LoveVeronica

story:
Visit Our Newest Campaign at: http://igg.me/at/MPP2/x/2616711 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A NEW, CLEAN & RENEWABLE SOURCE OF POWER FOR THE WORLD'S ENVIRONMENTAL & ENERGY FUTURE

 

 

Our poles are melting, our ocans are rising, our climate is changing, plants and animals are in decline. Our environment is in distress.

 

(NASA Study)

 

We propose that we have an energy solution that replaces fossil fuels with affordable clean energy which curbs toxic and greenhouse gas emissions in the next 2-5 years.  

 

Would you help support our efforts to implementation this clean energy technology solution into society?  Here is why we are asking for your help:  A Plan to Save Our Environment       

 

 

Marine Power Products (MPP), a self funded research/developer of clean and renewable energy conversion technology based on Active Ion Displacement (or AID).  

AID is the science of converting hot water to hydrogen fuel.  AID allows for the conversion of low cost energy from hot water into high grade hydrogen (H2) and oxygen (O2) gases.  Low grade heat can be found everywhere and hydrogen can be used as a fuel to power our cars, generate our electricity, reduce pollutants at fossil fired power plants and produce compounds that society uses every day.

 

Currently produced hydrogen comes from processes (like natural gas and electricity) ultimately produce significant amounts of carbon dioxide which are greenhouse gases that impact our environment.  

 

AID is different.  AID uses low temperature heat sources as energy instead of natural gas and electricity.  This difference is what makes AID so special and ultimately vitally important to our worlds energy security.

 

When combined with heat sources such as a geothermal wells,  solar heat, industrial process that emit heat, or the heat from combustion, AID allows society to produce clean and renewable energy for clean living, minimizing impact on all of our health and the environment.  

 

What Has Been Completed to Date

For over 8 years, many lab scale experiments have been conducted and several prototypes have been built and tested.  In early 2011 the US Air Force, Sandia National Labs and the DOE conducted an Assessment of the potential for the AID science and technology.   Five patents have been filed so far (spanning 12 potential future patents) and we are currently working on 5 follow-on improvement patents.  A team of 30 scientists, engineers and technical experts have developed the AID science and technology over time and now are ready to build a commercial pilot plant.

 

 

Our Next Steps

Our goal is to build and demonstrate the AID technology's capability at the industrial scale. We are staging our progress funding $250K into 3 separate phases:

  • Phase 1, $90K, Purchase Components and Equipment - Secure all equipment necessary for the build-out.
  • Phase 2, $90K,  Product Assembly - Assemble the Pilot plant. 
  • Phase 3, $70K,  Testing and Demonstration - Develop, adjust, tweak, and stabilize the hydrogen production pilot plant.

In the current Phase, Phase 1, we are raising money to purchase components, parts, equipment and the overhead to support the  pilot plant.

 

Engineering designs and build-up plans for the industrial scale pilot plant have already just recently been completed.  The pilot will be installed at a low grade and currently unused geothermal site.  It is anticipated to initially produce between 5 kWt and 10 kWt of thermal energy in hydrogen. We believe AID will prove out within 120 days from receipt of full project funding. The pilot will be a working model for demonstrating the significance and importance of heat conversion to hydrogen energy to many various industries, an important beginning.  

 

The Risks

There are risks with our project.  Our previous models have established that the process does in fact work.  The science has been reviewed by the scientific and engineering communities.  The actual process is however, inherently unstable and requires computer process control. There are process control and software adjustments that we need to make as we scale the equipment up.  

 

We have world class engineers and scientists assisting us to do that.  We anticipate the system will break 100 times and be fixed  the same amount.  With persistence, it will develop into a smooth running industrial scale pilot plant.

 

Even if our project is only partially funded, we will still continue to apply resources to the development of the technology, and continue seeking funding for the balance needed. 

 

In Closing

Our perks are items you can use daily.  These items have been selected to provide you with a reminder of your contribution toward the development of potentially important technology, a technology that just may make our world a better place to live. We have intentionally been conservative with the cost of these perks to create the best opportunity for our success.  

 

If making a contribution is a challenge at this time, please help by spreading the word about AID by sharing this link with your friends and family through email, facebook and other social media.

 

We are working hard for a cleaner and more sustainable world for all of us. 

 

Thank you for your support!

 

Jeffrey Carey

Marine Power Products

Marine Power Products

story:
We're Getting Married!

This Indiegogo has been set up to give our family and friends the opportunity to give presents for our wedding. Here's how we met...

 

Chris's Story - I met Rita at a friend's pic-nic in Knightsbridge in London in April 2011. She lived in Bristol but I couldn't bear our time apart so she moved in to my shared house in August. I didn't for a moment doubt inviting her to live with me and I knew I couldn't let her get away. I proposed in Rome in November. I carried a ring around Rome to all those stunningly romantic places everyone tells you about but it was back at our quiet hotel room, with a pic-nic of local foods on the bed and glasses of Prosecco on the balcony over looking a beautiful park that I proposed. 

It took us month's to find a home, but finally we moved in to our first place in February this year. 

 

Rita's Story - I met Chris at a very good friend of mine, while my sister was with me on her summer vacations. The weather was perfect for an April picnic, we got on very well from the very beginning. Next day Chris invited me to his homemade Sunday Roast, and thats what stole my heart ;). Since then we've become almost unseparatable. i knew straight away he was very special: caring, loving, romantic, crazy....! It is a big blessing to share my life with my baby squirrel Chris.

 

The Plan! - We were lucky to know some people moving away from England and were able to buy most of the things we needed for our flat from them in one go. So rather than add more glasses, toaster's and other stuff to our little home we thought we would instead ask you to help us buy a car for our little family. 

As thanks for helping us raise money for our car we're using our contacts to give you something back too. We'll be producing a beautiful little book containing pictures and momentoes from our wedding day for you to remember as we will. We'll be sending this to everyone and will have a digital version for friends as well.   

We're not specifically trying to hit any target (Indiegogo requires you set an actual target) but will use whatever money raised to get the most reliable car that we can use to visit family and friends as well as get to work.If we go over the target all the money will go towards getting a more reliable car and contribute towards us having a nice honeymoon somewhere.

You'll see you have the opportunity to choose several PERKS which are basically fun gifts of different amounts we dreamed up to help you envision us building the car from all the gifts. All the money goes in to the same pot so don't worry what they're called!

Indiegogo only shows amounts in dollars, so if you're not sure exactly what the amounts are below just check www.xe.com for the exchange rate. A good rule of thumb is 1.55 US$ = £1. 

 

Looking forward to seeing you all on our special day on the 22nd September 2012!

Chris & Rita

story:
The Doctor Livingstone campaign nr. 1. 

I am doing for 25 years voluntary Medical & Surgical work as MD in the poorest regions of the poorest countries in the world. I am European (Belgian) - American.   I live on donations my self although I am a specialized MD (Tropical Diseases, First Assistant Maxilo-Cranio-Facial Surgery). Some call me a kind of modern "Dr. Livingstone". Basically, I need to decide every day about life and death! Why? Because since Sept. 11, my organization receive not many donations and - to say the truth - I don't want to waste my time going from here to there trying to raise some funds. See also www.DoctorsOnMission.org I am the only Western MD and work through local medical teams wherever I arrive. We always go as far inland as we possible can and set up clinics and orphanages when possible.For example, I worked during earthquake Bolivia (1998); Earthquake Haiti (Jan. 2010); Hurricane Sandy (end 2012); Super tyfoon Philippines on isolated Island (Bantanyan Island). Bantanyan Island was in the eye of this Tyfoon after it passed Tacloban (Leyte Island). I do this full time and spend extended time on the field. I refuse to stay in cities but only want to go where no Doctor goes.You can also check my Facebook (see especially end year reports about N. Pakistan, Bolivia, Haiti and Philippines). 

I am currently working in Inland Haiti and sitting there with too many orphans. This was not my intention. As I am the only "white" here, hundreds of small children rushed to me for help...I could already give clothes and a cup of rice a day for a 200 in Morency. In the mountains (Artibonite), a 300 more are waiting. I hate to spend time in the West to just "raise" funds as my time is a lot more valuable on the Mission field. 

I want to give these orphans shelter, schooling and medicines... They are very lovely kids (see FB) and they need our help. It's important for me. I know they will possibly die otherwise.... 

Maybe I am too idealistic but maybe there are some people who believe in what I do after checking me out. We have of course big needs there too to get the medicines and provide education. Same in the other countries... Currently, Philippine children are dying in refugee camps, minority groups in N. Pakistan as Taliban is waging a war their with their famous suicide bombers and doing horrible things there. We are currently also helping a lot in North Pakistan where a famine started in Feb. 2014. Many children already died. In Bolivia I worked for first time in 1986 in poor state hospitals and then I have set up teams to reach the Quetchua's (Inca's) in the Andes, several tribes in the Bolivian Amazon and also the Guaranies in the South.

But now, I want to focus on Haiti being here. These children need shelter, sanitary conditions, education and medication in Morency and surroundings and same in Manceaux and surroundings. We already have two small clinics but can't even put the needed medicines or contract a nurse. Nobody has ever paid me any consultation in 25 years as I prefer to work with the poorest of the poor. I have a board, all is tax deductible but we have no people who do some effort to raise funds. 

All support will go for the 100% for this need. 

What We Need & What You Get

I need donations for shelter for all these orphans!!! Also food, medicines and educational tools and some sanitary conditions. 

All funding goes directly to my organization and there is a board and this board will take care that these funds go to Haiti. I don't need them myself. I have friends who support me at least for the necessary. 

I also brought Haitian children over to Gent, Belgium to give them surgery for free (also transportation, follow-up), etc.. There faces were all crippled and I have been first assistant in Craneo-Maxilo-Facial Surgery. I also studied tropical diseases, etc...

I want to make this world a better world for the needy and hurt. Mainly children and young (often pregnant) women who are alone and have no means to survive with their other 5 - 10 children. Of course, we teach how to prevent through my local teams... 

So, funds go for 100% to Haiti, just write Haiti on donation. 

The Impact

The impact is obvious. Currently 28.000 children under five years die every day from just 5 common diseases! That's "Why I do what I do".  I wrote an article about it. We want to bring this number down. That's like each day a 100 planes with each 280 children under five fall down let's say in New York. Then, it would be more then world news. Now, it's too often forgotten as these children live in the forgotten corners of this world.  

Worst are not the death, even if these are 243.000 or 255.000 in Earthquake Haiti They even don't know yet if 12.000 more or less died! It's that bad... The biggest problem for me and my teams are the wounded, the hurt, the diseases long after Emergency teams has left because they just follow CNN and other main media channels to get the first funds as they are too well structured but work with big administrative expenses. We not!  All administration is done by me or through some volunteers. 

When "Breaking News" becomes "Old News" the real misery start. Wounded are - as for my calculation - 1.5 till 2 times more then death. 

I don't believe that I need to explain while this project is so valuable to the world... 

This question from Indiegogo and Crow funds is not needed to asked as for my work. It's obvious!!! I prefer to work with local doctors and nurses and local workers as we need them to train and put in the right spot. Only problem, they don't have money neither as they come from these regions. Western medical teams come for a week or so and spend on an average 50.000$ while not knowing the local language, culture or not going inland but staying in the main cities as Port au Prince (Haiti), La Paz (Bolivia), Islamabad (Pakistan), etc...  Who will do follow up? Health Care doesn't work like this! You know! 

I have been setting up many clinics in Bolivian Inland (Andes), done medical outreaches in Bolivian Amazon and Chaco (Guarani Region) near Paraguay boarder, set up 3 clinics in Haiti (Carrefour, Morency and Manceaux) and set up a clinic in N. Pakistan (Toba Tek Singh) as minority groups are bad treated in Muslim hospitals or even receive lethal injections in several muslim hospitals (I heard it on the spot itself). I am often myself in big danger as I work with minority groups and Taliban, Extreme Muslims (Paksitan); Drug maffia (Bolivian Amazon), etc.. does not want this. In the Bolivian Amazon, they wanted to kill me as I of course could not pay what they wanted (Santa Ana De Yacuma, Beni, Bolivia ---> see drugwars in the 90's by search on google). 

I speak Flemish (I am originally from the Flanders), Dutch, French, Spanish, English and have studied Quetchua (Inca language), German, Greek and Latin. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Doctors, nurses can help in these inland countries if they speak at least the most common language of these countries (Spanish for Bolivia, French for Haiti and English is acceptable for N. Pakistan. They will work with the local Medical staff but can't depend on me as I am traveling to 1/ give the example to the local teams 2/ Follow-up of the teams 3/ Administrative supervision to avoid corruption.

Other help might be to set up promotion campaigns or write grants! I need ambassadors for my work without being too depended on me. I am just too busy...
