story:
Let’s face it, today's garbage cans…. are garbage! They have too many problems. They’re usually designed to be hidden, which makes them less accessible for everyday use. Garbage often piles up causing odors and attracting insects into your home. They’re also pretty ugly. As for the bags, they’re not much better. They never fit properly and constantly fall in on themselves. They leak, they tear, and they can’t handle any significant weight if they’re not doubled up. Worst of all, plastic bags are a detriment to our environment, polluting our oceans and filling landfills by the millions. 

That's where Canbi comes in. Canbi looks great and is meant to be shown off in your home. With its sleek design and customizable colour palette, it's sure to compliment any room of your home. With this focus on visual appeal, you won't want to hide Canbi under your kitchen sink where nobody can see it. You can proudly put it on display making it super accessible at all times.

 

Canbi has some really unique features that differentiate it from the common household garbage receptacle. We wanted to create a garbage can that was easy to use, and solved all of the major problems we found with other cans on the market. 

Canbi's latex liners aren't just environmentally friendly, they're also specially configured to make them super simple to use. We've developed Canbi's liners to nest together in sets of 25 layers. This means that once you install a set, you won't have to change the bag for months at a time.

 

Simply remove the filled liner and the next one is ready to go. No more fumbling with bags that don't fit properly. Canbi's latex liner system is a revolutionary new way to manage household waste.

 

Garbage odors are not exactly ideal, but they're extremely common. Now you can fight the funk with Canbi's built in organic Deodorizer hidden inside the lid. Made of natural odor neutralizing ingredients, including baking soda and activated charcoal, Canbi's Deodorizer can hide any unpleasant smells coming from your trash. Our deodorizers are easily replaceable and last up to 3 months! Say goodbye to your old smelly garbage and say hello to Canbi.

Canbi's interchangeable accent rings can offer an extra touch of personality and compliment your home decor. Our ring themes are inspired by precious metals, choose from Gold, Platinum or Rose Gold. Every Canbi comes with all 3 ring options so you can switch them out at any time! Mix and match to suit your personal style and let Canbi shine!

Canbi is available in two sizes, small and large. Our small size is perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, bathrooms, you name it. It's discreet enough to not call attention to itself and blend in with its surroundings. Our large model is ideal for places that accrue the most garbage, whether it be your kitchen, office, garage or wherever! 

Canbi will easily outshine your old garbage can and become an instant staple in your life. Use it as a green-bin for organic waste with no worry of leaks. Use it to dispose of diapers while eliminating the smell. Use it as a beautiful centerpiece for conversation, it's up to you!

You'll love how simple Canbi is to use. Just lift the lid and toss your garbage in. Removing the filled bag is just as easy. Simply lift top rim, peel off the first liner and throw it away. Your next liner is ready to go without the hassle of changing bags.

The big issue we wanted to tackle was the reliance on single use plastic bags. We hate those. Plastic bags are a big problem today, with 500 million to 1 trillion being used worldwide every year. They're made out of fossil fuels and take hundreds of years to break down. Most bags end up in landfills and get covered by other waste, limiting the necessary UV exposure they need to decompose. Even after they finally break down, they can leave harmful toxins and chemical off-gases behind causing long term environmental duress. 

We wanted to eliminate plastic bags and create a better alternative to what was currently available. Our first consideration was paper. Paper bags are much better than plastic, but they're not super practical for garbage can liners. They're prone to tearing and liquids can easily limit their structural integrity. Our next consideration was bio-plastic. While bio-plastic bags are a step in the right direction, they too have many issues that make them a less than perfect solution. They often require specific conditions in order to fully break down, and most will never be properly recycled. Most will end up back in landfills where they're almost as bad as regular plastic bags.

 

 

We found our solution in the natural compound of the Hevea Brasiliensis tree. Natural latex is a miracle material and is already widely used in a variety of products and applications. Pure natural latex is fully biodegradable and takes the same amount of time to break down as an oak leaf, approximately 4 years in normal conditions. That's quite a big jump from 500+ year decomposition rate for plastics. Our original blend includes natural latex, organic compound fillers, starch-based polymers and waste latex from other industrial uses, such as balloon and condom manufacturing. We are able to use this blend to create a strong and flexible liner material that resists leaks and tears, and breaks down quickly and efficiently even under a broad range of environmental settings. With this formula we are also able to further decrease the break down time of our liners. Utilizing latex encourages the replanting of our rain forests, and helps to keep single use plastic bags out of our oceans and landfills.  

Latex allergy is another concern we've dealt with. We are developing our liner manufacturing process to remove the protein that causes allergic reactions in a small portion of people. We use a curing bath to leach out this protein and higher vulcanization temperatures to ensure it's elimination. We hope to have fully hypoallergenic liners by the time we are ready to ship. We will also be fully transparent with what materials we are using, and Canbi liners will have labels stating that they contain latex.

Canbi is an important step in the evolution of waste management. It's setting the new standard of what we as a society view as acceptable for our environment. It's changing the way we use our planets resources. Canbi is putting a stronger emphasis on long term solutions that have a positive impact on our global health. It's time we made a change in how we interact with our world. Let's clean up with Canbi.

Canbi liners are 100% biodegradable. We use a proprietary blend of natural latex, recycled waste latex, starch based polymers and an organic compound blend to produce our high quality liners. We are constantly tweaking our unique formula to improve biodegradability rates and decrease overall break down times. 

View our chart below to find the perfect reward tier for you. Take advantage of our Super Early Bird options and save big before they're gone!

If we reach $70,000 CAD we will release the Canbi Obsidian model as an upgrade. For those that prefer a darker aesthetic, Canbi Obsidian is the can for you. Available in both sizes, this super slick model will surely turn some heads. 

To select this model in your reward package, please specify your preferred colour in our backer survey which will be sent out after the campaign is completed. 

To add extra liners to your purchase, add 10$ CAD to your pledge amount for each additional set of 25. To add extra deodorizers, add 5$ CAD to your pledge amount for each additional deodorizer. Orders will be confirmed at the end of the campaign.

After our campaign ends we will have liners and deodorizers for sale on our website. We are also working to have them available on Amazon worldwide. 

We know you'll love Canbi as much as we do. We are determined to create a meaningful difference in the world and help put an end to plastic pollution. If you want to support Canbi please don't hesitate to share our campaign with all of your friends and family, and together we can create a greener tomorrow. Your support is greatly appreciated.

Risks and challenges

Every project comes with its own risks and challenges. We are doing our best to plan for as much as possible, but sometimes delays and unforeseen obstacles can come up. In the event that we are met with these circumstances we vow to be fully transparent with our backers, and work our hardest to address any delays or issues that may arise. We promise to post regular updates on our progress and ensure that our backers are fully aware of where we stand.

story:
The NOMAD Micro Home

With a cool factor set at maximum, this groundbreaking tiny house is flat-packed in a box that's ready for shipment anywhere on the planet and is easily assembled by our purchasers. Living room, kitchen, bathroom, stair, and sleeping area are all seamlessly integrated into a 10' x 10' space.

Priced at $25,000 for the base model, NOMAD’s goal is to reduce consumerism and focus on an affordable and sustainable housing option for the largest portion of our society: hard-working individuals who can't make ends meet due to the high cost of living. Adding our pre-engineered green packages for solar energy, rainwater collection and grey water treatment can take NOMAD’s right off the grid. 

Use any contribution toward the purchase of your own NOMAD Micro Home!


What We Need and What You'll Get

NOMAD’s design phase is now complete. At this point, we require significant funding to take the next steps: construction and testing our prototype as well as developing the infrastructure for large-scale production.

Upon receiving your support, we'll send you one or more of the following unique gifts that form part of the NOMAD legacy.

Access to the "Steve Cam" recording his daily life in a 10' x 10'  NOMAD Micro Home for 60 days!


The NOMAD solar jar provides a fun, sustainable light supply that traps sunshine during the day so you can enjoy it at night!


Our bamboo Architect's Scale Model comes in a box ready to assemble - just like NOMAD!


A Concept Sketchbook showing NOMAD's evolution and signed by the designer, Ian Kent.


The "LESS HOUSE, MORE HOME" t-shirt.


Why is NOMAD important?

The Tiny House Movement is currently driven by individuals at a grass-roots level who, for the most part, have built their own homes and are living sustainable, mortgage-free lives. Recognizing the importance of these progressive dwellings and the philosophy adopted by their occupants, NOMAD has taken on the challenge of making this affordable housing option accessible worldwide. 


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you're unable to financially support NOMAD at this time, here are some other simple things you can do that will have a big impact:

    • Make some noise about our campaign by talking about us with others.
    • Share this link with at least 10 people who you feel are most likely to respond and ask that they, in turn, email 10 people.
    • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
In The News

What Is FollowGrams?

FollowGrams is the only smart projector that magically teaches kids how to draw, just like a professional sketch artist! In addition, kids can learn how to write letters and numbers too!

The first thing we worked on is connecting the projector to our app. It works with any smart device (via Bluetooth connection) which allows a child to take a picture of anything and then turn that picture into a traceable image.

The child can take a picture of ANYTHING or ANYONE, apply any of several filters available in the app, and FollowGrams will project the desired image onto paper. The budding artist will trace and draw a masterpiece!

Then we remembered how we learned to draw from the old sketch books back in the 70’s and 80’s. We thought, “why not allow kids to learn from the same STEP-BY-STEP experience?” But we infused the process with a little techie update to bring it closer to 2020 by equipping the projector with an internal micro-SD card. All those Step-by-Step images are now digitally available on a memory card!

Kids can control which drawing they wish to draw by using the simplified control located in the front of the projector.

* The "Home" button takes you back to the 1st step and 1st drawing in the content card.

In the future we plan to add content card expansions that will contain various educational content, such as: spelling, programming basics, advanced drawings and more educational games.

Easy Setup

An easy and fun introduction to drawing. Just dim the lights, switch on the projector, place a blank page and trace away!

Product Specs

Our Story

Flycatcher, a tech toy company that was founded in 2013 in New York, is on a mission to help parents promote their child's learning skills by developing toys that bridge the gap between real-life and the digital space.

story: God never gives us more than we can handle but life can throw a pretty mean curve ball sometimes. Devon is my great nephew. He is a wonderful gift from God and is a very special person. Now, at the age of 16, he is outgrowing his equipment that he depends on. Devon is quadriplegic and has Cerebral Palsy. He has never walked and has been on a feeding tube his entire life. His care requires special liquid food and medicine, wound care and other products... all at inflated prices. Medical equipment is so expensive and his parents cannot afford to replace it. After so many surgeries and the hours he must lay, the doctors have prescribed a special mattress for him. The cost of this bed is $2000.oo. Can you help me raise the funds to buy this badly needed item? Any excess funds raised will go towards the sling lift he will need in a few months. Prayers of Thanks will be said for all of you. Your kindness and generosity will never be forgotten. I can be contacted at shellym@amtelecom.net. Any donation will help but if you can't donate money, it will be appreciated if you forward the message to your friends. Together we can do this.

His care requires special liquid food and medicine, wound care and other products... all at inflated prices. Medical equipment is so expensive and his parents cannot afford to replace it. After so many surgeries and the hours he must lay, the doctors have prescribed a special mattress for him. The cost of this bed is $2000.oo. Can you help me raise the funds to buy this badly needed item? Any excess funds raised will go towards the sling lift he will need in a few months. Prayers of Thanks will be said for all of you. Your kindness and generosity will never be forgotten. I can be contacted at shellym@amtelecom.net. Any donation will help but if you can't donate money, it will be appreciated if you forward the message to your friends. Together we can do this.

story:
Who Are We?

We are a family business thats been making candles under two banners since 2018. Those banners have been Black Bat Studios, and Black Cat Candlery. We ended up having to close up shop around the time covid struck because we were no longer able to purchase our supplies at an affordable cost. We have always decided that with any of the sales weve had we were going to do some good for the community, so with black bat studios we used to donate a portion of our profit to bat conservation, and with black cat candlery we used to donate a portion of our profit to domestic animal rehoming. We even sponsored a bat conservation event in Oklahoma called Glo Wild. We made this indiegogo so that we may relaunch our brand under just one label, that being Electric Love Candlery, and giving the people the choice to pick which of the five causes to benefit based on which candle they buy. The five causes will be bat conservation, feeding hungry children, rehoming domestic pets, helping supply educators with needed supplies, and supporting dignity through union organizing in the workplace. 

 

What Are The Five Scents?

 

 

What are the Candle Specifics?

Each different scent will come in a 20oz, triple wicked tumblr type jar with a bronze lid. All labels will be made of recycled paper, and we will no longer be using dyes so that its better for the environment. The triple wicked tumblr is the best jar for throwing our scents so it will be a stronger scent rather than subtle, and it will not be adjustable on a person to person basis if so requested. We only use 100 percent soy wax, as its got a cleaner burn, and lasts a lot longer than other competitive waxes.

story:
•  Automate any curtain (rod and rail type), with App, Schedule, and Sun light sensor.
  •  Install in 30 seconds without any screws, nuts or bolts.
  •  The most affordable motorized curtain solution. Don't waste your curtain, retrofit it.
  •  Voice control your curtain with Alexa, Google Home, and Siri, with Hub Mini.
  •  Open and connected with API, IFTTT, and SmartThings support with Hub Mini.
  •  Smart, automated and healthy lifestyle, enabled.
  •  Practical and useful for high ceiling curtains, elderly, and disabled people.

 

 

Seeing is Believing

 

Even the most eco-friendly air-conditioning consumes energy to cool your room. We can reduce energy consumption by minimizing temperature fluctuations in your room. Close the curtains to block out sunlight to keep your room cool.

Sun light sensor for keeping the room cool

  

Save energy with the solar panel strip add-on

 

You can also install the solar power strip add-on to charge the SwitchBot Curtain’s battery using sunlight, thus eliminating the need to recharge the battery. Don't worry about "charging anxiety" on the SwitchBot Curtain. Install and forget!

 

Smart living

Leverage technology to take care of the daily routines through automation and voice control. A "Lights Off" scene turns off the light and draws the curtains brighten the room naturally with sunlight. Or you can just say it  "Alexa/Ok Google/Hey Siri, give me sunlight".

Lifestyle automated with the Schedule feature

 

Healthy lifestyle

Maintain a regular light-dark cycle in your bedroom to keep your sleep-wake rhythm in sync with your circadian rhythm. The SwitchBot Curtain can be set to close at night and open when it senses daylight. Get better sleep and wake naturally to sunshine. 

 

Anti-theft

Set your curtains to close automatically when you’re out of the house to hide your valuables from prying eyes. Can’t remember if you closed the window? Check via our app and remotely close the curtains where necessary. Or set them to automatically open at regular intervals to give the impression that someone's home.

Your curtain keeps the bad guy away.

Adapt your existing curtains instead of replacing them. We at SwitchBot are firm believers in retrofitting your home to create a smart home instead of replacing trusty old appliances or furniture that are still in work well.

Retrofitting is simple with SwitchBot Curtain. It only takes a few seconds to make your existing curtains smart. You have to see it to believe it. 

Seeing is believing

The average price of a set of smart curtains is USD 1,000. The SwitchBot Curtain is way more cost-effective at a fraction of that price. You don’t just save money with the SwitchBot Curtain, you do your part for the environment by retaining your existing curtains instead of throwing it away.

 

We support 99% curtains

Some smart curtain solutions only support a single type of curtains. Others are too bulky or require tedious modifications to provide a power source.

The SwitchBot Curtain supports different track types such as U-rail and I-rail, and also rod types. It is also wireless. Just clip it on and you're ready to go. It is that simple. 

We even handle that "BUMP" for extendable rods and rails

The round rails allow the SwitchBot Curtain to glide smoothly along the rod. Just clip on the rails and you're all set.

For those of you who have a longer rod with a bump where the rod extends, we've got that figured out. The SwitchBot Curtain is not affected by such bumps.

Install in seconds

 

U Rails, retrofitted

The SwitchBot Curtain has hooks for U-rail. It is simple to attach the respective hooks to the rails.  

 

I Rails, retrofitted

The SwitchBot Curtain has hooks for I-rail. It is simple to attach the respective hooks to the rails. 

Wouldn't it be great to just say it?

Even with SwitchBot Curtain, you'd probably still instinctively draw the curtains by hand some times. When it senses you drawing the curtain, the SwitchBot Curtain will kick in and do the work for you. We call this Touch & Go.

 

Double-sided curtains are very common and we have been getting a lot of inquiries about how to use the SwitchBot Curtain with these. You could get two units and part the double-sided curtains from the middle. Or, you could try out this tip from the King of Retrofit! Attach the top curtains with a velcro strip or a strong clip so the curtains will move as one. Then install the SwitchBot Curtain on either end to let it work its magic!

So your next question is probably where to find a velcro strip. The good news is, we believe so strongly in retrofitting that we will ship every SwitchBot Curtain with a velcro strip in the box as a standard accessory.

What's more, you can forget about having to charge it by getting the solar power strip add-on. Sunlight will ensure the SwitchBot Curtain is charged up for its daily work routine.

Our SwitchBot Curtain is very complicated from the inside so it is so SIMPLE for you on the outside.

 

Why we need your support

We have finished the development of the SwitchBot Curtain and we are excited to get it into the market to you. However, we cannot bring this product to life without your support. We need to raise funds for the raw materials and components needed to start mass production of the SwitchBot Curtain.

 

A few years ago, we shared the possibility to control SwitchBot on their Raspberry Pi, OpenWRT board, or PC running Linux based system. It has been a fantastic journey since then with contributions by many users who love to DIY! 

Makers who don't want to use Bluetooth controls can now choose to use our RESTFUL APIs. Moreover, you can use Home Assistant!

Tap on the power of IFTTT + Webhook to create and trigger countless incredibly creative scenarios! 

 

Boost your creativity!

Does the SwitchBot Curtain inspire you to use it in other ways? Yes, we thought it would. That's why we are sharing the STL files to build your hooks after the campaign!

Besides adapting the SwitchBot Curtain to work with any rods and rails, you can also use create hooks to extend the SwitchBot Curtain's function! We came up with wacky ideas such as using it to open and close the door,  and building a cam cable to mounting a small action camera or the OSMO Pocket. We are excited to see what creative ideas can you come up with!

Be creative with your cat.

 

 

Development and testing 

The SwitchBot Curtain is not possible before we develop, craft, and test tirelessly in the past 2 years. We tried and tested thousands of rods and rails, and found every possible way to stress test it. We listen. We fix. We iterate.

Validated thousands of rods and rails

SwitchBot Curtain is strong!

 

Press kit is available here. 

 

Our Philosophy and Story

Our co-founder and CEO, Connery, has been the in IoT industry specializing in smart home for years. One night after reading before sleeping, he realized that he cannot even turn off his bedroom light and close his curtain on the bed. This led to the team evaluating all kinds of self-proclaimed smart switches and curtains in the market. Our first thought was to have a robot butler. Yet, the reality is that despite years of robots making the news, we have not seen a real robot that in our homes. Thus, we began our adventure to create a useful, simple and convenient bot. SwitchBot is the fruit of our labor. With this product philosophy in mind, we strive to create more products that will help our users save time, effort and money spent on hiring professionals for installation.

 

The SwitchBot Team

Brains

  • Connery Lee, the decision daddy, and CEO
  • Bruce Pan, the geek, and CTO
  • Lin, the everything guy, and COO
  • Richard Mou, the storyteller, and Marketing Lead

Customer Happiness

  • Momoko Takahashi
  • Yoko Kuriyama
  • XC Huang
  • Ivy Wong

 

Investors

We are invested and mentored by Prof. Li Zexiang, Prof. Ko Ping Keung and Prof. Gan Jie.

  •  Li Zexiang: Ph.D., University of California, Berkeley, Chairman of DJI & Googol tech and Co-founder of Xbot Park.
  •  Ko Ping Keung: Ph.D., University of California, Berkeley, Former Dean of the School of Engineering of HKUST and Co-founder of Xbot Park.
  •  Gan Jie: Ph.D., Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Vice president of Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business and Co-founder of Xbot Park.

 

Join the SwitchBot family

We are a young startup and we value your feedback. Help us improve and shape the direction of SwitchBot products. Come share your suggestions, ideas, or even creative ways of using SwitchBot.  

 

Sustainability

Some ways that SwitchBot as a brand helps to care for the environment and promote sustainability.

  • Want smart home? Don't waste, but upgrade.
  • Eco-friendly packaging.
  • Save energy with the solar power strip add-on.

Install in seconds
 

 

Open and close the curtain at your fingertip. We offer intuitive App control for iOS and Android, with weekly/bi-weekly updates following feedback from you. OTA firmware update is also available for better user experience.

Intuitive UI
 

Smart living is powered by your voice commands.
Wouldn't it be great to just say it?

"Alexa/Ok Google/Hey Siri, close my curtain please" (Hub is required)
 

Even with SwitchBot Curtain, you'd probably still instinctively draw the curtains by hand some times. When it senses you drawing the curtain, the SwitchBot Curtain will kick in and do the work for you. We call this Touch & Go.

SwitchBot Curtain makes even the conventional way to draw a curtain smarter.
 

A wireless remote button add-on for you to place anywhere. 

Hold it or mount it. Your say.

The SwitchBot Curtain is so small that it hides nicely behind your curtains. It will work in its own way without getting in your way.  Likewise, we keep the sophisticated mechanism within the body of the SwitchBot Curtain, giving you fast and easy installation so you can enjoy the benefits it brings.   

Size fits in your palm.
 

Instead of a wired system, the SwitchBot Curtain is a wireless solution. It uses a rechargeable battery that lasts 8 months depending on the usage. This means you only need to charge it once or twice a year! 
What's more, you can forget about having to charge it by getting the solar power strip add-on. Sunlight will ensure the SwitchBot Curtain is charged up for its daily work routine.

In the box, 2 types of hooks will be there for your preference.

story:
Background
Hi folks, Lee here. If we haven't met yet, I'm a dad of five from England, currently residing in Virginia in the U.S., with my wife Katie, four kids, two dogs and a cat!

I met Francis 'Quame' Adu, through a mutual friend, about 5 years ago now...

Quame was in Nkoranza, in central Ghana, Africa. Where he and his family had started to take orphaned and abandoned kids in off the streets. Watch the video I shot with Quame, where he explains how the orphanage was started when they took in Charity, the first 'Love Kids' child.



Quame is now in England, where he lives and works, and sends money back to Nkoranza on a monthly basis, to help feed, clothe and school the kids.
While at the same time being a father to his own daughter, Evie...



He's an incredible human being, who simply has a desire to help others. And despite growing up in humble surroundings himself, would give any money that he had left over to the street kids that he would see near his home, in Nkoranza.

Fast forward a few years, and Love Kids currently has six kids that are cared for, as numbers were reduced due to lack of funds to support more children. This is something that we intend to change.

A few years ago, I promised Quame that I would help him with his dream to make Love Kids a fully self-sustaining foundation. With a new home on new property, able to grow their own food and generate their own income through various small-business activities.

Now is that time. But where do you come in?


What We Need

Before we can start to raise the funds for a new property, we need to provide some solid foundations for the kids and Quame's family at the current orphanage home, by paying the rent for the next 24 months by the time it comes due on February 25th, 2015.

The rent for the next 2 years (which has to be paid in advance), is 5,000 Ghana Cedis. Which converts to 1,029 British Pounds, or 1,546 US Dollars.

That's were this campaign and your good self come in! ;-)

As soon as that rent is paid, we can then shift the focus to the master project of constructing a new home, on the parcel of land that we already have, in Nkoranza.

That's the big project...this is the small one.
And we got this...with your help!


The Impact

When we raise the necessary £1,029 to cover the rent, the future for Love Kids is secure for the next two years.

Without it...well, we won't let it happen, so we won't go there.

We will make it happen (with your help).

With that solid foundation in place, we will be able to focus not only on the big picture, but on what's most important...taking care of the kids on a daily basis.




Why this?

For me personally, I made a promise to Quame and I fully intend to honour that promise.

For yourself, you get to know that you are DIRECTLY impacting the lives of orphaned and abandoned kids. Kids who may have lost their parents through HIV/AIDS, or who's grandparents are no longer able to care for them.

Literally, keeping them off the streets.

Now I don't know about you, but as a father myself and as a human being, I simply can't comprehend young children have to sell water and fend for themselves, like Charity did (see the video) before Quame found her and took her into their family home.

In the 21st Century...
a time of such abundance, is it really acceptable that kids (yes, young children) don't have a bed to sleep in, food to eat, or someone to care for them?

Is this really the best we can do?


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute financially at this time, that's ok! We appreciate any support you may be able to give by spreading the word about Love Kids...

by sharing this campaign on social media, or telling anyone about it that you think might be interested in helping. Thanks in advance!

If you want to contribute on a long term basis, we are also looking for sponsors for the children. Where you could contribute a small amount (£11/$17) on a monthly basis to help cover food, clothing and educational costs.

We are also looking for potential volunteers who are interested in heading to Ghana, to actually help at the home in Nkoranza. Jane, who is also a part of our team here, volunteered in 2012, and loved it so much that she went back in 2014!

-more photos from Jane's 2014 trip to Ghana-

"The sights and sound that greeted me were like no other I had ever experienced...in the taxi taking me from the bus stop I suddenly saw all these little excited faces running alongside squealing with delight! I had arrived at The Love Kids Orphanage Foundation, my home and family for the next month."

Visit www.LoveKidsFoundation.org for more information.


Thanks for being here and showing an interest in the future of the children at Love Kids Foundation!

Quame, Jane, Lee & the rest of the Love Kids family!

Literally, keeping them off the streets.Now I don't know about you, but as a father myself and as a human being, I simply can't comprehend young children have to sell water and fend for themselves, like Charity did (see the video) before Quame found her and took her into their family home.
In the 21st Century... a time of such abundance, is it really acceptable that kids (yes, young children) don't have a bed to sleep in, food to eat, or someone to care for them?Is this really the best we can do?

    Other Ways You Can Help If you are not able to contribute financially at this time, that's ok! We appreciate any support you may be able to give by spreading the word about Love Kids...
by sharing this campaign on social media, or telling anyone about it that you think might be interested in helping. Thanks in advance!
If you want to contribute on a long term basis, we are also looking for sponsors for the children. Where you could contribute a small amount (£11/$17) on a monthly basis to help cover food, clothing and educational costs.
We are also looking for potential volunteers who are interested in heading to Ghana, to actually help at the home in Nkoranza. Jane, who is also a part of our team here, volunteered in 2012, and loved it so much that she went back in 2014!


-more photos from Jane's 2014 trip to Ghana-
"The sights and sound that greeted me were like no other I had ever experienced...in the taxi taking me from the bus stop I suddenly saw all these little excited faces running alongside squealing with delight! I had arrived at The Love Kids Orphanage Foundation, my home and family for the next month."

Visit www.LoveKidsFoundation.org for more information.  Thanks for being here and showing an interest in the future of the children at Love Kids Foundation!Quame, Jane, Lee & the rest of the Love Kids family!

story:
Betterspot In-Demand has been switched to Indiegogo MarketPlace. If you want to buy the perks, please check Betterspot MarketPlace Page.   

Guaranteed Shipping

 

 

 

Today, all of our data will be censored by the government, ISPs and network managers. Moreover, with the high-risk of public Wi-Fis, hackers' activities, and the security hole existing in routers and IoT devices, you are not able to feel secure. Accordingly, the need for a safe, secure and a fast service becomes essential, so it’s a challenge to find a service that works on all your devices. Betterspot can encrypt your online data and helps you have a safer, freer and better internet experience


Betterspot secures your network and enables you to surf the Net anonymously. It also allows you to bypass geo-restricted contents. You can simply replace your home router with Betterspot or place it next to your router. All of your devices can connect to Betterspot with Wi-Fi or cable. Betterspot is portable; which means you can take it with yourself everywhere like public areas such as hotels, coffee shops, airports, etc.

 

Betterspot Functions!

 

Streaming with Betterspot VPN Router 

 
 

Betterspot is compatible with:

 

 

How does VPN work?

A virtual private network, also known as a VPN, is a private network that extends across a public network or internet.

 

 

Why do I need Betterspot?

 

 

Betterspot Features

learn more

 

 

History of Betterspot

Everyday VPN services are used by millions of people in countries across the globe. A VPN helps users bypass internet restrictions such as censored or geo-restricted content while providing anonymity by masking their IP address and location. We believe freedom to access information online is a basic right. Betternet Technologies Inc. is the team behind the Betterspot project. We have over 5 years of experience providing secure VPN services for more than 40 million users around the globe. Our team has proven its place as your first VPN choice on the world wide web.

As smart devices and IoT are quickly and inevitably becoming part of our daily lives, the need for a safe, secure and a fast VPN service becomes essential. We noticed it had become a challenge to find a VPN app that works on all your devices, in the home or at the office. To meet this challenge, Betternet decided to create Betterspot, a device which easily connects to your router providing VPN functions to all of your WiFi devices such as tablets, smartphones, laptops, PCs, etc. Betterspot is compatible with various operating systems such as Windows, Ubuntu, OS X, Android, iOS, Blackberry, etc. By supporting Betterspot, you are supporting a device which will provide security, privacy, and freedom of information to millions. By using Betterspot, you yourself may find the internet quite simply better.

 

 

Design

Some may overlook design as an essential feature of a VPN router, supposing it should just bypass the internet restrictions. Going the extra mile for us means making Betterspot a beautifully designed and efficient product which exceeds our customers’ expectations.

Betterspot, distinguished by the Betternet Shield located on top of it, may be one of the most modern, exciting, convenient and user-friendly VPN routers on the market. After six months of effort and research, our professional design team has created two models. Based on the user feedback we ensured that not only the functionality was streamlined, but also the design remained sleek and attractive.

Our team considered every detail in the process of developing Betterspot, including a multi-color LED which shows Betterspot’s status to the user. Two Ethernet ports and a micro USB port are neatly placed at the back of the device. Surrounding these key components is a hard ABS polymer case. You’ll know it’s a quality product because like our Betternet App it features the shield logo you’ve come to trust.

 

 

Betterspot Press

 

 

Betterspot App

All settings in your hand
Betterspot allows you to control the device easily through your smartphone. You just need to install it on one device and the rest will connect and pair to Betterspot without any need to install apps.

VPN (Betternet)
Connect to Betternet premium service to increase your security and privacy and choose between multiple server locations. Encrypting your data, Betternet secures your connection. It changes your IP address and hides your real locations. It helps you access blocked websites, and bypass internet censorship and firewalls. Betternet lets you access different streaming channels everywhere; even when you are traveling. 

Tor
You can switch to Tor anonymity network and surf anonymously. It hides you from the other users on the network, so the more populous and diverse the user base for Tor is, the more your anonymity will be protected. Tor allows you to improve your privacy and security on the Internet. It also lets organizations and individuals share information over public networks without compromising their privacy.

Direct Mode
You can turn the VPN off by choosing this mode. In this mode, Betterspot functions like a normal router. If you only use a secure connection for certain services and prefer to browse the net using your own IP address, we made it easy for you to switch between VPN/TOR and Direct mode. In Direct mode, your router acts like a messenger: it only sends your requests to the internet without any modifications.

Location selection
Choose your desired server location from the menu. We provide a broad range of dedicated, and premium servers all around the world.

 

 

How to use

Connection via cable:
1   Turn on Betterspot.
2   Plug in the input cable to connect Betterspot to the internet source.
3   Now connect your device to Betterspot using Wi-Fi and enter the password. (Default password is betterspot)

Watch how to set up Betterspot : 

Connecting via Wi-Fi
1   On your device, choose Settings >Wi-Fi>Betterspot XX
2   Enter your access point or router password. (Default password is betterspot)
3   Open admin.betterspot.com on your favorite browser or you can use the app.
4   Choose a password for your admin panel.
5   Click on the button labeled  "Cable" on the top left of the panel, then choose your Wi-Fi source from the list.
6   Enter the Wi-Fi source's password.
7   Press Connect button.

 

Watch how to set up Betterspot: 

 

 

Betterspot Dimension

 

 

Social Network

 

 

Our Story

We’d like to say that Betterspot was the result of a “eureka” moment, however we think the reality is far more interesting. Through inspiring feedback we were able to construct a product that meets all your demands. We realized that Betternet users enthusiastically require using Betternet on all of their smart devices such as smart TVs, Windows phones, Mac computers, Blackberries and Apple TVs, but unfortunately, VPN apps cannot be installed on all these devices.

As we traveled abroad we were faced with online restrictions and censorship. This encouraged us to design Betternet, a VPN service that has now more than 40 million users. To ensure we were on the right path during each stage of development we engaged our users across the globe. The first stop was China where we asked our users for feedback about Betternet VPN, which in turn further encouraged us to develop the hardware. Thanks to our customers’ comments, we had a new idea: a device you could simply connect all your smart devices too. A device that is small, portable, easy to use and empowered with our award winning Premium VPN service: Betternet. By running the VPN for your smart device, Betterspot will reduce the exhaustion of your smart devices' battery life.

 

 

Our Team

Betterspot team is comprised of top notch tech experts, experienced hardware engineers, embedded developers and designers who are part of Betternet Technologies, an established company providing VPN services to more than 40 million people across the globe with more than 5 years of experience in this business. Our mobile app developers and DevOps have designed one of the most reliable and compatible VPN protocols which are tested for over a year and now empowers Betterspot VPN router. Our diligent CRM team constantly responds to the users' questions and relays their feedback to our development team which in turn fine tunes our service and product.

Our industrious team is still on the go and working hard to bring Betterspot to life. We are grateful to the potential Kickstarter backers for supporting us to achieve this goal. Your support will give us the opportunity to put Betterspot in your home.

 

 

 

China Trip

To bring Betterspot's idea to a real product, we have traveled to China for three times. We went to "Asian Innovation Tour" on our first trip. There, we shared our idea and could attract many manufacturers' and investors' attention. We chose them carefully based on their quality and experiences. We also found some options for packaging and shipping.
On our second travel to China, we signed the contract and visited the factories again to double check the quality.
Betterspot QC trip was the last and longest one. It was both exciting and exhausting. Exciting, since we tested Betterspot everywhere like coffee shops, restaurants, and hotels. It was very enjoyable to see the working Betterspot. Exhausting, because it was very difficult to manage everything among our 4 partners including OEM, Molding, Packaging, and shipping. They were very far from each other. Sometimes, we had to visit all of them all in a single day.
We could successfully overcome the issues regarding Betterspot manufacturing during our trip. Our industrious team is still on the go and working hard to bring Betterspot to life.Your support will give us the opportunity to put Betterspot in your home.

 

What HWTrek thinks about Betterspot!

 

Shipping

We are delighted to inform you that we have started shipping Betterspot devices. We do our best to send Betterspot devices to all of our backers within 15 days. We will soon send the tracking number to all our backers. It may take a few days to send “the tracking number email” to all backers. Therefore, be patient please and help us give Betterspot to your hands as soon as possible.


 

Timeline

 

 

FAQ

> Can I get Betterspot outside of the USA?

We are doing our best to ship Betterspot all around the world. Based on our users’ requests the estimated shipment destinations are: Europe in general, UAE, China, Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, etc. 

We are going to inform you about the shipment price and list of the countries on Betterspot Kickstarter campaign, so you can wait until the project launch on 14 September.

 

> Is it possible to use Betterpot's premium account on Betternet app?

Unfortunately, that's not possible. The premium services on Betterspot router and Betternet app are two separate things. 

Using Betterspot router for multiple devices at the same time requires a considerable amount of bandwidth, so to provide our users with a better browsing and streaming experience we decided to separate Betterspot premium servers from those of Betternet, so that our Betterspot users could enjoy less crowded, and dedicated servers.

 

> Can I use Betterspot for hard wired desktops? For example, a device I could place inline before my router?

Betterspot can work with wired equipment properly. It has one LAN port which the device can connect to via Ethernet cable, and more than 10 devices can connect to Betterspot at the same time via Wi-Fi.

 

> Would Betterspot be a subscription service or would it be a one–time purchase?

Without our VPN service subscription (Betternet Premium), Betterspot can work with Tor for free. As a Kickstarter backer, you’ll receive 1-month Premium VPN service for free. If you want the premium service you should pay for a subscription and there are different types of pricing which you can see on Kickstarter like lifetime and yearly plans.

 

> What kinds of network protocol do you have?

The network protocol is used for our new product is Hexatech. It is designed to offer an ultra fast speed and reliable security to the users and to connect smartphones to secure servers in an easier way. It is also safe to any blockings. 
For more information you can visit: betternet.co/hexatech-vpn 
or our Weblog about Hexatech: 

https://www.betternet.co/blog/betternet-introduces-hexatech-a-revolutonary-vpn/

 

> Is Betterspot using the free Betternet VPN, Hexatech, or a dedicated VPN?

Betterspot uses Betternet premium servers. We limit the number of users on each server to provide a high-quality service.

 

> What kinds of extra money we should pay? Should we pay extra money like shipment or taxes?

Yes, you have to pay for VAT & shipment which is specified on our Kickstarter page based on your country.

 

> What are the usage restrictions?

You can visit the link below to be informed about the restrictions. 

https://www.betterspot.com/terms#prohibited

 

> Will there be an Ethernet-in port and also an Ethernet-out (routing) port?

There will be both of them and Betterspot also works via Wi-Fi.

 

> We have internet in our dorm room through the DSL cable and we don't have a router yet. Would we be able to get Betterspot and use it as a wireless router and be able to connect our phones to it and use it as a router and VPN?

Yes. You just need to connect Betterspot to your DSL router. Betterspot is a router that is compatible with all devices and platforms, and you can simultaneously use it as VPN and a router.

 

> Can we carry the device so that it functions with cellular data and in return functions as a hotspot?

Betterspot has Wi-Fi to Wi-Fi capability so that you can connect it to your 3G modem via Wi-Fi. Just note that Betterspot has no built-in battery, so you need to use a power bank, or USB adapter.

 

> Does Betterspot work with a 4G Router?

Yes. Betterspot also works with a 4G Router. As long as your 4G modem provides Wi-Fi hotspot, you can use Betterspot as a gateway for it. It allows you to use a Wi-Fi hotspot as an internet source.

 

> Can you give me more details about the specifications, capabilities, the future firmware update support and premium access for life time?

Betterspot is a VPN router. Every device will be protected by connecting to it. You don’t need to install any VPN app on your device. Betterspot has a mobile app for your ease of use. We do our best to update the firmware and Betterspot app. We also try to add new features.

 

> Can I use it for my Goobang doo MS8 streambox which is similar to an apple TV device. Would it work for it?

Yes. Every device that works with 802.11 b/g/n (almost all Wi-Fi devices) can connect to Betterspot. As long as it can connect to Wi-Fi hotspot, yes, it would.

 

> Connecting it to my router, will ALL devices on Wi-Fi and Ethernet including my TV usage (like apple TV and my smart TV internet) be on VPN automatically? Doesn't it need to do anything to activate it. Is that how this is set up?

Yes, exactly! You can connect all your Wi-Fi/wired devices to Betterspot and good news for you is that it needs zero setup! You will be on a secure connection without any extra steps.

 

> Can you use VPN and TOR together?

No, You will be able to use one at a time by switching between the two modes, using Betterspot app or via its web panel. Since Tor constantly connects you to random servers, you can't be on Betternet Premium servers unless you switch modes.

 

> Will it be able to transfer 1000mbps as wired or 300mbps?

The transmission speed is 300mbps.

 

> Will Betterspot available on cash on delivery?

No. Betterspot shipment plan does not support paying on cash.

 

> Can I use Betterspot while I’m travelling?

Yes, you can take Betterspot with you while you are traveling to countries with internet restrictions like China. You can also use it while you are connected to public Wi-Fi networks at the airports, cafes, hotels, etc.

 

> What benefits will Betterspot give me Vs. using the free service or paying $30 year for premium and using my own router?

There are two matters to consider here: 

First: reliability, and quality of a VPN service. 

Second: its ease of use. 

Maybe you have a router that you can configure a VPN on it. Then you need to find a reliable VPN provider that allows you to set it up on a router. This is technically difficult and it needs technical knowledge too. Considering Betternet, it provides a reliable service that 40 million users trust it, but you cannot set it on your own router because the security protocol we use is not supported by any router. Considering Betterspot, it allows using Betternet's security layer on a router with zero configs. We also provide an app that users can simply change the settings and use it easily. That's what you are paying for.

 

> Where are Betternet servers located?

Betternet supports the following locations: US, UK, Canada, Netherlands, France, Australia, Germany, Japan, Singapore, and Hong Kong. Our US servers are located in different states of America and you can select among them.

 

> What encryption protocols does Betterspot use for my data?

We use Betternet's Hexa protocol which uses latest encryption technologies including SALSA algorithm.

 

> Is there a limit to the number of devices which can connect to Betterspot?

You can use Betterspot for at least 10 to 15 devices at the same time. Betterspot has one LAN port. A device can connect to it via Ethernet cable, and 10 to 15 other devices can connect to Betterspot at the same time via Wi-Fi.

 

> What type of VPN protocol is used on Betterspot?

Betterspot uses Hexa protocol, a secure communication protocol built from scratch for this new era. This technology has several advantages over old technologies:

The time needed to create a secure tunnel is negligible, it only takes a few milliseconds (compared to several seconds for OpenVPN or IPSec). Hexatech supports both IPv4 and IPv6 so there is no risk of IPv6 leaks. The protocol is designed with no signature so controlling organizations are not able to track or block it. All these features make Hexatech protocol unique and awesome!

Would it work for it?Yes. Every device that works with 802.11 b/g/n (almost all Wi-Fi devices) can connect to Betterspot. As long as it can connect to Wi-Fi hotspot, yes, it would. > Connecting it to my router, will ALL devices on Wi-Fi and Ethernet including my TV usage (like apple TV and my smart TV internet) be on VPN automatically? Doesn't it need to do anything to activate it. Is that how this is set up?Yes, exactly! You can connect all your Wi-Fi/wired devices to Betterspot and good news for you is that it needs zero setup! You will be on a secure connection without any extra steps. > Can you use VPN and TOR together?No, You will be able to use one at a time by switching between the two modes, using Betterspot app or via its web panel. Since Tor constantly connects you to random servers, you can't be on Betternet Premium servers unless you switch modes. > Will it be able to transfer 1000mbps as wired or 300mbps?The transmission speed is 300mbps. > Will Betterspot available on cash on delivery?No. Betterspot shipment plan does not support paying on cash. > Can I use Betterspot while I’m travelling?Yes, you can take Betterspot with you while you are traveling to countries with internet restrictions like China. You can also use it while you are connected to public Wi-Fi networks at the airports, cafes, hotels, etc. > What benefits will Betterspot give me Vs. using the free service or paying $30 year for premium and using my own router?There are two matters to consider here: First: reliability, and quality of a VPN service. Second: its ease of use. Maybe you have a router that you can configure a VPN on it. Then you need to find a reliable VPN provider that allows you to set it up on a router. This is technically difficult and it needs technical knowledge too. Considering Betternet, it provides a reliable service that 40 million users trust it, but you cannot set it on your own router because the security protocol we use is not supported by any router. Considering Betterspot, it allows using Betternet's security layer on a router with zero configs. We also provide an app that users can simply change the settings and use it easily. That's what you are paying for. > Where are Betternet servers located?Betternet supports the following locations: US, UK, Canada, Netherlands, France, Australia, Germany, Japan, Singapore, and Hong Kong. Our US servers are located in different states of America and you can select among them. > What encryption protocols does Betterspot use for my data?We use Betternet's Hexa protocol which uses latest encryption technologies including SALSA algorithm. > Is there a limit to the number of devices which can connect to Betterspot?You can use Betterspot for at least 10 to 15 devices at the same time. Betterspot has one LAN port. A device can connect to it via Ethernet cable, and 10 to 15 other devices can connect to Betterspot at the same time via Wi-Fi. > What type of VPN protocol is used on Betterspot?Betterspot uses Hexa protocol, a secure communication protocol built from scratch for this new era. This technology has several advantages over old technologies:The time needed to create a secure tunnel is negligible, it only takes a few milliseconds (compared to several seconds for OpenVPN or IPSec). Hexatech supports both IPv4 and IPv6 so there is no risk of IPv6 leaks. The protocol is designed with no signature so controlling organizations are not able to track or block it. All these features make Hexatech protocol unique and awesome!

story:
Short Summary

I’m John Staehlin an 87-year-old mechanical engineer, inventor, and founder of Volunteers for Medical Engineering (VME). Inventing has been my life. 37 years at Westinghouse, six years at Northrop Grumman. 37 years ago I founded VME and began designing devices for people living with disabilities. We have developed solutions such as mobile standing frame, servo driven hand closure devices, blink writing system, etc. Since moving to Carroll Lutheran Village 10 years ago many of my inventions have been directed towards the senior population. Seniors want to live in their home as long as possible. If they use a mobility device such as a wheelchair or scooter the entrance to their home becomes a major barrier, especially with the typical combination of the storm door and the main door at  the entrance.  A search showed that no commercial devices are available.

I have invented, designed and am ready, with the help of funding from this campaign, to build  prototypes of my “Opposing Door Opener” (ODO ) mechanism.. With the ODO installed between the doors we can provide unimpeded entry into the home for all of our friends, neighbors and relatives.

I have taken the design and fabrication about as far as I can afford to take it. Your donations will be the force that brings this revolutionary product to the public.

With your funding. I will be able to machine parts for the mechanism, purchase the components  needed for the drive mechanism, complete electrical design and updating of the CAD database for production.

Significant effort will be directed towards building and testing prototypes to enable unimpeded access to a home. I can only offer you my sincere thanks along with the satisfaction of knowing that you have made this product available to the public as we record your name for posterity in the product's owner manual..

PERKS

Here is the special Perk that I have to offer to all donors. If you know of someone with a disability that has an unaddressed problem I am prepared to address the problem (as I’ve done for the last 37 years) as follows:

·        Platinum donor ($500 plus) two hours of consultation directed to a proposed solution.

·        Gold donor ($400 plus) 1 ½ hours of consultation directed to a proposed solution.

·        Silver donor ($300 plus) one hour of consultation directed to a proposed solution.

·        Bronze donor ($200 plus) one half hour of consultation directed to a proposed solution.

·        Donor response will  email be by with suggested approach to solution

Response to Donors will be in the order they were submitted with the donation. They will also be addressed as time allows over and above the Opposing Door Open product development time line.

They will be addressed!

Over the years I’ve had the good fortune to see people use their hands for the first time, see people communicate even though paralyzed, watch people, raise themselves out of a chair with an assistive device, use power tools in the artificial arms, grip a ball with artificial and, etc. The donors to this campaign will get to see people in wheelchairs entering their home past the storm door and passed the main door with unimpeded access.

Phase one: build and test two manually control “Opposing Door Opener” prototypes.

Phase two: design, electronics for automated control of “Opposing Door Opener” prototypes, assemble and test.

Phase three: design, test and evaluate alternative manufacturing techniques and incorporate where applicable.

 

 

 

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The historic Morris House is moving to Central Halifax in early 2013 as part of an innovative affordable housing project, and needs your help!

The Morris House, the second oldest wooden building in Halifax, will soon be transported from Hollis Street, to a donated lot at the corner of Creighton and Charles. Once settled on its new foundation, an addition will be constructed, and the building will become affordable, energy efficient housing for young adults. The Morris House has become a symbol of Halifax’s heritage and culture, of youth engagement and adaptive re-use of existing buildings. It is a demonstration of sustainable building practices that can guide our city’s future growth.

Many fundraising efforts are underway and the “House on the Move” needs YOUR help! Help us raise $15 000, which will go directly to the cost of moving the house.

Lead partners in the Project are Metro Non-Profit Housing Association; The ARK, a drop-in centre for young adults; Heritage Trust of Nova Scotia and the Ecology Action Centre.

We are incredibly grateful for your contributions to help Move the Morris House - every dollar contributed will go directly to moving it.  We could not do this without your support!

What We Need & What You Get:

We need $15,000, all of which will go directly to the cost of moving the Morris House. The Morris House is the second oldest wood structure in Halifax, and an important symbol of our city’s social and architectural history. Why move it? To show that we don’t have to needlessly demolish old buildings - we can and should incorporate the old with the new, to build a resilient and sustainable Halifax AND to provide much needed affordable housing for young adults.

Donate, and receive a package of our unique perks!

For $10, you will receive a silk screened Morris House patch, hand made by participants of the ARK, a drop-in centre for young adults, and one of the project’s partners.

For $25 you'll get a unique hand crafted Morris House felt pin created by a local artist.

For $50, you’ll get both the ARK silkscreened patch, plus a unique hand crafted Morris House felt badge.

$100 gets you the $50 perks, plus a limited edition engraved brick from the original Morris House site, commemorating its history and the Move the Morris project.

As a unique collaboration between heritage, green building, young adults and affordable housing advocates, the Morris house has inspired people of all ages, from all walks of life. It is a model of sustainable development, showing how diverse interests can come together to provide cities and towns with shared social, cultural and environmental benefits. It is a story of resilience, creativity and determination.

Other Ways You Can Help:

There are many ways to help out, beyond donating to the “Move the Morris” campaign. Please visit http://morrishouse.ca/get-involved/ to find out how you can get involved.

story:
Are you an unfortunate user of separate taps? 
Are you tired of choosing between freezing cold and scalding hot water to wash your hands, brush your teeth or do the dishes? 
Is this how you wash your hands? 




Well, you no longer have to! 
Retromixer is a patent pending, easy to use, adjustable and affordable adapter that will mix your hot and cold water streams, allowing you to enjoy warm water of adjustable temperature.  

Our research revealed that most users simply turn on both of the taps, but use only one tap at a time. This means that the water flowing out of one tap goes directly to the drain and is wasted.  




Retromixer will not only make washing your hands more convenient, it will also help you save water and energy. On top of that, it's made from recycled plastics and helps save the environment. Hurray!  




Retromixer can be easily disassembled and cleaned.  


 


It is designed to fit various double tap configurations. The adjustable straps provide grip to even the weirdest shaped taps. 


Currently, Retromixer fits taps with a distance of 16 to 24cm apart, which covers the vast majority of two tap sinks (we plan to improve that in the future to cover even more). 




Separate taps are a problem that we know all too well. 




After months of dealing with extremely hot and cold water and discussing the problem with other people, we decided it was time for action. We do not only believe in our idea- we invested our money and time in it! 
Several prototypes were made for testing and getting feedback from first users.  




This allowed us to validate the concept and improve the design... 



...and 3D-print even more prototypes... 




...until the final design emerged! 





The next stage of our project is to initiate serial production. We found several European manufacturers who meet our requirements for technology, quality and cost. 
All materials used for production are certified as food and drink safe (FDA-approved). 
For the first batch of Retromixers, we need to raise a total of £7,000. We have already raised £3,000 and aim to gather the missing £4,000 via this campaign. 
If we manage to raise £6,000 or more, we will be able to deliver Retromixers in different colors, so that you can customize your Retromixer the way you like!  



(colors shown above serve as an example. We can't tell how many different color versions we can offer until the campaign is finished- see Risks and Challenges section) 


RECYCLED MATERIALS x WATER SAVING = REDUCED CARBON FOOTPRINT 

Sustainability is at the heart of this project. Making recycled plastics the material of choice has several advantages. 
• Manufacturing process requires about 50% less energy, therefore reducing greenhouse gasses emitted in the process. 
• Plastics are not biodegradable; recycling prevents inefficient landfill and ocean contamination. 





Pledge £3 - Our Retro Postcard check it out 

Pledge £8 - One of our Retro Posters (60x42cm) check it out *explicit language* 

Pledge £10 - Our cool Retro Penholder check it out 

Pledge £8 - Super-early bird! 1 x Retromixer 

Pledge £10 - Early bird! 1 x Retromixer 

Pledge £16 - 2-Pack 

Pledge £34 - 5-Pack 

Pledge £54 - 10-Pack 








We are an international group of friends with different skills and backgrounds who joined forces to solve a well-known problem that has been long crying for a solution. 



The initial concept was developed by Denny and Artur who founded the company, Retromixer Ltd., in Edinburgh in 2015. Adrianna joined to give a hand with branding and graphic design activities. Stephanie's vast experience in product design resulted in much improved aesthetics and ergonomics of the product. Our friends have also supported us with creating the website (Tomek), advising on marketing and social media (Holly) and making the video (Maciej). 




DESIGN 

The product design is mature and we are in the final stages of prototype testing. Some minor design change could still occur which might postpone the delivery, but by no more than two weeks. 

MANUFACTURING 

To minimize the risks, we decided to keep the production in Europe and shortlisted several manufacturers that meet our expectations regarding the technology, quality and cost. 
Nevertheless, there is risk involved. There is no serial production yet and we will be working with manufacturers we have never worked with before. We will conduct background checks and due diligence audits to ensure manufacturer's capacity to deliver a quality product on time. 

DIFFERENT COLOR VERSIONS 

If we reach our stretch goal of £6,000, we will offer Retromixer in different colors. However, until we know how much money we raised, it is impossible to tell how many versions can be offered. As you would imagine, the more money we raise, the more colors will be offered.
