story:
Introduction

We are a group of Wisconsin landowners concerned about Canadian oil pipeline company Enbridge’s plans to construct a new oil pipeline through Wisconsin. A new pipeline means Enbridge needs more land. Many of us already have an 80 foot wide Enbridge easement across our properties with four pipelines running through it (hence our name, 80 Feet is Enough!).  Enbridge has recently completed land surveys for a new pipeline adjacent to existing easements. In addition, in 2015 Enbridge worked behind the scenes to change Wisconsin’s eminent domain law, making it easier for them to take private property by condemnation.

If Enbridge takes more of our land, it means we (every property owner along the route) can’t use our properties the way we want because of the restrictions placed on buildings, construction activities, tree planting, etc.  This oil will travel through Wisconsin, much of it likely to be refined on the Gulf Coast and exported to overseas markets. It is un-American that a foreign company could take OUR land, for their private gain.

If  there is an oil leak or explosion we could lose our homes, water, farms, even our lives. One such leak of about 40 gallons several years ago resulted in an area family having to move because of contaminated well water.

The public needs to know that Wisconsin now has rules that would allow a private company to take their land.  To help spread the word, we are planning to purchase billboard space along several heavily-traveled highways throughout Wisconsin. But billboard advertising is expensive. Our goal is to raise $25,000 for billboards.

We hope you will consider helping us in our grassroots fight against eminent domain abuse by a foreign pipeline company. All donations will be very helpful and greatly appreciated. 

The Billboards

Below are the three different designs that we have proposed. If you pledge $25 or more  you will be able to vote on your favorite design and the winning design will be the first to go up.

BILLBOARD DESIGN #1

BILLBOARD DESIGN #2

BILLBOARD DESIGN #3

What We Need & What You Get

NOTE: If you prefer to waive any perks and donate 100% of your gift to the cause, you can simply click the "Back It" button at the top and enter any dollar amount.

We need to raise $25,000.  Billboards are not cheap! To claim a perk, you MUST click on a specific perk package from the list to the side and then complete the donation. 

  • Donate $5 for web recognition (can remain anonymous).
  • With a  $25 donation you will receive  web recognition and you can vote for your favorite billboard design (see above).
  • With a $50 donation you will get a can coolie, web recognition,  and you can vote for your favorite billboard design (see above).
  • A $100 gift we will give you  a coffee mug, can coolie , web recognition,  and you can vote for your favorite billboard design (see above).
  • A $200 donation we will give you a t-shirt, a coffee mug, a can coolie , web recognition,  and you can vote for your favorite billboard design (see above).
  • Give $500 and receive your own 3x5' banner with grommets, web recognition, a mug, can coolie, t-shirt and  you can vote for your favorite billboard design (see above).
  • For the first five donors who give $1,000 or more you will be able to  help choose which location we use to install for our first billboard. (and all the other perks!)
  • Any amount is greatly appreciated.

The Impact

Your contribution will help build a groundswell of public opposition to Enbridge's abuse of property rights and the unconscionable use of eminent domain for private gain. Enbridge worked behind the scenes to changed Wisconsin's eminent domain law in 2015 without public knowledge. The billboards will raise awareness and galvanize Wisconsin citizens to restore their property rights.

The billboard messages are relevant nationwide. Unlike gas pipelines which are granted eminent domain powers by the federal government, oil pipeline companies are granted the power of eminent domain at the state level. That's why Enbridge found it so important for their planned expansion to change the eminent domain law in Wisconsin. 

The grassroots groundwork we are laying here in Wisconsin can be used by citizens in other states to stop oil pipeline companies from having undue power in taking property.

Every dollar you donate will be dedicated to raising billboards throughout Wisconsin. If we are so fortunate, all funds exceeding our goal will go towards working at the Wisconsin legislative level to reform the eminent domain law and prevent oil pipeline companies from land takings.

Risks & Challenges

We have a clear strategy and dedicated volunteers. Our two main challenges are funding and public awareness and that is why we designed this campaign.

If we do not meet our goal, we will place as many billboards as we can afford. The greater the funding the more billboards we can place for a longer period of time in larger high-profile markets.

In their day jobs the organizers behind 80 Feet Is Enough are professionals accustomed to leading complicated projects to success. We have a very experienced team with the skill sets and professional networks up to the task of stopping Enbridge's expansion in Wisconsin.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please use your network and the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about our campaign. We need to reach out nationwide to be successful
  • Please discuss this issue with your friends and family; most people are not aware their property rights are tenuous.
  • And please join 80 Feet is Enough at 80feetisenough.org. We need to build power in numbers to effect change and prevent Enbridge from taking more land.
story_txt:
Introduction
We are a group of Wisconsin landowners concerned about Canadian oil pipeline company Enbridge’s plans to construct a new oil pipeline through Wisconsin. A new pipeline means Enbridge needs more land. Many of us already have an 80 foot wide Enbridge easement across our properties with four pipelines running through it (hence our name, 80 Feet is Enough!).  Enbridge has recently completed land surveys for a new pipeline adjacent to existing easements. In addition, in 2015 Enbridge worked behind the scenes to change Wisconsin’s eminent domain law, making it easier for them to take private property by condemnation.
If Enbridge takes more of our land, it means we (every property owner along the route) can’t use our properties the way we want because of the restrictions placed on buildings, construction activities, tree planting, etc.  This oil will travel through Wisconsin, much of it likely to be refined on the Gulf Coast and exported to overseas markets. It is un-American that a foreign company could take OUR land, for their private gain.
If  there is an oil leak or explosion we could lose our homes, water, farms, even our lives. One such leak of about 40 gallons several years ago resulted in an area family having to move because of contaminated well water.
The public needs to know that Wisconsin now has rules that would allow a private company to take their land.  To help spread the word, we are planning to purchase billboard space along several heavily-traveled highways throughout Wisconsin. But billboard advertising is expensive. Our goal is to raise $25,000 for billboards.
We hope you will consider helping us in our grassroots fight against eminent domain abuse by a foreign pipeline company. All donations will be very helpful and greatly appreciated. 
The Billboards
Below are the three different designs that we have proposed. If you pledge $25 or more  you will be able to vote on your favorite design and the winning design will be the first to go up.
BILLBOARD DESIGN #1

BILLBOARD DESIGN #2

BILLBOARD DESIGN #3


What We Need & What You Get
NOTE: If you prefer to waive any perks and donate 100% of your gift to the cause, you can simply click the "Back It" button at the top and enter any dollar amount.
We need to raise $25,000.  Billboards are not cheap! To claim a perk, you MUST click on a specific perk package from the list to the side and then complete the donation.  

Donate $5 for web recognition (can remain anonymous).
With a  $25 donation you will receive  web recognition and you can vote for your favorite billboard design (see above).
With a $50 donation you will get a can coolie, web recognition,  and you can vote for your favorite billboard design (see above).
A $100 gift we will give you  a coffee mug, can coolie , web recognition,  and you can vote for your favorite billboard design (see above).
A $200 donation we will give you a t-shirt, a coffee mug, a can coolie , web recognition,  and you can vote for your favorite billboard design (see above).
Give $500 and receive your own 3x5' banner with grommets, web recognition, a mug, can coolie, t-shirt and  you can vote for your favorite billboard design (see above).
For the first five donors who give $1,000 or more you will be able to  help choose which location we use to install for our first billboard. (and all the other perks!)
Any amount is greatly appreciated.


The Impact
Your contribution will help build a groundswell of public opposition to Enbridge's abuse of property rights and the unconscionable use of eminent domain for private gain. Enbridge worked behind the scenes to changed Wisconsin's eminent domain law in 2015 without public knowledge. The billboards will raise awareness and galvanize Wisconsin citizens to restore their property rights.
The billboard messages are relevant nationwide. Unlike gas pipelines which are granted eminent domain powers by the federal government, oil pipeline companies are granted the power of eminent domain at the state level. That's why Enbridge found it so important for their planned expansion to change the eminent domain law in Wisconsin. 
The grassroots groundwork we are laying here in Wisconsin can be used by citizens in other states to stop oil pipeline companies from having undue power in taking property.
Every dollar you donate will be dedicated to raising billboards throughout Wisconsin. If we are so fortunate, all funds exceeding our goal will go towards working at the Wisconsin legislative level to reform the eminent domain law and prevent oil pipeline companies from land takings.

Risks & Challenges
We have a clear strategy and dedicated volunteers. Our two main challenges are funding and public awareness and that is why we designed this campaign.
If we do not meet our goal, we will place as many billboards as we can afford. The greater the funding the more billboards we can place for a longer period of time in larger high-profile markets.
In their day jobs the organizers behind 80 Feet Is Enough are professionals accustomed to leading complicated projects to success. We have a very experienced team with the skill sets and professional networks up to the task of stopping Enbridge's expansion in Wisconsin.

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please use your network and the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about our campaign. We need to reach out nationwide to be successful
Please discuss this issue with your friends and family; most people are not aware their property rights are tenuous.
And please join 80 Feet is Enough at 80feetisenough.org. We need to build power in numbers to effect change and prevent Enbridge from taking more land.

story:
An Introduction

Ever thought how you could get involved in one of the most lucrative fields of endeavour, the business which has created many, many ultra wealthy men and women over the years worldwide?

Well, I am a 39 year old guy who's been involved in some interesting international projects from the US, Europe, the Far East and Africa, having run a number of very successful projects from start to finish.

I've always had a plethora of ideas for new ventures, and I've finally decided to bring one to market in an effort to help everyone who's always been interested in property but been too afraid to ask.

It all started when I had a number of retirement policies, policies I've always had questions about. I've always wondered how good they will be 10 or 20 years after I retire. I've always wondered if 75% of my income at retirement will be enough after 30 years have passed. It was because of these questions that I decided to investigate the property market with its residual inflation linked income and, it's because of this that that I've been working for years on Property Advisor as a concept, an idea and a prototype.

I started off creating a spreadsheet with thousands of cells and hundreds of formulas giving me all the information that I wanted. However, it was never really feasible carrying around a pc whenever I went to view a property, so I began thinking that it would be great to have this concept as an app available on an iPad and make it available for the whole world to use.

Well, on to the product I'm trying to fund and I'm holding thumbs for every one of you to help get this out there so we can all get involved in property that much easier.

Property Advisor

Property Advisor is a world first for the iPad market giving you the information to make informed decisions about property investment.

Imagine buying an average house for an average price, in a good area, and only paying 6% of the cost of the house. Would you buy it?

Download Property Advisor to find out how little you'll be paying for a property when you buy-to-let with all the complex calculations and formulas done for you giving you a simple rating at the end. And also, for everyone who wants all the nitty-gritty details, they are all still in there for you.

Retire early, retire strong!

In recent proven statistics, it’s said that even if you manage to save 15% of your gross income for an entire 40 years, it is still not enough to last you in to your 70’s and 80’s. According to the experts in the industry, we should be saving 15% of our gross income for the entire 40 years and, they make assurances that we'll retire happy, wealthy and have more than enough to get through the rest of the years. Even according to their own calculations, your pension will start running short within 5 years even if you cut expenses.

While inflation keeps happening, unless it's truly index-linked, your pension will still keep paying the same and it will eventually be a fraction of what you started out with. 75% Of your salary now won’t be worth much in 10 years when the cost of living doubles and you’re still earning 75% of what you were getting 10 years ago.

It is said that most millionaires have a minimum of seven streams of income and, the best kind is passive income. Property gives you the power to not only create inflation-based revenue streams long after you retire, but to also have an asset at the end of the bond which has been paid off by someone else. Imagine retiring 20 years early, or even 10 years earlier, living off income generated by your properties?

Why property?

  • Property allows you to generate wealth by means of several income streams.
  • Even though property is your business, you'll still never have to personally deal with tenants.
  • Using Property Advisor, you'll be able to quickly, and easily, evaluate any property before buying giving you values such as future return and capital outlay.
  • Property offers one of the highest returns with the lowest risk of all asset classes.
  • Income streams from a buy-to-let business are linked to inflation and the chances are that you will never run out of money!

What was the inspiration behind Property Advisor?

I hope to empower ordinary people with the ability to create financial freedom much earlier in their lives rather than later and to teach and guide people to successfully implement the most powerful business concept on a part time basis in an easy and informative way.

Property Advisor Features

You can view all of the screenshots, and the progress for the project, on the Property Advisor Facebook page so please feel free to visit and make as much noise as you'd like!

Overview

  • View an interactive map showing you of all your properties, opportounities and owned, drawn on a map.
  • View a scatter chart of your various properties giving you an easier view to determine which ones to focus on and which are the best according to figures and taking the "feeling" out of it.

View all of your opportunities at a glance.  This view will show you how much money you would outlay (based on the size of the circle), whether it's a good or bad investment (green, orange or red) and how long it will take for you to break even.  You're also able to click on a circle to go directly to the property.

An easy to see overview of all your opportunities and owned properties.  Just click on a property to go to see the information about that property.

Analyse a property

See just how good a property really is by entering in the figures and watch the graphs move giving you a recommendation as to whether it's a good buy or not.

  • Capture potential acquisition details and determine the viability for purchase
  • Capture rental income and expenditure
  • Capture environmental variables (bond term, bond interest rate, rental escalation, vacancy rate, inflation rate, capital growth)
  • Calculate Invested vs. Returns
  • Calculate your breakeven point
  • Determine capital outlay
  • Calculates the market value of the property at any given year
  • View figures on a year by year basis
  • Monthly and total cash-flow forecasts
  • View photos of the property
  • Investment indicators shown as graphs from red to green (red being dangerous and green being safe)
    • Rental - How good is the rental in comparison to your bond?
    • Rates - How good are your rates in comparison to the price of your property?
    • Return of Investment - How efficient is your investment?
    • Internal Rate of Return - Measure the profitability of your investment.
    • Cashflow - How good or bad is the monthly shortfall?
    • Invested - How much have you invested yourself?
    • Recouped - How long will it take for you to recoup your investment?
    • Breakeven - How long will it take for you to break even and start making a profit?
    • PA Score - The indicator that sums it all. How good is this investment?

Have a look and see whether the property is a good investment.  With easy to see indicators, all green is always good.  View information from your Cashflow, how much you've Invested, Return on Investment, Internal Rate of Return, when you'll Recoup your money, when you'll Break Even and more.

View information such as your Cashflow over your Bond Period, your Income vs. Expenditure and your Rental Income over the duratin of your bond.

 If you're investing in a few properties, having a map is always handy to help you remember where it is.  

View the list of photos attached to the property.  This will help you remember exactly how to looks.

View the chosen image and flip through them as you would your photos to remind yourself of the property.  You can take the pictures either with the camera on your iPad or attach them from Photos.

Bond optimiser

The bond optimiser will help see how you can optimise your bond and see just how much faster you can clear the loan. See the graphs and charts explaining just how much you'll save with various optimising strategies.

  • Additional payments - See how additional payments affects your bond.
  • Maintain initial shortfall - See how you can pay your property off sooner.
  • Re-invest all surplusses - See how reinvesting all of your additional profit in to the bond affects the length of your bond.

Optimize your Bond Repayment Strategy.  What happens if you pay extra?  What happens if you invest all surpluses after breakeven back in to your bond?  Find out here.

Tools

  • Home loan qualifier - How much of a loan do you qualify for? Find out a rough estimate with the home loan qualifier tool.

What We Need & What You Get

Although I have my excel spreadsheet, I don't have the expertise to create an iPad application and, although I can make it look like a dog's breakfast, I'd like to have something presentable.

The funding will be going towards one project:

  • The development itself

I have already done quite a bit of the design and hopefully it's easy to use and intuitive.  If there are any additional funds, I'd like to use them to get the user interface as pristine as possible.  

These are the only two areas in which your contributions will be used.

Who is doing the development?

The company doing the development is a company by the name of Swenggco, a mobile solutions company who is one of the top rated companies on Elance. 

They have done over 100 jobs and have a 4.9/5 rating with absolutely phenomenal reviews and I am so looking forward to working with them.  

The estimated time for completion for Property Advisor is 6-8 weeks.

What happens if I don't reach my goal?

If I don't manage to reach my goal, the first thing I'll do is cut out the UI (User Interface) design and I'll complete the design myself along with the developer. It may not look as amazing as it can or be as usable as it can but I will do my absolute best I can to make it as easy to use as possible.

If I still do not have enough for the development, I'll attempt to get a loan from the bank to fund the remainder to bring Property Advisor to market and make sure that I don't' disappoint my contributors (that's all of you) in giving you your free app.

I will be creating a Facebook page and updating it as often as possible with news, features, screenshots so all of you can see how the project is coming along. It will be great to be able to chat with you and hear your input too.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn't mean that you can’t help:

Please, ask some of your friends to come and see the project and perhaps they can make a small contribution towards getting Property Advisor out.

Please also share the project on all your social networking sites and make as much noise as you can and I will be forever grateful to each and every one of you!

Let's make property investing an easy simple task rather than a huge monster that it is to so many.

I will bring this to market come hell or high water. I will make this a success and I will bring you all the best property investment application I possibly can! That is a promise!

So looking forward to working with each and every one of you to bring you an app that can help you retire early, retire richer and never ever worry about if your retirement is going to last as long as you need it to or whether you're going to outlast your retirement.

 Christopher Cousens

story:
Meet Your Future Home Theater

H1 Smart Projector with Harman Kardon Built-In Stereo

H1 by XGIMI is an amazing smart projector that replaces any home theater with an elegant single-cable box.

The XGIMI H1 is our new & improved Smart LED projector that can truly display the clarity and precision of TRUE HD 1920 x 1080p, rivaling far more expensive projectors transforming any surface into a 300-inch screen with unparalleled brightness and clarity.

Experience superior Hi-Fi sound quality with the 45mm built-in Harman Kardon stereo sound that can also be used as a stand-alone Bluetooth speaker.

Bring standard 2D video to life in brilliant 3D. Install apps and games with H1’s Android OS and stream directly to the projector for a truly connected, superior viewing experience.


Breaking new ground with innovative technology by creating extraordinary new products.

XGIMI has won two coveted CES Innovation Awards for its smart projectors. The H1 achieved an Honoree Award in the High Performance Home Audio/Video category, while the Z4 Aurora secured the Best of Innovation in the Portable Media Players and Accessories category

The annual CES Innovation Awards program rewards outstanding design and engineering across 28 consumer technology categories. The world-renowned event is the most coveted in the consumer technology industry.

An amazing smart projector that replaces any home theater with an elegant single-cable box for a fraction of the cost.

H1 comes fully loaded with the widest range of top specs. Stream, game, connect, and entertain with H1.

Enhance your entertainment experience with H1 for movies, TV, gaming, and music.

Stream your favorite movies, TV shows, and clips from Netflix, Hulu and YouTube.

Connect with your smartphone or console to enjoy immersive gameplay.

Stream music with Hi-Fi Harman Kardon 45mm dual unit stereo.

Setup is easy with H1. Seamlessly navigate your way through presentations with wireless connectivity.

Control your entire home theater system with H1’s wireless, bluetooth enabled remote.

H1 remote is a gaming controller and cursor all rolled into one. Entertainment is effortless with one connected remote.

The elegant, uniquely designed H1 integrates with your home seamlessly.

The Ultimate in True Clarity － 1080p Projection

H1’s native resolution is HD 1080p, 2.25x clearer than standard 720p projectors.

H1 Projects Perfect High-Res 3D Display

H1 uses DLP active shutter 3D imaging (cinema-grade technology) to convert any 2D video into a 3D feature film on a 300” display.

Massive 300” Display

You can turn any location into an immersive theater with easy, portable setup. See below the screen sizes based on the distance of the device to the screen wall.

Built-In Harman Kardon Superior Sound Quality

H1 has top of the line Harman Kardon bass-enhancement which ensures Hi-Fi quality for all sound ranges. Plus, H1 is a bluetooth speaker.

New High-Performance Processor Speed Will Blow You Away

H1 boasts the brand new Mstar 6A928 TV chip, Cortex A17 structure, Quadcore 1.75GHz CPU, HEVC/H.265 form 60fps ultra HD 4K decoder and 3GB RAM. 

H1’s sophisticated hardware delivers on all of your video, app, and gaming needs. 

Zero Maintenance, Energy Efficient LED Light Source

You never need to replace the bulb. Keep H1 on 8 hours a day for up to 10 years. 

All backers will receive 1 H1 Carry Bag for FREE when we hit our $900,000 stretch goal! Get excited to enjoy the convenience and ultimate protection from the H1 customized carry bag (MSRP $40).

All backers will receive 2 XGIMI DLP-Link 3D Active Shutter Glasses for FREE when we hit our $600,000 stretch goal! Get excited to enjoy an immersive 3D visual experience at no extra cost.

Their super fast 144Hz refresh rate (backwards compatible to slower 120Hz, 100Hz, or 96Hz) significantly reduces blurring and ghosting, while their stylish, lightweight design increases comfortability and portability. 4K and 1080p are both supported, keeping imagery beautiful, vivid, and lifelike. Plus, they even accommodate eyeglasses without discomfort. No emitter required. Works with H1 and all DLP Link 3D projectors.

*Our 3D glasses utilize cutting-edge Infrared Active Shutter technology. They have been rigorously tested to ensure they work flawlessly with H1. They may also be compatible with other 3D projectors, though we are unable to guarantee success for their use with products other than H1.

 

You can receive the H1 customized stand adapter for FREE when we hit the stretch goal of $400,000.

With the stand adapter, you can easily attach your H1 with accessories* like the wall mount, floor stand, or the ceiling holder.

*All accessories will be available to purchase on Amazon as separate add-ons when H1 starts shipping

                                   X-Floor Stand

The X-Floor Stand is XGIMI’s most popular accessory. The Stand has a sleek, elegant design with adapter storage in the base and a 360° adjustable joint for smooth rotation. Now available as add-on purchase for $110, 27% off (MSRP $150).

Project A Clear Image From Any Angle － Keystone Correction Set Free

H1 projects a crystal clear 300” screen from any angle with its proprietary wide range keystone correction.

We are a young, energetic, and-fast growing team of 200+ people, founded by a group of experienced R&D engineers. Our dream is to create the best, most affordable big-screen projection products in the world and to bring these outstanding home theater systems to every family. We love crowdfunding our latest technology on Indiegogo and want to build up an engaged XGIMI community. We can’t wait for backers such as yourselves to share your great ideas and feedback. With your help, we will be able to create the world’s best projector for everyone. Join the XGIMI family now!

H1’s lifelike projections are created for the connoisseur like you. Get a taste of true 1080p resolution on a 300” display.

From now until the end of the H1 campaign, you can refer your friends to get H1 exclusive accessories and amazing XGIMI product. Let’s begin the sharing fun!

The rules are simple:

  • Copy your unique sharing referral link​​​​​​​

​

  • Share your unique sharing referral link with your friends and ask them to join the XGIMI family by placing an order for H1 on Indiegogo
  • You’ll receive FREE referral prizes including shipping! Types of prizes vary depending on how many referral orders are tracked via Indiegogo.

See below for prize options.

Wanna take the show on the road? The H1 Carry Bag should be at the top of your list. It only takes 2 successful tracked referrals before you earn this prize for free!

The X-floor Stand is XGIMI’s most popular accessory. The Stand has a sleek, elegant design with adapter storage in the base and a 360° adjustable joint for smooth rotation.

The Who:

You must be a H1 backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.

The How:

Log in to Indiegogo. Then, visit our campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s share tools, shown below.

How to Track Your Results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  5. See the number of funders and your total referred contribution amount.
  6. We’ll send you free XGIMI merchandise based on the total points earned!

  1. ABOUT
  2. FEATURES/SPECS
  3. SETUP AND MAINTENANCE
  4. SHIPPING
  5. CUSTOMER SERVICE
Please contact service@xgimi.com with any questions or requests for changes in your order.

What is H1? H1 is the world's first true 1080p projector that can project lifelike pictures up to 300" wide, has built-in Harman Kardon stereo and runs Android OS, all at an accessible consumer price.
Who created H1? XGIMI Technology Co., Ltd.
Why should we use H1? H1 allows you to enjoy an amazing screenless 1080p audiovisual experience with high-definition Harman Kardon stereo, at an affordable price.

What features are available? True 1080p projection quality, 300'' display capability, 3D support, 2D-to-3D functionality, optical zoom function, bluetooth speaker, 35˚ (vertical) and 30˚ (horizontal) keystone correction, Android operating system, streaming ability, plus a bluetooth remote control with an embedded gravity sensor cursor.
What is the uniqueness of the technology? Unlike a traditional LCD projector, H1 uses LED technology. The lifetime of an LED bulb is much longer and is far less likely to overheat than a typical projector bulb. H1 is much smaller and more portable than a traditional projector. Compared to standard Pico projectors that only support 1080p, H1 projects true 1080p physical resolution. H1 also has a higher lumen count than most Pico projectors. H1’s 3D functionality and its vertical and horizontal keystone correction capabilities are more advanced than any other product in this market.
Will there be updates to H1 in the future? Yes - the Android OS will continue to optimize and update over time.
How does H1 integrate with other connected devices? Other devices (smartphone, PC, tablet, laptop) can be connected to H1 with mirror display. TV boxes and gaming consoles can be connected through H1’s HDMI port. Hard drives and thumb drives can be connected through H1’s USB ports.
Does H1 have an app? Which phones does it work with? We have an app (XGIMI Assistant) to control and manage apps on H1. This app is compatible with iOS, and Android.
How does H1 connect to the XGIMI Assistant app? The device and H1 must be connected to the same wifi network, then connected via the XGIMI Assistant app.
What can we expect from XGIMI Assistan app? Access to Google Play store and smart remote control functionality. The XGIMI Assistant app is simple and intuitive.

How do I set H1 up? H1 will come with an adapter, designed for H1 use only. Attach the adapter to the bottom of H1 by taking out the 4 screws in the bottom of H1. So H1 can be matched with different stands (X-Floor, X-Wall, etc.)
How do I turn H1 on and off? Slide the H1's lens cover to turn it on/off or use the remote control to turn it on/off.
How long will H1 last? Besides the sturdy material of H1's surface, it utilizes a highly efficient LED light source, allowing its projections to stay perfectly crisp, clear and bright for its entire lifespan - up to 10 years, with 8 hours of daily use.
Will H1 come with an international adapter that enables it to work with every standard outlet? Yes! All H1 orders will include a global power adapter, so customers can travel with H1 all over the world.

When does shipping begin? Orders placed now will begin shipping in December, and we guarantee a Holiday 2016 delivery.
*Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you placed your order. The XGIMI team will keep you up to date on every step of the process.
Why order now? We will process shipments in the order that we receive them. Backers who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their H1 from our first production batches that have been fully tested and prepared for mass production.
We are offering incredible discounts on all pre-orders of H1’s in return for your support.
You will never find H1 at these low prices again!
Where does H1 ship? How much is shipping? The H1 is available for shipping worldwide. Shipping rates vary depending on your country.
Who should I contact if I'm interested in a distribution partnership? Please email us at service@xgimi.com if you're a retailer interested in distribution.
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? Yes, customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped outside of the China may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; XGIMI has no control over these charges.
What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today? Family conflicts may occur, because everyone will want to use H1!

Is there a warranty? XGIMI warrants H1 against defects in materials and workmanship under normal use for a period on ONE (1) YEAR from the date the retail purchase by the original puschaser ("Warranty Period").

If the H1 projector is defective, XGIMI will cover shipping fee to repair the defective device for free in 15 business days. This Warranty does not cover and shall be void for defects or damages resulting from casualty, accident, transportation, misuse or abuse, liquid, viruses and spyware, neglect, alterations, and service or repair by other than XGIMI.
What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign? See these steps on How to Request a Refund. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting support@indiegogo.com. or searching their help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.
What is your return / exchange policy after the Indiegogo campaign is over? If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees. Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, we're sorry to see you go. Please see here for How to Request a Refund.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? Support, Press, Or just to sat hi please reach out to: service@xgimi.com. for further assistance
story_txt:
Meet Your Future Home TheaterH1 Smart Projector with Harman Kardon Built-In StereoH1 by XGIMI is an amazing smart projector that replaces any home theater with an elegant single-cable box.The XGIMI H1 is our new & improved Smart LED projector that can truly display the clarity and precision of TRUE HD 1920 x 1080p, rivaling far more expensive projectors transforming any surface into a 300-inch screen with unparalleled brightness and clarity.Experience superior Hi-Fi sound quality with the 45mm built-in Harman Kardon stereo sound that can also be used as a stand-alone Bluetooth speaker.Bring standard 2D video to life in brilliant 3D. Install apps and games with H1’s Android OS and stream directly to the projector for a truly connected, superior viewing experience.Breaking new ground with innovative technology by creating extraordinary new products.XGIMI has won two coveted CES Innovation Awards for its smart projectors. The H1 achieved an Honoree Award in the High Performance Home Audio/Video category, while the Z4 Aurora secured the Best of Innovation in the Portable Media Players and Accessories categoryThe annual CES Innovation Awards program rewards outstanding design and engineering across 28 consumer technology categories. The world-renowned event is the most coveted in the consumer technology industry.An amazing smart projector that replaces any home theater with an elegant single-cable box for a fraction of the cost.H1 comes fully loaded with the widest range of top specs. Stream, game, connect, and entertain with H1.Enhance your entertainment experience with H1 for movies, TV, gaming, and music.Stream your favorite movies, TV shows, and clips from Netflix, Hulu and YouTube.Connect with your smartphone or console to enjoy immersive gameplay.Stream music with Hi-Fi Harman Kardon 45mm dual unit stereo.Setup is easy with H1. Seamlessly navigate your way through presentations with wireless connectivity.Control your entire home theater system with H1’s wireless, bluetooth enabled remote.H1 remote is a gaming controller and cursor all rolled into one. Entertainment is effortless with one connected remote.The elegant, uniquely designed H1 integrates with your home seamlessly.The Ultimate in True Clarity － 1080p ProjectionH1’s native resolution is HD 1080p, 2.25x clearer than standard 720p projectors.H1 Projects Perfect High-Res 3D DisplayH1 uses DLP active shutter 3D imaging (cinema-grade technology) to convert any 2D video into a 3D feature film on a 300” display.Massive 300” DisplayYou can turn any location into an immersive theater with easy, portable setup. See below the screen sizes based on the distance of the device to the screen wall.Built-In Harman Kardon Superior Sound QualityH1 has top of the line Harman Kardon bass-enhancement which ensures Hi-Fi quality for all sound ranges. Plus, H1 is a bluetooth speaker.New High-Performance Processor Speed Will Blow You AwayH1 boasts the brand new Mstar 6A928 TV chip, Cortex A17 structure, Quadcore 1.75GHz CPU, HEVC/H.265 form 60fps ultra HD 4K decoder and 3GB RAM. H1’s sophisticated hardware delivers on all of your video, app, and gaming needs. Zero Maintenance, Energy Efficient LED Light SourceYou never need to replace the bulb. Keep H1 on 8 hours a day for up to 10 years. 


All backers will receive 1 H1 Carry Bag for FREE when we hit our $900,000 stretch goal! Get excited to enjoy the convenience and ultimate protection from the H1 customized carry bag (MSRP $40).


All backers will receive 2 XGIMI DLP-Link 3D Active Shutter Glasses for FREE when we hit our $600,000 stretch goal! Get excited to enjoy an immersive 3D visual experience at no extra cost.

Their super fast 144Hz refresh rate (backwards compatible to slower 120Hz, 100Hz, or 96Hz) significantly reduces blurring and ghosting, while their stylish, lightweight design increases comfortability and portability. 4K and 1080p are both supported, keeping imagery beautiful, vivid, and lifelike. Plus, they even accommodate eyeglasses without discomfort. No emitter required. Works with H1 and all DLP Link 3D projectors.

*Our 3D glasses utilize cutting-edge Infrared Active Shutter technology. They have been rigorously tested to ensure they work flawlessly with H1. They may also be compatible with other 3D projectors, though we are unable to guarantee success for their use with products other than H1.

 

You can receive the H1 customized stand adapter for FREE when we hit the stretch goal of $400,000.
With the stand adapter, you can easily attach your H1 with accessories* like the wall mount, floor stand, or the ceiling holder.

*All accessories will be available to purchase on Amazon as separate add-ons when H1 starts shipping


                                   X-Floor Stand
The X-Floor Stand is XGIMI’s most popular accessory. The Stand has a sleek, elegant design with adapter storage in the base and a 360° adjustable joint for smooth rotation. Now available as add-on purchase for $110, 27% off (MSRP $150).


Project A Clear Image From Any Angle － Keystone Correction Set FreeH1 projects a crystal clear 300” screen from any angle with its proprietary wide range keystone correction.




We are a young, energetic, and-fast growing team of 200+ people, founded by a group of experienced R&D engineers. Our dream is to create the best, most affordable big-screen projection products in the world and to bring these outstanding home theater systems to every family. We love crowdfunding our latest technology on Indiegogo and want to build up an engaged XGIMI community. We can’t wait for backers such as yourselves to share your great ideas and feedback. With your help, we will be able to create the world’s best projector for everyone. Join the XGIMI family now!



H1’s lifelike projections are created for the connoisseur like you. Get a taste of true 1080p resolution on a 300” display.


From now until the end of the H1 campaign, you can refer your friends to get H1 exclusive accessories and amazing XGIMI product. Let’s begin the sharing fun!

What is H1?
H1 is the world's first true 1080p projector that can project lifelike pictures up to 300" wide, has built-in Harman Kardon stereo and runs Android OS, all at an accessible consumer price.


Who created H1?
XGIMI Technology Co., Ltd.


Why should we use H1?
H1 allows you to enjoy an amazing screenless 1080p audiovisual experience with high-definition Harman Kardon stereo, at an affordable price.





What features are available?
True 1080p projection quality, 300'' display capability, 3D support, 2D-to-3D functionality, optical zoom function, bluetooth speaker, 35˚ (vertical) and 30˚ (horizontal) keystone correction, Android operating system, streaming ability, plus a bluetooth remote control with an embedded gravity sensor cursor.


What is the uniqueness of the technology?
Unlike a traditional LCD projector, H1 uses LED technology. The lifetime of an LED bulb is much longer and is far less likely to overheat than a typical projector bulb. H1 is much smaller and more portable than a traditional projector. Compared to standard Pico projectors that only support 1080p, H1 projects true 1080p physical resolution. H1 also has a higher lumen count than most Pico projectors. H1’s 3D functionality and its vertical and horizontal keystone correction capabilities are more advanced than any other product in this market.


Will there be updates to H1 in the future?
Yes - the Android OS will continue to optimize and update over time.


How does H1 integrate with other connected devices?
Other devices (smartphone, PC, tablet, laptop) can be connected to H1 with mirror display. TV boxes and gaming consoles can be connected through H1’s HDMI port. Hard drives and thumb drives can be connected through H1’s USB ports.


Does H1 have an app? Which phones does it work with?
We have an app (XGIMI Assistant) to control and manage apps on H1. This app is compatible with iOS, and Android.


How does H1 connect to the XGIMI Assistant app?
The device and H1 must be connected to the same wifi network, then connected via the XGIMI Assistant app.


What can we expect from XGIMI Assistan app?
Access to Google Play store and smart remote control functionality. The XGIMI Assistant app is simple and intuitive.





How do I set H1 up?
H1 will come with an adapter, designed for H1 use only. Attach the adapter to the bottom of H1 by taking out the 4 screws in the bottom of H1. So H1 can be matched with different stands (X-Floor, X-Wall, etc.)


How do I turn H1 on and off?
Slide the H1's lens cover to turn it on/off or use the remote control to turn it on/off.


How long will H1 last?
Besides the sturdy material of H1's surface, it utilizes a highly efficient LED light source, allowing its projections to stay perfectly crisp, clear and bright for its entire lifespan - up to 10 years, with 8 hours of daily use.


Will H1 come with an international adapter that enables it to work with every standard outlet?
Yes! All H1 orders will include a global power adapter, so customers can travel with H1 all over the world.





When does shipping begin?
Orders placed now will begin shipping in December, and we guarantee a Holiday 2016 delivery.*Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you placed your order. The XGIMI team will keep you up to date on every step of the process.


Why order now?
We will process shipments in the order that we receive them. Backers who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their H1 from our first production batches that have been fully tested and prepared for mass production.We are offering incredible discounts on all pre-orders of H1’s in return for your support.You will never find H1 at these low prices again!


Where does H1 ship? How much is shipping?
The H1 is available for shipping worldwide. Shipping rates vary depending on your country.

Please email us at service@xgimi.com if you're a retailer interested in distribution.


Do I have to pay VAT / GST?

Orders shipped outside of the China may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Family conflicts may occur, because everyone will want to use H1!





Is there a warranty?

This Warranty does not cover and shall be void for defects or damages resulting from casualty, accident, transportation, misuse or abuse, liquid, viruses and spyware, neglect, alterations, and service or repair by other than XGIMI.


What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?
See these steps on How to Request a Refund. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting support@indiegogo.com. or searching their help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.


What is your return / exchange policy after the Indiegogo campaign is over?
If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees. Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, we're sorry to see you go. Please see here for How to Request a Refund.

story:
BoxKitty is an amazing cat house that lets you create the purrfect space for your cat, to play and relax in.

Cats need their own territory and place to call their own, BoxKitty can be that space, helping them feel more relaxed, mentally and physically.

Because of its clever modular design, BoxKitty can fit into any home, and can be changed at any time to suit both you and your cat.

BoxKitty lets you  build a cat house that's right not just for you, but your home and off course your cat too!

And when you feel like a change, it's as easy a pulling off some tabs, rearranging some pieces and sticking the tabs back on, a new cat house in minutes!

What Makes BoxKitty Special?


It's extremely modular: 

The pieces have been uniquely designed to offer the most amount of building and play options, and more are planned for the future, with tunnels, slides and more all possible.

Easy To Make:

 just use the hook and loop tabs to joining the cardboard pieces together. 


BoxKitty is Tough: 

Made of the highest quality materials, with a specially selected double layered cardboard from New Zealand. It is much stronger than regular cardboard, as well as being hard to scratch and water resistant.


Great for your Cat: 

You have your own space, so why not your cat? Cats like to have their own space too, this makes them happier. Cats also need exercise to keep them healthy, both physically and mentally, BoxKitty give's them there own place to play and exercise.

BoxKitty, can change your cats life and maybe your's too: If your cat is happy it will show you more affection, an easy equation; 

HAPPY CAT=HAPPY YOU

Cat's love it, we have been live testing BoxKitty with different cats for months, and if there's one thing we are sure of, it is cats love to play with it!

Protect your property: A cat with it's own space to relax and play is a happy cat, hopefully by expending it's energy playing in BoxKitty, it will leave some of your more valuable possessions alone.

Safe; the materials in BoxKitty were chosen because they do not contain chemicals that would harm you or your cat.

Perks, or what you actually get:


Why Crowdfunding?

We want to get through to cat lovers the world over and offer it to everyone, Crowdfunding uniquely offers us the chance to reach people on the cat loving internet, both to get us sales and spread the word.

  • Improve BoxKitty: Your contribution and feedback will help us build new modules, and improve the existing model for cats and cat owners everywhere.
    每一位的支持可以讓我們開發更多真正適合貓的模具以及堅持耐用無毒的品質。

  • Final Tooling and Production Run:  We have done all the design and even made lots of prototypes for testing, but now we need the funds to get our final high quality tooling, and materials and start a full production run. We just need to press the BIG RED BUTTON!

  • Build the Brand: We hope that this campaign will help us build Box Kitty into an international brand, so that we can offer this and future cat products to people all over the world.So please even if you aren't going to buy, feel free to share, and like our campaign, videos, and facebook, after all everyone loves cute cats pics and videos!

The BoxKitty Team:

Made up of Designers and Cardboard Manufacturer Specialist, along with professional feline play testers, BoxKitty has the purfect team to made the ultimate modular cat house:

Risks & Challenges

We have worked hard to minimise any risks to you and us, but of course there are always challenges to overcome:

  • Shipping Costs, the biggest issue for us is the simple cost of shipping, international shipping is very expensive, that's why we have to charge for it. However we are working out ways to overcome these costs, by batching shipments and then sending out locally.
  • Our Cardboard is just so tough, unlike other products we are not worried about how strong it is, testing has shown it can stand up to plenty of prolonged abuse. We have had a few issues cutting it cleanly, even with our industrial machinery; some early editions, may have small cosmetic flaws, however these do not affect function or lifespan of BoxKitty. We hope to have this figured out by the time we ship.

story:
Here's our recommended strategy for storing your caddies:

  • Caddies containing seasonings used nearly every time you cook should stay out on the counter, as handy as can be.
  • Caddies containing cuisine-specific seasonings should be stored in easy to reach locations: on the counter, under cabinets, in a top drawer or an eye-level shelf in a cupboard.
  • Bulk and rarely used seasonings don’t need to go in Chef Caddy units and can be stored out of the way in a dry, cool place.   

The complete label set comes with:

  • 15 cuisine groups, each with four spice cap labels and seasoning list
  • 60 total spice cap labels covering the 60 most common spices 

Specifications:

Learn to make the most of Chef Caddy with the cooking courses that started it all.  Look for the free download link on the instruction card included in the box.

Why Chef Caddy?

While traditional spice racks assume your main goal is to stash bottles away, Chef Caddy believes your true aim is to make great tasting food as quickly and easily as possible. It’s a shift in thinking about spice storage that changes everything... for the better.

Consider how we season. It's not alphabetically or randomly. And rarely do we want just one spice. Most of the time we want a collection of spices that relate to the flavor profile of the cuisine we are making. Chef Caddy groups spices that go together, well, together.

Think about frequency. Some seasonings you use all the time while others can sit idle for months on end. And yet we often jumble them together in our cupboards and drawers as if we use them equally.  Chef Caddy puts your go-to's front and center where they belong.

Let's talk about recipes. Current spice storage solutions offer no guidance about what goes with what, forcing us to turn to recipes for that information. A process that gets tedious to say the least. Chef Caddy puts information in your hands along with the spices. 

Chef Caddy is designed with cooking in mind. It helps you get organized and prepared quickly, inspires you to season more adventurously, reduces hassle, increases confidence, and boosts flavor. 

How to use Chef Caddy

Base Unit + Cuisine Caddy = Seasoning Station

Your Base Unit should contain the five basics: S,P, O, G, Oil

  • Salt
  • Pepper
  • Onion
  • Garlic
  • Oil

These five seasonings play across all cuisines worldwide. Together they form the foundation of flavor. 

A Cuisine Caddy should contain the four key spices for the cuisine NOT INCLUDING salt, pepper, onion, garlic, oil, which are givens for every cuisine. The top of the Cuisine Caddy lists the rest of the flavor profile for that cuisine. These are usually perishable seasonings that don't normally go in a spice rack. 

When it's time to cook, just decide the cuisine you're in the mood for, grab that Cuisine Caddy and connect it to your Base Unit. You now have the nine most important seasonings for your cuisine (five in the base unit + four in a cuisine caddy). Presto. And instant seasoning station with additional flavor suggestions printed right on top. 

If you want to designate more than four spices to a given cuisine, use additional spice caddies and bottle caddies to expand your cuisine set. 

How much easier will it be to make great tasting meals with all your seasonings at your fingertips?

Chef Caddy makes following recipes a snap because it gets you set up super quickly. But Chef Caddy really shines when you are cooking without recipes.

The grouped seasonings and extra information on top allow you to freestyle with confidence. Once you get the hang of cooking in general (something we will teach you very quickly with our included cooking courses), you won't need a recipe to tell you that a squeeze of lime would brighten up that Mexican dish. Just a quick reminder will do. (Sorry Alexa, sometimes a lo-fi solution is better than a talking speaker.) 

What's the story behind Chef Caddy? 

Hi! My name is Casey Moulton, known to some as The Kitchen Karate Guy. I'm a busy working dad, home cook and meal prep instructor. Pictured here with one of my assistants. 

The story of Chef Caddy stretches back about 10 years to the time when I was first learning how to cook. 

Every other Thursday I’d hold a dinner party at my place for six guests where I’d make a three course meal following recipes. Each time I took on a different world cuisine with an appetizer, entree and dessert. I billed myself as America’s Top Recipe Follower and over the course of a year I cooked my way around the world. 

Over that time I learned a few things. One is that recipes are beyond tedious. I’d spend five hours making a meal that got scarfed down in 15 minutes. 

The other thing I learned was that the same five seasonings showed up over and over. Salt, pepper, onion, garlic, and olive oil. I called these the Starting 5 and put them in a kit separated from the the rest of my seasonings. 

Around that same time I got into meal prep as part of a health kick. I loved the concept of preparing all my healthy meals for the week on the weekend but I didn’t like spending my entire Sunday doing it. So I set a goal of making 15 completely different meals in 2 hours. It took me two years of Sundays to crack the code but once I'd done it I knew I'd developed a powerful system.

I dubbed the practice Kitchen Karate and offered to teach it out of test kitchen here in Los Angeles. More than a thousand students attended over the course of two years. 

In the class I showed student how to meal prep their way around the world quickly and without recipes. All they needed was a Starting 5 kit and a cheat sheet of the dominant seasonings for each flavor profile, along with a willingness to cook by eye and feel (skills that are surprisingly easy to learn). 

I showed them how to take a label maker to a spice rack and essentially turn it into the cheat sheet. 

My students told me I should turn the concept into a product and go on Shark Tank! So I hired product designers to work with me on the idea. 

Getting feedback from my students and manufacturing companies, we slowly, painstakingly iterated our way forward. 

Until finally we had a design that checked all the boxes:

  • Attractive
  • Customizable
  • Lightweight
  • Durable
  • Easy to clean
  • Manufacturable for a reasonable price
  • Unique (patent pending)

It’s been a long journey to this point with hundreds of hours of generous feedback from countless home cooks to smooth out every detail. Finally we are here on Kickstarter to raise the funds to get the tooling made and do the first production run. 

We are so excited and grateful to you for helping bring this product to life. And who knows, one day you might see it on Shark Tank!

Press kit

Press inquires: sara@chef-caddy.com

General and support inquiries: sara@chef-caddy.com

Caddies containing seasonings used nearly every time you cook should stay out on the counter, as handy as can be.
Caddies containing cuisine-specific seasonings should be stored in easy to reach locations: on the counter, under cabinets, in a top drawer or an eye-level shelf in a cupboard.
Bulk and rarely used seasonings don’t need to go in Chef Caddy units and can be stored out of the way in a dry, cool place.   
  The complete label set comes with:
15 cuisine groups, each with four spice cap labels and seasoning list
60 total spice cap labels covering the 60 most common spices

story:
Welcome to the Ethos Planetware Campaign!

With Planetware, our goal is simple -- to merge smart design with responsible, sustainable production in an everyday product where both are so often overlooked.

Like many big ideas, Planetware was born over a fine meal among friends. In between bites, we were discussing the design philosophy of cradle-to-cradle -- a sustainable model that produces virtually zero waste and is considerate of the next generation. We began to think: Where does this plate come from? What's it made of? What happens when I'm done with it? These are questions we rarely ask.

Then came the proverbial lightbulb moment -- design an everyday product that not only looks great but is also great for the earth. And where better to start than the kitchen table? After all, everybody eats, right?

We set out to discover if sustainable tableware already existed and found that while some products were compostable, they were still riddled with chemicals, dyes, and plastics that we did not want anywhere near our food or our communities.

We knew we could do better, so we spent nearly two years developing a line of tableware that is made from natural, sustainable materials and devoid of artificial materials or dyes.

The proud result is Planetware -- a full tableware line of cups, plates and bowls that not only looks good, but you can feel good using. Made of sustainable bamboo, rice husk, and corn bioplastic, it's microwave and dishwasher safe, shatterproof, and free of synthetic dyes and chemicals. Planetware’s slim design is also uniquely stackable, freeing up space in your crowded cabinets. And should you ever throw them away, they're completely compostable, leaving zero impact on the planet.


Natural Ingredients: Planetware is made from eco-friendly, sustainable materials -- bamboo, rice husk, and corn and colored with vegetable dye. Available in 6 colors: White, Elderberry Red, Alder Orange, Sassasfras Yellow, Matcha Green, and Natural.

Thoughtful Design: With heat and pressure we mold these ingredients into tableware that's alive with natural grain and texture.  Smooth curves, flowing lines, and stackable design add just enough flair to be a conversation starter.

Synthetic-Free: We looked high and low to find all-natural dye sources that were safe enough to eat and eat off of. We discovered that 100 percent all-natural vegetable dyes create colors that really pop! You're welcome for helping you step up your Instagram food snap game. No filter needed.

Easy Care: Microwave it. Throw it in the dishwasher. Stack it. Done.


Ultra Durable: Don’t let Planetware’s sleek, slim design fool you -- our cups, plates, and bowls are shatterproof and will survive any drop. (Tell your toddler to give it his best shot.) The durable natural materials can also withstand the harshest everyday wear-and-tear. Don’t believe us? We’re throwing in a two-year warranty.


Compostable: Planetware is really built to last -- and we hope you'll enjoy our cups, plates, and bowls for years to come -- but if you do ever throw them away, you can feel good knowing all of our products are completely compostable, resulting in zero waste.


Did you know that Americans throw away roughly 23 billion paper cups every year? Become part of the solution!

Our eye-catching travel mug features a 100 percent natural hemp sleeve for grip and a tight-sealing bamboo lid to prevent spills and maintain temperature. It's an eco-friendly way to enjoy your favorite drink that's perfect at home, in the office, or on the road. (Also available in all six Planetware colors: White, Elderberry Red, Alder Orange, Matcha Green, Sassafras Yellow, or Natural Grain.)


Each Planetware Place Setting includes:

Cup: Our 13.5 oz (400ml) cup measures the same as our travel mug and is perfect for hot or cold liquids come mealtime.

6” Bowl: Perfect for soups, cereal, or your favorite ramen, our bowl is easy to grip with one hand and good for hot or cold use.

8" Salad Plate: Imagine this -- a serving of plants, atop a plate made of plants. Our salad plate is just the right size for any opening course or late-night snack.

11" Dinner Plate: Because everyone loves the main course. The grandaddy of the Planetware line allows for a generous helping of whatever’s cookin’.




Risks and Challenges: With any project comes risks and challenges. These issues can occur during the development, production, and/or logistical aspects of the project. When making products molds can break, materials can be swapped, and imperfections can be missed during quality control. When shipping goods packages get damaged, packages can be lost, and certain countries will levy large duties even for a small order.

Basically, things can happen that are out of our control. The good news is, we’ve been through this before. We have everything in place to launch our product line and the means to correct anything that might go wrong . Most important, we will continue to be transparent throughout the campaign, and also into production and beyond if Planetware is funded. If you have any specific questions about our campaign, our products, or our brand please ask us directly and we will continue to update the answers to the FAQ.

story:
Introducing You to Vie Belles’ Reserve Knife Series:

 

They slice their way through the toughest ingredients foods, thanks to their precision and sturdy build. The knives have all been tried, tested, and found capable of giving you the best cuts for years to come.  

Quality does not come cheap, but we have learned how to create the perfect balance in order to provide a quality item without charging a fortune for the finished product!

Meet your new kitchen companions:

 

We created the Reserve Knife Series to be in the hands of culinary professionals, novice chefs, at-home cooks or even beginners who demand the very best! 

Having been thoroughly tested by Chef Maryam Ghargharechi, Vie Belles' knives managed to win her over completely. 

Ghargharechi spoke highly of the knives saying  "These are truly professional quality, with a balance, sharpness, and function that’s first class all the way. I only use the best in my kitchen and, today, the Reserved Series is what you’ll find there."- Maryam.

See what other professional are saying on TrustPilot:

 

 
 
 

 

 Chefs Resources is a sort of “culinary Wikipedia” providing information specifically for Professional Chefs. We got 5.9 Stars for our Reserve Knife Series.

 Vie Belles Reserve Knife Series

 
 
 
 
 
 

Vie Belles’ Handcrafted Reserve Knife Series are professional quality tools that are stylish as they are functional. In many ways, they are well worth the investment.  

There is nothing more valuable than being able to purchase a quality product that lasts a lifetime!

8" Reserve Chef's Knife

Vie Belles 8" Reserve Chef's Knife is a well-crafted cutting tool that has been designed to offer the toughness, durability, and aesthetic appeal that your kitchen needs. Behind its beautiful looks is a capable blade that can take care of multiple jobs.

 

This breathtaking knife is lightweight, agile, and offers an extremely comfortable grip.

The Vie Belles’ 7" Reserve Santoku Knife is a tool that never gets tired. Outside of being a capable implement for dicing, chopping, and slicing of vegetables, the knife is also perfect for cutting boneless meat and fish, thanks to its super sharp edge. Covered in Damascus steel, the blade’s sharp edge holds up for a very long time without getting blunt.

 

 This beautiful, Asian-inspired chef knife is by far one of the most versatile cutting tools money can buy. At its most basic, it does everything a Santoku knife should; it makes light work of all cutting tasks.

 

 

5.5-inches Nakiri Knife

If finishing details and handle shape are essential to you, then you shouldn’t look past Vie Belles’ 5.5-inches Nakiri Knife. The knife is versatile enough to let you cut vegetables of all shapes and sizes.

 Nakiri is a Japanese word for "vegetable knife." When it comes to preparing salad slicing vegetables for stir-fry, you won’t find better than the Nakiri knife.

 

 

10" Reserve Bread Knife

Lightweight and easy-to-use serrated bread knives won’t come greater than Vie Belles’ 10" Reserve Bread Knife. The knife is an excellent workhouse to have in your kitchen thanks to its versatile, surprisingly light, and easy-to-control nature. While bread knives can be hard to re-sharpen, the quality of the material and toughness of Vie Belles’ bread knife means you are dealing with a tool that will give you a very long useful lifespan.

 

 

5.5" Reserve Utility Knife

Besides adding beauty to your kitchen, Vie Belles’ 5.5" Reserve Utility Knife offers convenience and practicality in more ways than can be imagined. Its sturdy build is made to last, while the knife’s sharp edge is intended to provide you with all the cutting power you need to handle the rigours of the job.

 It's perfect for a multitude of small tasks where more precise cuts are needed, such as trimming broccoli, green beans, or other smaller vegetables.

 

 

MORE ITEMS ON ADDS ON:

 

How Sharp? Razor Sharp!

SHARP has never looked this GOOD.

 

 

Attention: We do not have any control over natural wood color. Natural wood varies in color over time, due to oxidation or exposure to oxygen.

 

 

Why Vie Belles

 

An Honest Price

We set out to create Vie Belles a Knife brand that is beautiful in design and available to everyone at a fair and honest price.

 

Luxury Package 

Perfect gift for your loved ones!

Review

We have tested our knife and cutting board with both professional chefs and home cooks to develop a product that feels intuitive for everyone. Tested, reviewed and approved by Chef Maryam Ghargharechi.

 

We are a team of entrepreneurs, chefs, and designers who like great food and great products. We have no outside investors, no revenue goals, no PowerPoint presentations. That means it's just you, our brilliantly skilled suppliers, and us.

                                                                                                                                            

FAQ

 

SHIPPING & TAXES 

These packages will have FedEx tracking information.

All orders are responsible for duties charged by their respective countries. Visit https://www.dutycalculator.com/ to calculate approximate duties.

Notes: 

  • We cannot alter the value of your rewards on customs declarations - the value will be declared as the total value of the items contained in the shipment. 
  • Canadian customers, the additional shipping costs for Canada may be higher than expected due to the inclusion of Canadian sales taxes.

 

All Vie Belles products carry a limited lifetime guarantee. In order to uphold our quality standards, each Vie Belles® cutlery is backed by a limited lifetime warranty designed specifically to protect against any defects in workmanship or material.

Lifetime sharpening and protecting service are not included in this warranty.

We will not warranty products due to loss, damage caused by abuse, neglect, misuse, accident, improper blade sharpening or dis-assembly. Certain foods are too hard to be cut with a knife and should be avoided such as frozen items, bones, shellfish shells, hard squashes, hard cheeses, nut shells, blocks of chocolate, etc. Defective knives will be replaced, repaired, or refunded at our discretion.

We manufacture our knives to the highest standard of quality. We take pride in the quality of our items. Our products are designed to be functional, sustainable and timeless - for you and many generations of cooks to come. At Vie Belles, we guarantee 100% satisfaction. If you feel that the knives did not meet your expectations, simply contact us and we will send you a 100% refund – no questions asked. Such guarantees are rare in crowdfunding, but we are doing it to make your decision to pledge that much easier.
 

HOW TO BACK 

Become a backer of this project and pick a reward. You will essentially be pre-ordering one of our new cutlery products. You'll get a special backer discount, and receive our products before it is available in stores. Want to buy more than one? Check out All Rewards.  

  • Choose a reward level to back this project! You will receive items stated in details. We have 18 reward levels to pick from. 
  • If there is a product you don't see on the menu but wish to add-on, inquire with us and we will work something out after our campaign ends.
  •  All details like shipping information and other specifics will be collected after this campaign has ended. [After the campaign has ended, all backers will receive a form to complete which entails shipping address, sales tax (if the destination address is in Canada), shipping charges and all other details & quantities to their pledges amount.]

Note that you can order multiple items by doubling/tripling/etc the amount you increase your pledge by. 

 

Risks and challenges

This is Vie Belles Indiegogo In Demand project. We launched over 40 products in the last 5 years, also we had successful Kickstarter & Indiegogo projects and we've got some great experience under our belts on how to manufacture high-quality goods and fulfill lots of orders for our customers. We've also been blindsided more than once by completely unexpected issues and always dealt with them in a way that leaves every last customer happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.

In short, we know what we're doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with the utmost transparency and care for you, our supporters.

Supply Chain Risk: We're incredibly proud of our supply chain, and have a lot of confidence that we can make what we say we'll make when we say we'll make it. But know what? Sometimes 10 shipping containers of product get stuck outside a shipyard for 4 weeks. We pad our schedule for this kind of things, but sometimes not enough.

Whatever happens, we'll get through it together. We promise.

HELP US TO REACH MORE PEOPLE BY SHARING OUR STORY!
