 Nakiri is a Japanese word for "vegetable knife." When it comes to preparing salad slicing vegetables for stir-fry, you won’t find better than the Nakiri knife.

 

 
10" Reserve Bread Knife
Lightweight and easy-to-use serrated bread knives won’t come greater than Vie Belles’ 10" Reserve Bread Knife. The knife is an excellent workhouse to have in your kitchen thanks to its versatile, surprisingly light, and easy-to-control nature. While bread knives can be hard to re-sharpen, the quality of the material and toughness of Vie Belles’ bread knife means you are dealing with a tool that will give you a very long useful lifespan.
 
 
 
If you bake or buy whole loaves of bread, then you will need a bread knife in your kitchen.

 
5.5" Reserve Utility Knife
Besides adding beauty to your kitchen, Vie Belles’ 5.5" Reserve Utility Knife offers convenience and practicality in more ways than can be imagined. Its sturdy build is made to last, while the knife’s sharp edge is intended to provide you with all the cutting power you need to handle the rigours of the job.
 
 It's perfect for a multitude of small tasks where more precise cuts are needed, such as trimming broccoli, green beans, or other smaller vegetables.

 

 

 
MORE ITEMS ON ADDS ON:
6" Reserve Boning/Fillet Knife (Realistic Photo)
2-Piece Reserve Carving Set (Realistic Photo)
5" Reserve Tomato Knife (Realistic Photo)
Reserve Magnetic Knife Block 

 

How Sharp? Razor Sharp!
SHARP has never looked this GOOD.
 

 
Designed by master knife-makers, handcrafted in over 100 steps per knife, The Reserve Knife Series are credit to Vie Belles’ mastery in bladesmithing!
 
A handle that will last a lifetime | Single piece Rosewood handles can withstand several years of mauling.
 
With its fine edge and high level of steel hardness, the Vie Belles Reserve 8-Inch chef will hold its edge longer than most knives with regular honing.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
Vie Belles Handcrafted Reserve 8" Chef's Knife
3D (360°) View

 
Attention: We do not have any control over natural wood color. Natural wood varies in color over time, due to oxidation or exposure to oxygen.
 

 
Why Vie Belles


 
An Honest Price
We set out to create Vie Belles a Knife brand that is beautiful in design and available to everyone at a fair and honest price.


 
Luxury Package 
Perfect gift for your loved ones!
Reserve Knife Series Packaging Design
 
Review

We have tested our knife and cutting board with both professional chefs and home cooks to develop a product that feels intuitive for everyone. Tested, reviewed and approved by Chef Maryam Ghargharechi.

 
 Chef Maryam Ghargharechi 


We are a team of entrepreneurs, chefs, and designers who like great food and great products. We have no outside investors, no revenue goals, no PowerPoint presentations. That means it's just you, our brilliantly skilled suppliers, and us.


 
 
                                                                                                                                            
FAQ
 SHIPPING & TAXES 
These packages will have FedEx tracking information.
All orders are responsible for duties charged by their respective countries. Visit https://www.dutycalculator.com/ to calculate approximate duties.
Notes: 

We cannot alter the value of your rewards on customs declarations - the value will be declared as the total value of the items contained in the shipment. 
Canadian customers, the additional shipping costs for Canada may be higher than expected due to the inclusion of Canadian sales taxes.


 
All Vie Belles products carry a limited lifetime guarantee. In order to uphold our quality standards, each Vie Belles® cutlery is backed by a limited lifetime warranty designed specifically to protect against any defects in workmanship or material.
Lifetime sharpening and protecting service are not included in this warranty.
We will not warranty products due to loss, damage caused by abuse, neglect, misuse, accident, improper blade sharpening or dis-assembly. Certain foods are too hard to be cut with a knife and should be avoided such as frozen items, bones, shellfish shells, hard squashes, hard cheeses, nut shells, blocks of chocolate, etc. Defective knives will be replaced, repaired, or refunded at our discretion.

We manufacture our knives to the highest standard of quality. We take pride in the quality of our items. Our products are designed to be functional, sustainable and timeless - for you and many generations of cooks to come. At Vie Belles, we guarantee 100% satisfaction. If you feel that the knives did not meet your expectations, simply contact us and we will send you a 100% refund – no questions asked. Such guarantees are rare in crowdfunding, but we are doing it to make your decision to pledge that much easier.
 HOW TO BACK 
Become a backer of this project and pick a reward. You will essentially be pre-ordering one of our new cutlery products. You'll get a special backer discount, and receive our products before it is available in stores. Want to buy more than one? Check out All Rewards.  

Choose a reward level to back this project! You will receive items stated in details. We have 18 reward levels to pick from. 
If there is a product you don't see on the menu but wish to add-on, inquire with us and we will work something out after our campaign ends.
 All details like shipping information and other specifics will be collected after this campaign has ended. [After the campaign has ended, all backers will receive a form to complete which entails shipping address, sales tax (if the destination address is in Canada), shipping charges and all other details & quantities to their pledges amount.]

Note that you can order multiple items by doubling/tripling/etc the amount you increase your pledge by. 
 
Risks and challenges
This is Vie Belles Indiegogo In Demand project. We launched over 40 products in the last 5 years, also we had successful Kickstarter & Indiegogo projects and we've got some great experience under our belts on how to manufacture high-quality goods and fulfill lots of orders for our customers. We've also been blindsided more than once by completely unexpected issues and always dealt with them in a way that leaves every last customer happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.
In short, we know what we're doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with the utmost transparency and care for you, our supporters.
Supply Chain Risk: We're incredibly proud of our supply chain, and have a lot of confidence that we can make what we say we'll make when we say we'll make it. But know what? Sometimes 10 shipping containers of product get stuck outside a shipyard for 4 weeks. We pad our schedule for this kind of things, but sometimes not enough.
Whatever happens, we'll get through it together. We promise.

 
HELP US TO REACH MORE PEOPLE BY SHARING OUR STORY!

story:
DES2: Your Pleasant Heaven

 

Because of being soft and spacious, DES2 is truly a heaven for you. DES2 is a coffee table, a reading desk, a sofa, or a comfortable bed ready to serve you everywhere, from the bedroom, living room, and garden to the pool.

 

Ready To Serve You At Everywhere

 

You can place DES2 wherever you like. The swing looks gorgeous while being placed near a pool or in a garden.

 

But very homey while being placed in the living room or bedroom.

 

A Full Set Of DES2

 

 

Dimensions 

 

Colors

 

 

Hurry! DES2's Price

Is Being Increased Soon

 

HTD SWING LLC, A Campaigner

That Is Trust By Backers

 

HTD SWING LLC is a company in Dover, Delaware, USA. We are a hard-working team with enthusiastic and passionate people who always find better ways to improve DES2. Until now, there have been a lot of meetings like this one.

On Indiegogo, we are trusted by backers by what we have accomplished. We proud ourselves on more than 1000 items shipped worldwide and hundreds of happy backers around the world.

Let See What Backers Say About Us In Our Previous Campaign

ComfortC

 

Shipping Cost Discount

For Early Backers

 

To make DES2 more affordable to backers, HTD SWING LLC gives early backers a discount on their shipping cost. By then, we will cover most of the freight fees. The amount of shipping cost that is left for each early perk is only:

This Additional Discount Program applies to early backers only. We will terminate it right after reaching the target number of backers.

 

No Hidden Fees

 

Warranty Policy

 

  • DES2's standard warranty period is 2 years from the time which the backers receive their products.
  • Backer’s benefit during the warranty period:
  1. Exchange for new items or receive 100% of the repairing costs due to manufacturer's faults.  HTD SWING LLC covers 100% of the shipping costs of exchanged products.
  2. Exchange for new mattress & pillows color.

 

Hurry! DES2's Cheap

Price Won't Last Long

 

The current price is an exceptional price for early backers only. DES2's price, then, is being increased as the Price Table below

story: My family needs money for clothes, appliances, to either rebuild or buy a new house. My goodness, when you lose everything it's overwhelming to even think about what you need to go back to a normal state of life. They also need help with medical bills.

story:
Our Story

If you're a friend or family member visiting this page, you probably already know how long of an undertaking this project has been. If you're visiting just because...well...thank you! Here's a quick backstory for you. I started Hammocks & High Tea as an homage to my grandmother and my upbringing in South America. For as long as I can remember I have been enamored with design, and after studying the markets & trends for some time, I realized there was room to bring a new sense of color and pattern to modern homes. I started this collection in 2007 as a stationery line, producing cards from a tiny room in my Brooklyn apartment. In 2008 I launched a few textiles & gift products to test the market and was blown away by the reaction I received. In short, Lucky magazine, Instyle, and the Today show liked the product and suddenly I was in business. I have been expanding ever since and 2011 heralds the biggest growth spurt for my little company.

 

Hammocks & High Tea is an environmentally conscious company from the printing of our fabrics (water based, no VOC inks) to the production of our collection (local, and made to order to minimize any waste). I aim to grow this collection in the "slow and steady" manner, producing quality products in limited quantities. In January I will exhibit at my first of many major tradeshows, awe heck...the mother of all tradeshows...the New York International Gift Fair! This past year Hammocks & High Tea has been embraced by major publications such as Elle Decor, House Beautiful, Coastal Living, Women's Health, etc. The Spring 2011 collection has already been received with such enthusiasm that I am still pinching myself.

 

How you can help

There are two ways sales happen in design: direct sales online and wholesale. The wholesale market is where I will be making my first major foray this year, hence the International Gift Fair. Hammocks & High Tea is already sold at a limited number of retailers in the US and nationwide, but in order to grow I must expand my distribution. At a wholesale show the buyer (store owner) places an order for the collection and products must be made, and ready to ship, before payment is received. This causes a common stagger in funds as cash gets tied up in producing the collection. In this case, I am using campaign funds to ready my fabric (as well as a small portion for materials I will need before the show) in order to produce and ship quickly. Below is a breakdown of how funds will be distributed in order to get us rolling on the first round of production.

 

Purchase of fabric for sample making and production- $4000

Production of samples for sales reps- $1000

Catalog photography & design for distribution- $1500

Booth fee- $500

 

Income at the time is approximately 90% online sales and 10% wholesale, and I'm happy to say that the company has doubled sales in 2010 and expect to triple sales in 2011. We are completely self funded, single owned and run, and at this time put all income back into our production & marketing efforts.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help by forwarding this to your friends, family, Harry the Goldfish, and whomever you think might be willing to help my campaign for growth. Thank you ever so much for your time.

 

xo

 

Karen Young

story:
It has never been easier to get your Sky Shelves! Why?

Our team is happy to announce that we have just finished our first batch production and packaging. We are shipping out the backers orders. 

 

Are Those Magnets Strong Or What?

The Most Adaptable & Customizable Magnetic Shelves Ever.

Your Space. Your Design.

We believe space is an important element to everyone's life and has a direct impact on your well-being – that’s why we designed Sky Shelves.


Sky Shelves allow you to increase space, comfort and provide you with that magical personalized finishing touch. With Sky Shelves, you can easily enhance your space, and organize it just the way you want it – create endless combinations and get exactly the kind of shelves you need.

We’ve obsessed over every element and functional detail on Sky Shelves while exercising great care and consideration with each aspect of product development. We wanted to separate ourselves from others on the market, and have worked hard to ensure our product is useful today, and strong enough to last for the future!

Our team has created the storage solution we felt was missing on the market – a strong, sturdy shelving system you can build, adapt and change in seconds!

Why are we confident you will fully enjoy your investment?

1- Use them anywhere and everywhere.

2- So versatile, always put them to use. 

3- Unlike other shelves, Sky Shelves easily adapts to your needs and not the other way around. 

4- Simply relocate them & always put them to use.

5- Create endless combinations anytime, today or in the future.

6-  Did we say "No tools, no screws."

7 - And more, keep scrolling and see for yourself!  


 

                   

 

 

 

Sky Shelves are available in multiple colors – they’re sure to fit into any home and color scheme.

 

   ON DESKS, OFFICE CUBICLES, RECEPTION

     

KITCHEN, CUPBOARDS, COUNTERS & DRAWERS 

           WASHROOM HIS & HERS

   ANYWHERE WHICH MAKES YOUR LIFE EASIER 

 

 
 

STEP 1

Just insert the legs into each other until desired height. Then, insert a shoe on the bottom leg.

STEP 2

Now, insert legs into boards. Please note – adjacent boards can share legs to maximize space.

 

STEP 3

Then, place boards in the combination desired. Create any combination you want.

Infinite possible combinations 

 

 

 

Your Space. Your Design.

 

 

 

Simply Shelves is ideal for one level shelves (for example to use in cupboards) and can also be combined with the Magnetize-Me option for a more cost-efficient solution.

Magnetize me has magnets integrated  inside the product to enhance the sky shelves experience by providing multi-level shelving stability and rigidity through magnetic fields while remaining completely free of screws and tools.

Magnetize Me is the complete Sky Shelves experience giving you unlimited range and combination possibilities today and in the future when you decide to purchase more boxes or product lines.

*Please note if you choose the Magnetize Me option: the shoes of each column and the corners of each board will activate a magnetic field to provide a stable, strong multi-leveled shelf.

 

 

After extensive testing and sourcing the best materials we could find, we are ready for large-scale production.


Below, you can see some pictures of the mold we’re using to create Sky Shelves

 

 

Meet the Sky Shelves team! We are a bunch of cool and hard working people, just like you. We’re based in Laval, Quebec in Canada and are proud to say we’re surrounded with a great board and a fantastic team.

The innovative idea all started when  we moved into our new home. There was so much space not being utilized properly.  There was a need for more space and organization in many areas in our home and office.

However, present solutions just did not fit our particular needs. That is when we said "Why doesn't someone make a customizable, adaptable and easy to use shelving solution."

That is when Sky Shelves was born.

Once we received our first prototypes, we wanted to use them everywhere; the office, the bedroom, the living room, the kitchen, counter spaces,  the bathroom and more places.

 

The Reason

EVER WISHED YOU HAD JUST A LITTLE MORE SPACE AT HOME/OFFICE?

TIRED OF SCREWS AND TOOL?

We understand that with time your space and storage needs are forever changing. We also understand how annoying screws and tools can be. 

Now, what if you can redesign your space infinitely without any tools or screws? 

The existing nightmares: 

Inflexible and non adaptable designs, the loose screws, damaged pressed woods/soft woods, fear from water absorption, chipped corners, peeling design, the fear of the shelves falling due to its gradual declination and so on... 

One Purpose Only

Most products out there only serve one purpose and are meant for only one place in your home for their entire life span! What a waste of money.

How about relocating one of these existing solutions? 

Most products when mounted will most likely fall apart if dismounted.

How about personalizing one of these existing solutions?

Just Impossible!

That is how we felt about all that wasted space!

 

 

Our word means the world to us.
If despite our planning, under some rare circumstances out of our control, our delivery deadline wouldn’t be met – we promise to be transparent with our backers and keep you in the loop every step of the way.
Rest assured, we will keep all our promises and deliver.

All the factories we deal with are ISO certified, most importantly we choose them not only because of their qualifications but because they were great people. We always look to build long lasting relationship with everybody we deal with including you.

 


 

 

Everyone will have access to them.

1) Why two products?

We realized we can make you save by offering you a non magnet version of the Sky Shelves " Simply Shelves."

For example, in your kitchen cupboards; if you are using a one level shelf, you do not need the magnets.

If you have many combinations, a good way to reduce cost is to have your highest level a non magnetic board.

However, we always recommend the "Magnetize Me" option since it is most versatile for future use.

2)  Which package should I get?

That is a very good question. It all depends on the space and items you have. You can always email us  support@skyshelves.com for us to help you pick the best package for you.

3) What makes this product different?

1 - You can customize your shelves to fit your space and your needs. Not Just your present space and need but your future one as well!

2 - The greatest part of it is that you do not need any screws or any tools.

3- In the future, your needs and spaces will probably change and we are aware of that. That is what makes this product a long term keeper for you. You can simply redesign your shelves just for a change, for a different mood, for a different practical setup or when you get new products to fit just right! 

4- It looks great in any place of the house. 

All of the above and more are reasons you will enjoy your return on investment with the Sky Shelves. 

4) Will the magnets interfere with my electronic device?

No they should not. The magnet strength required to damage modern devices is extremely more powerful than the one we use.

Neodymium magnets are now found in computer hard drives, headphones, compact high-force magnetic assemblies and Halbach arrays. They are also used in medical equipment, such as magnetic resonance imagers, and acoustics.

However, it is best to do your own research. We do not want to be responsible for anything. If still in doubt, opt for the Simply Shelves which do not have magnets.

5) Will the magnets lose their strength?

The lifetime of these magnets is permanent. They begin to lose their magnetism at temperatures above 80 degrees Celsius, so they are not suited to high-temperature applications. Room temperature is ideal.

We deal with ISO-9000 and ISO-9001 factories across the world to get you the best product out there.

6) Why crowdfunding?

Crowdfunding is a good way to raise money to go into mass production and to showcase our product to the world. In return, we offer discounted rates for our early supporters who are helping us give birth to this innovation and who believe in us.

7) Customs and duties for international order

Our prices do not include VAT or other country taxes.

As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and tax for each location through Indiegogo

8) Will the shipping cost be adjusted if more than one perk is purchased?

At the moment, the shipping cost is per item per weight but we hope to renegotiate these fees with a larger volume (larger contributions) and reward our backers afterwards. 

9) When do we choose colors?

We will send you an email at the end of our campaign confirming your order and you’ll be able to tell us which color is your favorite. 

10) Will you have your own site for support and for purchasing more packages? 

Yes we will! However, the best time to back us is now! Once the campaign will be completed, we will enter InDemand mode from Indiegogo. We will also in parallel launch our website, where you will be able to purchase in the future directly from us. At that point the prices will reflect more our MRSP. 

11) What material are used to make the boards and why?

Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene .

Some of the key properties; very sturdy and hard, long-life span and higher melting point.  ABS is widely used for purposes ranging from musical instruments, golf-clubs,  machine parts, car bumpers, toys, motorcycle helmets and so on.

12) Have a question?

Simply email us: support@skyshelves.com

- Good Vibes - Be Positive - Stay Cool -

*patent pending*

Inflexible and non adaptable designs, the loose screws, damaged pressed woods/soft woods, fear from water absorption, chipped corners, peeling design, the fear of the shelves falling due to its gradual declination and so on... 
One Purpose Only
Most products out there only serve one purpose and are meant for only one place in your home for their entire life span! What a waste of money.
How about relocating one of these existing solutions? 
Most products when mounted will most likely fall apart if dismounted.
How about personalizing one of these existing solutions?
Just Impossible!
That is how we felt about all that wasted space!
 
 

Our word means the world to us.If despite our planning, under some rare circumstances out of our control, our delivery deadline wouldn’t be met – we promise to be transparent with our backers and keep you in the loop every step of the way.Rest assured, we will keep all our promises and deliver.
All the factories we deal with are ISO certified, most importantly we choose them not only because of their qualifications but because they were great people. We always look to build long lasting relationship with everybody we deal with including you.
 



 

 

Everyone will have access to them.


1) Why two products?
We realized we can make you save by offering you a non magnet version of the Sky Shelves " Simply Shelves."
For example, in your kitchen cupboards; if you are using a one level shelf, you do not need the magnets.
If you have many combinations, a good way to reduce cost is to have your highest level a non magnetic board.
However, we always recommend the "Magnetize Me" option since it is most versatile for future use.
2)  Which package should I get?
That is a very good question. It all depends on the space and items you have. You can always email us  support@skyshelves.com for us to help you pick the best package for you.
3) What makes this product different?
1 - You can customize your shelves to fit your space and your needs. Not Just your present space and need but your future one as well!
2 - The greatest part of it is that you do not need any screws or any tools.
3- In the future, your needs and spaces will probably change and we are aware of that. That is what makes this product a long term keeper for you. You can simply redesign your shelves just for a change, for a different mood, for a different practical setup or when you get new products to fit just right! 
4- It looks great in any place of the house. 
All of the above and more are reasons you will enjoy your return on investment with the Sky Shelves. 
4) Will the magnets interfere with my electronic device?
No they should not. The magnet strength required to damage modern devices is extremely more powerful than the one we use.
Neodymium magnets are now found in computer hard drives, headphones, compact high-force magnetic assemblies and Halbach arrays. They are also used in medical equipment, such as magnetic resonance imagers, and acoustics.
However, it is best to do your own research. We do not want to be responsible for anything. If still in doubt, opt for the Simply Shelves which do not have magnets.
5) Will the magnets lose their strength?
The lifetime of these magnets is permanent. They begin to lose their magnetism at temperatures above 80 degrees Celsius, so they are not suited to high-temperature applications. Room temperature is ideal.
We deal with ISO-9000 and ISO-9001 factories across the world to get you the best product out there.
6) Why crowdfunding?
Crowdfunding is a good way to raise money to go into mass production and to showcase our product to the world. In return, we offer discounted rates for our early supporters who are helping us give birth to this innovation and who believe in us.
7) Customs and duties for international order
Our prices do not include VAT or other country taxes.
As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and tax for each location through Indiegogo
8) Will the shipping cost be adjusted if more than one perk is purchased?
At the moment, the shipping cost is per item per weight but we hope to renegotiate these fees with a larger volume (larger contributions) and reward our backers afterwards. 
9) When do we choose colors?
We will send you an email at the end of our campaign confirming your order and you’ll be able to tell us which color is your favorite. 
10) Will you have your own site for support and for purchasing more packages? 
Yes we will! However, the best time to back us is now! Once the campaign will be completed, we will enter InDemand mode from Indiegogo. We will also in parallel launch our website, where you will be able to purchase in the future directly from us. At that point the prices will reflect more our MRSP. 
11) What material are used to make the boards and why?
Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene .
Some of the key properties; very sturdy and hard, long-life span and higher melting point.  ABS is widely used for purposes ranging from musical instruments, golf-clubs,  machine parts, car bumpers, toys, motorcycle helmets and so on.
12) Have a question?
Simply email us: support@skyshelves.com
- Good Vibes - Be Positive - Stay Cool -
*patent pending*

story:
Doing laundry can many times be a burden, as wash-only clothes and garments need special care. And what happens when travelers are on a trip and no washing machine is available?

Behold Nival, a game-changing portable washer to help clean your clothes, protects delicates from damage, saves 60 times energy, and gets laundry done easier with less hassles. 

 

 

 

 

Delicate clothing is the greatest concern of the laundry world. One mistake can bring your favorite garments to badly stretched or destroyed stuff. 

But look at this, what would be worse than wasting an evening washing clothes by hand? 

To solve this, Nival utilizes the powerful transducer to automate scrubbing clothes, passively help detach all traces of contamination: dirt, oil, dust, grease, pigments thoroughly in a gentle way. 

It protects delicates from damage from a conventional washing machine. Just 30 to 40 minutes, rinse your clothes, hang up to dry, you will be able to dress up your favorite garments the next day. 

 

Unpack suitcase, do laundry and return suitcase to closet for the next time trip: those post-trip tips no longer apply. 

Nival helps you stay tidy and comfortable during traveling. No hassles returning with loads of dreaded clothes. 

 

Four steps to get it work, really that simple...

 

30 minutes to accomplish your laundry. Easy and energy efficient. You don't have to pay for any dry cleaning services, or line up in a hotel for a self-service coin machine or even overload your luggage with extensive garments. 

You can also use Nival to wash fruits, glasses and jewelry. 

 

Nival has a built-in powerful transducer in the chamber. It induces high pressure waves at hand-wash frequency, which generates cavitation bubbles to agitate a liquid. The agitation produces high forces on contaminants adhering to clothes and it is also able to penetrate microfibers to thoroughly detach contamination like dirt, oil, dust, grease, pigments, etc. 

 

The Nival detergent tablet is pure-plant extracts, containing nano-grade active ingredient of decontamination. It will be dissolved within 1 minute and carried away by the water molecules. With help of alternating waves of compression and expansion, it removes dirt and kills 99% bacteria in 30 minutes.

Commonly seen detergent usually contains harsh chemicals. Nival detergent tablet is the environment-friendly formula, which is proven safe, nontoxic, free of fluorescent agents, heavy metals and other harmful substances to your laundry and capable to sterilize and disinfect.  

Diameter: 20 mm

Thickness: 7 mm

 

 

 

View

the Nival test report 

Nival laundry effervescent tablet test report

 

 

 

 

Throughout over 1000 experiments, we have proven Nival a functionally workable device. Now that small batch production has been verified, we have nailed down a trustworthy manufacturing provider who has rich experience and strict requirements on QC. With you help, we will be able to make this amazing device accessible to everyone.

 

 

 

 

FAQ

1.  Will Nival be safe enough to use? 

Nival is 5 voltage-driven device, which is within the human safety voltage range and absolutely safe to use. You can use mobile phone charger or 5V, 2A power bank to get it work, the power will automatically cut off after operating for ONE HOUR. 

2. Can Nival actually clean clothes? 

Nival works functionally well for our ordinary clothes. It is tough to contaminants especially 

soy sauce, vinegar, fruit juice and other stains.

3. How many pieces of clothes can Nival wash in a time? 

Use T-shirts for example, it can wash two or three once, so Nival will be perfect for underwear, socks and other delicates which are less inclined to put in the ordinary washing machine. 

4. How do I get my Nival work? 

Simply 4 steps: 

A. Drop down clothes into any bucket.

B. Add the laundry effervescent tablet to the device.

C. Soak Nival into water. 

D. Plug and wash. 

5. How long does it take to accomplish the washing? 

Generally about 30 minutes to achieve the cleaning effect. If the stain is more strong, you can extend the cleaning time.

6. Is Nival only used to wash clothes? Does it work for other items? 

In addition to clothes, it can also wash dolls, any kind of clothing such as hat, as well as fruits, seafood, jewelry, glasses and so on.

7. What is the principle of Nival?

Nival has a built-in powerful transducer in the chamber. It induces high pressure waves at hand-wash frequency, which generates cavitation bubbles to agitate a liquid. The agitation produces high forces on contaminants adhering to clothes and it is also able to penetrate microfibers to thoroughly detach contamination like dirt, oil, dust, grease, pigments, etc.

story:
My husband, Blue, has NO idea I am trying to do this campaign for us, but our 2 year anniversary of marriage is coming up on September 4th, and I wish to take us home.

Blue and I met in Lebanon in late 2010, and long story short, we ended up in Ottawa, ON, in 2011. We spent nearly 3 amazing years there, building our life in Ottawa. We chose to be married in Ottawa, among our family and friends, because Ottawa is where our relationship developed, and our love, dreams, and life goals were firmly established.

2 years ago this October, Blue and I left Canada and end up on a very unexpected 18+ month journey through 5 countries, in order to immigrate to the U.S. It was a very tumultuous and emotionally exhausting time in our lives, and it took a serious toll on our relationship, especially because of the simple fact that we were essentially forced to leave the one place we both called and still, to this day, call home - Ottawa. I cannot express how much I have continuously grieved over leaving our life, our friends, our family, our security, behind, when we said goodbye to Canada. And though Blue does not wear his emotions on his sleeve, I feel he is on the same page as me. He misses his people, just as I do.

In January of this year, Blue and I were granted entry, together, into the U.S., and we arrived to Austin, TX on the 29th. Our time here has been very beneficial and we are both now working and establishing ourselves in the states. We are so grateful to have finally been given the chance to settle down again.

Unfortunately, after immigration forms, fees, visas, travel expenses, living expenses, and many many surprise expenses, by the time we made it to the U.S., we had run through any type of savings we had been preparing in order to start our new life in this new country, and that has made us very dependent on outside assistance. On this journey over the last two years, We have both had an amazing support system from our family and friends all over the world, especially my father, Nasri, who has generously offered his support to help Blue and I on this very long immigration path to the United States. I could not have asked for a more supportive, understanding, and loving father, and I honestly don't think I could have done all of this without him. Thank you dad.

This campaign is not essential, and by that, I mean, Blue and I will be ok if we do not make it to Canada for a visit home at this time. But I know, in the bottom of my heart, that being among friends and family, surrounded by beautiful memories, music, and wonderful and fulfilling conversation, we both might, for the first time in a very long time, feel a sense of peace and calm. I know that we both need a chance to heal from our experiences over these past two years, and what better time to do that than for our second wedding anniversary?

Blue and I have both been working very hard since we arrived to Austin, and we are starting to make our own living, slowly but surly. Blue was just hired at Guitar Center (ATX) as a professional audio sales associate, and I was hired, in February, as the lead female singer for a party band company, Stargazer Production, LLC, forming a new band to market. Unfortunately, I was put out of commission on June 20, just a short time ago, halting all of my work for 6-8 weeks, after a brick fell on my foot at a venue and shattered my second toe on my right foot. I am still able to perform as a solo act, sitting down, but this unexpected and unfortunate incident has slowed down my work to almost a full stop. I am gracefully rocking crutches like a pro until further notice! Regardless of this setback, we expect that in the next 6 months, we will no longer need support from family in order to compensate for bills and expenses. We are in a country with many opportunities and we are trying to utilize its benefits and live well! 

Your donations to this campaign will be funding:

1) Two round trip tickets from Austin, TX, to Ottawa, ON, (8-10 day trip)

2) Food/Lodging/Transportation Expenses for the entire trip

3) Payment of Fees for indigogo campaign site use

4) Possibly, but not likely, a little bit of extra Cash to compensate for the time off work, in order to make the trip, for both Blue and me

I know this is a lot of money to ask for, and don't worry! Only donate what you can! Anything surely helps!

Thank you so much for taking the time to read through our story. And to our entire Canadian family, one way or another, we are getting up there to see you all, as We both have about 30+ people who each need huge hugs and kisses for about an hour each! This process will take a while... I'm exercizing and stretching my arms daily, in preparation for all the hugging!

Lots of Love,

Hanna

story:
FACT:  4 out of 5 homes have detectable levels of dust mite allergens in the bed.


THE PROBLEM 

Your house is filled with trillions of microscopic life forms, called dust mites, that feed off your dead skin cells. Dust mites are nearly everywhere. The harmful allergen they create comes from their fecal pellets and body fragments.       

MYTH: Just washing your bed sheets is enough to prevent dust mites.

MORE FACTS:

  • Your body sheds about 40,000 skin cells every hour.
  • Over a 24 hour period, you'll lose about a million skin cells.
  • In one year, you'll shed more than 8 pounds of dead skin cells!

WHERE DO THEY ALL GO?

The dust that collects on your tables, TVs, windowsills and on those picture frames are mostly made up of dead skin cells. In fact, about 80% of the material seen floating in a sunbeam in your house are actually dead skin cells.


OUR MISSION

We're on a mission to rid the world of dust mites and desperately need your support to win this battle!

To arm you, we've created the worlds most advanced & most powerful portable bed vacuum that incorporates a simple, ergonomic design with great functionality and is very sturdy...like one user said, "it's the BMW of bed-vacs!"  Now we need your voice to get the word out and your contribution to win the war.

                            

"Ato" refers to "Atopic" Dermatitis - an itchy skin condition influenced by dust and dust mites.  Several close family members of our Atocare team as well as many others in this world suffer from this, so we were driven to develop Atocare in an effort to eradicate many of those causes, because we know how you feel!

That's why we are proud to introduce the ultimate bed-vac and want to reach out and help others always keep their beds clean & fresh.  Atocare will give you peace of mind when you sleep and we all know how important that is. 

Atocare is simply the best and we stand by that.  But don't take it from us, see what some of our actual users had to say...  

Simply the best bed-vac today, don't settle for anything less...your bed is too important to neglect!


 We spend about a third of our                     lives in bed.

      

                     Don't you think you should be cleaning it?

 

Meet ATOCARE, designed to clean your bed...really good!

Every home should have one, period. How are you cleaning your mattress and bed now...or are you?

   
             Watch Atocare Managing Director, Jae-Hyun Jun giving a demo


FEATURES & BENEFITS

  • 650 WATT MOTOR*: Very powerful, the best in its class & usually only found in larger vacuums.
  • CYCLONE VACUUM SYSTEM: Separates and collects fine dust particles.
  • 3-STAGE TRUE HEPA FILTER SYSTEM: Captures particles as small as 0.2 microns andemits clean air.
  • EASY-SNAP CANISTER: For simple dust removal & disposal. Rinse & clean canister. Easy to maintain. Large, clear & easy to see dust build-up.
  • 3,600 RPM BRUSH: Separate motor brush beats & sweeps hard to lift particles, including pet hair.
  • PHILIPS UV-C STERILIZING LAMP: A distance control sensor safety feature automatically shuts off light when vacuum is lifted. Light can be shut on/of manually as well.
  • DETACHABLE SUB-HOSE: For tricky areas (sofa crease, window frame, drawers, under tables, mattress gap, plush toys)
  • PATENTED NOISE REDUCTION TECHNOLOGY: Only 70db with a powerful motor, we've reduced the shrill noise found in most motors to a "muted sound".
  • BALANCED & LIGHTWEIGHT: Only 5 lbs and ergonomically designed so arms don't get tired.
  • SIMPLE DESIGN: We designed Atocare with simplicity, functionality, safety and ease-of-use, but most of all ultimate suction power in mind.

*600-watt vacuum motor / 50-watt brush motor


"Powerful suction is the most effective way to      reduce house dust allergens in the mattress..."  

                                                                - Dyson


 


THE ATOCARE DIFFERENCE



Dust mites are so small, they are undetectable to the naked eye...

  

If neglected, your mattress can become a virtual breeding ground for dust mites and bed bugs! 


THE SOLUTION


             


INCREDIBLE SUCTION POWER

At the end of the day, nothing beats pure suction power to get dust mites. Atocare has many features, but we focused on suction power as a focal point to our design. 

650 watts makes this an extremely powerful bed vac - only bigger vacuums are this powerful. The powered suction reaches deep into the bedding to remove dust, dust mites and bacteria. Atocare has a suction power performance rating of 40 litres per second, which makes it the most powerful in its class.



 


PHILIPS UV-C STERILIZING LAMP

Similar to sunlight, Atocare uses an ultraviolet (UV) light. UV light reduces dust mites & bed bugs by damaging their nucleic acid, or DNA, thereby destroying their ability to multiply. This is a safer way to sterilize your bed without the use of harsh chemicals.

UV light treatment is used in a variety of applications such as food, air and water purification, because it kills 99.8% of dangerous germs (e.coli, salmonella, staph).

Each unit is also equipped with a safety "distance control sensor" - this means that when the vacuum is lifted 1-inch from a surface, the sensor will automatically shut-off the UV light. The lamp can be controlled manually as well.

             Flat-bottom design glides over fabric and mattresses "like an iron"

            


 


DETACHABLE SUB-HOSE

Atocare comes equipped with a sub-hose for hard to get places.  It can also be used to "self-clean" the bottom of the vacuum after use.

                         

TESTED BY INDEPENDENT LABS

Atocare has been tested and approved by independent labs for effectively reducing dust and allergens in the environment...

     

...by cleaning deep inside mattresses and other fabric furniture!

      

      

TRUE HEPA FILTER

To meet US government standards, a HEPA filter must remove 99.97% of all particles.  For a HEPA filter in a vacuum cleaner to be effective, the vacuum cleaner must be designed so that all the air drawn into the machine is expelled through the filter, with none of the air leaking past it.  This is often referred to as "Sealed HEPA" or "True HEPA".  

                  

Atocare uses a "True HEPA" filter with a filtration rating of 99.97% of anything bigger than 0.2 microns, which is among the best filter ratings.


                              


EASY TO CLEAN

We designed Atocare to be powerful, but also easy to clean and maintain. The large 570cc canister is big enough for long cleaning jobs and since it is clear and attached on the outside, you can easily see when to empty it. 

 Just twist-off and rinse!

 


CYCLONE SYSTEM
A cyclone system removes and separates dust and other particles from the air stream. Dirty air enters a conical container where it flows in a tight spiral. Centrifugal force throws the particles out of the airflow onto the wall of the container, from which they fall into a bin.


 



EXPELS CLEAN AIR
We employed several stages of cyclones so that the air that is expelled is perfectly clean, odorless, and free of any dust or allergens. We also designed the flow of air to blow 45 degrees out and up. This prevents air from not blowing down to create more dust or blow uncomfortably in your face as you clean.

                      



PERKS...THANK YOU!

NOTE:  This model is an Indiegogo exclusive.  This campaign is your ONLY chance to pre-claim this model - get the best bed-vac in the world now!



THE "BMW" OF BED-VACS!


TIMELINE


WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT


ABOUT US

After years of prototyping, developing, refinement and adding many features, we began manufacturing in Korea and distributing on a small scale in Asia. We are asking for your support to help us develop a new model that will be compatible for North America and other select countries.  We hope to reach out to more people and raise awareness of how important it is to keep our sleeping environment clean.

Your contribution can help our company move forward and introduce Atocare to a global community and especially to those who can benefit from it the most. Indiegogo provides a great way for us to reach out to real people, but all with common needs.      

OUR VISION       

We represent one of many small companies in South Korea that dream of promoting their products & creations to a global community, but lack the marketing budget or the manpower to do it through traditional methods.  As a start-up or small company, the global retail environment is very brutal and risky, let alone the language & cultural barriers. 

Crowdfunding is still a very new concept in Korea, but represents a new hope in today's marketing for start-ups and small companies like us to reach out to a global community to tell their story & raise funds for their projects. A successful campaign would enable us to not only launch a new model here on Indiegogo, but would also raise awareness of crowdfunding in Korea. Through increased awareness, more innovative creators, small companies and start-ups may gain hope to reach out to people for funding outside of their current small networks. And the global community will get to see the dynamic innovations from Korea, one of the most advanced technological countries in the world. There are so many innovative and beneficial products that just stay in Korea and never get a chance to shine.

Start-ups and small businesses are supported by the Korean government through various organizations that are always searching for new ways to help companies like us. A successful campaign would enable us to employ the strength of these organizations and influence them to take notice of the benefits of crowdfunding and get them to assist other companies in various ways, including cultural and communication barriers as well as marketing.

So our goal is to not only introduce Atocare to you, but also in the long-run, you to the thousands of Korean creators and developers and give them new possibilities and hope for their efforts through our campaign and Indiegogo!  

                      

THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESS

PATENTED NOISE REDUCTION TECHNOLOGY

Packing such a powerful motor in a compact and portable case was an extremely challenging step in the development process.  When we started initial designs, we encountered some obstacles, such as noise.  With a smaller case design, came less room to create sound barriers and with a powerful motor, the noise was an issue.

Many vacuums that house powerful motors tend to give off a "shrill" noise. To overcome this obstacle, we researched different types of materials and eventually developed our own in-house technology to combat the noise. The result gave us more a "muted" sound at only 70db with no shrill or unpleasant feeling. We have patented this technology and have received an award of recognition for it as well from the Korean government. It has allowed us to put a powerful motor in a compact case without compromising power.

HELP US TO HELP YOU

We hope that through this campaign, we can exceed basic funding goals to reach stretch goals that would allow us to further our research & development and continually improve upon what we have created. 

                             

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

  • NAME:  Atocare EP-880-N (new model coming after campaign)
  • COLOR:  Pearl White
  • SIZE:  8.74(W) x 14(L) x 7.87(H) inches / 222(W) x 358(L) x 200(H) mm
  • WEIGHT:  5.2 lbs. / 2.4 kg.
  • CORD:  16.4 ft. / 5 m.
  • MOTOR:  Main 600-watts / Sub-brush 50-watts
  • VACUUM TYPE:  Cyclone / Rolling brush
  • LIGHT:  Philips UV-C
  • FILTER:  True / Sealed HEPA filter
  • LIGHT SENSOR:  Auto-shut off (1.2 inches from surface)
  • ATTACHMENT:  Sub-vacuum hose
  • DUST CANISTER CAPACITY:  570cc
  • POWER CONSUMPTION:  650-watts
  • POWER:  220v/60Hz I  110v (coming after campaign)
  • ACCESSORIES:  TRUE HEPA Filter / Cleaning brush / Instruction Manual


CAMPAIGN GOALS

This campaign is our chance to hear from real people what other features we could incorporate that would make sense and improve Atocare. If we can exceed our current goal, it would allow us to explore new possibilities in designs with extra features that incorporate new technologies. A successful campaign would will help us to manufacture and bring exciting perks directly to you.

Campaign contributions will go directly towards: 

  • Purchase parts and supplies inventory
  • Register necessary certifications & licenses
  • Modify technical & electrical specs
  • Modify molds & prep manufacturing
  • Quality control testing
  • Create new packaging and instructional materials
  • Set-up logistics and fulfillment
  • Manufacture, pack & ship Indiegogo perks

Thank you for your support...our mission is to make all beds a cleaner, more comfortable and safer place to sleep!


ATOCARE CAMPAIGN TEAM

                   


RISKS & CHALLENGES

We have good experience working with manufacturers and have already established a relationship with a factory. If our campaign is successful, we will work quickly and work hard to prep the new model for our Indiegogo contributors.

MANUFACTURING - We have selected a manufacturer in Korea. They are extremely reliable and we been discussing a tentative manufacturing schedule for this campaign.

SUPPLIES & INVENTORY - We have established a list of suppliers and with funding, we can secure enough parts to assure a timely delivery to Indiegogo contributors.

TOOLING & MOLDS - This is sometimes a complicated part of the process as issues do arise. However, depending on the changes that we need to make to the new model and the condition of the current molds, we will assess whether we can use or modify existing molds or create entirely new ones for this batch run, which would bring up costs.

ELECTRICAL SPECIFICATIONS - Each country has different electrical requirements and outlet types. Unless an electronic device has free-range voltage (110v-220v), usage in different countries will result in damage to the device. Due to design configurations, Atocare currently does not have free-range voltage. It is configured for Korea (220v). With funding, we can purchase inventory and make the technical and electrical changes necessary to comply with US (110v) and other countries.

*Unless otherwise noted, we will match the Electrical Specification according to the country listed on your shipping address that you provide us.

LANGUAGE - While we understand that Indiegogo is a global community, informational material, including user manual, tags and buttons will be made in English only.

DISTRIBUTION - We welcome interested parties, but recommend trying it out first, we know you'll love it!

FULFILLMENT - We don't anticipate any delays or issues to the timeline as we are already planning a few steps ahead, but will keep you updated throughout the process. Please send us your thoughts & questions.

DISCLAIMER - Please understand that we do not claim to cure any disease or illness or health condition.  However, we do claim to significantly reduce dust, dust mites and/or other allergens and bacteria that may be harmful to your health.

INDEPENDENT LAB TESTS - All our claims are backed by independent lab tests and are certified.

TESTIMONIALS - All testimonials are from actual users that have willingly submitted their opinions to us.

Thank you so much for your support and we look forward to an exciting campaign!

                        

                    Video from actual user (cute bed sheets!)
story_txt:
FACT:  4 out of 5 homes have detectable levels of dust mite allergens in the bed.






THE PROBLEM 

Your house is filled with trillions of microscopic life forms, called dust mites, that feed off your dead skin cells. Dust mites are nearly everywhere. The harmful allergen they create comes from their fecal pellets and body fragments.       


MYTH: Just washing your bed sheets is enough to prevent dust mites.
MORE FACTS:

Your body sheds about 40,000 skin cells every hour.
Over a 24 hour period, you'll lose about a million skin cells.
In one year, you'll shed more than 8 pounds of dead skin cells!



WHERE DO THEY ALL GO?
The dust that collects on your tables, TVs, windowsills and on those picture frames are mostly made up of dead skin cells. In fact, about 80% of the material seen floating in a sunbeam in your house are actually dead skin cells.



OUR MISSION
We're on a mission to rid the world of dust mites and desperately need your support to win this battle!
To arm you, we've created the worlds most advanced & most powerful portable bed vacuum that incorporates a simple, ergonomic design with great functionality and is very sturdy...like one user said, "it's the BMW of bed-vacs!"  Now we need your voice to get the word out and your contribution to win the war.

                            
"Ato" refers to "Atopic" Dermatitis - an itchy skin condition influenced by dust and dust mites.  Several close family members of our Atocare team as well as many others in this world suffer from this, so we were driven to develop Atocare in an effort to eradicate many of those causes, because we know how you feel!
That's why we are proud to introduce the ultimate bed-vac and want to reach out and help others always keep their beds clean & fresh.  Atocare will give you peace of mind when you sleep and we all know how important that is. 
Atocare is simply the best and we stand by that.  But don't take it from us, see what some of our actual users had to say...  





Simply the best bed-vac today, don't settle for anything less...your bed is too important to neglect!


 We spend about a third of our                     lives in bed.


      

                     Don't you think you should be cleaning it?


 


Meet ATOCARE, designed to clean your bed...really good!








Every home should have one, period. How are you cleaning your mattress and bed now...or are you?




                Watch Atocare Managing Director, Jae-Hyun Jun giving a demo


FEATURES & BENEFITS



650 WATT MOTOR*: Very powerful, the best in its class & usually only found in larger vacuums.

CYCLONE VACUUM SYSTEM: Separates and collects fine dust particles.

3-STAGE TRUE HEPA FILTER SYSTEM: Captures particles as small as 0.2 microns andemits clean air.

EASY-SNAP CANISTER: For simple dust removal & disposal. Rinse & clean canister. Easy to maintain. Large, clear & easy to see dust build-up.

3,600 RPM BRUSH: Separate motor brush beats & sweeps hard to lift particles, including pet hair.

PHILIPS UV-C STERILIZING LAMP: A distance control sensor safety feature automatically shuts off light when vacuum is lifted. Light can be shut on/of manually as well.

DETACHABLE SUB-HOSE: For tricky areas (sofa crease, window frame, drawers, under tables, mattress gap, plush toys)

PATENTED NOISE REDUCTION TECHNOLOGY: Only 70db with a powerful motor, we've reduced the shrill noise found in most motors to a "muted sound".

BALANCED & LIGHTWEIGHT: Only 5 lbs and ergonomically designed so arms don't get tired.

SIMPLE DESIGN: We designed Atocare with simplicity, functionality, safety and ease-of-use, but most of all ultimate suction power in mind.

*600-watt vacuum motor / 50-watt brush motor


"Powerful suction is the most effective way to      reduce house dust allergens in the mattress..."  

                                                                - Dyson




 

THE ATOCARE DIFFERENCE




Dust mites are so small, they are undetectable to the naked eye...


  
If neglected, your mattress can become a virtual breeding ground for dust mites and bed bugs! 


THE SOLUTION


             

INCREDIBLE SUCTION POWER


At the end of the day, nothing beats pure suction power to get dust mites. Atocare has many features, but we focused on suction power as a focal point to our design. 
650 watts makes this an extremely powerful bed vac - only bigger vacuums are this powerful. The powered suction reaches deep into the bedding to remove dust, dust mites and bacteria. Atocare has a suction power performance rating of 40 litres per second, which makes it the most powerful in its class.



 

PHILIPS UV-C STERILIZING LAMP
Similar to sunlight, Atocare uses an ultraviolet (UV) light. UV light reduces dust mites & bed bugs by damaging their nucleic acid, or DNA, thereby destroying their ability to multiply. This is a safer way to sterilize your bed without the use of harsh chemicals.
UV light treatment is used in a variety of applications such as food, air and water purification, because it kills 99.8% of dangerous germs (e.coli, salmonella, staph).
Each unit is also equipped with a safety "distance control sensor" - this means that when the vacuum is lifted 1-inch from a surface, the sensor will automatically shut-off the UV light. The lamp can be controlled manually as well.
             Flat-bottom design glides over fabric and mattresses "like an iron"

            
  



DETACHABLE SUB-HOSE
Atocare comes equipped with a sub-hose for hard to get places.  It can also be used to "self-clean" the bottom of the vacuum after use.

                         
TESTED BY INDEPENDENT LABS
Atocare has been tested and approved by independent labs for effectively reducing dust and allergens in the environment...
     
...by cleaning deep inside mattresses and other fabric furniture!
      
      

TRUE HEPA FILTER
To meet US government standards, a HEPA filter must remove 99.97% of all particles.  For a HEPA filter in a vacuum cleaner to be effective, the vacuum cleaner must be designed so that all the air drawn into the machine is expelled through the filter, with none of the air leaking past it.  This is often referred to as "Sealed HEPA" or "True HEPA".  

                  

Atocare uses a "True HEPA" filter with a filtration rating of 99.97% of anything bigger than 0.2 microns, which is among the best filter ratings.


                              



EASY TO CLEAN
We designed Atocare to be powerful, but also easy to clean and maintain. The large 570cc canister is big enough for long cleaning jobs and since it is clear and attached on the outside, you can easily see when to empty it. 


 Just twist-off and rinse!
 

CYCLONE SYSTEMA cyclone system removes and separates dust and other particles from the air stream. Dirty air enters a conical container where it flows in a tight spiral. Centrifugal force throws the particles out of the airflow onto the wall of the container, from which they fall into a bin.
 


EXPELS CLEAN AIR
We employed several stages of cyclones so that the air that is expelled is perfectly clean, odorless, and free of any dust or allergens. We also designed the flow of air to blow 45 degrees out and up. This prevents air from not blowing down to create more dust or blow uncomfortably in your face as you clean.


                      



PERKS...THANK YOU!
NOTE:  This model is an Indiegogo exclusive.  This campaign is your ONLY chance to pre-claim this model - get the best bed-vac in the world now!







THE "BMW" OF BED-VACS!
