story:
Our Indiegogo campaign is finished, but check out

www.zenthermostat.com

for more details including where to get the ZEN Thermostat

THE SIMPLE, BEAUTIFUL, CONNECTED
THERMOSTAT

AS SEEN ON

THE IDEA

Most home thermostats are either extremely unattractive, or too complicated and loaded with features that you don’t really use.

Zen is a new home thermostat that looks beautiful on your wall, is incredibly simple to use and allows you to control the temperature of your home from anywhere using your smartphone.

BEAUTIFUL

Zen fits beautifully into your home or office environment. 

The LED screen provides clear and simple feedback, icons only display when they are required.

Available in black or white, Zen blends seamlessly into your existing interior design.


SIMPLE

Comfort doesn't have to be complicated.

Thats why we've designed Zen and the smartphone app to make it easy to stay in control of your home heating and cooling.

TOUCH SCREEN
INTERACTION

• WAKE UP

Touch ZEN to wake the display.

• SET THE MODE

The left and right arrows allow you to switch between heating, cooling and controlling the fan.

• SET THE TEMPERATURE

Use the up and down arrows to set the temperature.

• FADE

Once you are done, the display fades, but ZEN keeps working in the background.


SET THE TEMPERATURE
WHEREVER YOU ARE

Zen allows you to control the temperature of your home anytime, from anywhere, by using our smartphone app.

Our phone app provides you with convenient functionality including:

• REMOTE CONTROL

Set the temperature of your home anytime from anywhere.

• ZONES

Manage multiple thermostats in your home.

• SCHEDULES

Set up a schedule to match your routines.

• PRESETS

Create and modify presets for your ZEN.

ZEN FOCUSES ON WHAT REALLY MATTERS,
MAKING YOUR HOME COMFORTABLE

"We looked at how people use thermostats and we found that complicated units with embedded learning algorithms don’t really work the way people expect. You can spend a lot of time correcting the assumptions it’s made about you. We wanted to avoid this.
We didn’t want to create a thermostat that thinks it’s smarter than you. We wanted you to only interact with Zen when you really need to."

CONNECTED

ZEN CAN WORK AS A STAND ALONE UNIT
OR WITH YOUR EXISTING HOME AUTOMATION SYSTEM.

Zen is designed to be an open system using Wi‐Fi or ZigBee. It will work with smart home systems like Apple HomeKit and, once OpenHome Certified, it will work seamlessly with other OpenHome devices. This allows home owners to access scheduling and energy saving apps if they choose.

MULTIPLE THERMOSTATS?

No problem - You can connect up to 5 Zen WiFi thermostats on your home network, giving you the control you need over the temperature in all parts of your home.

Check out our perks for ways to get Zen and support our team.

If you like what we are doing but are unable to contribute, it would be great if you could share this campaign and help spread the word.

INTERACTIVE 3D MODEL


INSTALLATION

INSTALLATION IS SIMPLE TOO

ZEN comes complete with everything you need in the box. Our interactive installation guide generates a personalized set of installation and wiring instructions.

If you’re not comfortable installing ZEN yourself, we’ve made it easy for your HVAC contractor to get you up and running quickly too.

MAGNETS FOR
EASY ATTACHMENT

ZEN uses a patented magnet mounting system that makes it easy to click it on and off the wall.

WHAT DO YOU GET IN THE BOX?

DESIGN

• Simple and intuitive touch interface
• One-touch magnetic mounting
• Screwless wiring terminals
• Web-based system setup and wiring guide

FEATURES

• 2 year battery life (on 4 AA batteries, with typical operation)
• Continuous operation on C-wire (where present)
• Cool, heat, auto and emergency heat modes
• Fan mode - Auto or On

OPERATIONS

• Adjust temperature by 1 ° F or 0.5 °Celsius
• Display languages – English, French, Spanish
• Zigbee Home Automation 1.2 compatible
• WiFi compatible (with included Zen WiFi Bridge)
• Supports Over-the-air firmware updates

COMPATIBILITY

• For 24V systems, 2A maximum per output
• Supported heating system types: Forced Air, Heat Pump, Gas, Electric, Millivolt, Hydronic
• Supported cooling system types: Heat Pump, Evaporative, Hydronic
• One or Two Stage Conventional Heat
• One or Two Stage Conventional Cooling
• Two Stage Heat Pump (with Auxiliary Heat)

PERKS


YOU CAN CHOOSE THE COLOR YOU PREFER
BLACK OR WHITE


For supporters of the campaign we will be in contact with you to receive your color selection and review your connectivity, and platform compatibility requirements.

HOW TO PARTICIPATE IN OUR REFERRAL PROGRAM

We want to help you get your Zen for free! Take a few seconds to share our campaign with friends and earn a chance to get referral rewards!

Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here. Be sure to use the same account you used when you claimed your Zen! Then, visit the Zen Indiegogo page and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.

Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the Facebook or Twitter buttons.

When you click on any Share Tool on the Zen Indiegogo page then you’ll get a post or Tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal URL.

Feel free to get really creative with your referrals!

LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR REFERRAL PROGRAM HERE

CHECK OUT ZEN ON THE AUGMENTED APP


THE TEAM

Zen has an experienced design team based in Australia and North America who have led hundreds of projects in global markets. The team has significant experience in developing medical, consumer, clean technology and energy efficiency products.

Our development partners are Planet Innovation, which was recently voted Australia’s Most Innovative Company and North America’s MMB Networks, renowned as the gold standard in Zigbee smart home devices.

"Our goal is to create a thermostat for everyone,
one that looks great and is easy to use.
Because we believe that truly smart products are both
beautiful and simple."

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

We have built a great team of product designers and engineers who have been developing thermostats and hi‐tech devices for many years.

We’ve sketched the concepts, engineered the details, run usability and field trials, and refined and simplified the design. We’re ready, and now we need your help.

By backing us, and sharing our story with your family and friends, you’ll be helping us take Zen through to production, investing in tooling and manufacturing automation.

PRODUCT TIMELINE

FAQ



What regions is Zen compatible in?

Currently Zen is compatible in the following countries:

- United States

- Canada

- Australia

- New Zealand

We will be working to make Zen compatible with other countries in the future.

Will Zen work in my home?

Zen works with almost all heating and cooling systems, and will work even if you don’t have a home automation system already installed. When you select one of our perks, we will contact you to review your current system so you can be confident Zen will work in your home when you get it.

What home automation platforms is the Zen thermostat compatible with?

The Zen thermostat uses ZigBee for communicating to existing home automation platforms. We will be OpenHome certified which means Zen will work with the IControl platform used by leading US retailers and cable providers. We are also working to add compatibility with other platforms, including Apple Homekit, SmartThings and Revolv.

Can I use the Zen thermostat if I don’t have an existing home automation system?

Yes. Zen also comes in a WiFi version, which connects to your home WiFi network using a small bridge which plugs into any wall power outlet (it’s about the size of a phone charger). This means you can use the Zen app to control the thermostat from your smartphone without needing a home automation system. Alternatively if you just want a beautiful thermostat you can use your new Zen thermostat the same way you use your existing one.

Do I need a professional installer to setup my Zen thermostat?

In most regions a professional installer is not required to setup your Zen thermostat, however it is recommended.

What heating and cooling systems is the Zen thermostat compatible with?

The Zen thermostat is a compatible replacement for most existing 24VAC thermostats. Check out our section on Technical Specifications, or use the configuration website (www.zenthermostat.com/install) or contact us if you are unsure.

When you select one of our perks, we will get in touch with you to get your specific details so you can be confident Zen will work in your home when you get it.

What is the power source for the Zen thermostat?

The Zen thermostat can be powered permanently when a “C” wire is in place on your current system. Don’t worry, if your home doesn’t have this, Zen has 4 AA batteries which keep it powered. In typical usage patterns the Zen thermostat's batteries will last approximately two years.

What smartphone platforms is the Zen compatible with?

The Zen smartphone app runs on both iOS and Android platforms.

Can I schedule Zen to turn on my heating or cooling system?

Yes. We’ve created a simple user interface for scheduling, so you can program your system from anywhere using the Zen smartphone app. If you are connecting to an existing home automation platform you can use their scheduling or remote access apps.

Are there any on-going fees for using the Zen app?

No, there are no on-going fees for using the Zen app.

How much does shipping cost?

Shipping costs are included in the perk prices. We will ship anywhere around the world.
story_txt:
Our Indiegogo campaign is finished, but check out
www.zenthermostat.com
for more details including where to get the ZEN Thermostat



THE SIMPLE, BEAUTIFUL, CONNECTEDTHERMOSTAT

AS SEEN ON







































THE IDEA


Most home thermostats are either extremely unattractive, or too complicated and loaded with features that you don’t really use.
Zen is a new home thermostat that looks beautiful on your wall, is incredibly simple to use and allows you to control the temperature of your home from anywhere using your smartphone.








BEAUTIFUL





Zen fits beautifully into your home or office environment. 
The
LED screen provides clear and simple feedback, icons only display when they are
required.
Available in black or white, Zen blends seamlessly into your existing interior design.












SIMPLE


Comfort doesn't have to be complicated.
Thats why we've designed Zen and the smartphone app to make it easy to stay in control of your home heating and cooling.







TOUCH SCREEN INTERACTION



• WAKE UP
Touch ZEN to wake the display.
• SET THE MODE
The left and right arrows allow you to switch between heating, cooling and controlling the fan.
• SET THE TEMPERATURE
Use the up and down arrows to set the temperature.
• FADE
Once you are done, the display fades, but ZEN keeps working in the background.











SET THE TEMPERATURE WHEREVER YOU ARE



Zen allows you to control the temperature of your home anytime, from anywhere, by using our smartphone app.
Our phone app provides you with convenient functionality including: 

• REMOTE CONTROL
Set the temperature of your home anytime from anywhere.
• ZONES
Manage multiple thermostats in your home.
• SCHEDULES
Set up a schedule to match your routines.
• PRESETS
Create and modify presets for your ZEN.




ZEN FOCUSES ON WHAT REALLY MATTERS,
MAKING YOUR HOME COMFORTABLE
 "We looked at how people use thermostats and we found that complicated units with embedded learning algorithms don’t really work the way people expect. You can spend a lot of time correcting the assumptions it’s made about you. We wanted to avoid this. We didn’t want to create a thermostat that thinks it’s smarter than you. We wanted you to only interact with Zen when you really need to."













CONNECTED


ZEN CAN WORK AS A STAND ALONE UNITOR WITH YOUR EXISTING HOME AUTOMATION SYSTEM.
Zen is designed to be an open system using Wi‐Fi or ZigBee. It will work with smart home systems like Apple HomeKit and, once OpenHome Certified, it will work seamlessly with other OpenHome devices.  This allows home owners to access scheduling and energy saving apps if they choose. 











MULTIPLE THERMOSTATS?


No problem - You can connect up to 5 Zen WiFi thermostats on your home network, giving you the control you need over the temperature in all parts of your home. 

Check out our perks for ways to get Zen and support our team.
If you like what we are doing but are unable to contribute, it would be great if you could share this campaign and help spread the word.





INTERACTIVE 3D MODEL






INSTALLATION


INSTALLATION IS SIMPLE TOO
ZEN comes complete with everything you need in the box. Our interactive installation guide generates a personalized set of installation and wiring instructions.
If you’re not comfortable installing ZEN yourself, we’ve made it easy for your HVAC contractor to get you up and running quickly too.












MAGNETS FOR
EASY ATTACHMENT

ZEN uses a patented magnet mounting system that makes it easy to click it on and off the wall. 









WHAT DO YOU GET IN THE BOX?




DESIGN
• Simple and intuitive touch interface
• One-touch magnetic mounting
• Screwless wiring terminals
• Web-based system setup and wiring guide
FEATURES
• 2 year battery life (on 4 AA batteries, with typical operation)
• Continuous operation on C-wire (where present)
• Cool, heat, auto and emergency heat modes
• Fan mode - Auto or On
OPERATIONS
• Adjust temperature by 1 ° F or 0.5 °Celsius
• Display languages – English, French, Spanish
• Zigbee Home Automation 1.2 compatible
• WiFi compatible (with included Zen WiFi Bridge)
• Supports Over-the-air firmware updates
COMPATIBILITY
• For 24V systems, 2A maximum per output
• Supported heating system types:
Forced Air, Heat Pump, Gas, Electric,
Millivolt, Hydronic

• Supported cooling system types:
Heat Pump, Evaporative, Hydronic

• One or Two Stage Conventional Heat
• One or Two Stage Conventional Cooling
• Two Stage Heat Pump (with Auxiliary Heat)





PERKS



YOU CAN CHOOSE THE COLOR YOU PREFER BLACK OR WHITE

For supporters of the campaign we will be in contact with you to receive your color selection and review your connectivity, and platform compatibility requirements.




HOW TO PARTICIPATE IN OUR REFERRAL PROGRAM


We want to help you get your Zen for free! Take a few seconds to share our campaign with friends and earn a chance to get referral rewards!
Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here. Be sure to use the same account you used when you claimed your Zen! Then, visit the Zen Indiegogo page and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.
Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the Facebook or Twitter buttons.
When you click on any Share Tool on the Zen Indiegogo page then you’ll get a post or Tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal URL.
Feel free to get really creative with your referrals!
LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR REFERRAL PROGRAM HERE




CHECK OUT ZEN ON THE AUGMENTED APP







THE TEAM



Zen has an experienced design team based in Australia and North America who have led hundreds of projects in global markets. The team has significant experience in developing medical, consumer, clean technology and energy efficiency products.Our development partners are Planet Innovation, which was recently voted Australia’s Most Innovative Company and North America’s MMB Networks, renowned as the gold standard in Zigbee smart home devices.








"Our goal is to create a thermostat for everyone,  one that looks great and is easy to use. Because we believe that truly smart products are both  beautiful and simple."



















WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT



We have built a great team of product designers and engineers who have been developing thermostats and hi‐tech devices for many years.
We’ve sketched the concepts, engineered the details, run usability and field trials, and refined and simplified the design. We’re ready, and now we need your help.
By backing us, and sharing our story with your family and friends, you’ll be helping us take Zen through to production, investing in tooling and manufacturing automation.



PRODUCT TIMELINE








FAQ









What regions is Zen compatible in?
Currently Zen is compatible in the following countries:

- United States

- Canada

- Australia

- New Zealand

We will be working to make Zen compatible with other countries in the future. 


Will Zen work in my home?
Zen works with almost all heating and cooling systems, and will work even if you don’t have a home automation system already installed. When you select one of our perks, we will contact you to review your current system so you can be confident Zen will work in your home when you get it.

What home automation platforms is the Zen thermostat compatible with?
The Zen thermostat uses ZigBee for communicating to existing home automation platforms. We will be  OpenHome certified which means Zen will work with the IControl platform used by leading US retailers and cable providers. We are also working to add compatibility with other platforms, including Apple Homekit, SmartThings and Revolv.
Can I use the Zen thermostat if I don’t have an existing home automation system?
Yes. Zen also comes in a WiFi version, which connects to your home WiFi network using a small bridge which plugs into any wall power outlet (it’s about the size of a phone charger). This means you can use the Zen app to control the thermostat from your smartphone without needing a home automation system. Alternatively if you just want a beautiful thermostat you can use your new Zen thermostat the same way you use your existing one.
Do I need a professional installer to setup my Zen thermostat?
In most regions a professional installer is not required to setup your Zen thermostat, however it is recommended.
What heating and cooling systems is the Zen thermostat compatible with?
The Zen thermostat is a compatible replacement for most existing 24VAC thermostats. Check out our section on Technical Specifications, or use the configuration website (www.zenthermostat.com/install) or contact us if you are unsure. 
When you select one of our perks, we will get in touch with you to get your specific details so you can be confident Zen will work in your home when you get it. 
What is the power source for the Zen thermostat?
The Zen thermostat can be powered permanently when a “C” wire is in place on your current system. Don’t worry, if your home doesn’t have this, Zen has 4 AA batteries which keep it powered. In typical usage patterns the Zen thermostat's batteries will last approximately two years.
What smartphone platforms is the Zen compatible with?
The Zen smartphone app runs on both iOS and Android platforms. 
Can I schedule Zen to turn on my heating or cooling system?
Yes. We’ve created a simple user interface for scheduling, so you can program your system from anywhere using the Zen smartphone app. If you are connecting to an existing home automation platform you can use their scheduling or remote access apps. 
Are there any on-going fees for using the Zen app?
No, there are no on-going fees for using the Zen app. 
How much does shipping cost?
Shipping costs are included in the perk prices. We will ship anywhere around the world.

story:
While computers, mobile phones, cars and even the way we drink coffee is changing with rapid pace, cooking has even made a few steps back in the past few centuries.

We’ve forgotten how to use the cookware made by our great grandfathers and we’ve forgotten many recipes and methods taught by our great grandmothers.  

We strongly believe that cooking, now more than ever, should be easier, funnier and the food we make tastier.  

At IRONATE, we want to bring back what our ancestors already knew about cooking for generations and improve it with modern materials and manufacturing techniques. 

We want to Reinvent cooking. Join the revolution!

 

Let me tell you a secret. This pizza wasn't made in a wood fired brick oven. It wasn't made in an oven at all. I made it on my kitchen stove in just 3 minutes.

 

It has a thin, crunchy crust with just the right amount of those traditional, charred spots on the rim and the toppings are cooked to perfection at high temperatures you just can't reach in your home oven.

 

If you are here, the chances are that you love making pizza at home. But like most of us, you hate waiting for your oven to preheat.  

Nowadays, you even see celebrity chefs like Gordon Ramsay and Jamie Oliver making pizza in a frying pan, finishing it under the broiler.

But why stop there, why would you use an oven when there is a better, simpler way? IRONATE is designed to skip an oven altogether, so you can make your pizza straight on your kitchen stove or range. Or if you are an outdoor person, you can even use it on your grill or camp fire.  

Trust me, when you serve your friends a gourmet pizza on a camping trip, the looks on their faces will be priceless.

 

 

 

 
 

In under 10 minutes, IRONATE can heat to over 800 degrees F (around 430 degrees Celsius) just like commercial pizza ovens. No more waiting 30+ minutes for your oven to preheat, heating up your apartment and wasting all that energy.

The top of IRONATE is designed to quickly soak up the energy from your stove and radiate intense heat into the crust and toppings to ensure evenly cooked pizza in just 3 minutes.  

The bottom end of IRONATE emulates the floor of a wood fired brick oven. You see, we made IRONATE out of special steel. Just ¼ inch of this steel can hold as much energy as a few inches of brick and it conducts heat much better, so you get those perfectly charred spots on the bottom of your pizza, a characteristic of the best Italian pies.

Pizza is the original fast food and I really love to share it with my friends. It's the perfect party food. I don't know many people who don't like pizza.

But, making pizza at home can be time-consuming and the results are never the same as in my favorite pizzeria.  

Well, it WAS time consuming, until IRONATE was born.

Don't miss all the party while you sweat away in your hot kitchen and don't keep your friends hungry. Nothing kills the mood faster than hungry guests. 

With IRONATE you can make a pizza in just 3 minutes, so you will actually be able to enjoy your party. And you can keep them coming – a different pizza with different toppings every few minutes.

We love to cook and experiment with all kinds of dough and toppings. We love using sour dough and organic, homegrown toppings for our pies. 

But there are times when you just want a pizza and don't have the time to mess with the dough. 

That's why IRONATE is designed for a standard 10" pizza from your local supermarket freezer. 

And what a frozen pizza it is. High cooking temperature and shorter baking time can turn even a bland, frozen pizza into the star of your party. The crust won't get all hard and crumbly like it does after 10, 15 minutes in an oven.  

You can add just a few leaves of fresh basil or some fresh mozzarella and your friends won't believe you didn't make that pie all by yourself.

IRONATE is made out of heavy duty carbon steel that prevents wrapping and has the perfect thermal properties for cooking. It has even better heat capacity than cast iron. 

You can use it on most heat sources in most conditions. It can make a great pizza indoors, using only your glass cooktop or gas burner. 

But it can also be used on an open fire or as a separate container on your grill. You can easily remove those cool wooden handles, cover the whole IRONATE with hot coals and use it as a bell for authentic Mediterranean feel.

 

 

 

 
 

At IRONATE we want to learn from our past. Cast iron and carbon steel cookware was used for generations and generations and for a good reason. 

It's much more durable than modern, thin Teflon pans and can hold much more energy. That really helps with cooking.

When developing IRONATE, we wanted to use that age-old technology but add something to it. We researched all the available materials and manufacturing techniques and IRONATE was born.

 

In the process of making a pizza-making gadget, we developed a piece of cookware that can really do anything and will last a lifetime. 

It's can withstand high temperatures and doesn't cool down much, when you put food in it, so it's perfect for searing those sous vide steaks, giving them a nice crust on the outside. 

You can use it to make vegetables. Just close the hot lid for a few minutes to cook them and then crank up the heat to add some color. 

Even the lid has a few tricks up its sleeve. If you’ve ever wanted to bake your pizza in an oven, you can use it instead of baking stones or steels and save up to $90.

It can also be used to keep your food warm for up to an hour. Just flip it around and serve your dinner on the plate. IRONATE doesn't use coating, so you won't damage the lid when cutting or using metal cutlery on it.

 

 

 

 

When designing new products, we look in the past for inspiration, but design for the future.

That's why you won't find a single piece of artificial material in our product, even the box that IRONATE comes in is wooden. And there is no built-in planned obsolescence. IRONATE is designed to last for generations.

The bulk of IRONATE is made out of carbon steel, hand welded together for ultimate durability. It's coated and seasoned with vegetable oil, that's all the rust protection you will ever need and it provides a great low-stick surface.

Those cool handles are made out of locally sourced oak or beech wood that can stand the test of time. Even the packaging is handmade out of untreated softwood boards.

We don't use artificial printing ink anywhere on IRONATE. All the logos and insignia are laser engraved into the material.

 

 

 

IRONATE comes with cool wooden handles that protect you from hot metal. They can be easily removed for easy cleaning or use in an oven or on open fire.

All handles are laser engraved with IRONATE logo. But our friends told us that IRONATE would make a perfect gift for special occasions like weddings, housewarming parties and birthdays.

So we decided to offer you, our Kickstarter backers, an option to choose a custom engraved handles. You can put anything you want on those handles (within reason).

 

Shorter pre-heating times and shorter baking times means that you will be able to enjoy the party with your guests, instead of waiting and sweating in your kitchen.

But it also means that you can save money and energy.

Faster pre-heat and cooking times mean less energy spent. That can translate into less dollars spent and your apartment will not turn into a sauna every time you make a pizza.

You will also save money on cookware. IRONATE is durable and made to last a lifetime, so it can be the only one you will ever buy.

Just think about all those cheap, thin pans you bought over the years. Sure, they are only $19,99 but it adds up if you have to buy a new one every few months.

Steel is a perfect material for cookware. It really is. Cleaning IRONATE is a breeze. You can put it in a dishwasher or clean it with warm soapy water. As long as you don't leave it wet for long periods of time, it's natural oil coating will prevent it from rusting.

It doesn't need any special maintenance either. Just add a few drops of oil now and then and it will reinforce its seasoning every time you use it.

story:
-

Who Is Responsible for Duties, Taxes and Import Costs Once Shipped?

It is the responsibility of the recipient to pay any duties, taxes & import costs that arise from the shipment of the pledges.

>>>See our Latest Media Reviews here! 

 

 

Did you think temperature is the only thing that controls your comfort? Think again. As found by numerous studies, thermal comfort is affected by 6 different factors – something that’s quite hard for us humans to easily monitor, or for old-fashioned AC remotes to sense and control.

Enter Ambi Climate – the one device to easily manage your thermal comfort. Our smart sensors measure the “other” factors of thermal comfort: humidity and sunlight; and we also collect online weather data to account for clothing, plus track the time of day to account for your metabolic cycle. This allows our A.I. engine to create your unique profile, which helps adjust your AC accordingly. Goodbye old remote, hello continuous personalized comfort!

 

Use Cases

Sleep Comfort

Do you find yourself constantly waking up cold? Our body temperature, as well as the external temperature, fluctuates throughout the night, normally becoming cooler towards morning; while our AC is usually set at the same temperature and doesn’t adjust to meet our needs.

Climate Change

Seasonal changes or sudden weather such as a thunderstorm or a spike in humidity may quickly jumble up our comfort and leave us confused, with our AC not able to track and quickly adjust to these situations. 

Always adjusting AC

Constantly adjusting your air conditioner to meet your needs can be quite frustrating - especially when it’s never just right.

Monitor your kids' and pets’ comfort at home at all times

When you’re not at home, it’s hard to make sure your pets or kids stay comfy - not too cold and not too hot; taking care of them from afar at all times is an ultimate goal!

 

How Ambi Climate Works

Comfort Problem 

ASHRAE, the American Society of Heating, Refrigerating and Air-Conditioning Engineers, states that human thermal comfort depends on multiple factors, such as temperature, humidity, sunlight, and others. 

A.I. Model and abilities

In order to deliver an optimal environment, Ambi Climate needs to learn what is comfortable for you. This is done using Machine Learning techniques and A.I. technology. You’ll need to help Ambi Climate learn by giving feedback about your comfort in different seasons and times. This way, you’ll enjoy custom-made comfort. You can always let Ambi Climate know if your comfort differs from the estimate using the app; over time this can also reduce overheating and overcooling issues you may encounter with a traditional remote, since the A.I. auto adjusts to deliver the optimal temperature. Conditions obviously change when the climate changes, so remember that the more you teach Ambi Climate, the more tailored comfort you will enjoy year-round!

Energy Savings

By using multiple sensors to auto-adjust your AC, Ambi Climate reduces energy waste of constant remote adjustment and fluctuating temperatures to give you up to a 30% cut in your energy bill!

 

How To Use Ambi Climate

 

Easily set up your Ambi Climate by placing it in clear view of your AC unit, but not in direct sunlight or AC airflow; download the Ambi Climate App on iOS or Android; pair your Ambi Climate with your AC and you're good to go!

 

Away mode

Away Mode allows you to adjust and maintain a heating, cooling or drying threshold; once you set those, just let Ambi Climate know if you’d like to keep the temperature above or below the desired temperature or the humidity below a certain level. Ambi Climate will only switch on the AC when it is needed to maintain the threshold - take the stress out of travelling or being away from home and let Ambi Climate manage everything.

Multi User Geo-location (Q3 2017)

Want your AC to turn on once you're almost at home and turn off when all members of the household have left? With our new Geo-location feature, Ambi Climate will pay attention when the first person is arriving and adjust the AC to fit their needs; and intelligently turn off once everyone is gone, not just one person.

Integrations

Ambi Climate is integrated with services such as IFTTT and Alexa (coming Q3 2017), to ensure a smooth and truly Smart Home experience!

 

Insights & Usage Stats

The Ambi Climate app is not only designed to manage and control your AC, but also to make it easy for you to stay informed on your AC usage, and gain a greater insight into your usage patterns overtime!

You can check out stuff like AC run time, average recorded temperature and humidity, your favorite modes and your very own comfort profile.

 

Tech Specs 

Testimonials 

Warranty

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

All Ambi Climate 2nd Edition units come with a 2-year warranty! 

Compatibility

Ambi Climate works almost with all infrared-controlled air conditioners that use LCD remotes! This is just a partial list of all the brands we support - you can check out your specific brand and remote right here.

 

Follow our Journey

 

 

 

 

 

Company Story 

Ambi Labs is an IoT startup founded & headquartered in Hong Kong. Inspired by the concept of “Ambient Intelligence”, we believe that truly smart technology is intuitive and seamless - fading into the background and augmenting the user's lifestyle. Our mission is to bridge the gap between outdated appliances and modern technology to make the modern home comfortable and energy efficient, with the power of A.I. and IoT.

We’ve been around for a while, starting off with a successful Kickstarter campaign back in 2014 for the first Ambi Climate. Since then, we have spent countless hours developing and perfecting Ambi Climate, using the feedback we received over the years until finally creating Ambi Climate 2nd Edition - a newly-designed device with even more features and an even better A.I. engine! We believe good technology should be natural and intuitive; it shouldn’t require too much effort, but should “know” what you want, and this is what leads us ahead.

Awards 

 

Making of Ambi Climate 

The Team

We currently have an international team of 25 people in Hong Kong and the Philippines, with the bulk of the team in product development, covering hardware, cloud backend, AI, mobile and production. Having people from different backgrounds and countries is helping us learn more and achieve more every day.
story_txt:
-Who Is Responsible for Duties, Taxes and Import Costs Once Shipped?It is the responsibility of the recipient to pay any duties, taxes & import costs that arise from the shipment of the pledges.>>>See our Latest Media Reviews here!   Did you think temperature is the only thing that controls your comfort? Think again. As found by numerous studies, thermal comfort is affected by 6 different factors – something that’s quite hard for us humans to easily monitor, or for old-fashioned AC remotes to sense and control.Enter Ambi Climate – the one device to easily manage your thermal comfort. Our smart sensors measure the “other” factors of thermal comfort: humidity and sunlight; and we also collect online weather data to account for clothing, plus track the time of day to account for your metabolic cycle. This allows our A.I. engine to create your unique profile, which helps adjust your AC accordingly. Goodbye old remote, hello continuous personalized comfort! Use Cases
 
Sleep ComfortDo you find yourself constantly waking up cold? Our body temperature, as well as the external temperature, fluctuates throughout the night, normally becoming cooler towards morning; while our AC is usually set at the same temperature and doesn’t adjust to meet our needs.
 
Climate ChangeSeasonal changes or sudden weather such as a thunderstorm or a spike in humidity may quickly jumble up our comfort and leave us confused, with our AC not able to track and quickly adjust to these situations. 
 
Always adjusting ACConstantly adjusting your air conditioner to meet your needs can be quite frustrating - especially when it’s never just right.
 
Monitor your kids' and pets’ comfort at home at all timesWhen you’re not at home, it’s hard to make sure your pets or kids stay comfy - not too cold and not too hot; taking care of them from afar at all times is an ultimate goal! How Ambi Climate Works
 
Comfort Problem ASHRAE, the American Society of Heating, Refrigerating and Air-Conditioning Engineers, states that human thermal comfort depends on multiple factors, such as temperature, humidity, sunlight, and others. 
 
A.I. Model and abilitiesIn order to deliver an optimal environment, Ambi Climate needs to learn what is comfortable for you. This is done using Machine Learning techniques and A.I. technology. You’ll need to help Ambi Climate learn by giving feedback about your comfort in different seasons and times. This way, you’ll enjoy custom-made comfort. You can always let Ambi Climate know if your comfort differs from the estimate using the app; over time this can also reduce overheating and overcooling issues you may encounter with a traditional remote, since the A.I. auto adjusts to deliver the optimal temperature. Conditions obviously change when the climate changes, so remember that the more you teach Ambi Climate, the more tailored comfort you will enjoy year-round!Energy Savings By using multiple sensors to auto-adjust your AC, Ambi Climate reduces energy waste of constant remote adjustment and fluctuating temperatures to give you up to a 30% cut in your energy bill! How To Use Ambi Climate Easily set up your Ambi Climate by placing it in clear view of your AC unit, but not in direct sunlight or AC airflow; download the Ambi Climate App on iOS or Android; pair your Ambi Climate with your AC and you're good to go! Away modeAway Mode allows you to adjust and maintain a heating, cooling or drying threshold; once you set those, just let Ambi Climate know if you’d like to keep the temperature above or below the desired temperature or the humidity below a certain level. Ambi Climate will only switch on the AC when it is needed to maintain the threshold - take the stress out of travelling or being away from home and let Ambi Climate manage everything. Multi User Geo-location (Q3 2017)Want your AC to turn on once you're almost at home and turn off when all members of the household have left? With our new Geo-location feature, Ambi Climate will pay attention when the first person is arriving and adjust the AC to fit their needs; and intelligently turn off once everyone is gone, not just one person. IntegrationsAmbi Climate is integrated with services such as IFTTT and Alexa (coming Q3 2017), to ensure a smooth and truly Smart Home experience! Insights & Usage StatsThe Ambi Climate app is not only designed to manage and control your AC, but also to make it easy for you to stay informed on your AC usage, and gain a greater insight into your usage patterns overtime!You can check out stuff like AC run time, average recorded temperature and humidity, your favorite modes and your very own comfort profile.  Tech Specs Testimonials  Warranty          All Ambi Climate 2nd Edition units come with a 2-year warranty! CompatibilityAmbi Climate works almost with all infrared-controlled air conditioners that use LCD remotes! This is just a partial list of all the brands we support - you can check out your specific brand and remote right here. Follow our Journey         Company Story 
Ambi Labs is an IoT startup founded & headquartered in Hong Kong. Inspired by the concept of “Ambient Intelligence”, we believe that truly smart technology is intuitive and seamless - fading into the background and augmenting the user's lifestyle. Our mission is to bridge the gap between outdated appliances and modern technology to make the modern home comfortable and energy efficient, with the power of A.I. and IoT.
We’ve been around for a while, starting off with a successful Kickstarter campaign back in 2014 for the first Ambi Climate. Since then, we have spent countless hours developing and perfecting Ambi Climate, using the feedback we received over the years until finally creating Ambi Climate 2nd Edition - a newly-designed device with even more features and an even better A.I. engine! We believe good technology should be natural and intuitive; it shouldn’t require too much effort, but should “know” what you want, and this is what leads us ahead.
Awards 

 
Making of Ambi Climate 

The Team

We currently have an international team of 25 people in Hong Kong and the Philippines, with the bulk of the team in product development, covering hardware, cloud backend, AI, mobile and production. Having people from different backgrounds and countries is helping us learn more and achieve more every day.

story:
Fire and smoke alarms have been required in U.S. schools for decades, because we know they save lives.  In fact, fire alarms in U.S. schools are so effective that no one has been killed in a school fire in the last 50 years.  But no U.S. schools have gunshot detection alarms, which could have helped to protect the 334 people killed or injured by gun related violence since 2000. 

 
Schools systems around the world are doing everything they can to protect our children from gun violence, but they need help.  Now, you can help them.  By contributing now you are helping us complete AERES and donate gunshot detection alarms to schools. With your contribution, you will become a vital part in protecting the life of a child, a teacher, a staff member and even a first responder. 

Fire and smoke alarms have been required in U.S. schools for decades, because we know they save lives.  In fact, fire alarms in U.S. schools are so effective that no one has been killed in a school fire in the last 50 years.  But no U.S. schools have gunshot detection alarms, which could have helped to protect the 334 people killed or injured by gun related violence since 2000.  

GUNSHOT DETECTION AND NOTIFICATION
OnAlert has invented a new type of gunshot detection alarm that we call AERES (for Automated Emergency Response and Engagement System), which will greatly reduce the horrific effects of gun violence in schools.  With your help we can get this new gunshot detection and notification technology in schools before the end of 2014, if not sooner.

Our Twitter account is https://twitter.com/onalertguardian 

Our Facebook account is https://www.facebook.com/onalert 

This is one of the greatest ways you can help us if you've contributed or not. We urge everyone who believes we need to do more to protect our children and teachers in schooling to pass information about this campaign to others.

CONTACT

If you wish to get in contact please access our website and drop us an email.

www.onalertguardian.com

OnAlert Guardian Systems, Inc. ©2014 and Patent Pending

story:
The American Press is unlike any brewer you've seen before. Its patented design brews quickly, has its own unique brewing character, is easy to clean, and offers a visually stunning, hands-on brewing experience that you simply have to see to believe. Read on, and watch on, to see what makes the American Press different. 


 

The American Press rapidly brews a rich and smooth cup by forcing water through an enclosed, reusable pod and an ultra-fine steel filter as you press. It combines the hands-on control connoisseurs love with simplicity and ease of use to create a craft coffee experience that's perfect for every morning. 
 

 



 

But the most striking part is what happens when you press. You're in control of forcing water through our patented pod as you press, creating a visual brewing experience that's unique in the coffee world. And since you control the speed, pressure and timing of extraction, you can brew your cup, your way, without the elbow grease you may be used to, thanks to our low-friction hydraulic seal. But don't take our word for it. Watch the magic that truly sets the American Press apart unfold right here in our videos, and see for yourself.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The American Press has many advantages but we're especially proud of fulfilling our original mission and inspiration to create a “coffee press without the mess”. Our reusable pod keeps mess contained and waste out of landfills, so cleanup is easy and it's eco-friendly, too. And it wouldn't be a coffee press without the mess if it dripped coffee all over the place, so our specially designed steel pouring edge is guaranteed to never spill a drop! 


 

But the American Press is about more than just being easy to clean! It's an easy to use craft brewing method that's convenient and easy to use while still being eco-friendly, it brews quickly, it's great for coffee and tea, and it offers a delightfully clean and complex brewing character all delivered with a little bit of visual magic.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

12-ounce design can brew more or less coffee, up to 15 ounces

Designed for medium grind coffee (pre-ground works fine)

Ultra-fine 150 micron stainless steel filtration

Shatterproof, dishwasher safe double-wall Tritan(R) carafe

Solid stainless steel handle and stainless steel pouring edge

Medical-grade silicone seals and lid core

100% BPA free

 

 

Whether you're at home or on the go, all you need is hot water and coffee to make an amazing cup of coffee anytime. Its beautiful design makes it the perfect addition to your kitchen counter top and portability means you can make great coffee at the office, in a hotel or around a campfire.

 

We have a production ready prototype ready and waiting, but we need your help to actually go into production. I've personally funded this project so far through my own savings and with the help of family and friends, but now I need a lot more friends! If you can help us fund the next chapter, you'll be a part of creating a new way to brew, bringing a startup to life, and we'll owe you a big thanks (and a lot of cool perks!).

 

UPDATE!! New Stretch Goal!

Early Production! - Help us reach $100,000 and we’ll begin production early – The moment we hit $100,000 we’re cutting the checks for tooling, even if the campaign hasn’t ended yet. The earlier we get there, the earlier you get your press!
 

 STRETCH GOAL REACHED! THANK YOU!!

Thanks to the pull we now have with over 1000 backers and over $100,000 in funding we have one of the best housewares factories in the world pitching in to expedite production of the American Press. Normally, tooling contracts would be completed 15 days after campaign end when final funds are disbursed, but thanks to your support we will have tooling production started almost a month early! 
 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

Want to give the gift of crowdfunding or just have a reminder of your own that you’ve earned a genuine new way to brew and that it’s on the way? We’ve got that covered. Buy the "Golden Ticket" to give the gift of a complete American Press set (press, mug and coffee) or choose silver or bronze for more affordable packages.
 

NEW PERKS!! Handmade letterpress art prints, designed & printed in Detroit
 

Want some hand-pressed art prints to go with your hand-pressed coffee? Designed and printed in Detroit by the community letterpress studio “Signal Return”, our custom prints come in three different versions, each celebrating a unique aspect of our campaign: Beautiful mornings, coffee itself, and the heritage equipment that produced these prints in Eastern Market, Detroit: The venerable letterpress.

 

These perks have all been at least designed locally in Detroit, MI and, where possible, they're being produced locally as well. Our mug's original artwork was produced by the Detroit Woodtype Co. and the coffee selections are from the craft roasters at Hyperion Coffee Co. located in Ypsilanti, MI (yup, another startup aided by crowdfunding).


Back in 2010 I was a graduate design student with a physics background and a passion for coffee. I noticed people bringing French presses to work and leaving them on top of desks and filing cabinets for days, nasty used grounds and all as a sort of big, messy ode to a match made in heaven: coffee & work. It was clear to me that people loved the idea of a simple way of making coffee that you could take with you, but no one loved cleaning up a messy coffee press. 
 



So I drew some sketches of an idea for a coffee press without the mess. One that would keep grounds contained in a pod so they’d be easy to remove, and I wound up spending my entire thesis year in the university machine shop fabricating the first prototypes. Along the way I realized the American Press was about much more than just being easy to clean. 

 

 

Once I saw the second prototype brewing for the first time, I knew I'd realized more than just my original vision for a coffee press without the mess. I realized pressure and ultra-fine steel filtration could brew a cleaner cup of coffee in less time, and brewing as you press made waiting a thing of the past. Just press and pour. 

 

And best of all, I saw how the design for the American Press created a visual experience unique in the coffee world as I pressed and watched a column of clear water transforming into a column of rich, dark coffee for the first time. 

 

I continued to work through many twists and turns, wrong turns, and dead ends for years. I tried to do things myself, and I tried to seek out help. There were successes, and there were failures. Ultimately I found the right help and the right team, and together we’ve made it this far. Now the rest is up to you...

 

 

It's pretty much just me...

Amazing friends and family, a lot of awesome, independent freelancers, and these great organizations:
 

 

 

 

 

Yes, when I started this, it was just me. It's been five years since I first walked into a university machine shop with no idea how to make a spice rack, much less a working prototype coffee press. I walked out months later with a beautiful, working prototype that made it clear to me that giving up would never be an option, and I’m certainly not going to start now.

 

 

 

Since then, I've assembled a dream team of designers, engineers, and business people. We have over a century of collective experience and everyone involved has launched or worked on successful projects and companies. Having a team like mine makes a huge difference. We are ready to do things right the first time, and are committed to delivering the best quality product. 

 

 

 

 

You can see that commitment in our prototype. I can tell you we've done our homework and the only thing missing is your help to continue to fuel our team with the cash they need to manufacture the American Press. We have come as far as we can alone - now we need your help to put the American Press into full-scale production.

 

 

 

 

 

As we continue working to build a company from the ground up with your help, we'll remain committed to making an impact in the communities we're a part of. That starts right here with this campaign. We knit together a network of creatives and agencies from California to New York with my home towns of Chicago and Detroit picking up most of the work between, but with special thanks to University of Pittsburgh fine arts professor Anna Lemnitzer and her home state of Montana for some amazing photography of the American Press there and in the American West.

 

Men and woman from across America have been a part of everything from creating our final prototype to photographing and filming it. The videos you see here were created by Michigan filmmaker Shawn Hamer and filmed right around the corner from us at our favorite restaurant in Ypsi, yet another crowdfunded startup, the Bona Sera Supper Club (special thanks to Bad Fairy & Wonder Woman!).

 

Our perks have all been at least designed locally in Detroit, MI and, where possible, they're being produced locally as well. Our mug's original artwork was produced by the Detroit Woodtype Co. We have coffee available from the craft roasters at Hyperion Coffee Co. located in Ypsilanti, MI (yup, another startup aided by crowdfunding). 

 

 

Our promotional handbill as well as our favorite perk, the best way give someone (or yourself) the gift of crowdfunding, our "golden" ticket, were all designed by the Detroit letterpress studio, Signal Return, with copy writing assistance provided by Texas-based copywriter Kendra Greene. From there we'll remain committed both to delivering the best of high-quality, factory-made products from our own studio, as well as supporting and promoting handmade works by local artisans and their studios, both things we hope will have an impact far beyond this campaign or our own company.

 

 

There will still be risks and challenges. Even with the best talent and plenty of cash, manufacturing a new product can be tricky. The best prototype, CAD and engineering drawings don't guarantee that tooling comes out right the first time. There can be delays and costs can mount. We know from the many years of collective experience on our team that very strange things can happen during production, shipping and warehousing. Cycle times aren’t quite right, parts can shift or break in transit and packages can be damaged or even lost. But these are all issues that can be minimized and overcome. That's why I assembled my dream team. Everyone on it will be hard at work on your behalf to help minimize risks and delays, and to deliver the beautifully crafted product you expect and deserve as our earliest customers.
 

 

 

Don't forget there are ways you can help besides backing our campaign financially. We do need the help of a broader community of friends who love coffee, the entrepreneurial spirit and being a part of turning dreams into reality. Growing that community can be done for free. If you love what you've seen here, please tell every friend you have. 

 

Spread the word, share the love and be a part of creating a new way to brew. You can do that by sharing our campaign on social media, emailing family and friends, or simply by chatting them up about our new way to brew, the American Press.

 

 

 

Q: How does the coffee taste??

A: We wish we could get you all samples! But in lieu of that we've had many experts taste test various coffees brewed in our press and the most common notes are that it's surprisingly clean and complex, with distinct and subtle flavors and aromas preserved by its unique brewing mechanics and carefully designed filters.

Q: What type of filters does the American Press use?

A: The American Press uses a stainless steel inlet filter and an ultra-fine, 150 micron stainless steel outlet filter that preserves flavors and oils while restricting unwanted sediment and "muddiness" so your last sip as enjoyable as the first.

Q: How much coffee does the American Press make?

A: The American Press is sized to make a standard 3-cup serving, but can make up to 4 cups in a single press. This corresponds to 12-16 ounces, or approximately 350-475 ml. 

Q: I know the American Press can make more than the standard 12-ounce serving, but can it make less?

A: Yes! Some customers prefer stronger coffee or may want a smaller, 8-ounce serving, for example. Either can be accomplished simply by adding less water. And if you really want to push the limits of the American Press' similarity to an espresso machine, you can try using even less water to "press shots".

Q: How long does it take to brew?

A: The American Press can make coffee surprisingly quickly. How fast you press is up to you and your tastes, but it can brew as you press in under a minute, though we recommend a slower 2-minute press including 20-30 seconds of pre-infusion (letting the grounds wet evenly after a short initial press/before your main press).

Q: Are there other sizes available?

A: We will be introducing the American Press in one size only, but may introduce other sizing options in the future. Luckily, the American Press can easily make less or more than the standard serving, and if its largest serving of 15 ounces still isn't quite enough, the American Press is unique both in actually being an enjoyable and fun way to brew coffee, and being easy to re-set for another round. If you have a group, we think everyone will want their own turn!

Q: How much coffee does the American Press use?

A: The reusable pod at the core of the American Press' brewing technology is sized to be filled by approximately 24 grams of coffee, corresponding to 12 grams/6 ounces of water, our recommended ratio. You can, however, add more or less coffee. If you prefer less bold coffee, try 20 grams for a 12 ounce serving. If you want to push the limits of your American Press, try tamping even more coffee in than the recommended 24 grams.

Q: What grind does the American Press use?

A: We recommend a standard, medium grind. The same used for most automatic coffee machines and the same you'll find in pre-ground coffee, but you can play with finer grinds. We do not, however, recommend using either very fine OR very coarse coffee. 

Q: Is the American Press made of food-safe materials?

A: The American Press is made of the highest quality materials available and is entirely constructed from only 3 materials: Stainless steel (handle, lid exterior, rod and filters), BPA-free Tritan(R) (carafe, pod and structural components) and medical-grade silicone (seals and lid core).

Q: Is the American Press dishwasher safe?

A: Yes! The carafe is made of Tritan(R), the same BPA-free material used in Nalgene(R) bottles, Camelbak(R) products and high-end Vitamix(R) blender bodies was chosen for its strength and durability. It can be washed on top rack of the dishwasher without concern along with all parts of the American Press, though you may prefer to handwash the high-polish steel parts. The filter screen in the pod top can also be easily removed by pushing it out of the pod top with your finger, and the silicone gasket can be removed from the filter screen as well for thorough cleaning and drying, but please be careful with these small parts in the dishwasher (recommend placing them in a utensil basket by themselves).
 

Q: Is the Tritan carafe microwave-safe?

A: No! There is a piece of steel in the carafe, so it's not microwaveable. We recommend microwaving your water in a ceramic mug, then transferring it to your carafe. Though we prefer using an electric kettle ourselves, this method does have the added benefit of pre-heating you mug!
 

Q: I notice the American Press has no handle, isn't it too hot to pick up? How well insulated is the Tritan(R) carafe? 

A: Tritan(R) itself has some insulating properties, but the carafe is a double-wall, vacuum sealed design, offering a high-level of insulation that's completely cool to the touch, even when filled with boiling water.
