I walked out months later with a beautiful, working prototype that made it clear to me that giving up would never be an option, and I’m certainly not going to start now.
 
 
 

Since then, I've assembled a dream team of designers, engineers, and business people. We have over a century of collective experience and everyone involved has launched or worked on successful projects and companies. Having a team like mine makes a huge difference. We are ready to do things right the first time, and are committed to delivering the best quality product. 
 
 
 
 

You can see that commitment in our prototype. I can tell you we've done our homework and the only thing missing is your help to continue to fuel our team with the cash they need to manufacture the American Press. We have come as far as we can alone - now we need your help to put the American Press into full-scale production.
 

 
 
 
 

As we continue working to build a company from the ground up with your help, we'll remain committed to making an impact in the communities we're a part of. That starts right here with this campaign. We knit together a network of creatives and agencies from California to New York with my home towns of Chicago and Detroit picking up most of the work between, but with special thanks to University of Pittsburgh fine arts professor Anna Lemnitzer and her home state of Montana for some amazing photography of the American Press there and in the American West.
 

Men and woman from across America have been a part of everything from creating our final prototype to photographing and filming it. The videos you see here were created by Michigan filmmaker Shawn Hamer and filmed right around the corner from us at our favorite restaurant in Ypsi, yet another crowdfunded startup, the Bona Sera Supper Club (special thanks to Bad Fairy & Wonder Woman!).
 

Our perks have all been at least designed locally in Detroit, MI and, where possible, they're being produced locally as well. Our mug's original artwork was produced by the Detroit Woodtype Co. We have coffee available from the craft roasters at Hyperion Coffee Co. located in Ypsilanti, MI (yup, another startup aided by crowdfunding). 
 

 
Our promotional handbill as well as our favorite perk, the best way give someone (or yourself) the gift of crowdfunding, our "golden" ticket, were all designed by the Detroit letterpress studio, Signal Return, with copy writing assistance provided by Texas-based copywriter Kendra Greene. From there we'll remain committed both to delivering the best of high-quality, factory-made products from our own studio, as well as supporting and promoting handmade works by local artisans and their studios, both things we hope will have an impact far beyond this campaign or our own company.
 

 

There will still be risks and challenges. Even with the best talent and plenty of cash, manufacturing a new product can be tricky. The best prototype, CAD and engineering drawings don't guarantee that tooling comes out right the first time. There can be delays and costs can mount. We know from the many years of collective experience on our team that very strange things can happen during production, shipping and warehousing. Cycle times aren’t quite right, parts can shift or break in transit and packages can be damaged or even lost. But these are all issues that can be minimized and overcome. That's why I assembled my dream team. Everyone on it will be hard at work on your behalf to help minimize risks and delays, and to deliver the beautifully crafted product you expect and deserve as our earliest customers. 

 
 



Don't forget there are ways you can help besides backing our campaign financially. We do need the help of a broader community of friends who love coffee, the entrepreneurial spirit and being a part of turning dreams into reality. Growing that community can be done for free. If you love what you've seen here, please tell every friend you have. 
 

Spread the word, share the love and be a part of creating a new way to brew. You can do that by sharing our campaign on social media, emailing family and friends, or simply by chatting them up about our new way to brew, the American Press.


 

 
 
Q: How does the coffee taste??
A: We wish we could get you all samples! But in lieu of that we've had many experts taste test various coffees brewed in our press and the most common notes are that it's surprisingly clean and complex, with distinct and subtle flavors and aromas preserved by its unique brewing mechanics and carefully designed filters.
Q: What type of filters does the American Press use?
A: The American Press uses a stainless steel inlet filter and an ultra-fine, 150 micron stainless steel outlet filter that preserves flavors and oils while restricting unwanted sediment and "muddiness" so your last sip as enjoyable as the first.
Q: How much coffee does the American Press make?
A: The American Press is sized to make a standard 3-cup serving, but can make up to 4 cups in a single press. This corresponds to 12-16 ounces, or approximately 350-475 ml. 
Q: I know the American Press can make more than the standard 12-ounce serving, but can it make less?
A: Yes! Some customers prefer stronger coffee or may want a smaller, 8-ounce serving, for example. Either can be accomplished simply by adding less water. And if you really want to push the limits of the American Press' similarity to an espresso machine, you can try using even less water to "press shots".
Q: How long does it take to brew?
A: The American Press can make coffee surprisingly quickly. How fast you press is up to you and your tastes, but it can brew as you press in under a minute, though we recommend a slower 2-minute press including 20-30 seconds of pre-infusion (letting the grounds wet evenly after a short initial press/before your main press).
Q: Are there other sizes available?
A: We will be introducing the American Press in one size only, but may introduce other sizing options in the future. Luckily, the American Press can easily make less or more than the standard serving, and if its largest serving of 15 ounces still isn't quite enough, the American Press is unique both in actually being an enjoyable and fun way to brew coffee, and being easy to re-set for another round. If you have a group, we think everyone will want their own turn!
Q: How much coffee does the American Press use?
A: The reusable pod at the core of the American Press' brewing technology is sized to be filled by approximately 24 grams of coffee, corresponding to 12 grams/6 ounces of water, our recommended ratio. You can, however, add more or less coffee. If you prefer less bold coffee, try 20 grams for a 12 ounce serving. If you want to push the limits of your American Press, try tamping even more coffee in than the recommended 24 grams.
Q: What grind does the American Press use?
A: We recommend a standard, medium grind. The same used for most automatic coffee machines and the same you'll find in pre-ground coffee, but you can play with finer grinds. We do not, however, recommend using either very fine OR very coarse coffee. 
Q: Is the American Press made of food-safe materials?
A: The American Press is made of the highest quality materials available and is entirely constructed from only 3 materials: Stainless steel (handle, lid exterior, rod and filters), BPA-free Tritan(R) (carafe, pod and structural components) and medical-grade silicone (seals and lid core).
Q: Is the American Press dishwasher safe?
A: Yes! The carafe is made of Tritan(R), the same BPA-free material used in Nalgene(R) bottles, Camelbak(R) products and high-end Vitamix(R) blender bodies was chosen for its strength and durability. It can be washed on top rack of the dishwasher without concern along with all parts of the American Press, though you may prefer to handwash the high-polish steel parts. The filter screen in the pod top can also be easily removed by pushing it out of the pod top with your finger, and the silicone gasket can be removed from the filter screen as well for thorough cleaning and drying, but please be careful with these small parts in the dishwasher (recommend placing them in a utensil basket by themselves). 
Q: Is the Tritan carafe microwave-safe?
A: No! There is a piece of steel in the carafe, so it's not microwaveable. We recommend microwaving your water in a ceramic mug, then transferring it to your carafe. Though we prefer using an electric kettle ourselves, this method does have the added benefit of pre-heating you mug! 
Q: I notice the American Press has no handle, isn't it too hot to pick up? How well insulated is the Tritan(R) carafe? 
A: Tritan(R) itself has some insulating properties, but the carafe is a double-wall, vacuum sealed design, offering a high-level of insulation that's completely cool to the touch, even when filled with boiling water.

story:
The final version of The Orb. Here seen in a bedroom environment

 

INTRODUCING THE ORB

The Orb is our take on the next generation smart light: a beautifully crafted designer lamp with an intelligent control system that brings a professional lighting solution to your home and works right out of the box.

Unlike any other lamp, with the Orb you can control not only the intensity and colour but also the direction. A combination not available through any other product on the market.

With Danish design at heart, the Orb isn’t just an intelligent lighting solution, but a beautiful light that will look stylish in any home.

 

 

Rendering of the final version of The Orb. Here seen in a kitchen environment

 

BETTER LIGHT. BETTER LIVING.

Our first lighting platform builds on the idea of being able to create a multitude of light settings with one lamp. Through conversations with lighting designers and architects, it became evident that good light needs to be dynamic. We need to create contrasts and leaps in luminance, add dashes of colour, and control the white balance. 

In order to do this, we needed to break out of the traditional way of creating lamps. This is the reasoning behind the Orb.


First renderings of The Orb. Note that there are small changes to the final design

 

THE RIGHT MOOD FOR ANY SITUATION

The Orb comes with a set of pre-defined settings: the moods. The included wall switch is pre-configured with a selection of these, but they can easily be modified to suit your needs through the Better Light app. You can even create your own moods and save them for future use.

The options for finding the right light are almost endless, but with our intuitive app and presets, you won’t have to tinker to find the right mood quickly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

INTELLIGENT FEATURES

The Orb comes with a range of intelligent features that support our mission of enhancing your home and influencing the atmosphere through the use of light. Part of our mission is to create a more hands-off experience, where you don't need to adjust your light over the course of the day, but where the Orb knows what you need - perhaps even before you do.

Our feature set is in constant development, and we will be actively working with our users to develop new meaningful ways of adding intelligence to our lighting solutions.

 

 

The Night Fall feature over the course of an evening

 

 

INSIDE THE ORB

With its sleek and streamlined appearance, it can come as a bit of a surprise that the Orb is packed with high-tech components.

The patented cooling system is designed specifically for the electronics inside the Orb, and the reflectors have the exact build that ensures optimal lighting. Nothing is left to chance - it truly is a beautifully crafted piece of designware.

 

 

Some of the first prototypes of The Orb. In the final version of The Orb there are small changes

 

WORKS RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX

We believe that the ease of use is vital, so the Orb works right out of the box. Everything is already set up from the get-go, so you just need to unpack the product and plug it in. It literally takes minutes.

The Orb comes with an included controller that ensures you’re up and running in no time, and have access to a range of pre-defined settings, without having to reach for your phone.

 

 

 

You can configure the Orb through your smartphone, and even connect to existing smart-home solutions. Choose the light mood from one of the predefined settings or easily create your own. Enable the intelligent features you wish to use. You now have complete control.

 

The Better Light App - use it to control your Orb

 

THE SHADE ECLIPSE

From the start we have planned to include a control unit in the box with the Orb. We want users to have a positive unboxing experience, and find it crucial that users are up and running in no time.

The design needed to be simple, intuitive, and functional, sticking to our Nordic design culture.

With all this in mind, we introduce the Eclipse, the first control system for the Orb. It's elegant, easy to use, and will add another layer to the Shade experience.

Newest renderings of The Orb and Eclipse

You can use it mounted on a wall, or clip it off the wall to use it as a bedside or table-side remote control. It fits your needs.

You receive an Eclipse with each Orb, and the remote is paired with its Orb out of the box. However, if you have multiple Orbs, you can easily create zones/rooms where several Orbs are controlled by the same remote, allowing you to have e.g. one Eclipse by the entrance to the room, and one by the sofa. 

 

A close up of Eclipse.

Operating the Eclipse is simple and even kids will be able to use it. A quick twist cycles through the pre-defined or customized moods, and the beauty of using rotation as the operator is that you can fit in as many moods as you wish. Sometimes 3 moods are enough, sometimes you want 10.

A press on the front of the Eclipse turns the Orbs on or off. Hold the button and rotate to control to dim. An elegant and tactile solution.

 

The Eclipse is your a portable innovative light switch

Our plan is to manufacture the Shade Eclipse using a high-quality polymer, and the Bluetooth LE technology that is used to communicate means that you can have the switch operative for years without changing batteries... and yes - the batteries WILL be easily exchangeable.

 

 

A CONNECTED HOME

The Orb is a connected device. You can easily add more Orbs and configure them through the Better Ligh app interface. You now control rooms instead of individual lamps.

Through the use of Bluetooth LE technology, the Orbs communicate over their own network without having to use your Wi-Fi. This ensures that external network problems don't have any influence on the stability of the Orbs. 

With the Better Light app, you can choose from The Orb’s built-in mood settings or manually control the colour, intensity, and direction of light. Find it in App Store or Google Play

 

 

 

 

THE SLAATTO S1 SILHOUETTE

In addition to the Orb, we also created a complementing lampshade that surrounds the Orb and accentuates the effects of directional lighting. The Slaatto S1 resembles the shape of a flower, and its "petals" can be moved or adapted depending on your needs and preferences.

The Slaatto S1 was created in collaboration with Øivind Alexander Slaatto, an award-winning Danish designer. Øivind’s design philosophy and experience with world-famous Danish high-end brands proved to be a great addition to Shade's drive to innovate.  

As a result of this collaboration, Slaatto S1 was born. It embodies a simple yet poetic design approach, celebrating traditional Danish design roots while seeking inspiration in the world of nature.

 

Øivind Slaatto working at his workshop.

 

ADJUSTABLE LAMPSHADE

 

 

 

 

TECH SPECS

The Orb packs a punch. It's roughly the size of a mango, but don't be fooled by its small size. The high-quality components add up to an extraordinary product that not only looks good - but performs when needed.

 

 

 

 

 

HOW WE GOT HERE

We at Shade want to rethink how we interact with light and how to provide a solution that enables us to dictate the atmospheres we want to have.

Over the past 15 months, we have put an enormous amount of energy and work into the process of creating the perfect lighting and we are finally at a stage where we can show prototypes that support our idea.

As of now, we are in the final stages of the product hardware development, but still need to complete the software part, and run all the necessary tests.

 

Early sketches of The Orb

 

 

 

One of our first prototypes of The Orb

 

Early concept renderings of The Orb

 


Final rendering of The Orb

 

TIMELINE

 

 

MEET THE TEAM

Shade is a tech and design startup from Copenhagen, Denmark. We were founded in 2015 by two engineers who wanted to revolutionize the way people interact with artificial lighting. Over the course of 2016 we grew the team to over ten employees and created fully working prototypes of the products.

Our team consists of experienced professionals, mixed with young talent, within software and hardware engineering, product design and business administration. One thing we all have in common, is that we want to improve the way we light our homes.

We already have fully working prototypes and it is our goal now to deliver fully working Orbs in the fall of 2017. We need your help to achieve that aim and bring our lighting revolution into everybody’s home. Please help us with that final push, so we can enlighten your home with our products.

 

 

The team behind the Crowdfunding campaign, 

 

SHADE MANIFESTO

Light doesn’t just help us see in the dark, it helps influence our moods and feelings, whether we’re indoors or outdoors. In Denmark, our favourite word is ‘Hygge’, which is roughly translated as the idea of cosiness and making our homes comfier. Having a product that is able to instantly create different atmospheres gives people the power to improve their moods.”Shade enables you to create what you want within seconds and lets you set the tone for your life.

 


 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Over the past 1 ½ years, we have worked hard to get to the current stage with working prototypes and basic software functionality. Our biggest motivation is to deliver a product of high quality and outstanding performance: The devil is in the detail and ensuring we reach the level we are aiming for will take a tremendous effort.

In order for this to happen, we gathered an experienced team with a varied set of skills, that is working tirelessly on the finalization of the Orb and all other Shade products.

As of now, we are at a late stage in the hardware development, but ensuring that we can ramp up production at the quality we want, means we have to invest in molds and manufacturing equipment. Additionally, the further development of software is a significant task, and even though we currently have a strong team, we will look to strengthen our line-up with additional talents.

We have already set up partnerships with a strong network of suppliers, and we’ve secured their support ensuring that we are not alone in terms of development, component sourcing, and logistics, to name but a few areas. We cannot do this alone, and we need to make sure we have the best heads helping us out.

We won’t hide from the fact that this is a complex operation, but with a bit of help from our backers, we will be ensuring the level of stability needed to focus on the task at hand.

This campaign gives us the final push to finish the creation of the product that not only we, but everyone will love!

 

An early prototype of the Slaatto S1 

 

FAQ

 

SHIPPING

Do you ship worldwide?

Yes, we are shipping our products worldwide. We are shipping to a pick-up point near you. Our courier is UPS. When our courier UPS has picked up your order, they will send you an e-mail with more information. Please be aware to check your mailbox. Unfortunately, we sometimes experience that these important emails end up in your spamfolders. So please check this too.

When will I receive my product?

You will receive more information via mail and updates. Please be sure to read your mail and check your spam folder. 

What are the shipping costs?

The shipping costs change depending on the chosen perk and your location. Select your country in the checkout process and the shipping costs will be shown instantly.

I live in Denmark, can I pick up the products myself?

No, unfortunately, you can not pick up the products yourself.

 

CUSTOMER SUPPORT

What type of warranty do you offer on Shade's products?

All Shade products come with a 2-year manufacturer's warranty.

How do you handle returns?

If you experience problems with your Orb, please contact us at help@shadelights.com.

Where can I get help if there is a problem with the product?

If you need more help our site will be updated with support assets, and you can always write to us at help@shadelights.com

How do you handle taxes?

The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing.

Where are the products shipped from?

The products are designed, developed, manufactured, and shipped from Denmark.

TECHNICAL

How long do the LEDs in the Orb last?

The typical lifetime of the LEDs in the Orb is up to 50.000 hrs, depending on how warm they get - which we control intelligently in the Orb.

How warm does the Orb get?

The warmth of the Orb depends on usage - the Orb is substantially cooler than light bulbs due to the larger diameter. It will regulate itself to be below a specified temperature to make sure the LEDs last a long time (currently we work with 70 °C max.).

How much does The Orb weigh and what are the exact dimensions?

The Orb weighs 333g and the dimensions are 13 cm x 4 cm.

What material is The Orb made of?

The Orb is made of polycarbonate specially formulated for diffusion properties. The surface is treated, polished bronze that maximizes heat output.

What kind of material is the Slaatto S1 made of?

The Slaatto S1 is made of a polymer, which is selected due to its very remarkable light properties.

Does the Orb replace my lightbulb?

The Orb replaces your entire lamp. We are working on a solution to put your favourite lampshade on to the Orb.

Can I replace the LEDs in the Orb or do I need to buy a new one?

No, this is not a typical light bulb and it’s not to be opened in any way by the end user.

Will The Orb work with any light fitting?

The Orb needs power from the fitting.

Does The Orb use more power than a traditional light bulb?

The Orb can give a lot of light when fully lit, which does, of course, cost power. When compared to a traditional light bulb that gives the same amount of light as the Orb, it uses 80% less power. When you factor in that some moods and features can use less power than the traditional due to a smart energy consumption, the power saving goes up to 96%.

How do I control the Orb light settings?

You can control The Orb light setting with the included wall switches and the app, which gives you the freedom to change in-depth settings such as the creation of moods.

How do you integrate with other home automation systems (Apple Home Kit, Google Home, Alexa etc.)

Out of the box, the Orb is setup to work on our own platform. This means that the included wall switch - Eclipse, will be working with the Orb out of the box and ensures you’ll be up and running in no time.

We are working on integrating with leading home automation providers, and are closely monitoring the market for developments. From our side, we will be integrating with a select few of the leading platforms.

The Orb will not integrate with the Apple Homekit out of the box. We plan on integrating with Apple Homekit as it evolves in the near future. Our target is to have the best integrated user experience on the platform.

Will Shade integrate into my IHC system?

There are a lot of Intelligent Home Concept systems out there. They have a lot of interesting features that could be very nice if used together with the Shade system.

Presently, we cannot promise integration to these, the main reason being that they are not that intelligent. They control on the high voltage side which in our opinion is a suboptimal solution. They usually come with a significant of installation cost, which goes directly against our philosophy. Most of what they do, we can actually do a lot smarter.

So will Shade be compatible with my ICH system?

It depends on the system, but most likely yes. You cannot use the dimming function of your system but instead has to use Shade's system for this. You can turn the lamps on/off with the IHC system. You can program your IHC system to turn multiple orbs on/off with one switch for instance. You can also program your IHC system to turn the orbs on/off through the ICH scheduling if you would like that.

So most of the functionality of the IHC system compliments the orb functionality nicely. You just don’t need a IHC to do any of this with our system.

Are there any other products planned in the near future?

Definitely, follow us on Facebook or our website.

What changes are you planning on doing to the hardware?

All visual material in the campaign is done with our prototypes. Up until launch, we will continue to develop these to get the aesthetics and the functionality second to none. Our designer Øivind Alexander Slaatto will help us reach the premium level quality we are aiming for.

We are improving the design of the connector, and developing the controller, as well as the base unit. We will continuously communicate our progress, and we hope that you will trust our team on finalizing the details.

 

INSTALLATION

Will it work with the power that is available in my country?

Yes, we use a switch mode that goes from 100-240VAC / 50-60Hz. This covers most of the world, of course including EU, US, Canada, UK, Australia.

The orb will be C-UL-US and CE certified, among other more local certifications.

How do I install the Orb? Is it easy?

Yes, it is quite easy. A bracket is fixed on the ceiling, AC wiring is done (phase and neutral) and the lamp is mounted on the bracket. The Orb is plugged in and can be turned on. Mind that some countries require authorised personnel to do the AC wiring.

Can I install multiple units into one light circuit - for example, three lights over a dining table operated on one switch, or one two-way switch?

You can install Orbs just like you do with regular lamps, so yes for example 3 Orbs on 1 circuit.

However, you really don’t have to control them like that, because you can pair Orbs and switches in our app. The Orbs just need power, and then you can set them up exactly as you want them.

Do Orbs work with my dimmers?

The dimming function will not work, since all that will do is give The Orb less power. You can wire the orb with many types of old dimmers and if you can use your dimmer for on/off, then it will also work for turning the orb on and off.

The wall switch that comes with the orb can do dimming (and way better than old dimmers), so you will just use that one instead.

Is it safe to install in my children's bedroom?

What we found in our user tests was that children love the different colors of the Orb.

The child can potentially unplug the orb if they can reach it. This is still safe since it does not get very warm. There is only low voltage in the cord, so it is much safer than regular light bulbs where children can unscrew it and get high voltage.

Please read the user manual and take necessary precautions before installing in children's rooms.

 

INDIEGOGO

How can I choose multiple perks?

If you want different perks or need more orbs? Write to us at help@shadelights.com

The discounts on the campaign are quite significant. What is the reasoning behind this?

The recommended retail price is based on industry practices which include a significant share for the retail partners. By selling directly through IndieGoGo we can greatly reduce the distribution cost since there is no middle-man.

I preordered a Shade product, but I didn’t get any confirmation email. How do I check the status of the order?

If you didn't get a confirmation email yet, try looking in your spam filter. If it is not there, write to us at help@shadelights.com

Who should I contact if I have other questions?

Please contact help@shadelights.com in any case

When is the money taken from my account?

The money will be deducted from your account right after you purchased any or multiple of the Perks via the Indiegogo page. 

Disclaimer: Final specifications may be subject to changes during production optimization.

You can easily add more Orbs and configure them through the Better Ligh app interface. You now control rooms instead of individual lamps.Through the use of Bluetooth LE technology, the Orbs communicate over their own network without having to use your Wi-Fi. This ensures that external network problems don't have any influence on the stability of the Orbs. With the Better Light app, you can choose from The Orb’s built-in mood settings or manually control the colour, intensity, and direction of light. Find it in App Store or Google Play    THE SLAATTO S1 SILHOUETTEIn addition to the Orb, we also created a complementing lampshade that surrounds the Orb and accentuates the effects of directional lighting. The Slaatto S1 resembles the shape of a flower, and its "petals" can be moved or adapted depending on your needs and preferences.The Slaatto S1 was created in collaboration with Øivind Alexander Slaatto, an award-winning Danish designer. Øivind’s design philosophy and experience with world-famous Danish high-end brands proved to be a great addition to Shade's drive to innovate.  As a result of this collaboration, Slaatto S1 was born. It embodies a simple yet poetic design approach, celebrating traditional Danish design roots while seeking inspiration in the world of nature. Øivind Slaatto working at his workshop. ADJUSTABLE LAMPSHADE    TECH SPECSThe Orb packs a punch. It's roughly the size of a mango, but don't be fooled by its small size. The high-quality components add up to an extraordinary product that not only looks good - but performs when needed.     HOW WE GOT HEREWe at Shade want to rethink how we interact with light and how to provide a solution that enables us to dictate the atmospheres we want to have.Over the past 15 months, we have put an enormous amount of energy and work into the process of creating the perfect lighting and we are finally at a stage where we can show prototypes that support our idea.As of now, we are in the final stages of the product hardware development, but still need to complete the software part, and run all the necessary tests. Early sketches of The Orb   One of our first prototypes of The Orb Early concept renderings of The Orb Final rendering of The Orb TIMELINE  MEET THE TEAMShade is a tech and design startup from Copenhagen, Denmark. We were founded in 2015 by two engineers who wanted to revolutionize the way people interact with artificial lighting. Over the course of 2016 we grew the team to over ten employees and created fully working prototypes of the products.Our team consists of experienced professionals, mixed with young talent, within software and hardware engineering, product design and business administration. One thing we all have in common, is that we want to improve the way we light our homes.We already have fully working prototypes and it is our goal now to deliver fully working Orbs in the fall of 2017. We need your help to achieve that aim and bring our lighting revolution into everybody’s home. Please help us with that final push, so we can enlighten your home with our products.  The team behind the Crowdfunding campaign,  SHADE MANIFESTOLight doesn’t just help us see in the dark, it helps influence our moods and feelings, whether we’re indoors or outdoors. In Denmark, our favourite word is ‘Hygge’, which is roughly translated as the idea of cosiness and making our homes comfier. Having a product that is able to instantly create different atmospheres gives people the power to improve their moods.”Shade enables you to create what you want within seconds and lets you set the tone for your life.   RISKS & CHALLENGESOver the past 1 ½ years, we have worked hard to get to the current stage with working prototypes and basic software functionality. Our biggest motivation is to deliver a product of high quality and outstanding performance: The devil is in the detail and ensuring we reach the level we are aiming for will take a tremendous effort.In order for this to happen, we gathered an experienced team with a varied set of skills, that is working tirelessly on the finalization of the Orb and all other Shade products.As of now, we are at a late stage in the hardware development, but ensuring that we can ramp up production at the quality we want, means we have to invest in molds and manufacturing equipment. Additionally, the further development of software is a significant task, and even though we currently have a strong team, we will look to strengthen our line-up with additional talents.We have already set up partnerships with a strong network of suppliers, and we’ve secured their support ensuring that we are not alone in terms of development, component sourcing, and logistics, to name but a few areas. We cannot do this alone, and we need to make sure we have the best heads helping us out.We won’t hide from the fact that this is a complex operation, but with a bit of help from our backers, we will be ensuring the level of stability needed to focus on the task at hand.This campaign gives us the final push to finish the creation of the product that not only we, but everyone will love! An early prototype of the Slaatto S1  FAQ SHIPPINGDo you ship worldwide?Yes, we are shipping our products worldwide. We are shipping to a pick-up point near you. Our courier is UPS. When our courier UPS has picked up your order, they will send you an e-mail with more information. Please be aware to check your mailbox. Unfortunately, we sometimes experience that these important emails end up in your spamfolders. So please check this too.When will I receive my product?You will receive more information via mail and updates. Please be sure to read your mail and check your spam folder. What are the shipping costs?The shipping costs change depending on the chosen perk and your location. Select your country in the checkout process and the shipping costs will be shown instantly.I live in Denmark, can I pick up the products myself?No, unfortunately, you can not pick up the products yourself. CUSTOMER SUPPORTWhat type of warranty do you offer on Shade's products?All Shade products come with a 2-year manufacturer's warranty.How do you handle returns?If you experience problems with your Orb, please contact us at help@shadelights.com.Where can I get help if there is a problem with the product?If you need more help our site will be updated with support assets, and you can always write to us at help@shadelights.comHow do you handle taxes?The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing.Where are the products shipped from?The products are designed, developed, manufactured, and shipped from Denmark.TECHNICALHow long do the LEDs in the Orb last?The typical lifetime of the LEDs in the Orb is up to 50.000 hrs, depending on how warm they get - which we control intelligently in the Orb. How warm does the Orb get?The warmth of the Orb depends on usage - the Orb is substantially cooler than light bulbs due to the larger diameter. It will regulate itself to be below a specified temperature to make sure the LEDs last a long time (currently we work with 70 °C max.).How much does The Orb weigh and what are the exact dimensions?The Orb weighs 333g and the dimensions are 13 cm x 4 cm.What material is The Orb made of?The Orb is made of polycarbonate specially formulated for diffusion properties. The surface is treated, polished bronze that maximizes heat output.What kind of material is the Slaatto S1 made of?The Slaatto S1 is made of a polymer, which is selected due to its very remarkable light properties.Does the Orb replace my lightbulb?The Orb replaces your entire lamp. We are working on a solution to put your favourite lampshade on to the Orb.Can I replace the LEDs in the Orb or do I need to buy a new one?No, this is not a typical light bulb and it’s not to be opened in any way by the end user.Will The Orb work with any light fitting?The Orb needs power from the fitting.Does The Orb use more power than a traditional light bulb?The Orb can give a lot of light when fully lit, which does, of course, cost power. When compared to a traditional light bulb that gives the same amount of light as the Orb, it uses 80% less power. When you factor in that some moods and features can use less power than the traditional due to a smart energy consumption, the power saving goes up to 96%.How do I control the Orb light settings?You can control The Orb light setting with the included wall switches and the app, which gives you the freedom to change in-depth settings such as the creation of moods.How do you integrate with other home automation systems (Apple Home Kit, Google Home, Alexa etc.)Out of the box, the Orb is setup to work on our own platform. This means that the included wall switch - Eclipse, will be working with the Orb out of the box and ensures you’ll be up and running in no time.We are working on integrating with leading home automation providers, and are closely monitoring the market for developments. From our side, we will be integrating with a select few of the leading platforms.The Orb will not integrate with the Apple Homekit out of the box. We plan on integrating with Apple Homekit as it evolves in the near future. Our target is to have the best integrated user experience on the platform.Will Shade integrate into my IHC system?There are a lot of Intelligent Home Concept systems out there. They have a lot of interesting features that could be very nice if used together with the Shade system.Presently, we cannot promise integration to these, the main reason being that they are not that intelligent. They control on the high voltage side which in our opinion is a suboptimal solution. They usually come with a significant of installation cost, which goes directly against our philosophy. Most of what they do, we can actually do a lot smarter.So will Shade be compatible with my ICH system?It depends on the system, but most likely yes. You cannot use the dimming function of your system but instead has to use Shade's system for this. You can turn the lamps on/off with the IHC system. You can program your IHC system to turn multiple orbs on/off with one switch for instance. You can also program your IHC system to turn the orbs on/off through the ICH scheduling if you would like that.So most of the functionality of the IHC system compliments the orb functionality nicely. You just don’t need a IHC to do any of this with our system.Are there any other products planned in the near future?Definitely, follow us on Facebook or our website.What changes are you planning on doing to the hardware?All visual material in the campaign is done with our prototypes. Up until launch, we will continue to develop these to get the aesthetics and the functionality second to none. Our designer Øivind Alexander Slaatto will help us reach the premium level quality we are aiming for.We are improving the design of the connector, and developing the controller, as well as the base unit. We will continuously communicate our progress, and we hope that you will trust our team on finalizing the details. INSTALLATIONWill it work with the power that is available in my country?Yes, we use a switch mode that goes from 100-240VAC / 50-60Hz. This covers most of the world, of course including EU, US, Canada, UK, Australia.The orb will be C-UL-US and CE certified, among other more local certifications.How do I install the Orb? Is it easy?Yes, it is quite easy. A bracket is fixed on the ceiling, AC wiring is done (phase and neutral) and the lamp is mounted on the bracket. The Orb is plugged in and can be turned on. Mind that some countries require authorised personnel to do the AC wiring.Can I install multiple units into one light circuit - for example, three lights over a dining table operated on one switch, or one two-way switch?You can install Orbs just like you do with regular lamps, so yes for example 3 Orbs on 1 circuit.However, you really don’t have to control them like that, because you can pair Orbs and switches in our app. The Orbs just need power, and then you can set them up exactly as you want them.Do Orbs work with my dimmers?The dimming function will not work, since all that will do is give The Orb less power. You can wire the orb with many types of old dimmers and if you can use your dimmer for on/off, then it will also work for turning the orb on and off.The wall switch that comes with the orb can do dimming (and way better than old dimmers), so you will just use that one instead.Is it safe to install in my children's bedroom?What we found in our user tests was that children love the different colors of the Orb.The child can potentially unplug the orb if they can reach it. This is still safe since it does not get very warm. There is only low voltage in the cord, so it is much safer than regular light bulbs where children can unscrew it and get high voltage.Please read the user manual and take necessary precautions before installing in children's rooms. INDIEGOGOHow can I choose multiple perks?If you want different perks or need more orbs? Write to us at help@shadelights.comThe discounts on the campaign are quite significant. What is the reasoning behind this?The recommended retail price is based on industry practices which include a significant share for the retail partners. By selling directly through IndieGoGo we can greatly reduce the distribution cost since there is no middle-man.I preordered a Shade product, but I didn’t get any confirmation email. How do I check the status of the order?If you didn't get a confirmation email yet, try looking in your spam filter. If it is not there, write to us at help@shadelights.com Who should I contact if I have other questions?Please contact help@shadelights.com in any caseWhen is the money taken from my account?The money will be deducted from your account right after you purchased any or multiple of the Perks via the Indiegogo page. Disclaimer: Final specifications may be subject to changes during production optimization.

story:
GREEN ENERGY 4 INDIA

Our Plan is to install Renewable Energy Power Systems, consisting of biogas, solar, wind and storage solutions integrated into buildings in cities and for remote villages in India. This is the only alternative to coal and nuclear power plants. Green electricity is the basic requirement for sustainable development and will also lead to poverty reduction.

We need your support to present our solution to investors, multi-national corporations and other global players at the Transatlantic Makers Conference from the 2-4th September 2014.

What is our vision with this project? 

Our vision is to implement our unique model that will revolutionize the business world because it:

-  Combines Social Responsibility with Business Opportunities.  

-  Builds Bridges between established and emerging Economies

-  Tackles Poverty through Energy, Education and Employment Programmes

-  Contributes significantly in Saving Our Environment!

What is our plan?

Phase I:   Feasibility Study incl. first simulations *almost completed

Phase II:  Formation of the Conglomerate *Talks in Progress

Phase III: Finishing the Feasibility Study incl. a Pilot Project in India

Phase IV: Setting up of the 1st Fund

Phase V:   Implementation of RE Systems and becoming the E-Provider

What are our goals and who is our target group?

Our aim is to become the major green electricity provider in India through financing, installing and managing Renewable Energy Systems in India. The main target groups are residential buildings, shopping malls and villages.

How will we achieve our goals as a small start-up company?

1. In forming a Conglomerate with international investors, multi-national companies specialized in the Renewable Energy field and local Indian manufacturers and EP Contractors.

2. Because of our Panel of highly skilled engineers, scientists and economists, who have been working for FREE like ourselves, because we believe there is a solution for a better future for us and our children.

3. The technology is already available to set up Renewable Energy Systems in India. It is now our task to co-ordinate it by bringing the key players together and making this project lucrative! 

Why should I support this project?

With this project we have the unique opportunity to introduce sustainable green energy systems into India on a large scale level and significantly reduce carbon emissions as a result. Major investors and companies want to work with us because of our network, our know-how and our passion, but we need your help to get to the final stages!

Why do you need this financing?

For Phase I & II, which includes:

Preparation for Investor Pitches  

Travel expenses to USA (New York & San Francisco) 

Travel expenses to India 

Office

Contracts for conglomerate partners

Software


The Story behind Eurobrain:

Our Earths Problem:

By far, one of the biggest battles facing our generations is against the ongoing threat of climate change. Climate change is no fictitious topic, but an everyday problem. We can see the weather changing year by year, the news are full with natural disasters and the water levels are rising faster than expected in our oceans. What few people know though, is that currently 5 million people are dying annually because of climate change. It is absolutely essential to switch from energy sources, such as coal, nuclear power and oil to renewable energies as fast as possible to avert the increase of carbon dioxide transferred into the atmosphere.

The Point of No Return regarding global warming, according to the study published by Greenpeace in Jan 2013, is 2020!

Governments worldwide have started shifting their energy sources and have been utilizing new green technologies. We believe the key to saving our environment depends on the implementation of renewable energy solutions, especially in the developing countries, like Brazil, India, South Africa, etc. That way we can avoid large scale fossil fuel projects which are currently being planned/conducted. Let us learn from the mistakes in the past.

Invest in us to accomplish our vision, which is to become the Renewable Energy Electricity Provider for businesses, middle class segment and villages in India with an innovative social business model.

No Electricity, No Development, No Poverty Reduction

Our Solution:

Starting out as a consulting company specialized in the field of renewable energy, we have realized in the past two years that Brazil and India are going in the right direction in regards to implementing green technology. They only need financial and technological investments to avoid setting up further nuclear and coal power stations. We took the model of Elon Musk (Tesla) initiated in the US with Solar City, developed it further, and integrated several development schemes in our unique business model to also make a direct impact for the local citizens.

Our plan is to install renewable energy sources in hospitals, shopping centers, universities and in off-grid villages that desperately need access to sustainable energy, starting with India. We are currently planning and are involved in initial talks to form a conglomerate with following companies:

Simultaneously, we are working on the Feasibility Study for the Energy 4 India project, where our Panel has concluded the first phase. To complete the feasibility study, to establish the conglomerate and to present our project to international investors at the Transatlantic Makers Conference in New York City on the 2-4 September 2014, we need you!


Our Motivation:

We at Eurobrain Consulting dedicated ourselves to this project entirely for a very simple reason: the greatest responsibility of our generation is the survival of our planet. We believe that this will be one of the most significant models that can be used for a global approach to fight climate change, to help poor people develop a sustainable income base and to deliver green energy solutions for the increasing electricity demand on the world. 

Through our own eyes, we have seen what suffering and opportunities co-exist in India. The national government and a few state governments in India are achieving their set targets to go green as soon as possible. The energy market is the most lucrative sector in India, as 35% of India does not have access to the grid/ regular electricity supply. On top, every percentage increase in the economic growth, India needs 0,75% more energy. This means, India requires 5% in average annually more electricity supply.  Considering all these facts, and some logical thinking, one can estimate what India offers as a potential in this sector. 

Our Panel of engineers, scientists and economists have been working with us for FREE for the last two years on this project to achieve our Vision. We believe it is possible to change the direction our world is steering towards. 

"The world is a dangerous place, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who look on and do nothing." Albert Einstein

The Risks:

We have two weeks to raise enough money to book the flight to present ourselves to investment firms and decision makers in the energy market to gain their support – Four weeks to raise 12,500 EUR. If we get 250 people to donate just 50 EUR each, we will be able to realize our goal - 50 EUR is  a nice meal for two, a night out in a club or a monthly electricity bill.

Of course, there is always a risk that the investors present are not interested about our project; or not being able to make the Feasibility Study currently lucrative enough to set up the Fund, or the implementation could take much longer than expected,... But similar to Thomas Edison, we believe a failure will not stop us, but motivate us to find a solution that will be successful !!!

No Risk, No Change

Your Action:

This is where we need you, friends. Our plan to implement this new business approach has already awakened interest on the international platform. We were selected out of 100s of start-ups by Berlin Partner to present this project in New York and San Francisco. We have the team, the technology partners and the determination to bring the renewable energy sources to another level. It is time to take action on a global scale, as the threat is facing all of us, and not just a select few. 

To be successful and realize the final steps, we need your support – in whichever way you can. Invest 5 EUR, 50 EUR, or 500 EUR! Share this message on social media sites, Like it on Facebook, tell your colleagues, friends and family. 

All help is needed and much appreciated!

It is a small individual sacrifice that provides us a chance to significantly reduce our carbon footprint on this earth. We need to act now to avert the tragedies of climate change that await us, our children and our grandchildren if we keep moving forward with blinders on.

The time is there now for us to take a deep breath and stand up for us, for our children and our earth – help us implement renewable energy solutions in India. Together we can take a big leap towards a future with 100% renewable energy.

Click on the link below to donate NOW to the Energy4India campaign. 

The earth is our home, let’s clean it up together and make it nice again!!!

THANK YOU!!

Eurobrain Consulting

story:
We are striving to make a difference and impact lives through fire safety and prevention.  The design and use of this device is so simple that even a non-tech savvy user can utlize it.  There is only a minimum initial set up required and then we take it from there!

 

After Eyetemp is connected on your mobile app, just place the device on the item you selected and “turn us on!!”  Eyetemp takes over from there.   It really is that easy!!

Time 

Receive an alert when an item is left on for too long.  This is specific to the item being monitored.  When you set up Eyetemp, you will choose the type of item you are monitoring when you pair the device.

Location 

If you leave your residence while an item being monitored is considered in use, you will receive an alert.  For example, if you leave while your stove is left on and being monitored by Eyetemp, you will receive an alert to remind you that the stove is in use.

Drastic temperature increase 

If a rapid and drastic temperature change is noted, there is an alert that will be sent to notify you.  This will note a potentially dangerous situation.

Emergency contacts 

When setting up the app you will have the option to add up to 3 emergency contacts.  If you are non responsive to an alert, after a designated time period, the app will send a text notification to your emergency contact 1.  If there is no change and an item is still left on with no response, a notification will be sent to emergency contact 2 and then contact 3. 

Additional 

We are currently in the process of applying the option of having a call center notified after all of the emergency contacts are utilized and the problem remains.  This will be an optional feature.  We are also in the process of working on making the device compatible with other smart home networks.  This will also be an optional feature.

There are additional alerts and feature options available.

 

 

Customer Survey Facts

 

We did a customer survey and received some very interesting feedback.  46% of people say they have not left a heated device on but 72% of them have turned around to check if they did after leaving a residence and 95% of everyone who took it would buy a device that alerts them if they left something on via a smart phone.  It is interesting that although they did not encounter the actual problem the worry factor of leaving something on is significant enough.

 

The Eyetemp Story

 

 

Why do we need your help?

 

We decided to do a campaign to learn what you, the market wants.  We want to hear your feedback and suggestions.  We have the flexibility to make adjustments to cater to your needs and wants.  This is why we set a maximum delivery date next year to leave additional time although we intend to do everything in our power to get the devices to you sooner.

We need to raise demand to get manufacturing and tooling costs reduced.  With your orders and support, this will help us achieve our goal.  It is our mission to keep retail costs down so Eyetemp can be utilized in as many homes as possible.  This impact will save lives and start to reduce the negative statistics.  That is what the real goal is!!  Saving lives!!

 

Our upcoming Milestones include the following:

Finalize all engineering designs

Enhance the UI experience for users through an “easy to use” mobile app

Manufacturing and tooling

Optimization of product

Additional product testing

Packaging and Labels

 

Other ways you can help?

 

Help us make noise about our Eyetemp campaign by sharing our campaign.  Remember every share can potentially save a life.

 

Future of Eyetemp

 

We are working on deals with insurance companies to lower your rates if you have an Eyetemp in your house.  We are also working on setting up an emergency response call center as an optional feature to the emergency contacts and app.  We will constantly be looking for ways to enhance the current Eyetemp product and will have a variety of products that will follow.

 

 

 

 

Our Team

We are a women founded business passionate about innovation but most importantly, making an impactful difference.  Our team consists of dedicated and driven members all with the common interest of developing the most reliable technology and brand.  In addition to our core team, we have established an incredible team of industry experts including engineers, advisors, marketing experts, graphic designers, app developers and videographers. 

Danielle M

Chief Executive Officer

Danielle has over 10 years of experience in business and finance. Danielle has been part of multi million-dollar businesses in various industries including manufacturing, engineering, construction, and real estate.

Alicia Imbriano

Director of Marketing

Alicia has been involved with and excels at research, communication, and literacy.  Alicia is involved with all of the marketing and branding for the product.

 

Jeff Bergstein

Chief of Sales and Supply Chain

Jeff had a successful 36 year career with Arrow Electronics in various Executive and Management roles in Sales, Supply Chain and Marketing.  Arrow is a fortune 200 leading Electronics Distributor in the Technology Space.  Currently Jeff is very involved in the start up community sitting on many panels and boards.

 

Timothy Woo

Lead Engineer

Timothy is an engineer and inventor with a passion for creating innovative products. As a Jack-of-all-trades engineer, he designs comprehensive solutions that involve mechanical, electrical and software ingenuity all at once. His fancy for all things engineering has led him to help Eyetemp achieve its goal to save lives, one appliance at a time.

Disclaimer:  Eyetemp is in the functioning and working prototype phase.  There may be representations here that differ from the final product.  All purchases are made with this understanding.

***PATENT PENDING

Contact Us:  Info@eye-temp.com
story_txt:
We are striving to make a difference and impact lives through fire safety and prevention.  The design and use of this device is so simple that even a non-tech savvy user can utlize it.  There is only a minimum initial set up required and then we take it from there!




 

After Eyetemp is connected on your mobile app, just place the device on the item you selected and “turn us on!!”  Eyetemp takes over from there.   It really is that easy!!

Time 
Receive an alert when an item is left on for too long.  This is specific to the item being monitored.  When you set up Eyetemp, you will choose the type of item you are monitoring when you pair the device.
Location 
If you leave your residence while an item being monitored is considered in use, you will receive an alert.  For example, if you leave while your stove is left on and being monitored by Eyetemp, you will receive an alert to remind you that the stove is in use.
Drastic temperature increase 
If a rapid and drastic temperature change is noted, there is an alert that will be sent to notify you.  This will note a potentially dangerous situation.
Emergency contacts 
When setting up the app you will have the option to add up to 3 emergency contacts.  If you are non responsive to an alert, after a designated time period, the app will send a text notification to your emergency contact 1.  If there is no change and an item is still left on with no response, a notification will be sent to emergency contact 2 and then contact 3. 
Additional 
We are currently in the process of applying the option of having a call center notified after all of the emergency contacts are utilized and the problem remains.  This will be an optional feature.  We are also in the process of working on making the device compatible with other smart home networks.  This will also be an optional feature.
There are additional alerts and feature options available.
 





 
Customer Survey Facts
 
We did a customer survey and received some very interesting feedback.  46% of people say they have not left a heated device on but 72% of them have turned around to check if they did after leaving a residence and 95% of everyone who took it would buy a device that alerts them if they left something on via a smart phone.  It is interesting that although they did not encounter the actual problem the worry factor of leaving something on is significant enough.

Optimization of product
Additional product testing

story:
Conquer my destiny! 

What I had to do to get to London... 


In 2011 I won Canadian nationals in the 200m and the 100m but the glory of my victory didn’t last too long. During the 200m finals I broke my fifth metatarsal (my small toe) on my right foot.

For something so shocking to happen to me the year before the Olympics, it got me thinking I had to work harder at what I wanted. My coaches told me don’t worry about the year to come, don’t stress about it, if I want it I just need to work hard to get it.

I was determined but with the Olympics so close I had many ups and downs. I trained hard but in my mind I said to myself I wasn’t going to make it in 2012 but with the support of my friends and family I was able to keep moving forward.

They told me work hard and be happy with the end result because I worked hard to get back to where I was.

As the months passed I was improving slowly, reaching the speeds I was previously at but I felt like my body wasn’t running like I wanted to, so I started giving up on myself, thinking about the worst things possible.

Then the dream of making an Olympic team really came onto me and I told myself if I don’t make it this time I have to wait 4 years for another chance at this. So I decided to overcome my fears of failing and conquer my destiny to make that team. I worked hard and had one thing on my mind: wearing that Olympic bodysuit representing my country.

Coming up to Canadian nationals I was more nervous than anything so my plan was to avoid thinking about it until I stepped on the 100m line. I came second place which was something I was perfectly happy with seeing all I been through.

Next up was my 200m and I won! I couldn’t believe it, all my work paid off and I was on my way to London. Thinking back that year really showed me nothing is impossible with the right belief and support! Following nationals I had the perfect opportunity to get my mind ready to run the biggest race of my life at the training camp before the Olympics started.

The feeling of knowing that I’m going to be watched by millions of people gave me the greatest feeling of satisfaction because of how hard I worked to get there and that I scaled every bump in the road fighting for what I want. Finally race day came and that had to be one of the most thrilling days of my life. The nerves, the excitement, the roar from the crowd were all so exhilarating.

I couldn’t have asked for anything better to pump me up for the big race. I ran my race knowing exactly what I had to do for me to make it to the next round and when I looked at the board and saw I made it words couldn’t even describe the emotions I felt. My mind was made up to take every round at a time and even though I didn’t make it to the finals, I looked at it as I came this far and I know I can go further. 

What I Need & What You Get

With my hard work, dedication, and your help and support I know for sure all my goals will be reachable.

I am looking to make the final this summer at the World Championships in Russia and build my experience so I can go back to the Olympics in Rio for unfinished business. 

This is the time of year that I need your support the most! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help by sharing this page with your friends, family, colleagues, or anyone who loves Canadian athletics!

story:
A big thanks to all the IndieGoGo supporters who made this campaign a success! 

We have fully launched the product with your help and the LuminAID light is now available for purchase through our website: http://luminaid.gostorego.com/

Learn more about Give Light Projects and company updates:  http://luminaidlab.com/blog/

---------------------------------------------------------------

LuminAID: Give Light, Get Light

About the Project

LuminAID Lab is proud to introduce the LuminAID light: a solar-rechargeable, inflatable lamp that packs flat and inflates to create a lightweight, waterproof lantern. Safe, sustainable, and portable, the LuminAID light provides up to six hours of LED light, ideal for disaster relief situations, recreational use outdoors, or in the home as an extra light source. Our mission: make light more affordable, sustainable, and available for everyone. 

 

Join us in the “Give Light, Get Light” campaign as we seek to launch the LuminAID light and distribute it in January 2012 to you and to our community projects. Take a LuminAID light with you on your next adventure or trip, tuck it away in your first aid kit, or string them together to light your path ahead. $25 pre-buys you one light and gives another to someone in need.

 

Your gift of light will give one student 4 more hours to study at night. It will allow one small business owner to stay open for a few extra hours. Give in honor of loved ones for the holidays and we will e-mail you a tribute card to let them know. Give in bulk, and we will custom print your logo on the LuminAID lights you donate. 

 

Stay connected through our community map. Send us your photos of travels with the LuminAID light and we will post them on our blog. 

 

Forbes has called it: “a possible alternative to Thomas Edison’s 1879 electric discovery that has the potential to change, not only the light bulb, but also the world.” Help us make this world brighter. #GiveLight.  

Learn More at www.luminAIDlab.com
Follow us on Twitter @luminAIDlab #GiveLight 
Visit us on Facebook 



The LuminAID light has a thin, rechargeable battery, a state of the art solar panel, and super bright LEDs. The semi-transparent plastic material diffuses the LEDs. The reinforced handle makes it durable and easy to carry.


Technical Specifications

Waterproof design can float

Press button for Off, High, and Low light settings

Fully Charges in 4-6 hours of sunlight

4 hours of 35 lumens on HIGH for reading/task work

6 hours of 20 lumens on LOW for safety/night light

Rechargeable batteries can be recharged 800 times

Patent pending


Carry light with you on your next trek and we'll post your stories and images to our blog. Check out the "Carry Light" Package. Pledge Packages also include custom print options. Limited Edition LuminAID light print pattern will be designed by a graphic designer.


Community Projects for Matching Lights

We are partnering with organizations to help distribute and field test the LuminAID lights. In Rajasthan, India, where 1 in 2 households lack electricity, we are working with with Root Alliance to distribute the LuminAID lights to rural schools, homes and small-business owners. On our blog, we’ll detail progress through video and pictures of all of our community projects. If you are an organization interested in receiving and distributing lights, please contact us at info@luminAIDlab.com.

LuminAID Light Shipping Information

When the campaign ends, we will place an order with our manufacturer. Production of the LuminAID lights will take between 45 -60 days. As soon as we receive the LuminAID lights, we will ship you your pledge package. We expect to ship all pledge packages to backers by January 2012. The tribute cards will be e-mailed as soon as the campaign ends for you to print or e-mail for the holidays. We look forward to giving you updates along the way and making you the recipient of one of our first LuminAID lights!

Shipping costs within the USA & Canada are included in the pledge amount. For international shipping, please add $15.

LuminAID Lab's Pledge Package Guarantee

100% of funds will go to producing and distributing the LuminAID lights to you and to our community projects. We are fully committed to getting production underway. If we don’t reach our fundraising goal, it may take us a bit longer, but we will still fulfill the order you place. We would love to exceed our fundraising goal and produce more than 1,000 lights. 

Thank you! LuminAID Lab is so excited to launch this product with your help. Please contact info@luminAIDlab.com with questions or feel free to post on our Facebook page! A special thanks to Noa Younse, Siobhan Paganelli, and Paula Cavagnaro for your support with this campaign!

story:
What's the dealio?

Hi, I'm Jason. I designed this gate so any hobbyist can have a modular gate that would be impact resistant, waterproof and of course, luminous for night time FPV. I have designed it with value for money in mind and will be improving it over time. I've set up a business called WINTEK to create some products within the growing drone industry. I do various things to try and further the hobby, such as a Drone Club at my local school. 

Product Description:
Each gate is supplied with a blue waterproof LED strip with an XT60 Connector for Lipo batteries.  A tote bag for transportation and tape for customisation is provided along with wooden feet with holes in to secure both indoors and out. Lipo battery and tent pegs are not supplied with this product. 

THINGS THE VIDEO DOES NOT SAY:

The led strip is connected to an XT60 connector for Lipo batteries, I am testing how long a 1300mah 3 cell battery will power the LEDs, but I assume it will be several hours with no trouble. 

The battery slots nicely inside the piping for maximum protection from impact and the elements. The piping is 32mm in diameter and the internal dimensions of the gate when assembled are 145cm across and 90cm top to bottom, perfect for sub 250 racers , but we had no trouble flying a standard 250 racer through in the video as you can see. 

I am considering different size gates and constructive feedback on what would be the ideal size would be appreciated, but I feel this is about right. 


Here is an update on our prototype feet for the gate:

This is so you can use the gate both indoors and outdoors, with holes for tent pegs and a simple fold down design for added practicality on the move. Stay tuned for test videos of our gate very soon!

The trade off

So, why might you want to contribute? Well, so you can own your own race gate before anyone else gets them, at a reduced price too! I can do larger bulk order for clubs if this is required, just get in touch and we can discuss this. I can still supply any orders if we don't achieve our full goal. I am using crowd funding to test the demand for this product, as I am a one man band at the moment
I want to add value and innovation for hobbyists who fly and race drones. I find the race equipment available quite expensive and this is an idea to evolve the hardware and make it available to any hobbyist in an easily transportable package. 

Risky business...

In general we have no problem fulfilling orders, I just wanted to use this platform to promote the idea as there have been several successful drone projects launched through Indiegogo. 

How else to Help

If you are unable to contribute to our campaign but like our product then please give our campaign a share on social media, we would really appreciate it!

story:
We need your Support !

Green Gorilla Sunfunel System

·  400% more efficient over traditional solar (pv)
·  developed by MIT scientist
·  purifies water
·  generates electricity


The first unit has already been tested and is ready for installation at The University of Central Florida.  We are seeking your donations to bring Sunfunels to a global scale, donate with confidence, knowing a percentage of Green Gorilla Solar sales will  always go towards the planting of trees.


Make some noise!

About the Green Gorilla Solar Sunfunel

The SUNFUNEL campaign is about the world, about reducing pollution and carbon footprints. You are contributing to someone who is not money driven.

Don't get me wrong, it takes money to change the world, but it's people who really change the world. 

Get the Word Out

If you are passionate about being Earth friendly, about clean renewable energy, about recycling,  about planting trees and living green; then please use the Indiegogo Share Tools as well as sending this video link to your friends.

Thanks for your support.

story:
Intro

What exactly inspired us to do propolis? In a nutshell, “necessity is the mother of invention”. In our daily Internet experience, we lacked two main features:

1. Too many services online. Now there are many services online such as your email, social network, professional network, to-do-list, calendar, streaming websites, contacts, etc. That’s overwhelming. You can’t drag things from one service to another. Propolis will fix that with keeping security and privacy in mind.

2. We like the fact that we socialize with our friends online, but we can’t find the people we need or want to connect with. Why can’t I find another person who is interested in palying a basketball game, or who is interested in an online game, or who is working in my same company and interested in starting a union (j/k).

For those two necessities, propolis is being invented. Thomas Edison once said, “To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk”, we have the junk, and working on the imagination :)

Why Propolis?
This project is unique as it offers the user:
1. The ability to expand his network and expertise according to his interests and what matters to him.
2. The ability to organize all his online services at one place and be able to synchronize them, and move items from one service to another.
3. Be able to set his own privacy and protect his information online.

Features and Updates
You can check more updates at: join-propolis.com

1 Interest benefits: Event listing Tuesday, 20 July 2010
2 Modules in a nutshell Saturday, 17 July 2010
3 At propolis, privacy matters Thursday, 15 July 2010
4 Sharing on propolis Tuesday, 13 July 2010
5 No strings attached Monday, 12 July 2010
6 Propolis: Two services with one click Monday, 12 July 2010

Why do we need donations?
This project requires extensive effort in order to develop it into an elegant, efficient, secure tool. We are working on the programming development, however, we still require extra help. We believe that the $20,000 will help us in securing these resources to at least launch the beta version of the website. There are plenty of ideas, and we wish to implement most of it in the beta version.

Your help & donation would be greatly appreciated. If you would like to help out, please email: help@join-propolis.com
story_txt:
Intro
What exactly inspired us to do propolis? In a nutshell, “necessity is the mother of invention”. In our daily Internet experience, we lacked two main features:
1. Too many services online. Now there are many services online such as your email, social network, professional network, to-do-list, calendar, streaming websites, contacts, etc. That’s overwhelming. You can’t drag things from one service to another.  Propolis will fix that with keeping security and privacy in mind.
2. We like the fact that we socialize with our friends online, but we can’t find the people we need or want to connect with. Why can’t I find another person who is interested in palying a basketball game, or who is interested in an online game, or who is working in my same company and interested in starting a union (j/k).
For those two necessities, propolis is being invented. Thomas Edison once said, “To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk”, we have the junk, and working on the imagination :)
