story:
With more and more of us working remotely, it's more important than ever to make best use of our time. With TickTime beside you on your home desk, you'll be able to squeeze every ounce of productivity out of every minute of the day you're working—and still have time for family and friends.

TickTime gives you that extra focus you need to make the most of every minute of your day.Be more efficient. Use your time more effectively. Do what needs doing in the time you've got. Every second is precious and TickTime helps you focus on what you're doing and get it done. Boost your productivity. Complete tasks in the time you've set aside for them.

Fans of this ultra-efficient approach to time management invented back in the 1980s definitely need some TickTime in their life. Dividing your day into separate 25 minute phases is easy with TickTime. 25 minutes is one of the preset countdowns built-in to TickTime.   (Wikipedia) Enhance your productivity, making your every day more than 24 hours!

The timer that's of its time. TickTime is the timer born in the 21st Century, for the 21st Century. Forget sandtimers and stopwatches. Their time is up. 

It's sleek and sophisticated. 

It starts and stops without you having to press a button. And it's totally portable. So wherever and whenever you need to keep track of time, TickTime will be there.

Once upon a time, sand in a glass was used to countdown time. Then big, bulky stopwatches with buttons everywhere took over. Now it's time for TickTime. The sleek and simple way to countdown time.

“Today we will look at the future with this Prototype Timer! With its space age look and quality feel, it really gives the timer a new twist!”---Tech savvy Khan Flicks 

Change the way you manage your time to make the most of every minute of every day with the brand new fun and functional timer.

TickTime is light and small. So it fits into any pocket and any bag for ultimate portability.

 

TickTime certainly ticks plenty of boxes when it comes to different ways to use it:

 

Working--On a tight timescale? Want to spend a specific amount of time on a certain job? Get TickTime beside you on your desk to help you with your time management.

Workouts--Set yourself targets during gym sessions. Beat your personal best. TickTime records all your jogs, sprints, cycles, and rows so you can see the pace you're setting

Games--Use it as an alternative to a sandglass/egg timer for all kinds of games in which you've got a limited time to take your turn.

Cooking--How long has the pizza been in the oven? How much longer for the perfect souffle? TickTime will tell you.

Featured by top tech media Mashable. Click here to read more

Reviewed by top tech media The Next Web. Click here to read more

Reviewed and Tested by Yahoo! Click here to read more.

 

Reviewed and Tested by the Gadgeteer. Click here to read more.

 

TickTime has 6 preset timings. Just flip TickTime so the time you want to count down is facing up. The timer starts automatically. So you won't waste a second and you'll get more out of every minute of every day.

THE SIX PRESETS:

TickTime is a sophisticated timer. It is simple to operate by changing its positions. Meanwhile, if you want to manually set the time perfectly to every second, just easily push two buttons for setting the exact minute and second as you like.  

Also, you can adjust the alarm volume to the appropriate level, including silent mode, to notify you in different situations. 

Place TickTime with its name facing upwards and counting time begins. The time range is from 00:01 to 99:59. Plenty of time to time that meeting, or that speech, or the time your children spend on their homework!

 

 

 

Choose from a AUDIBLE ALARM with fully adjustable volume control. 

Or a VISUAL ALARM with a flashing light. Handy if you're deep in concentration and don't want the noise of an alarm to make you jump. Or if  you're working or studying in a public space such as a library, classroom, or office.

 

LED Display promotes better experience of visual images when you are tracking the time. The digital numbers and icons you see on the screen are much brighter in great colors. There is no motion delay on the screen. 

TickTime has a magnetic side to stick to the fridge or any metal surfaces to leave you hands-free while keeping track of the time.

Stick TickTime to the fridge or stovetop when you're cooking in the kitchen.

Stick TickTime to the whiteboard during a presentation or lecture.

WATCH gadget and tech reviewer Walcom S7 test TickTime and see what he thinks of it. 
WATCH gadget and tech reviewer OSReviews test TickTime and see what he thinks of it. 
 

 

TickTime is chargeable. No batteries are required. Simply plug-in your phone charger to boost TickTime's power. Save you tons of extra money to buy batteries and let us go environmental-friendly. 

 

“Make counting down fun & easy! With TickTime, you will be sure to have fun counting down activities like exercising, cooking, games e.t.c”
-----See what gadget and tech reviewer Samuel Lewis thought about TickTime when he recently tested it.

 

Reviewed and Tested by top tech web Craving Tech. Click here to read more.

Reviewed and Tested by  Nashville Noise. Click here to read more.

 

Reviewed and Tested by Game Space. Click here to read more.

 

Refer to our Update 8, we can ship TickTime fast as units have started being manufactured. So you can start counting down the time until you receive yours NOW!

The Nllano team started in Hong Kong in 2012. We're a high-tech enterprise company that integrates R&D, Design, Production and Sales. We are driven by innovation, and can guarantee quality products backed-up by the best customer service.

We are established in the digital technology, developing products and manufacturing them at our factory in Shenzhen. These include:

  • Mobile phone accessories
  • Notebook accessories
  • Digital accessories
  • Beauty tools

TickTime is the latest addition to our impressive portfolio of products.

story:
An affordable, modular, food producing home for every location!      すべての場所のための手頃な価格の、モジュラー、食料生産の家！                  

Compact, Comfortable & Self Sufficient 

    YES! We are building an affordable passive solar home that produces its own fresh food & renewable energy and you can help! Comfort, Security, Beauty. A modern home for everyone from urban lots, to back-to-the-land families, to developing nations.  Help us build the first real-world prototype for the next generation of portable, sustainable living!

ALMOST THERE!!!    UPDATE - Thanks to our many supporters, we reached our initial $5000 goal last year and the house is now up and open for guests , the fruit trees have shot up to 10ft tall, and the greenhouse is producing heaps of food (see Updates).   Our need now is to really fine tune the growing systems and insulate the greenhouse to test our production in the coming winter. We are raising the next $5000 in the coming months to install our aquaponics, assemble the automatic watering and ventilation systems, and a second layer of greenhouse within the existing  structure to keep our plants from freezing. Take a look at our perks and choose a gift in thanks for your contributions.  THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

 

   "Our team of architects, farmers, and eco-tech guys are putting all their best bits together into this extremely secure and comfortable home. The Eden Grow Home's hybrid construction combines a steel arch greenhouse with hydroponic gardens, natural living spaces and energy independence in a compact house, deliverable in 40' shipping containers to communities globally."                                                                                                                           -   Designer, Jacob Reiner        

 the Eden Grow Home...

  • grows tomatoes, lettuce, veggies, fruit, herbs, fish & chickens and more....
  • collects, filters & stores rainwater
  • passive solar heating & cooling  -  year round comfort
  • carbon neutral  & energy positive  (produces more energy than it consumes)
  • auto-climate control   -  smart phone app/remote video link
  • recycles green waste 
  • modular designs     *** easy to assemble and deliverable anywhere.      
 

    The prototype opened this year at the Fuji Eco Park Village permaculture education center on Mt Fuji in Yamanashi, Japan. Our quaint home, growing its own fruits, vegetables, eggs and herbs is open to tours, study groups, overnight guests & weekend retreats. 

    Make a contribution to help us build this model home and get one of our original gifts, organic teas & other great PERKS!!  Or custom design your own house and we will build and deliver it you!

Help Us...

 

Turn This.....      




What We Do For You

Visit the Demo House. We welcome guests for country getaways. Enjoy the gardens, join a yoga workshop, eat amazing food and relax with the Mt Fuji view.  

Design & Order a house! We are accepting pre-orders to begin delivery in 2016. Plan your dream house with us. Custom size & features. Online consultation.

PERKS - If your mailbox is too small to fit a house (!)  We have a bunch of other cool gifts and great goodies to repay your kindness ;D            

  Try our Mt Fuji Teas!           Get a Kimono!!               Come stay for a night!  

                    Original Green Teas              Vintage  Kimonos                            Wall prints      

              

         Outdoor Wear                             Pizza & Tea                                Tote Bag               

                                                                          Scroll down for MORE PERK details...


Much More Than a Tiny House....    

"We provide a starter home for the modern farmer with beautiful sustainable designs, and a tool kit to customize the home to your ideal lifestyle and needs. Let us know your dream, we will build it and send it !"  

1200sqft LIVING & GARDEN SPACE.  SLEEPS 4 PEOPLE COMFORTABLY
STEEL FRAME DESIGNED TO WITHSTAND HURRICANE FORCE WINDS


"Building global food security, One house at-a-Time"

   Across the world people increasingly need a low-cost reliable source of fresh natural foods and secure homes in the face of rising energy costs and climate instability.  The desire to grow at home is limited by access to land, education and the tools to get started.  Our homes provide an affordable ready-to-operate package for young families, elderly residences, and displaced people; which can be expanded and combined into operating farm communities.  

Our Beautiful Location 

  The Fuji Eco Park Village is on Mt Fuji, 2hrs from downtown Tokyo. The 5 acre permaculture landscape with ponds,sheep and herb gardens surrounds an impressive Minka center house and various innovative eco-buildings and electric vehicles, powered 100% by solar pv and wind. The park hosts yoga-detox workshops, internships, weddings and events. 


Our Plan  -  Building the Demo

With your help, we will complete the first Eden Grow Home this year in Japan as a demonstration and educational model. Fuji Eco Park's Imai-san has donated land and an insulated container. We have started framing out the greenhouse and decks and the steel pipe arch is coming into place. We are shooting for a initial prototype cost of $28,000.  Your participation can help us hit our mark! 

  • 40' Container, Solar & Wind (3 kW )                    donated       Imai-san
  • Site Prep.                                                                      donated       Wakabayashi-san
  • Greenhouse & Hydroponics                                    $ 8,500
  • Extension Arch Frame, Roof, Windows               $12,000
  • Interior, Bath, Kitchen                                               $ 8,250
  • Chicken Hutch ( Yes, Built-in Chickens!)             $    150

 




Who We Are 

     

The Earth Embassy team of architects, farmers, and eco-tech guys have been building homes, foods and community together since 2000.  The Solar Cafe & Farm is our farm-to-table education center where we've hosted students and guests from over 40 countries.  Our Lake Shojiko Village revitalization project restores antique minka homes for new families, with mentions in WSJ , Bloomberg.  Fuji Eco Park Village founder Imai-san is our gifted engineer; a permaculture specialist and a race winning EV car builder. Designer Jacob Reiner's Aquaponics House design received the 2012 Japan Eco Cup Award.  Our crew extends to NY and Africa too, where Jajja's Kids are housing and schooling 14 boys and looking for land for us to build the boys a sustainable farmstead.  

                                 -Jake explaining the Kiwi Arch to our international school students.

Our goals

With this first model home, the team is refining the design and building process to produce these homes at low-cost with simple and reliable food & energy systems. Our target is to be able deliver them globally for under $30,000. We are pretty good at building, now we are learning how to build light and manage the shipping process....

 As we reach the start-up goal with this campaign, we'll look to start Phase 2 and raise funds to send an Eden Farm Home to the orphans at Jajja's Kids in Uganda where our adopted brother Ronnie is teaching the kids to grow food.


Our System

A Simple Combination  -  Lifestyle & Ecology

Pre Fab homes built with eco-friendly materials to be modular and expandable. The core shipping container units can be shipped globally, installed in a week and can be customized using local materials and methods.

Modular designs allow for expandable greenhouses, multi-family homes, luxury homes, schools, shops and sustainable community developments.

Customize and Expand....The design is easily expandable, and fully extended one home can provide food and a cash crop income stream for a family of 6. The homes can be expanded and combined into operating farm communities.  

Hybrid Light-Homes    Our advanced lightweight frames and hybrid design bring together modern living comforts with built-in smart ecology systems. Durable exteriors, smart interiors, triple insulation, with flexible layouts create a super efficient home and ample space. 

Passive Solar Design and custom wooden louvers provide light and privacy while controlling solar insolation, heating and cooling.  

Portable Homes - 簡単に移動可能な  Sizing of units conforms to shipping container dimensions and structural standards, to allow ease of transport and assembly, with minimal permitting required.  Homes may be placed on a poured foundation, or may be placed on piers or wheels, allowing ease of permitting and "temporary“ placement on agricultural land, further reducing cost.

       



---- NOW THE PERKS !!!! ----

THANK YOU!    CONTRIBUTE NOW AND GET ONE OF OUR GREAT GIFTS.  


 $20 - Keychain Light !  A useful little light with Earth Embassy logo. Keep it on you always to shine for you on dark days.

                                                                  

 $30 -

PIZZA & TEA Lunch for two!  Enjoy a delicious Farm Pizza and fresh Organic Mint Tea at the Solar Cafe & Farm with a great Mt Fuji view.   
   

$45 - RECYCLE - Shopping Tote Bag   NO MORE PLASTIC BAGS!! Keep this sturdy tote in your EV bike and proudly say at the cash register "No thanks, brought my Earth Embassy tote today!"

                                

  

$60 - MT FUJI GREEN TEA - 3 Flavors  ORIGINAL Earth Embassy Teas !!! 3 PACK. Premium Shizuoka tea grown on traditional family farms of Mt Fuji. Mellow taste for easy drinking. Hot or with a little honey on ice! 3 Assorted Flavors - 桜Sakura-cherry blossom, 柚子Yuzu-citrus, バニラVanilla, ベリーBerry, パイナップル Pineapple,

                          

$85 - HOODIE - Earth Embassy logo  Super warm hoodie for those chilly mornings before the sun hits your greenhouse. Soft cotton blend with room to move. Available sizes (S,M,L,XL) and colors (White,Grey,Navy,Green,Red,Black) upon request.

                                 

$100 - KIMONO -Delivered to your Door   We will send you an authentic vintage kimono from Japan!!! The local Mt Fuji area was renowned for silk production and beautiful design. Great for dressing up or wearing around the house. Size and patterns vary, but let us know if you prefer Child or Adult, and Simple or Colorful, and we will do our best.

                               

$135 - 1 NIGHT in the Eden Farm Home  Come and experience a night in the house! Visit and explore the Fuji Eco Park Village. Learn first-hand our growing systems and renewable energy off-grid technology.


$150 - Your Own Blueberry Bush   ALL-YOU-CAN-EAT... We plant a blueberry bush in your name, with permanent tag. Visit the farm in season and stuff yourself full of berries! And if you dont make it up in season, once a year we can send you a box of fresh organic blueberries or jam! First delivery included for free. * Fresh berry delivery Japan only. ** One delivery included in contribution. **Subsequent orders subject to shipping & handling.


$185 - Earth Embassy Insulated Jacket   A super warm, high quality Ortega softshell with embroidered Earth Embassy logo. Be the envy of your glamping neighborhood!!! Stylish and durable, waterproof with adjustable closures. Please specify; Women's/Men's, Size (S,M,L,XL), Color (Blue/Navy/Black/White)

   

     

$350 - Original Art Prints

Beautiful original photo of Mt Fuji Sunrise reflected in Lake Shojiko. Canvas print with gallery wrap mounting for easy wall hanging. 18 x 24. Limited Edition.


 

Architectural rendering of the Eden Farm Home.  Canvas print with gallery wrap mounting for easy wall hanging. 18 x 24. Limited Edition.

What We Do For You
Visit the Demo House. We welcome guests for country getaways. Enjoy the gardens, join a yoga workshop, eat amazing food and relax with the Mt Fuji view.  
Design & Order a house! We are accepting pre-orders to begin delivery in 2016. Plan your dream house with us. Custom size & features. Online consultation.
PERKS - If your mailbox is too small to fit a house (!)  We have a bunch of other cool gifts and great goodies to repay your kindness ;D            
  Try our Mt Fuji Teas!           Get a Kimono!!               Come stay for a night!  
                    Original Green Teas              Vintage  Kimonos                            Wall prints      
              
         Outdoor Wear                             Pizza & Tea                                Tote Bag               
                                                                          Scroll down for MORE PERK details...



Much More Than a Tiny House....    

"We provide a starter home for the modern farmer with beautiful sustainable designs, and a tool kit to customize the home to your ideal lifestyle and needs. Let us know your dream, we will build it and send it !"  




1200sqft LIVING & GARDEN SPACE.  SLEEPS 4 PEOPLE COMFORTABLY

STEEL FRAME DESIGNED TO WITHSTAND HURRICANE FORCE WINDS



"Building global food security, One house at-a-Time"

   Across the world people increasingly need a low-cost reliable source of fresh natural foods and secure homes in the face of rising energy costs and climate instability.  The desire to grow at home is limited by access to land, education and the tools to get started.  Our homes provide an affordable ready-to-operate package for young families, elderly residences, and displaced people; which can be expanded and combined into operating farm communities.  






Our Beautiful Location 

  The Fuji Eco Park Village is on Mt Fuji, 2hrs from downtown Tokyo. The 5 acre permaculture landscape with ponds,sheep and herb gardens surrounds an impressive Minka center house and various innovative eco-buildings and electric vehicles, powered 100% by solar pv and wind. The park hosts yoga-detox workshops, internships, weddings and events. 

Our Plan  -  Building the Demo

With your help, we will complete the first Eden Grow Home this year in Japan as a demonstration and educational model. Fuji Eco Park's Imai-san has donated land and an insulated container. We have started framing out the greenhouse and decks and the steel pipe arch is coming into place. We are shooting for a initial prototype cost of $28,000.  Your participation can help us hit our mark! 

40' Container, Solar & Wind (3 kW )                    donated       Imai-san

Site Prep.                                                                      donated       Wakabayashi-san

Greenhouse & Hydroponics                                    $ 8,500
Extension Arch Frame, Roof, Windows               $12,000
Interior, Bath, Kitchen                                               $ 8,250
Chicken Hutch ( Yes, Built-in Chickens!)             $    150


 












Who We Are 


     

The Earth Embassy team of architects, farmers, and eco-tech guys have been building homes, foods and community together since 2000.  The Solar Cafe & Farm is our farm-to-table education center where we've hosted students and guests from over 40 countries.  Our Lake Shojiko Village revitalization project restores antique minka homes for new families, with mentions in WSJ , Bloomberg.  Fuji Eco Park Village founder Imai-san is our gifted engineer; a permaculture specialist and a race winning EV car builder. Designer Jacob Reiner's Aquaponics House design received the 2012 Japan Eco Cup Award.  Our crew extends to NY and Africa too, where Jajja's Kids are housing and schooling 14 boys and looking for land for us to build the boys a sustainable farmstead.  
                                 -Jake explaining the Kiwi Arch to our international school students.
Our goals
With this first model home, the team is refining the design and building process to produce these homes at low-cost with simple and reliable food & energy systems. Our target is to be able deliver them globally for under $30,000. We are pretty good at building, now we are learning how to build light and manage the shipping process....
 As we reach the start-up goal with this campaign, we'll look to start Phase 2 and raise funds to send an Eden Farm Home to the orphans at Jajja's Kids in Uganda where our adopted brother Ronnie is teaching the kids to grow food.




Our SystemA Simple Combination  -  Lifestyle & Ecology
Pre Fab homes built with eco-friendly materials to be modular and expandable. The core shipping container units can be shipped globally, installed in a week and can be customized using local materials and methods.
Modular designs allow for expandable greenhouses, multi-family homes, luxury homes, schools, shops and sustainable community developments.

Customize and Expand....The design is easily expandable, and fully extended one home can provide food and a cash crop income stream for a family of 6. The homes can be expanded and combined into operating farm communities.  




Hybrid Light-Homes    Our advanced lightweight frames and hybrid design bring together modern living comforts with built-in smart ecology systems. Durable exteriors, smart interiors, triple insulation, with flexible layouts create a super efficient home and ample space. 


Passive Solar Design and custom wooden louvers provide light and privacy while controlling solar insolation, heating and cooling.  
Portable Homes - 簡単に移動可能な  Sizing of units conforms to shipping container dimensions and structural standards, to allow ease of transport and assembly, with minimal permitting required.  Homes may be placed on a poured foundation, or may be placed on piers or wheels, allowing ease of permitting and "temporary“ placement on agricultural land, further reducing cost.
       







---- NOW THE PERKS !!!! ----
THANK YOU!    CONTRIBUTE NOW AND GET ONE OF OUR GREAT GIFTS.  


 $20 - Keychain Light !  A useful little light with Earth Embassy logo. Keep it on you always to shine for you on dark days.
                                                                  


 $30 - PIZZA & TEA Lunch for two!  Enjoy a delicious Farm Pizza and fresh Organic Mint Tea at the Solar Cafe & Farm with a great Mt Fuji view.   

   


$45 - RECYCLE - Shopping Tote Bag   NO MORE PLASTIC BAGS!! Keep this sturdy tote in your EV bike and proudly say at the cash register "No thanks, brought my Earth Embassy tote today!"
                                  

$60 - MT FUJI GREEN TEA - 3 Flavors  ORIGINAL Earth Embassy Teas !!! 3 PACK. Premium Shizuoka tea grown on traditional family farms of Mt Fuji. Mellow taste for easy drinking. Hot or with a little honey on ice! 3 Assorted Flavors - 桜Sakura-cherry blossom, 柚子Yuzu-citrus, バニラVanilla, ベリーBerry, パイナップル Pineapple,


                          


$85 - HOODIE - Earth Embassy logo  Super warm hoodie for those chilly mornings before the sun hits your greenhouse. Soft cotton blend with room to move. Available sizes (S,M,L,XL) and colors (White,Grey,Navy,Green,Red,Black) upon request.

                                 


$100 - KIMONO -Delivered to your Door   We will send you an authentic vintage kimono from Japan!!! The local Mt Fuji area was renowned for silk production and beautiful design. Great for dressing up or wearing around the house. Size and patterns vary, but let us know if you prefer Child or Adult, and Simple or Colorful, and we will do our best.
                               



$135 - 1 NIGHT in the Eden Farm Home  Come and experience a night in the house! Visit and explore the Fuji Eco Park Village. Learn first-hand our growing systems and renewable energy off-grid technology.



$150 - Your Own Blueberry Bush   ALL-YOU-CAN-EAT... We plant a blueberry bush in your name, with permanent tag. Visit the farm in season and stuff yourself full of berries! And if you dont make it up in season, once a year we can send you a box of fresh organic blueberries or jam! First delivery included for free.  * Fresh berry delivery Japan only.  ** One delivery included in contribution.  **Subsequent orders subject to shipping & handling.



$185 - Earth Embassy Insulated Jacket   A super warm, high quality Ortega softshell with embroidered Earth Embassy logo. Be the envy of your glamping neighborhood!!! Stylish and durable, waterproof with adjustable closures. Please specify; Women's/Men's, Size (S,M,L,XL), Color (Blue/Navy/Black/White)

        

$350 - Original Art Prints
Beautiful original photo of Mt Fuji Sunrise reflected in Lake Shojiko. Canvas print with gallery wrap mounting for easy wall hanging. 18 x 24. Limited Edition.
 
Architectural rendering of the Eden Farm Home.  Canvas print with gallery wrap mounting for easy wall hanging. 18 x 24. Limited Edition.

story:
Kristin Light, Registered Holistic Nutritionist from Living City Health talks about how to get a balanced diet and how Neo can help.

Craving candy?  Can’t keep your hands off the crackers? Indulge yourself without sacrificing your health goals. Keep an eye on what’s in your food and get suggestions for a healthy alternative. Whether you are watching your carbs, reducing fat, or managing sodium intake, Neo uses real-time measurement to track key nutritional indicators and help meet your health goals.



What does two spoons of chia have, how much protein is in your smoothie? 

Get instant info on calories, carbs, protein and fat. Adding multiple ingredients? Neo takes care of that too. It automatically adds up the nutrition for any number of items giving you accurate info each time you use the jars.


Eating healthy doesn’t have to be hard work. Tracking your health goals with Neo is simple and easy. Know what you’re consuming, where it comes from and what it means in terms of overall balance in diet. Sync with activity trackers to get total control of your fitness. 

                                     


Turn your kitchen into a smart one with Neo jars.  Fill up Neo with ingredients in your pantry or fridge and access them from any where. Wondering what to make for dinner? Neo app suggests recipes based on items you already have.




Let Neo do the math.  Pick a recipe, tell Neo how many people you are expecting or say "whatever is in the jar".  Neo will adjust mixing proportions so you get the perfect taste every time.





Never run out of anything. With Zero touch shopping, Neo learns how often and how much you use your ingredients, so it adds them to your mobile shopping list before it’s too late.  Take the list with you or check out items directly from Amazon!



                  


Powerful app that brings you personalized content and real-time data. Access your jars, know what you have, track consumption, nutrition, set targets, reach goals and share with friends using the Neo app.



Neo comes standard in black. To customize your smart jar, choose from 4 cool color options. Select the "Color my Neo" perk from the side bar. 





            





 

             

We are thrilled to have you as part of our developer community. As part of the developer toolkit, you will get access to REST APIs (PHP, .NET, Java and Javascript). SDK support includes iOS and Android. To order your dev kit, select a perk and signup at skelabs.com/developer. We will contact you soon with the next steps. 

 

      

   



                                  

                                         


SKE Labs is the company behind Neo.  Founded by engineer and food lover Madhuri Eunni, SKE is short for Smart Kitchen Ecosystem.  We are a small (but fierce) team working out of the MaRS innovation center in Toronto.


For Madhuri what started as a personal challenge to get more natural protein in her daily diet quickly turned into a smart kitchen solution that all her friends wanted and the idea for Neo was born.  In the months to follow Madhuri pulled together a team of talented and passionate designers, engineers and foodies to build the first ever smart jar. After several trials and 3D prototypes, Neo was launched successfully at CES 2015. Highlight of the event - we made it to NBC Top 10 Fun & Futuristic Gadgets. Thank you for the honor!

With years of experience in building cool products, our team is ready to manufacture Neo in the next few months.  We carefully selected trusted partners who bring only the highest quality and best manufacturing standards to build Neo. They helped us create our current prototypes. That means we are confident of the manufacturing process and timelines.


We’re excited to bring Neo to the Indiegogo community! We want you to try it, let us know what we can make even better and join us in this incredible journey. Together we’ll revolutionize the kitchen into the new connected heart of a home.


                                 



                                         


Using Neo

How do I configure a Neo?

Configuring Neo is easy. Simply turn it on and scan a barcode or enter the name of the ingredient into the app. Then just pour it in!

What if I’m putting something in Neo that doesn’t have a barcode?

No problem at all. Simply enter the name of the item you are putting inside Neo. Our cloud backend continuously learns to know more items day by day.

Can I change the ingredients that I keep in my Neo?

Yes. Turn off and then turn on Neo. When prompted in the app, scan a barcode or enter the name of the new item you want to put in.

Is Neo safe with hot foods/hot liquids?

No. We do not recommend using hot foods / liquids with Neo.

Can I store my Neo in the freezer?

Neo can work inside the refrigerator, however we do not recommend storing Neo inside a freezer. 

Does Neo provide alerts for “best before” dates? Can I customize them?

Yes. Neo provides alerts based on “best before” dates entered during configuration or simply based on the date the jar was filled. You can customize “best before” dates and alerts through the settings page in the app.

Is Neo food safe?

Yes. Neo is made out of BPA-free plastic and is completely food safe. 

Is Neo dishwasher safe?

Yes. Simply detach the base (which houses the electronics) and put Neo in the dishwasher.

Is my Neo secure?

Absolutely. We are working on cutting edge technologies to keep your usage and data completely secure.


Using Neo App

What platforms will be supported?

The Neo application is supported on iOS and Android. Support for Windows is coming soon.

What is Zero Touch shopping?

Neo knows your usage pattern and amount remaining inside it. So, it automatically adds to your shopping cart if you are running low, so you never run out of it.

What are the stores that Neo can order from?

Neo works with Amazon. We are adding support to more online retailers. You can also simply use the list to shop in your favourite local stores. 

Can I customize when to order or alert?

Yes. You can set custom order/alert level for each jar through the settings in the Neo App.

How does Neo Recipes work?

The Neo App fetches recipes from the cloud based on what and how much you have inside your Neo jars. 

Can I add my own recipes?

You can add your own recipes to the Neo App easily. Your recipes will be uploaded to the cloud and you can share them with your friends too.

How does Neo track Nutrition?

Neo knows how much you have consumed out of the jar. Neo App fetches the nutritional information for the content and provides you the exact amount of nutritional intake.

What kind of Nutritional components can I keep track of?

Neo tracks fat, cholesterol, carbohydrates, sodium, sugar and protein. 


Neo Technicals

How accurate is Neo?

Neo is very accurate. It has a precision of 1g (i.e. 0.035 oz).

How does Neo communicate to my phone / tablet?

Neo uses Bluetooth Low Energy to communicate to the App on your smartphone / tablet.

Can I use the same Neo App on multiple devices?

Yes. You can have up to 2 devices to manage same set of jars.

What if I take something out of my Neo but I do not have my smartphone / tablet with me at that time?

Neo uses smart retries. So, even if you don’t have your smartphone or tablet with you at the time of usage, Neo will communicate once they come inside the range.

What is the range of communication for Neo?

Up to 100 meters.

How long does the battery  last in Neo? Do I need to charge it?

A single charge can last for several months. Neo App shows real-time charge on each of your jars and will provide alerts if the charge is running low. You can charge multiple Neos simultaneously on the charging pad.

How does Neo charge wirelessly?

Neo has inductive charging inbuilt. You can charge up to 2 Neos simultaneously by simply placing them on the charging pad.


Other Questions

How can I specify a color other than black?

Choose “Color my Neo” perk from above. We will contact you as soon as the campaign is over to get your color choice. This perk is available only for 4 or more jars.

How do I pay for Shipping?

Depending on your perk, please add the shipping cost (if you are outside US and Canada) to your contribution.

Who did the video for the campaign?
Our video was done by the very talented Pam Lau. She is a Toronto based videographer.

Still got questions? Send us a note at contact@skelabs.com, and we'll get back to you.

story:
ThinkPillow, in combination with ThinkSleep, is the most effective sleep system to make you sleep and feel better. As a pillow, it is fully adjustable in both softness and height, so comfortable it feels like a custom-made pillow for you! Not only does ThinkSleep track how you sleep, it also knows the ideal time to wake you up, so you will feel alert and refreshed to face the day! All easy to use by smart phone app.

What else?

ThinkPillow

ThinkPillow reinvents the bed pillow ,changing the way of we sleep forever.

The ThinkPillow is mainly composed of SmartCore and SmartCusion .


One of the biggest breakthroughs in the ThinkPillow is its inner part, which we call Smart Core and it is very smart. The desired softness and thickness can be completely controlled through adjusting the push button. On both sides of ThinkPillow are two adjusting knobs. Press the right one to make pillow harder and higher. Press the left one to make it softer and lower. Simple adjustments can realize the precise softness and height of the Smart Core. Like magic, this makes ThinkPillow a custom-made pillow for you.

Another innovation in ThinkPillow is its inbuilt Smart Cushion. This is no ordinary cushion. It is made of special material and is filled with small moving spherical particles. Elegant and beautiful, the cushion is designed according to human physiological structure. In addition, while using ThinkPillow, Smart Cushion can form a natural curve supporting the neck and head, resulting in the neutralization of neck pressure. With no pressure on the body, you feel like you're sleeping on a cloud. No other pillow can can gift you the quality of sleep offered with ThinkPillow.

Used correctly, it will also mitigate the symptoms of cervical spondylosis and snoring. It will bring you the best sleep experience you never had before.

ThinkSleep



The most important innovation in ThinkSleep is not to simply track sleep, but to change and improve it to make you sleep better.

ThinkSleep and ThinkPillow are combined together to create a perfect sleep system. Through sleep data analysis, ThinkSleep offers the sleeper suggestions to improve their rest. If the decline of sleep quality is caused by the improper condition of the pillow, ThinkSleep will suggest you to adjust the height and firmness of the ThinkPillow, so as to meet your personal requirements and to reach the best sleep experience.

ThinkSleep is a professional sleep creation product. Compared with some existing wearable smart sleep products, it has additional advantages such as; non-wearable, added Before-sleep Event Marker, comprehensive statistics, remote sleep tracking of family members, smarter alarm clock, perfect combination with ThinkPillow and easy-to-use UI design.

Wearable devices when sleeping will make people feel uncomfortable which may seriously affect the quality of sleep. In these cases sleep tracking can often become meaningless. Sleep enhancement technology should be something that exists and changes our life without disturbing us. Based on this concept, ThinkSleep comes into being.

ThinkSleep has two important functions, firstly, sleep management; secondly, smart alarm .

Sleep Management:

1. Recording sleep status

ThinkSleep can specifically track your sleep behavior and display all the detailed daily sleep data in your smart phone APP, including history records, monthly and annual data.

2. Before-Sleep Event Marker

ThinkSleep creatively includes the before sleep event marking function, through which you can mark the exciting things you do 3 hours before sleep, such as drink alcohol, coffee, take medicine or do exercise. By analyzing the historical data, the ThinkSleep APP will tell you which behaviors can help you sleep and which may affect your sleep quality. According to this, you can change the bad habits so as to improve your sleep.

3. A Sleep Keeper of Your Family or Close Friends

It allows you to care more about your family in an often overlooked, yet critical aspect of our lives. The sleep data of your relatives will be uploaded to the Cloud of lovethink.com, or be directly sent to your APP through Bluetooth. With no need to be shared in social networks, you can check the sleep data of your relatives on your phone any time and any where. This is wonderfully helpful to assist your care of elderly friends and family. If you notice that a loved ones sleep behavior is abnormal over a certain period, you will be able to identify and assist prevention of possible illnesses and maladies. The ThinkSleep APP can also automatically safeguard sleeping patterns and will alert you of poor sleep trends, so if need be, you can make a trip to the doctor as soon as possible.

Smart Alarm:


Smart alarm clock will trigger the alarm at the perfect point in your sleep cycle during the 30 minutes before the set alarm time. If the ThinkSleep detects that you are stirring shortly before your alarm goes off, it will wake you then, rather than waiting, as you could well slip back into a deep sleep.

For example, the set alarm time is 6:30, then from 6:00 to 6:30, the smart alarm clock will make a judgment according to your sleep status. If you are rousing from sleep during that period, the alarm clock can wake you up then instead of waiting for the set time, preventing from falling deeper into sleep again only to force you awake later feeling terrible (all of a sudden calling it an "alarm" just doesn't seem right!).

In another instance, if you are in the deep sleep status during the pre-alarm period, the smart alarm clock will make a short vibration 15 minutes before the set alarm time to enable you to slowly transfer from deep sleep to light sleep, before triggering the alarm at the set time. In this case, you will be woken from a light sleep status which is a much more merciful morning call experience!

If you do not want to get up even though the alarm is triggered, turn off the alarm clock just with a double-tap on the ThinkSleep. The awkwardness of looking everywhere for the alarm clock with closed eyes will no longer happen to you because the ThinkSleep is beside you now and it won't disturb others sleep.


Design of ThinkSleep

ThinkSleep has an elegant appearance with black and white as its main color, it is very simple, small, even beautiful. It contains a 3-axis sensor, a small speaker, vibrating motor and a rechargeable battery with standby time for up to 3 months inside. Data transmitting with Smartphone through Bluetooth leads to its strong power in cloud data processing

The customizable pillow case is designed with great care. Simple graceful design blends with gray and blue colors harmoniously. 

It simply attaches to your ThinkPillow or normal pillow and invisibly tracks your sleep at night. You don't need to put on any uncomfortable "wearables" or press a button. ThinkSleep knows when you're falling asleep, soundly asleep, thrashing about, or waking up. Everything.

Let's Do a Comparison

According to our analyses, an unfitting and uncomfortable pillow can pose a serious negative effect on your sleep quality and health. People  vary in height, weight, gender and age, as a result they have different  requirements for their pillows. Some like hard ones, while others are  fond of soft ones. Some prefer higher ones, some like lower ones.  Almost all ordinary pillows are designed with the same softness and  height, thus failing to cater for different people. 

The index profile for ThinkPillow is a para-curve. The coordinates for softness and height can be freely adjusted. In response to individual differences, the index moves along the curve. The index profile for ordinary pillows is a straight line. As an analogy. It is a painful ordeal to wear the shoes of the same size regardless of the individual differences.

Who We Are?

Jesun Wang, the designer of ThinkPillow, founder and CEO of Lovethink Studio, is a young industrial designer and inventor who owns more than ten patents from Shanghai China. With his colleagues, including innovation technology entrepreneur Karl McCarrison, we have founded the Lovethink Studio five years ago and have our own skilled and experienced team of outstanding designers in the industry of technological innovation.

We just really enjoy investigating and developing new and different topics when they come across our path, we are designing for dreams that we want to change the world, even if it's just one nights sleep at a time. We have our own three golden rules for design:Innovation, Practicality, Elegance

The ThinkPillow Story

Why did I want to invent the ThinkPillow? To begin with my father, he often slept badly at night because of his cervical spondylosis. From research, I found that my father had been using a bad pillow for sleeping, which led to the injury of his spine. So I decided to make a special pillow that would be conducive to my fathers sleep.

After two years of hard work, I finally managed to invent a pillow that is the ThinkPillow, as we called it. I gave the ThinkPillow to my father as a gift on his birthday, from there on in, dad's sleep problem was solved.

Then I realized that there are a lot of people with sleep woes like my father in the world, so I continued to develop the ThinkPillow to create a product that could help anyone achieve a good nights rest.

Next Steps

The molds of the system's parts have been built and we have completed product and software application development and testing. We are now ready for mass production, but the factory needs a minimum order quantity to produce, so we come to Indiegogo to ask for help. We hope you believe in the benefit of the ThinkPillow enough to support us, so we can help to change the way we sleep forever.

Only The Best Quality

The ThinkPillow team has been working in the industrial manufacturing with global corporations for more than 10 years and we have deep experience in bringing innovative, successful products to market.

We have already invested one year of research to ensure the very best materials and the most innovative, compatible design.

The vast majority of our raw materials for the  ThinkPillow have been imported from USA, Germany and Japan. Such as the filling micro-balls , button balls as well as the airbag filling. Also we have 100% ensured they have met the highest level of international environmental standards, an absolute must for a product that serves such an intimate role.

Our staff will be stationed in the production outlets to monitor the assembly process, to ensure we deliver the highest quality products. We will then test, one by one, with a 3rd party quality control and compliance house to ensure each product passes the most stringent standards before it leaves the factory.

Risks and challenges

ThinkPillow is a little more complicated than an average adjustable pillow. As it is composed of several parts, these components are produced in separate factories and therefore the foremost consideration is production management and quality assurance between the locations. 

Particular attention is required to ensure quality control for the production of the ThinkPillows key components. Our staff will be stationed on site at these locations to ensure consistent standards of manufacturing and our 48 hour test cycle policy.

Naturally there will always be risks in any venture; however by implementing stringent production safeguards and conducting a deep level of research, we've dramatically reduced these risks by developing a reliably manufactured product that will actually revolutionize your sleep (and more importantly waking) experience! On top of this, we are 100% committed to our product and are ready to address any possible issues that may come our way.
story_txt:
ThinkPillow, in combination with ThinkSleep, is the most effective sleep system to make you sleep and feel better. As a pillow, it is fully adjustable in both softness and height, so comfortable it feels like a custom-made pillow for you! Not only does ThinkSleep track how you sleep, it also knows the ideal time to wake you up, so you will feel alert and refreshed to face the day! All easy to use by smart phone app.What else?ThinkPillowThinkPillow reinvents the bed pillow ,changing the way of we sleep forever.The ThinkPillow is mainly composed of SmartCore and SmartCusion .One of the biggest breakthroughs in the ThinkPillow is its inner part, which we call Smart Core and it is very smart. The desired softness and thickness can be completely controlled through adjusting the push button. On both sides of ThinkPillow are two adjusting knobs. Press the right one to make pillow harder and higher. Press the left one to make it softer and lower. Simple adjustments can realize the precise softness and height of the Smart Core. Like magic, this makes ThinkPillow a custom-made pillow for you.Another innovation in ThinkPillow is its inbuilt Smart Cushion. This is no ordinary cushion. It is made of special material and is filled with small moving spherical particles. Elegant and beautiful, the cushion is designed according to human physiological structure. In addition, while using ThinkPillow, Smart Cushion can form a natural curve supporting the neck and head, resulting in the neutralization of neck pressure. With no pressure on the body, you feel like you're sleeping on a cloud. No other pillow can can gift you the quality of sleep offered with ThinkPillow.Used correctly, it will also mitigate the symptoms of cervical spondylosis and snoring. It will bring you the best sleep experience you never had before.ThinkSleepThe most important innovation in ThinkSleep is not to simply track sleep, but to change and improve it to make you sleep better.ThinkSleep and ThinkPillow are combined together to create a perfect sleep system. Through sleep data analysis, ThinkSleep offers the sleeper suggestions to improve their rest. If the decline of sleep quality is caused by the improper condition of the pillow, ThinkSleep will suggest you to adjust the height and firmness of the ThinkPillow, so as to meet your personal requirements and to reach the best sleep experience.ThinkSleep is a professional sleep creation product. Compared with some existing wearable smart sleep products, it has additional advantages such as; non-wearable, added Before-sleep Event Marker, comprehensive statistics, remote sleep tracking of family members, smarter alarm clock, perfect combination with ThinkPillow and easy-to-use UI design.Wearable devices when sleeping will make people feel uncomfortable which may seriously affect the quality of sleep. In these cases sleep tracking can often become meaningless. Sleep enhancement technology should be something that exists and changes our life without disturbing us. Based on this concept, ThinkSleep comes into being.ThinkSleep has two important functions, firstly, sleep management; secondly, smart alarm .Sleep Management:1. Recording sleep statusThinkSleep can specifically track your sleep behavior and display all the detailed daily sleep data in your smart phone APP, including history records, monthly and annual data.2. Before-Sleep Event MarkerThinkSleep creatively includes the before sleep event marking function, through which you can mark the exciting things you do 3 hours before sleep, such as drink alcohol, coffee, take medicine or do exercise. By analyzing the historical data, the ThinkSleep APP will tell you which behaviors can help you sleep and which may affect your sleep quality. According to this, you can change the bad habits so as to improve your sleep.3. A Sleep Keeper of Your Family or Close FriendsIt allows you to care more about your family in an often overlooked, yet critical aspect of our lives. The sleep data of your relatives will be uploaded to the Cloud of lovethink.com, or be directly sent to your APP through Bluetooth. With no need to be shared in social networks, you can check the sleep data of your relatives on your phone any time and any where. This is wonderfully helpful to assist your care of elderly friends and family. If you notice that a loved ones sleep behavior is abnormal over a certain period, you will be able to identify and assist prevention of possible illnesses and maladies. The ThinkSleep APP can also automatically safeguard sleeping patterns and will alert you of poor sleep trends, so if need be, you can make a trip to the doctor as soon as possible.Smart Alarm:Smart alarm clock will trigger the alarm at the perfect point in your sleep cycle during the 30 minutes before the set alarm time. If the ThinkSleep detects that you are stirring shortly before your alarm goes off, it will wake you then, rather than waiting, as you could well slip back into a deep sleep.


For example, the set alarm time is 6:30, then from 6:00 to 6:30, the smart alarm clock will make a judgment according to your sleep status. If you are rousing from sleep during that period, the alarm clock can wake you up then instead of waiting for the set time, preventing from falling deeper into sleep again only to force you awake later feeling terrible (all of a sudden calling it an "alarm" just doesn't seem right!).
In another instance, if you are in the deep sleep status during the pre-alarm period, the smart alarm clock will make a short vibration 15 minutes before the set alarm time to enable you to slowly transfer from deep sleep to light sleep, before triggering the alarm at the set time. In this case, you will be woken from a light sleep status which is a much more merciful morning call experience!
If you do not want to get up even though the alarm is triggered, turn off the alarm clock just with a double-tap on the ThinkSleep. The awkwardness of looking everywhere for the alarm clock with closed eyes will no longer happen to you because the ThinkSleep is beside you now and it won't disturb others sleep.

Design of ThinkSleep
ThinkSleep has an elegant appearance with black and white as its main color, it is very simple, small, even beautiful. It contains a 3-axis sensor, a small speaker, vibrating motor and a rechargeable battery with standby time for up to 3 months inside. Data transmitting with Smartphone through Bluetooth leads to its strong power in cloud data processing


The customizable pillow case is designed with great care. Simple graceful design blends with gray and blue colors harmoniously. 
It simply attaches to your ThinkPillow or normal pillow and invisibly tracks your sleep at night. You don't need to put on any uncomfortable "wearables" or press a button. ThinkSleep knows when you're falling asleep, soundly asleep, thrashing about, or waking up. Everything.

story:
The Aerospring is a modern, compact vertical aeroponic gardening system that helps you grow up to 27 edible plants at a time using only 10 square feet, or one square meter, of space. It’s a tried and tested outdoor gardening system that has successfully turned many aspiring gardeners into urban farmers.

The Aerospring Indoor Garden kit is the newest addition to the Aerospring family and transforms the system into an all-year garden. It’s a complete indoor gardening system, with professional grade LED grow lights and airflow management in its own honeycomb shaped grow tent, that allows you to grow perfect crop, indoors, all year round.

It's fun for the whole family and a wonderful way to discover the joys of gardening with your children. One of the best ways to know where your food comes from, is to grow your own. 

 

The Aerospring gardening system uses aeroponics, a process in which plants are grown by having their roots suspended in air and regularly showering them with a nutrient-rich water solution. There’s no need to weed or toil any soil, and there’s much less threat from pests because the system is completely soil-less.

Seedlings are started in a hydroponic grow medium called rockwool, which is derived from basalt rock. It retains plenty of water but still provides the roots with enough oxygen to develop into healthy and strong plants. You can germinate your own seedlings with the grow cubes provided or buy some at your local garden centre. 

The Aerospring garden features a sleek hexagonal pole design that fits in any small apartment, home or balcony, using only 10 square feet, or one square meter, of space. It’s the most efficient way to grow up to 27 plants in a small space.

The Aerospring Indoor highlights the hexagonal shape in the grow tent, integrating six powerful triple-band LED grow lights. The tent can be left entirely open or completely closed in seconds. It illuminates a dark corner of your home, providing an oasis of greenery and the scent of fresh herbs in winter months. The garden is on wheels, so it can easily be moved around or put into any spare room.

Assembling your Aerospring is simple (it takes just fifteen minutes) with no additional tools required. Adding on your Indoor kit is just as easy and can be done in less than an hour.

Because the Aerospring Garden automates irrigation and lighting schedules, there’s very little time and effort required to maintain the garden. But to ensure the very best results, set aside 5 minutes every couple of days to tend to the garden. These few minutes should be used to check plants and to trim away older leaves. You will also need to check on the water and nutrient levels every so often and top them up when necessary. Most people do this about once a week. 

Harvest plants regularly -- pinch and prune the top tips so that they grow more efficiently, but above all, experience the joy of effortless gardening in your own home! Grow an abundance (up to 15lbs/7kg) of fresh, nutritious pesticide-free produce every month

(*actual yield depends on plants grown).

The outdoor Aerospring grows almost anything except root vegetables and trees.

The indoor system is ideal for salads, herbs and other leafy greens providing fresh, pesticide-free produce right at home. It can even be customized to grow a few larger plants, like tomatoes, or any other crop that captures your fancy.

With the addition of the Aerospring Indoor accessory kit, the Aerospring Garden functions as a 2-in-1 system - grow larger plants outdoors from spring through autumn, then add the indoor accessory kit to be able to grow in your home during the winter and colder months. 

It’s efficient, easy to set up and tear down, mobile and incredibly productive. It’s the most versatile gardening system - use it outdoors or indoors, grow as few or as many plants as you’d like. Grow all year round.

 
 

Your Aerospring consists of a 20 gallon, or 75 liter, bucket, a lid for the bucket with a small service port, nine hexagonal planter sections, a shower head with lid, nine water pipe conduits and a water pump with a hose and connectors.

Your Indoor kit includes six patented professional LED grow light bars, a fan, a lightweight aluminium wheelbase and frame, a grow tent with six zippable panels and Wi-Fi timers.

The LED grow light bars are like no other - the supplied bars produce the equivalent of 1000W but only consume 138W of electricity. Triple-Band LED technology produces a full-spectrum light to ensure that your plants receive full PAR spectrum which supports healthy vegetation. Patented, novel, single-chip architecture diodes emit blue, green, and red (BGR) bandwidths, full Photosynthetically Active Radiation (400nm to 700nm) for maximum plant yield, while keeping power consumption low.

Super slim and lightweight with a long life expectancy (50,000 hours), they pack a powerful punch to the Aerospring Indoor gardening system.

A little over 3 years ago, Thorben and Nadine had a dream: to grow tasty heirloom tomatoes on their little balcony in their apartment in Singapore.

The high prices of imported fresh produce and concerns about pesticides inspired them to grow their own food at home, but the problem of space in an urban environment quickly became an issue. 

Another challenge was to keep the plants alive when they went away on business trips or holidays. After failing countless times with soil gardens, they devised a vertical hydroponic system that would automatically water and fertilize the plants. Despite their hectic lifestyles, they were able to grow enough food without too much time or effort. Encouraged by this success, Thorben began developing the prototype systems further for commercialisation.

The goal was to come up with a food safe system and design that was functional and looked chic on any urban city balcony. Twelve months of 3D prototyping ensued, which led to the invention of a sleek, modular, simple to assemble and easy to maintain vertical gardening system that fits in the smallest of spaces.

The company has since sold over 1500 gardening systems in Singapore and the region, Europe, Australia and the Middle East. But not every climate is suited for year round growing. Singapore’s tropical downpours and blazing humidity can be tough to grow certain greens, so in December 2017 they decided to develop an indoor version of the system that would allow the Aerospring to grow anything, anywhere, anytime.

Aerospring Gardens’ goal is to provide the best growing experience possible, to allow people to take back control over their food, to reconnect with it and truly experience the joy of growing their own food, right at home.

JUNE 2019 UPDATE:
We have fully assembled and packed all systems and will begin shipping them in coming days.

story:
Short Summary

A single revolutionary Walert device can detect intrusion into a house up to 2000SQ without the installation of wired or wireless  door/window or glass break sensors


  • No installation, no monthly service, and no contract.
  • Based on an unique patented subsonic frequency sensing technology that detects subtle physical changes resulting from the door/window openings from any directions with almost zero false detection rate.
  • Pet friendly and reliable
  • Plug into a standard power outlet anywhere in your house
  • Wi-Fi
  • Triggered siren to deter intruder.
  • Alert to user's smart phones, and tablets over Internet anytime and anywhere
  • Support multiple devices per premise.
  • Free download client application from App Store and Play Store

The device is ready for production and distribute to consumers worldwide

We are offering the early endorsers the special discount perk deals as follows:


From receipt of funds we will deliver the final WAlert devices in three months after closing this funding drive.


Impact and contribution to community

By delivering low cost, easy to use and compact security device we can help protect the 90+% of homes that are not secured.  According to the FBI, we can expect one in every thirty-six homes in the United States to be burglarized this year resulting in an average loss of $1,675.  That means a home burglary happens once every 15 seconds.  It is really not a question of if you will have a break-in but when. Unfortunately home security systems are expensive, difficult to install, and require monthly service fees.  Many cannot afford this expense and they just hope they will be lucky.

As part of this funding drive, Watasensor plans to donate the first 100 units to low income families in local area

Milestones

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that many of the people who need us most just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help.  Please tell your friends about Watasensor and our WAlert home security device. Help us to protect your family and property by bringing this revolutionary product to market.

WAlert Connectivity

WAlert is designed to be connected with a surveillance camera, telephone, and WiFi enabled devices such as thermostats, smoke detectors and door locks, and IoT platform to form a complete home automation and security system.



WAlert  Key Features

  • 3D spatial sensor detects door/ window open, and glass 

    break of a premise with a floor space up to 2000 SQ.


  • Triggered siren to deter intruder.


  • Alert to user's smart phones, and tablets over Internet  

    anytime and anywhere


  • Wi-Fi network.


  • Plug into a standard power outlet.


  • Easy to setup using Smartphone and simple to use.


  • Support multiple devices per premise.


  • Free download client application from App Store and Play 

    Store


  • Compact design
        - 64 (H) mm x 54 mm (W) x 35 mm (D)
         - 20 grams
         - White color
  • Environment 
        - Operating temperature: 0° ~50°C (32°F~122°F)
        - Operating humidity: 10% ~ 80%
  • Agency listings: FCC, CE, and UL

Easy Setup

WAlert is designed to be connected with a surveillance camera, telephone, and WiFi enabled devices such as thermostats, smoke detectors and door locks, and IoT platform to form a complete home automation and security system.





WAlert  Key Features




3D spatial sensor detects door/ window open, and glass

story:
Do you have a central heating system and thermostatic valves?
Get Snugr and be the first to master your comfort and save money!


Snugr: more comfort, more savings... from anywhere!

Snugr connects your heaters to the internet, allowing you to easily monitor and control the temperature of each of your rooms and to activate a separate planning for each one of them...
You can do it from anywhere: at home without leaving your sofa, from the office or on the go, when leaving for holidays.

With Snugr, we have made it possible 

  • to get a different temperature and planning for each room 
  • to configure your plannings in an easy way
  • to control your heating system from anywhere, using your computer, your tablet or your smartphone. 
  • to improve your comfort while making substantial energy savings!

And you know what's best? This is really easy to use and there's no need for extra work as it is compatible with your existing equipment.

Be one of the first to support us and become a part of the Snugr journey...

This Snugr crowdfunding is the best way to be part of the project, to help us improving our product and to be the first to turn your heating system to the next level with Snugr. Our technology is already working and installed at some very early adopters places and everyone's feedback is positive and encouraging.

What do you get?

  • A very special price for your Snugr kit
  • The guarantee to be delivered in September and to be ready for the next winter
  • Exclusive informations of our latests developments

How will you help us?

  • Reach the market sooner.
  • Speed up the engineering process.
  • Refine a nice & attractive design for Snugr

We also want to develop a lot of additional functionnalities, such as giving some informations over the savings, adding compatibility with Airbnb for hosts who want to heat their house or appartment  according to the bookings, adding interaction with IFTTT.com, adding a public API for users who want to interact with Snugr using their own hardware or software...

But more than anything else, we are waiting for your feedback to get new ideas!

More Comfort? How?

Before Snugr, we were frustrated because we managed all the heaters of our houses with one thermostat that was measuring the temperature in only one room.

Did you ever feel too cold in your bathroom because you didn't want to heat the entire house during the night?

Are you also walking around the entire house, choosing between 1 to 5 on those 20th century heater valves, trying to get the right temperature in each room?

Did you find it too complicated to configure your thermostat and do you finally only switch between the day and night modes?

Forget about that! 

With Snugr, using a user-friendly interface, you decide the temperature you want in each room... and you can have different plannings too. You can control your entire heating system from anywhere, at any time.

Simply ask Snugr: "In the bathroom, on Saturday and Sunday, I want 21°C from 9 AM to 10 AM" and Snugr will take care of it. Snugr learns the best time to start heating each room in order to get the right temperature at the right time.

Aren't your children living with you full time?
Activate or deactivate a planning in a single click.

Are you coming home sooner?
Start heating when you are leaving the office!

Are you going out with friends tonight and not coming home this evening?
Turn off your heaters and save money!

More savings? How?

Smart heating: As Snugr allows you to heat the rooms individually, you are not loosing money heating the entire house every time you need a warm room. You can have a warm bathroom a few hours in the morning without having to heat the whole house.

Forgetting is no longer a problem: Snugr allows you to turn off the heaters from you smartphone. No worries if you are leaving sooner or if you forgot to think about the heaters when leaving for your job, for a dinner or for holidays.

Snugr's learning system: Snugr learns when it has to start heating to get the right temperature at the right time. This means the end of wasted energy because you started heating too early. Do you want 20°C at 8PM? With Snugr you get 20°C at 8PM, not at 8:45PM, nor at 7:30PM.

Boiler connexion: Snugr can replace your old thermostat and connect to your boiler to turn it off when no room is heating.

Max compatibility: No need for expensive works or equipments, Snugr is compatible with your existing heaters and you don't even need to bleed the radiators. Simply remove and  replace your old valves with the Snugr valves, plug the Snugr box and configure your system in a few steps. Quick and Easy.

With Snugr you can easily reduce your heating consumption by 25% or more because you only heat when and where it is needed. By reducing your energy consumption you will also reduce your CO2 emissions and help protecting the environment. 

How does it work?

Snugr is a kit that includes:

  • Snugr box: this is Snugr's brain and it is connected to the internet to enable remote control of your heaters, from anywhere, at any time. It communicates with the heater valves using the lowest consumption radio protocol.

  • Snugr heater valves: the Snugr valves are motorized, battery powered (meaning no wires), radio controlled and include a temperature sensor to enable efficient temperature control, room by room.
  • Snugr boiler control: this can replace your old thermostat in order to turn off your boiler when no room is heating. Less energy waste, more savings.

How much does it cost?

The end-user final pricing for the kit, including 5 Snugr Valves, will be 994€ VAT included. Final pricing for additional Snugr valve will cost 89€ VAT incl. (less for 5 Snugr valves or more).  Custom offers will be dedicated to professionals, public buildings, schools, hospitals, etc..

With our exclusive Indiegogo offer, get your pack 399€ VAT included!
Be quick, best offers are limited, but every Indiegogo pack means a very special price. 

More infos about this campaign

  • We will ship for free in the EU.
  • All batteries will be included! Start using your Snugr immediately.
  • All the Snugr perks (starting from the super early bird package) include 5 Snugr valves (or more if specified).
  • The Snugr valves include adapters to ensure compatibility with most heating systems. Should you need another type of adapter, we will provided it, for free.
  • 100% risk free: you will receive your Snugr, whatever the outcome of this Indiegogo campaign.

Want to know more? Download our technical sheet!

Here is the technical sheet of the Snugr Valve.

story:
Who is Black Box?

We are Small Form Factor (SFF) PC enthusiasts that want a high quality CPU cooler that's effective and affordable.  Our design creates a better option than large, expensive water cooling units and combines the best characteristics from air coolers and closed loop radiators. We strive for perfection in design and function.

 

Why build the Black Box?

Computers perform better when they are cooler.  
When running games, graphics or high-processing powered applications the stock fan/cooler just doesn't cut it.  For higher performance there are a number of after market options but after using and researching the existing optoins we believe a better CPU cooler can be created that is more effective and costs less. We set out to build something cooler, cheaper and easier to use!

We begin with an optimized design combing the best of water and air cooling. Then we execute using quality materials and precision-built fabrication. We have researched the current options on the market today including air cooled with heat pipes, closed-loop cooling and high-end water cooling (which cost hundreds and have high potential for leaks). Our design and approach addresses the following issues:

  • Hard to mount and weak plastic components.
  • Blocked Mother Board components and reduced air flow though the case.
  • Loud and annoying noises from fan and pump.
  • Coolers that are too large to fit in many cases.
  • If the pump fails the unit must be replaced so your computer is down.
  • If fan fails it cannot be replaced requiring replacement of entire cooler.
  • Inefficient use of fan and cooling system and/ or components.
  • Impractical design: to remove the cooler other components must be removed first.
  • Lack of PWM (Pulse Width Modulation) for controlling fan speed.

 

Why should you care?

By backing this project you can help us support a hyper-passionate PC building community and be part of developing an innovative product where previously there had been stagnation and lackluster results from large output manufacturers.

 

Black Box: A powerful, refined CPU cooler

The Black Box is a new CPU cooler that raises the bar in performance, versatility and design for the PC enthusiast as well as the novice. We combine the performance of water and air cooling in a compact maintenance-free design. It's easy to install and remove with an easy mount configuration. It's quality constructed with aircraft grade aluminum and pure copper. And, it's all wrapped in an elegant, minimalist beautiful aluminum finish exterior.

 

We've spent months perfecting the design using feedback from PC enthusiasts and KLW manufacturing engineers. Our goal is to take the design to production, and we need your help.

 

The next step before production is to test a prototype of the Black Box. The funding goal is the minimum we need to produce a prototype plus the equipment to test fitment, thermals and noise.

 

The purpose of this initial funding round is to test and make the necessary revisions to maximize efficiency and performance while minimizing costs. The more funding we're able to raise, the more hardware configurations we'll be able to test for, which will lead to a better product. So if we achieve our funding goal, don't let it stop you from backing us! Every little bit helps make the Black Box better.

 

Once we've completed the prototype and testing phase, the next step will be a limited production run funded via a second crowd funding campaign. And if you're wondering, based on our analysis, the estimated retail price of the Black Box will be USD $69-89.

 

Funding Allocation:

USD  2000   All machined and water cut parts

USD    300   Copper Coils

USD    400   Testing Equipment

Indiegogo + Bank transfer fee cost 10% of funding

 

How you can help?

Make a donation and spread the word!

 

Ever little bit helps. If you know anyone who would be interested in the Black Box, send them a like to this page! The more people hear about this project, the better the chance we'll hit our goal and get this operational.

 

Your contribution will help us bring this project into reality, foster innovation in the market, and perhaps change the way CPU cooling companies approach future R&D.

 

Black Box Technical Specifications

Dimensions: L 140mm x W 140mm x H 140mm

Weight: 750 - 1000 grams

CPU Support: Intel (LGA 1155, 1366 and 2011) + AMD (AM3 and AM+3)

Fan Support: Standard 120mm-Interchangable (Included PWM fan 600- 2200 RPM)

Pump: Mini DC Brushless pump 12V

Cold Plate, Water Block and Coils: Pure Copper

Mounting, Support Bracket and Cover: Aircraft grade aluminum

 

*Specification are preliminary and may change.

Latest dual cooling technology

The first CPU cooler to feature liquid cooling and air in one. Never lose cooling protection or performance with the combined power of water and air combined.

 

Air

High static pressure fan delivers continuous air flow to coils, CPU and mother board components. Large 120mm fan for effective cooling. Outer box cover improves fan static pressure as it delivers constant air flow over copper coils.

Top View

 Bottom View

Complete coverage from top to bottom of coils improves performance. Outer coil funnels air flow down to water block and out over mother board components providing dual cooling for your processor and ram.

All copper coils deliver cool liquid to water block. Large copper coils designed for maximum cooling and coolant flow. Dual coils angle in and out providing more surface area for superior performance.

 Water Block

Large oversized pure copper water block has chambers to pool up liquid as it flows though providing extreme cooling performance.

Cold Plate

High quality crafted cold plate transfers the processors heat to the copper cylinders as the water flows through removing the heat.

Support Bracket

Strong, light weight all aircraft grade aluminum support bracket helps dissipate heat from the water block as the holes allow air flow to improve cooling.

 

 Mounting Bracket

Easy install mounting bracket design just for your processor, no silly plastic flimsy adjustable clips. All aluminum construction for secure mounting provides and insures correct mounting.

 Black Box

Quality built, no silly plastic mounting hardware, no hoses, no dust filled up radiator to clean, 100% maintenance free, easy install, interchangeable standard 120mm fan, L 140mm x W 140mm x H 140mm.
