story:
The performance of our 8 inch android tablet is as good as iPad Mini but the price is almost half of iPad Mini.  Please see following specifications of our 8 Inch, 10.1 inch and 7 inch android tablets.

Our goal is not to compete with Apple.  The prices of Apple iPads are high.  The prices of android tablets currently available in the market are also high.  We believe there is room for good quality android tablets at an affordable price.  We plan to sell these tablets to college students, high school students, those who cannot afford currently available tablets in the market and Apple iPad owners who need second or third tablets for their family members.

These are not cheap $79 to $99 low resolution, low memory, not powerful android tablets that are currently available in the market.  Sinemems Neo Tablets are comparable to any high quality name brand android tablets currently available in the market.  Back covers of our android tablets are made of aluminum not cheap plastic.

Features

Using these tablets you can check and send your work and personal email, go to internet and to your Facebook or Twitter accounts, watch videos and movies such as You Tube, Netflix and Hulu Plus, play games, make video calls, listen to music, take photos and record videos, read books and magazines, do office and school work using Google Document or Microsoft Word, Excel or Power Point using Documents to Go application.

Living room or family room entertainment

As shown on video you may connect these Sinemems Neo Tablets to your TV using HDMI cable to watch latest Hollywood blockbuster movies or your favorite sitcoms or the latest video everyone is talking about. Find exactly what you are in the mood for on Netflix, You Tube, Hulu Plus, Google Play or more. You don't need a separate video streaming box to watch on TV.

Office or school work

You may get some serious office work or school work done by connecting the tablet to your computer monitor using HDMI cable and a Bluetooth keyboard as shown on video.

You may get your office or school work done with the following applications designed to work perfectly with the Sinemems Neo Tablets.

With Documents to Go application you may work on Microsoft Word, Excel or Power Point.  You may also use Google Document to get your work done.

Evernote is a very popular note taking application.  With Evernote you can supplement your written notes with color photos, audio clips and web pages.

Google Drive, Skydrive or Box applications are the smart way to share or view big files.  Your hard drive in the cloud, these applications let you access your files anywhere with any device.  With these applications collaborate and comment on projects with your officemates or classmates.

Studious: This application keeps track of all your classes and homework assignments.  It saves notes with text and photos.

CamScanner turns your tablet instantly into a handheld digital scanner and a fax machine.  With CamScanner, you are able to digitize any paper documents by photo shooting.  Scan work notes, class notes, homework, whiteboards, anything and share them via email, fax or print via internet or upload to cloud.

Splashtop: If you are traveling for work or you are in classroom or anywhere you go, complete access to your computer goes with you.  Splashtop is the remote desktop application that streams your entire desktop to your tablet with smooth, high resolution video and audio.

Neo 10

Neo 10 is our 10.1 inch android tablet.  This tablet comes in black and white colors.

Neo 10 Specification

  • Processor: Dual core ARM Cortex A9 1.6 GHz
  • Operating System: Android 4.1 Jelly Bean
  • Screen Size: 10.1 inches
  • Screen Resolution: 1280 X 800
  • Internal Memory (RAM): 1 GB
  • Storage: 16 GB plus expandable to 32 GB using SD card; Total storage with SD card: 48 GB
  • Wireless/Networking: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n; Bluetooth Technology
  • Camera: Front 2 MP, Back 5 MP
  • Inputs & Outputs: HDMI, SD memory card slot, mini USB connector, Headphone Output
  • Dimension: 10.43 inches X 6.88 inches X 0.47 inch (265 mm X 175 mm X 12 mm)
  • Weight: 1.48 lbs
  • Battery: 8 hours

Neo 8

Neo 8 is our 8 inch tablet.

Neo 8 Specification

  • Processor: Dual core ARM Cortex A9 1.6 GHz
  • Operating System: Android 4.1 Jelly Bean
  • Screen Size: 8 inches
  • Screen Resolution: 1024 X 768
  • Internal Memory (RAM): 1 GB
  • Storage: 16 GB plus expandable to 32 GB using SD card; Total storage with SD card: 48 GB
  • Wireless/Networking: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n; Bluetooth Technology
  • Camera: Front: VGA Resolution Photo/Video, Back: 2 MP
  • Inputs & Outputs: HDMI, SD memory card slot, mini USB connector, Headphone Output
  • Dimension: 7.91 inches X 6.06 inches X 0.43 inch (201 mm X 154 mm X 11 mm)
  • Weight: 0.92 lb
  • Battery: 8 hours

Neo 7

Neo 7 is our 7 inch android tablet.

Neo 7 Specification

  • Processor: ARM Cortex A8 1.2 GHz
  • Operating System: Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich
  • Screen Size: 7.0 inches
  • Screen Resolution: 1024 X 600
  • Internal Memory (RAM): 1 GB
  • Storage: 8 GB plus expandable to 32 GB using SD card; Total storage with SD card: 40 GB
  • Wireless/Networking: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n; Bluetooth Technology
  • Front Camera: VGA Resolution Photo/Video
  • Inputs & Outputs: HDMI, SD memory card slot, mini USB connector, Headphone Output
  • Dimension: 7.64 inches X 4.76 inches X 0.45 inch (194 mm X 121 mm X 11.5 mm)
  • Weight: 0.79 lb
  • Battery: 7 hours

 

About Sinemems

Naushad Hossain founded Sinemems.  He received his BS in Aerospace Engineering and MS in Civil Engineering specialized in Micro Electromechanical Sensor (MEMS) structures from University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA). He has 12 years experience in designing automotive airbag sensors and pressure sensors. He has a patent on automotive side impact airbag sensor and his US patent number is 5538099. Naushad has experience in taking several automotive sensor projects from design stage to production.

What have we done so far?

We have developed prototypes that are now working according to our specifications.  What you have seen on the video are the working prototypes.  For past several months we have been testing several components of the tablets to ensure quality and reliability.  Most of these components are proven and have field data available because they are currently being used in other manufacturers' tablets.  For electronic products quality and reliability does not only depend on the design and the components of the products but also depend on the production process.  Making few prototypes does not mean that you are ready for mass production.  A proven production process is needed to ensure quality and reliability of the product.  That's why we have selected a factory in China who is currently making tablets for other manufacturers.  They are well experienced in tablet manufacturing.  We are now ready to manufacture these tablets in volume.

Why do we need your help?

We have turned to Indiegogo to help us to fund our first production run.  Your support will help us to make these tablets in volume.  We also need your help to spread the word about our tablets.

What's next?

When it comes to production not everything work as planned.  That's why we have the following conservative schedule for the next few months:

March 2013: Do production test run and validate the process.

April 2013: Order materials and get certification.

May 2013: Start volume production.

June 2013: Start shipping Sinemems tablets to our backers.

Sinemems Baseball Cap

  • Black cap with with royal blue, white, red, athletic gold and magenta embroidery colors.
  • Velcro back adjustable cap.
  • If you want we can embroider your name on the back.
 
 

Custom Baseball Cap

  • You may add any statement you want at the front of the cap.  For example you may say “Go Green” or “Don’t Drink and Drive” or “I love Susan”.  Any statement you believe in.
  • Maximum four words for front statement.
  • You may mention your name or your email address or your website address on the back or you may leave it blank.
  • Velcro back adjustable cap.
  • Cap colors are black, navy and white.
  • Front and back statements embroidery colors are available in white, red, columbia blue, black, navy.

Sinemems Travel Suit

  • Black travel suit with royal blue, white, red, athletic gold, magenta trim and embroidery colors.
  • SM, MD, LG, XL and 2XL unisex sizes.
  • If you want we can embroider your name on the right side of the jacket.

 

 

Sinemems Solar Powered Bluetooth Keyboard

  • Works with Apple, Windows, Android tablets and computers.
  • Solar Bluetooth keyboard can also be charged with supplied USB cable.
  • Keyboard on/off switch.
  • Made of aluminum.
  • Leather cover included.

Sinemems All Leather Apple iPad Integrated Bluetooth Keyboard Cover

  • Works with iPad 2, third and fourth generation iPads.
  • Black leather iPad cover.
  • Bluetooth keyboard can be charged with supplied USB cable.
  • Keyboard on/off switch.

Sinemems Aluminum Apple iPad Bluetooth Keyboard Cover

  • Works with iPad 2, third and fourth generation iPads.
  • Made of aluminum for better durability and protects your iPad better.
  • Magnetic clips securely attaches iPad and Bluetooth keyboard cover.
  • Bluetooth keyboard can be charged with supplied USB cable.
  • Keyboard on/off switch.
story_txt:
The performance of our 8 inch android tablet is as good as iPad Mini but the price is almost half of iPad Mini.  Please see following specifications of our 8 Inch, 10.1 inch and 7 inch android tablets.
Our goal is not to compete with Apple.  The prices of Apple iPads are high.  The prices of android tablets currently available in the market are also high.  We believe there is room for good quality android tablets at an affordable price.  We plan to sell these tablets to college students, high school students, those who cannot afford currently available tablets in the market and Apple iPad owners who need second or third tablets for their family members.
These are not cheap $79 to $99 low resolution, low memory, not powerful android tablets that are currently available in the market.  Sinemems Neo Tablets are comparable to any high quality name brand android tablets currently available in the market.  Back covers of our android tablets are made of aluminum not cheap plastic.
Features
Using these tablets you can check and send your work and personal email, go to internet and to your Facebook or Twitter accounts, watch videos and movies such as You Tube, Netflix and Hulu Plus, play games, make video calls, listen to music, take photos and record videos, read books and magazines, do office and school work using Google Document or Microsoft Word, Excel or Power Point using Documents to Go application.
Living room or family room entertainment
As shown on video you may connect these Sinemems Neo Tablets to your TV using HDMI cable to watch latest Hollywood blockbuster movies or your favorite sitcoms or the latest video everyone is talking about. Find exactly what you are in the mood for on Netflix, You Tube, Hulu Plus, Google Play or more. You don't need a separate video streaming box to watch on TV.
Office or school work
You may get some serious office work or school work done by connecting the tablet to your computer monitor using HDMI cable and a Bluetooth keyboard as shown on video.
You may get your office or school work done with the following applications designed to work perfectly with the Sinemems Neo Tablets.
With Documents to Go application you may work on Microsoft Word, Excel or Power Point.  You may also use Google Document to get your work done.
Evernote is a very popular note taking application.  With Evernote you can supplement your written notes with color photos, audio clips and web pages.
Google Drive, Skydrive or Box applications are the smart way to share or view big files.  Your hard drive in the cloud, these applications let you access your files anywhere with any device.  With these applications collaborate and comment on projects with your officemates or classmates.
Studious: This application keeps track of all your classes and homework assignments.  It saves notes with text and photos.
CamScanner turns your tablet instantly into a handheld digital scanner and a fax machine.  With CamScanner, you are able to digitize any paper documents by photo shooting.  Scan work notes, class notes, homework, whiteboards, anything and share them via email, fax or print via internet or upload to cloud.
Splashtop: If you are traveling for work or you are in classroom or anywhere you go, complete access to your computer goes with you.  Splashtop is the remote desktop application that streams your entire desktop to your tablet with smooth, high resolution video and audio.
Neo 10
Neo 10 is our 10.1 inch android tablet.  This tablet comes in black and white colors.


Neo 10 Specification

Processor: Dual core ARM Cortex A9 1.6 GHz
Operating System: Android 4.1 Jelly Bean
Screen Size: 10.1 inches
Screen Resolution: 1280 X 800
Internal Memory (RAM): 1 GB
Storage: 16 GB plus expandable to 32 GB using SD card; Total storage with SD card: 48 GB
Wireless/Networking: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n; Bluetooth Technology
Camera: Front 2 MP, Back 5 MP
Inputs & Outputs: HDMI, SD memory card slot, mini USB connector, Headphone Output
Dimension: 10.43 inches X 6.88 inches X 0.47 inch (265 mm X 175 mm X 12 mm)
Weight: 1.48 lbs
Battery: 8 hours

Neo 8
Neo 8 is our 8 inch tablet.


Neo 8 Specification

Processor: Dual core ARM Cortex A9 1.6 GHz
Operating System: Android 4.1 Jelly Bean
Screen Size: 8 inches
Screen Resolution: 1024 X 768
Internal Memory (RAM): 1 GB
Storage: 16 GB plus expandable to 32 GB using SD card; Total storage with SD card: 48 GB
Wireless/Networking: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n; Bluetooth Technology
Camera: Front: VGA Resolution Photo/Video, Back: 2 MP
Inputs & Outputs: HDMI, SD memory card slot, mini USB connector, Headphone Output
Dimension: 7.91 inches X 6.06 inches X 0.43 inch (201 mm X 154 mm X 11 mm)
Weight: 0.92 lb
Battery: 8 hours

Neo 7
Neo 7 is our 7 inch android tablet.


Neo 7 Specification

Processor: ARM Cortex A8 1.2 GHz
Operating System: Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich
Screen Size: 7.0 inches
Screen Resolution: 1024 X 600
Internal Memory (RAM): 1 GB
Storage: 8 GB plus expandable to 32 GB using SD card; Total storage with SD card: 40 GB
Wireless/Networking: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n; Bluetooth Technology
Front Camera: VGA Resolution Photo/Video
Inputs & Outputs: HDMI, SD memory card slot, mini USB connector, Headphone Output
Dimension: 7.64 inches X 4.76 inches X 0.45 inch (194 mm X 121 mm X 11.5 mm)
Weight: 0.79 lb
Battery: 7 hours

 
About Sinemems
Naushad Hossain founded Sinemems.  He received his BS in Aerospace Engineering and MS in Civil Engineering specialized in Micro Electromechanical Sensor (MEMS) structures from University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA). He has 12 years experience in designing automotive airbag sensors and pressure sensors. He has a patent on automotive side impact airbag sensor and his US patent number is 5538099. Naushad has experience in taking several automotive sensor projects from design stage to production.
What have we done so far?
We have developed prototypes that are now working according to our specifications.  What you have seen on the video are the working prototypes.  For past several months we have been testing several components of the tablets to ensure quality and reliability.  Most of these components are proven and have field data available because they are currently being used in other manufacturers' tablets.  For electronic products quality and reliability does not only depend on the design and the components of the products but also depend on the production process.  Making few prototypes does not mean that you are ready for mass production.  A proven production process is needed to ensure quality and reliability of the product.  That's why we have selected a factory in China who is currently making tablets for other manufacturers.  They are well experienced in tablet manufacturing.  We are now ready to manufacture these tablets in volume.
Why do we need your help?
We have turned to Indiegogo to help us to fund our first production run.  Your support will help us to make these tablets in volume.  We also need your help to spread the word about our tablets.
What's next?
When it comes to production not everything work as planned.  That's why we have the following conservative schedule for the next few months:
March 2013: Do production test run and validate the process.
April 2013: Order materials and get certification.
May 2013: Start volume production.
June 2013: Start shipping Sinemems tablets to our backers.

story:
Our KATRIS Nest is a multi-functional cat lounge fit for rubbing, resting, and scratching. We’ve worked to design the KATRIS Nest into the perfect bowl shape, constructed with high density eco-friendly material to ensure that your cat has a reliable place to spend their day.  

The Nest is built with 100+ side panels that slightly shift when your cat rubs their back, giving them the perfect back rub all at the same time. The felt material that covers the center of the KATRIS Nest is perfect for cats to comfortably lounge on all day long.  

The center scratching pad is replaceable, and it’s especially great for scratching. With the KATRIS Nest, your cat has great outlet to relieve stress! Unlike similar products, the KATRIS Nest is breathable and is the perfect spot for your cat to keep cool, even on those hot summer days. This multi-functional lounge is KATRIS’s next best product.

 

 

Rubbing

  • The 100+ side panels move slightly with your cat’s body to provide the
    perfect back rubs.
  • The removable felt cover in the center provides added comfort for your cat.

 

 

Scratching

  • The replaceable center scratch pad is made with high-density material
    to help your cat relieve tension.
  • Premium selected corrugated material lasts longer than typical cat scratchers.

 

*Both the center fabric and circle pad are replaceable!

​​

 

Lounging

  • The unique design is the perfect shape for curling up on a hot summer
    day and is designed to be breathable and to prevent overheating.
  • The 19” bowl shape design is the perfect size for any cat to lay and
    sleep comfortably. 

 

PS: Also fits for small puppies, there's plenty room :) 

 

You can always get one more Nest for multi cats environment.

 

 

You have both pearl white and midnight black as options.

 

The idea for the KATRIS Nest started when our founder Jeff noticed that his cat Ceo was always rubbing his back on the carpet.  

 

 

Jeff realized that the cat market was lacking a product that lets cats rub their back along their own beds, while lounging and scratching all at the same time. With this new idea in mind, Jeff knew that KATRIS had the materials and the passion to produce it. At that time, KATRIS only specialized in cat furniture, but today, we are beginning to explore a new kind of product with the KATRIS Nest.  

 

 

The hardest part in developing the KATRIS Nest was finding the perfect bowl shape. We tried various shapes at first and went through various prototypes to find the right one, but the nest shape proved to be unbeatable. This perfect shape includes 100+ side walls that are corrugated to form the rounded structure. With this complex design, the KATRIS Nest became a comfortable cat lounge, as well as a unique design piece in any home.

 

 

The design is perfect for cats to rub their back on because the material has a slight give that moves as the cat rubs. After the design, the next step was perfecting the material used in the making of the KATRIS Nest. The eco-friendly corrugated material we decided to use is durable, lightweight, and breathable, ultimately making it the most obvious choice. The second material that covers the center of the KATRIS Nest is made with felt, and the soft, but slightly textured material offers a soft place for cats to lay. 

 

 

At the end of development, we were thrilled with the final product. We’ve now turned a simple idea into a multi-functional cat lounge that is now ready to be sold to the public. 

 

*You can save $10 for unassembled Nest, here is the assembling instruction. 

 

From dear @thefloppycats.

 

From dear @TheOreoCat.

 

 

The 50 awesome feline friends who first helped us to test our new product and develop it every step of the way.

story:
AmbiVision PRO is a new approach to entertainment that creates an astonishing viewing atmosphere. This technology enlarges the screen to the entire room  by projecting a glow of light from all four sides of the back of the screen onto the surrounding wall. It's especially great for enhancing a 3D experience. AmbiVision supports all screen sizes up to 120 inches diagonally and captures the screen from all HDMI devices.



Compare the difference - This shows how AmbiVision can simply extend your screen .



 

We are happy to introduce AmbiVision PRO. It is the first ambient lighting system that is able to capture a TV or monitor screen directly regardless of the video source.

It is a fresh solution invented by our second R&D team.  The end effect, AmbiVision’s modes and features are the same or better (for example the wall adaptive feature doesn’t need user configuration), but thanks to the fast fisheye camera, we can capture TV every screen with 60 FPS, analyze the screen edges and send it wirelessly to  the LED strip!

You just need to place the controller somewhere with max 5 meters distance. It will automatically pair with the LED strip and find your screen where the LED strip is placed.


It's how the AmbiVision PRO works

The LED strip is equipped with a small controller to drive the LED strip remotely. Data speed is about 1Mbps, so it can refresh the LED strip 125 per second for 250 LEDs RGBW strip (1.000.000/(32b*250)) without noticeable delay.

The controller based on 4x 1.6 GHz core  to fast capturing and analyzing a screen content.  An infrared sensor and BT&WiFi b/g/n module allow to control AmbiVision PRO by your own remote control or Smartphone App.  Additionally, we’ll add support for Philips Hue and other similar solutions as well as simple API for advanced users..

The AmbiVision PRO controller can be placed near of the TV, or somewhere else. Thanks to 174 degrees fisheye camera the device can capture the screen in almost all places in room and viewing angle isn't relevant.


Comparison between the competitors solution and AmbiVision PRO

 

How to update AmbiVision to the PRO?

We’ve created the AmbiVision PRO UPDATE for $29 exclusively for Indiegogo backers, so anyone who ordered a perk with controller included just need to choose the PRO update perk to receive the latest AmbiVision release.

If you are a new backer, you need to order AmbiVision 4K first, then order the PRO update perk. Sorry, Indiegogo does not provide multi-purchase.

Do we need more time to deliver AmbiVision PRO?


No, we are sure that we can do that as written on the timeline. We do not need to start from scratch. We have selected ready-to-buy components, so we can focus only on software development.

 

Safely spend more time with your favorite screen content! People spend about 34 hours a week watching TV and much more while working on the computer. During dark to bright scene changes, the pupil of the eye reacts by decreasing its’ diameter twice within 5 seconds for better eye protection.

When the scene changes from bright to dark, your pupil needs to increase its diameter up to 180 seconds for clearer vision in the dark. In every movie, scenes switch from dark to bright hundreds of times, resulting is that the muscles of your eyes are in constant tension which can lead to vision impairment.

Minimum luminosity level decreases contrast between wall and screen content to let your eyes relax.

With AmbiVision, the muscles of your eyes are less strained, so your eyes don't get tired while spending long periods of time in front of the screen.

 

Rock, classic, jazz? With AmbiVision, your music sounds better. Liven up your parties by making the beats match the visual effects.
 

 



Thanks to 5 years of experience, we developed a self-adjusting system to enhance your visual experience and avoid configuration setup. The device analyzes video content and adjusts capturing properties automatically.

For example, games require fast changes and are more dynamic, so AmbiVision boosts speed and increases colors. Dramas have statistically less fast changes than games, thus AmbiVision  adds more smoothing and increases minimum luminosity level to be more relaxed.

A high-performance DSP chip analyzes video stream in real time. We use this feature to recognize black bars while watching movies and automatically adjust capturing areas.



Thanks to a wall-adaptive feature, the color of the light is perfectly aligned with the screen picture, regardless of the wall color.


If you want to control all the features by yourself, you can use your own remote control and pair with AmbiVision. The device captures information exchanges between your TV and your HDMI devices (CEC technology). You can set the device up to take this information into account (for example, TV shutdown causes entering in low power mode of the AmbiVision contoller or use teletext buttons to change AmbiVision modes remotely).

 



We updated the AmbiVision 4K to use the latest SK6812 LED Strip. It provides two times faster data speed (so there’s no noticeable delay between end and beginning of LED strip) with better colors. However, AmbiVision can handle previous technologies too, so it still works with older LED strip types.

AmbiVision 4K supports RGB as well as RGB+White LED strips to provide excellent colors.


We do not use downscaling of video images, thus we can get extremely precise colors. AmbiVision does not split the image to specific number of zones and then fit the zones to the LED count. Every single LED means single parts of screen, creating a more dynamic and natural effect.
 


 


Installation for the AmbiVision is simple and takes only 6-8 minutes depending on your screen size. The self-adhesive RGB LED strip is only 10 mm wide, and is flexible and bendable. You can stick it to the 4 sides of your screen and bend it at the edges easily or use connection corners.

The adhesive material on the strip is good quality and reusable. You can remove it and transfer the strip to another monitor.

Then connect your HDMI device (HD-player, Slingbox, Nexus Player,  DVD or Bluray Player, XBox, PlayStation, Nintendo WiiU, Roku, Comcast, DirectTV, Time Warner Cable, Xfinity, Dish Network, Verizon FiOS, Satellite, Laptop, ChromeCast, Apple TV, Amazon Fire, PC, Mac, etc.)  into AmbiVision and you’re ready to enjoy it.


The LED numbers are automatically calculated when you turn on the device so you don’t need to set up the controller. However, if you want to check all features, you can still use the AmbiVision Wizard (available for MAC, Linux, Windows) and adjust the advanced settings.


The first AmbiVision had all connectivity features outside. We sold about 5k product all over the World and reached $115.000 on our crowdfunding campaign.  We were the first company which made HDMI connection possible, but now external stuff is no longer needed.

Together with a Chinese integrated circuits manufacturer, we developed a special 4K chip to replace all connectivity stuff with one piece of silicon. That’s why the device is so affordable and powerful.

Block diagram.

 

AmbiVision 4K prototyping.


This time we wanted to create “silent hero” hidden in the back of your TV in minimalistic style.


Final setup.

Compared to the older solution, now we have sped up ADC sampling frequency twice and enhanced the capturing algorithm to obtain about 1-3  miliseconds of delay. To make the light changes smoother and more eye-healthly, the LED refresh rate is about 250 per second.

Future plans are to add support to Smart TV. There is currently no way to capture the screen directly from TV. However, we like challenges. We will try to make it possible and create a SmartTV app that will capture video signal and outputs to the USB port of your TV.





The AmbiVision PRO is a powerful embedded linux solution. Thanks to the ARM Cortex A53 Quad Core processor we implemented ambient lighting system with screen tracking feature using fisheye camera. However, we noticed that it is possible to make a 4K Smart TV box as well as ambient lighting system in one box. If we reach $50k, we'll create a unique TV box. 



In order to keep the device affordable, we decided to equip them with one HDMI input. However, if we reach $150k, we’ll add an automatic HDMI switch inside the box to add additional 3 inputs.

 


Wireless connection requires high-cost laboratory testing and more developing time, which is why we decided to do not use any radio inside the box.  Amount of $250k is enough to equip the device in radio modules to be compatible with Philips Hue and other similar solutions that allow you to control the device by Smartphone app. However, CEC technology we use now provides faster remote control than Smartphone app (unlock the screen, find app and so on).



Currently we have 99% ready device and production files. We have selected electronics components and finished firmware. Thanks to the DFU mode, when we provide a new feature, you will need to allow firmware updating. Thanks to our previous projects, we have a trusted and fast manufacturer selected. They are capable of making about 1000 devices within 2 weeks (awesome, right?). Upon successful completion of the campaign, follow the updates on this page or our social media.



Our team has already created AmbiVision, which raised $115.000, and was delivered on time. We are a young, energetic, and-fast growing team of experienced R&D engineers. We would love to deliver another product that reaches people all over the world.

 

 

Robert Jaszczyk.  He created the idea of screen backlighting in 2009. The first prototype was shown during the first year of studies in Wroclaw University of Technology. Now it is time for crowd-founding to show the next release of AmbiVision to customers around the world. He is responsible for hardware and firmware design. He always tries to keep everything profoundly simple.

Robert Mielnik is the software engineer who likes to invent and test new things. He is an experienced developer of mobile, games, and other desktop applications.

Izabela Tereszkiewicz is the designer and manufacturing expert. A graduate University of Economy, she controls all the manufacturing processes from the start to the end of the product. She covers all financial topics as well as the enclosure design.

 

Jaclym Zhang. She is responsible for the whole production process in China. We have worked with her for 8 years without any failures in several different projects. She also creates   amazing enclosures projects and covers the whole enclosure manufacturing process
   
Alex Wang. Theron has 10 years experience in FPGA technology, especially in stuff related to HDMI/HDCP. Thus, he covers a whole stuff related to HDMI processing.

 

 

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments, or suggestions!

Email support, press etc. at  support@ambivision.tv

AmbiVision 4K official website:  ambivision.tv

Thanks to 174 degrees fisheye camera the device can capture the screen in almost all places in room and viewing angle isn't relevant.Comparison between the competitors solution and AmbiVision PRO How to update AmbiVision to the PRO?We’ve created the AmbiVision PRO UPDATE for $29 exclusively for Indiegogo backers, so anyone who ordered a perk with controller included just need to choose the PRO update perk to receive the latest AmbiVision release.If you are a new backer, you need to order AmbiVision 4K first, then order the PRO update perk. Sorry, Indiegogo does not provide multi-purchase.Do we need more time to deliver AmbiVision PRO?No, we are sure that we can do that as written on the timeline. We do not need to start from scratch. We have selected ready-to-buy components, so we can focus only on software development. Safely spend more time with your favorite screen content! People spend about 34 hours a week watching TV and much more while working on the computer. During dark to bright scene changes, the pupil of the eye reacts by decreasing its’ diameter twice within 5 seconds for better eye protection.When the scene changes from bright to dark, your pupil needs to increase its diameter up to 180 seconds for clearer vision in the dark. In every movie, scenes switch from dark to bright hundreds of times, resulting is that the muscles of your eyes are in constant tension which can lead to vision impairment.Minimum luminosity level decreases contrast between wall and screen content to let your eyes relax.With AmbiVision, the muscles of your eyes are less strained, so your eyes don't get tired while spending long periods of time in front of the screen. Rock, classic, jazz? With AmbiVision, your music sounds better. Liven up your parties by making the beats match the visual effects.  Thanks to 5 years of experience, we developed a self-adjusting system to enhance your visual experience and avoid configuration setup. The device analyzes video content and adjusts capturing properties automatically.For example, games require fast changes and are more dynamic, so AmbiVision boosts speed and increases colors. Dramas have statistically less fast changes than games, thus AmbiVision  adds more smoothing and increases minimum luminosity level to be more relaxed.A high-performance DSP chip analyzes video stream in real time. We use this feature to recognize black bars while watching movies and automatically adjust capturing areas.Thanks to a wall-adaptive feature, the color of the light is perfectly aligned with the screen picture, regardless of the wall color.If you want to control all the features by yourself, you can use your own remote control and pair with AmbiVision. The device captures information exchanges between your TV and your HDMI devices (CEC technology). You can set the device up to take this information into account (for example, TV shutdown causes entering in low power mode of the AmbiVision contoller or use teletext buttons to change AmbiVision modes remotely). We updated the AmbiVision 4K to use the latest SK6812 LED Strip. It provides two times faster data speed (so there’s no noticeable delay between end and beginning of LED strip) with better colors. However, AmbiVision can handle previous technologies too, so it still works with older LED strip types.AmbiVision 4K supports RGB as well as RGB+White LED strips to provide excellent colors.We do not use downscaling of video images, thus we can get extremely precise colors. AmbiVision does not split the image to specific number of zones and then fit the zones to the LED count. Every single LED means single parts of screen, creating a more dynamic and natural effect.  Installation for the AmbiVision is simple and takes only 6-8 minutes depending on your screen size. The self-adhesive RGB LED strip is only 10 mm wide, and is flexible and bendable. You can stick it to the 4 sides of your screen and bend it at the edges easily or use connection corners.The adhesive material on the strip is good quality and reusable. You can remove it and transfer the strip to another monitor.Then connect your HDMI device (HD-player, Slingbox, Nexus Player,  DVD or Bluray Player, XBox, PlayStation, Nintendo WiiU, Roku, Comcast, DirectTV, Time Warner Cable, Xfinity, Dish Network, Verizon FiOS, Satellite, Laptop, ChromeCast, Apple TV, Amazon Fire, PC, Mac, etc.)  into AmbiVision and you’re ready to enjoy it.The LED numbers are automatically calculated when you turn on the device so you don’t need to set up the controller. However, if you want to check all features, you can still use the AmbiVision Wizard (available for MAC, Linux, Windows) and adjust the advanced settings.The first AmbiVision had all connectivity features outside. We sold about 5k product all over the World and reached $115.000 on our crowdfunding campaign.  We were the first company which made HDMI connection possible, but now external stuff is no longer needed.Together with a Chinese integrated circuits manufacturer, we developed a special 4K chip to replace all connectivity stuff with one piece of silicon. That’s why the device is so affordable and powerful.Block diagram. AmbiVision 4K prototyping.This time we wanted to create “silent hero” hidden in the back of your TV in minimalistic style.Final setup.Compared to the older solution, now we have sped up ADC sampling frequency twice and enhanced the capturing algorithm to obtain about 1-3  miliseconds of delay. To make the light changes smoother and more eye-healthly, the LED refresh rate is about 250 per second.Future plans are to add support to Smart TV. There is currently no way to capture the screen directly from TV. However, we like challenges. We will try to make it possible and create a SmartTV app that will capture video signal and outputs to the USB port of your TV.The AmbiVision PRO is a powerful embedded linux solution. Thanks to the ARM Cortex A53 Quad Core processor we implemented ambient lighting system with screen tracking feature using fisheye camera. However, we noticed that it is possible to make a 4K Smart TV box as well as ambient lighting system in one box. If we reach $50k, we'll create a unique TV box. In order to keep the device affordable, we decided to equip them with one HDMI input. However, if we reach $150k, we’ll add an automatic HDMI switch inside the box to add additional 3 inputs. Wireless connection requires high-cost laboratory testing and more developing time, which is why we decided to do not use any radio inside the box.  Amount of $250k is enough to equip the device in radio modules to be compatible with Philips Hue and other similar solutions that allow you to control the device by Smartphone app. However, CEC technology we use now provides faster remote control than Smartphone app (unlock the screen, find app and so on).Currently we have 99% ready device and production files. We have selected electronics components and finished firmware. Thanks to the DFU mode, when we provide a new feature, you will need to allow firmware updating. Thanks to our previous projects, we have a trusted and fast manufacturer selected. They are capable of making about 1000 devices within 2 weeks (awesome, right?). Upon successful completion of the campaign, follow the updates on this page or our social media.Our team has already created AmbiVision, which raised $115.000, and was delivered on time. We are a young, energetic, and-fast growing team of experienced R&D engineers. We would love to deliver another product that reaches people all over the world. 


 
Robert Jaszczyk.  He created the idea of screen backlighting in 2009. The first prototype was shown during the first year of studies in Wroclaw University of Technology. Now it is time for crowd-founding to show the next release of AmbiVision to customers around the world. He is responsible for hardware and firmware design. He always tries to keep everything profoundly simple.


Robert Mielnik is the software engineer who likes to invent and test new things. He is an experienced developer of mobile, games, and other desktop applications.



Izabela Tereszkiewicz is the designer and manufacturing expert. A graduate University of Economy, she controls all the manufacturing processes from the start to the end of the product. She covers all financial topics as well as the enclosure design.


 
Jaclym Zhang. She is responsible for the whole production process in China. We have worked with her for 8 years without any failures in several different projects. She also creates   amazing enclosures projects and covers the whole enclosure manufacturing process



 
 



Alex Wang. Theron has 10 years experience in FPGA technology, especially in stuff related to HDMI/HDCP. Thus, he covers a whole stuff related to HDMI processing.
  Please let us know if you have any questions, comments, or suggestions!Email support, press etc. at  support@ambivision.tvAmbiVision 4K official website:  ambivision.tv

story:
Hello!

Thank you for your support! This online fundraiser is for those of you that would like to donate, but cannot attend the One Billion Rising fundraiser workshop on Thursday, February 20th from 3:30-7:30. 
Proceeds from donations online and classes will go to CAMBA's Rape Crisis Center, a center that provides free counseling, group therapy, and 24-hour hotline services to survivors of rape and sexual abuse.

Thank you again for your support!

story:
MEET VILFO

 

Vilfo is a smart network router where VPN is the main feature instead of an afterthought. All devices in your network are protected automatically and Vilfo's powerful hardware allows encryption speeds up to 600 Mbit/s.

Vilfo works with all VPN providers and a bunch are already pre-integrated and can be enabled with a single click. Furthermore, Vilfo supports using multiple VPN providers and VPN connections simultaneously.

We're so sure that you'll love Vilfo, that we offer returns within 14 days if you don't love it.

 

WHAT IT DOES

 

HOW IT WORKS

 

Vilfo allows you to organise devices in your network into groups. Groups enable you to decide exactly which VPN server the devices in the group should be connected to. By doing so, you get full control of each device, without installing any software on it. Regardless of why you use a VPN, Vilfo is here to make your life easier.

 

Privacy online

VPN providers limit the number of simultaneous connections you may utilize, meaning you can only protect a couple of your devices at the same time. With Vilfo, each group will count as one connection - independent of how many devices you have in that group.

Furthermore, using Vilfo's killswitch, you can be calm knowing that no traffic will escape if the VPN connection is lost.

 

Access blocked content

Do you live abroad and want to access the streaming services in your country? Or do you want to access streaming services that aren't available in your country?

No problem. Using Vilfo, you can finally watch your desired content on any device - even those that natively don't support VPN connections. Your AppleTV, Chromecast and Smart TV can finally be used so the people in your household don't need to squeeze together infront of a small laptop.

 

Ease of use

Instead of being forced to install software on all your devices — and handle any potential disconnects on all devices — you can control everything in one place.

You can literally set and forget Vilfo since it automatically protects all new devices in your network and reconnects automatically if the connection is lost.

 

A bunch of VPN Providers are pre-integrated

Over 40 OpenVPN providers have asked to be integrated into Vilfo. If you have a subscription with one of them, activation in Vilfo is a single click away.

 

 

Multiple simultaneous VPN connections

Decide exactly which devices in your network should be connected to which VPN provider and server.

 

 

Over 200 people already use Vilfo

Vilfo has been in beta since November 2017 and over 200 people have participated and helped us make Vilfo what it is today. Here's what some of them have to say.

 

 

 

"Vilfo is the first solution that makes VPN usable for an average user like me. The possibility to combine different VPN providers and the ability to use bypass rules for those sites where you don't want to use it, all in a graphical interface that is easy to understand yet powerful."

- Peder B.

 

 

 

"I've been using Vilfo for a few months now and I love the simplicity. The GUI is responsive, clean, neat and modern and it provides plenty of functionality to protect my devices and to keep my children in check with it's Parental Controls. Vilfo is stable, and informative so you get to see what devices are connected and whether they are protected or not.

You can easily sort the devices into groups to have fine grained control over them. When things do go wrong, support is never far away and always responsive and personal. I can highly recommend this as a great product!"

- Niall B.

 

 

 

"Really enjoy Vilfo. Great interface, easy to use and works great. Much more comfortable to protect all devices at home than using an app on each device."

- Tomasz L.

 

 

 

"Vilfo is clearly created by passion. It is, in my opinion, the best VPN solution today which clearly matches the definition of a great idea put together by passionate smart people. If you were curious enough to follow their journey you can see they went above and beyond in terms of hard work and quality.

Passionate people, great hardware with the Vilfo router, ingenious software with a very nice user interface & browser extension. In addition it’s amazing to see that things are kept open in terms of choice for the VPN provider you want to use. And to conclude, they have the best real human support I’ve ever encountered on the Internet up to this day."

- Alex S.

 

 

 

"I've been using Vilfo for a few months now without a single issue. It was easy to setup, easy to maintain and super easy to understand. The team behind it sends updates frequently and are very transparent with what the updates includes. Very professional bunch of people."

 

- Simon U.

 

 

 

"Vilfo is truly a next generation home router solution for the security minded.

Not only is the new Vilfo product awesome, the team behind the product provides outstanding customer service and pride in what they deliver to their customers."

 

- Lars L.

 

 

 

Get alerts for key events in your network

Receive email or push notifications for key events in your network - even if you're not there. 

 

 

Real-time bandwidth for groups and devices

Someone hogging your bandwidth? Or do you want to see what your IoT devices are doing? Vilfo provides real time bandwidth information for each device in the network, as well as aggregated bandwidth data for groups.

 

 

Vilfo vs. Ordinary router

There are multiple key differences when comparing Vilfo to ordinary routers.

 

 

Three LAN ports

Vilfo provides three LAN ports to enable you to connect access points and IoT devices via an ethernet cable.

 

 

Insights

Know what goes on in your network - in real time as well as historically. Vilfo gives you the information, whenever you want it.

 

 

Instant overview of your network

Vilfo's dashboard shows you how much traffic goes over a VPN vs. your ordinary ISP, the latency to gateways, as well as device information.

 

 

Even works if your VPN Provider isn't integrated

Vilfo has a bunch of integrated providers that are easy to use. But Vilfo works with any provider. Just upload the VPN providers OpenVPN configuration files and you're good to go.

 

 

Cooling

We've stressed Vilfo's heat tolerance to the extremes. It has multiple well-designed ventilation shafts in key areas to enable cooling which means you can mount it on a wall or let it stand on a table and it won't overheat. 

 

 

Production ready

Over 200 beta testers have helped us refine the software so far. We've already ordered the materials needed for production and assembly is taking place in March and April.

 

 

Browser extension to bypass/force VPN for websites

Empower your devices. Using the extension, each device can force VPN usage for a website or bypass the VPN for it. 

 

 

Hardware specs

Vilfo can encrypt VPN traffic up to 600 Mbit/s. The wifi can transmit data up to 867 Mbit/s and the wireless antennas are 8 dBi.

 

 

STRETCH GOALS

 

First of all a huge thank you for supporting our campaign and helping us reach the funding goal so fast! It took less than 24 hours to reach our goal, and we’re at 180% funding now.

We’re gazing forward and looking for ways to reach even more people with our campaign and how we can improve Vilfo even more for you.

 

200% funding - Bandwidth limitations (QoS)

Make sure no unnecessary devices are hogging your bandwidth. Set bandwidth limitations on devices in your network. Bandwidth limitations can be set on a group - or on individual devices.

If you set a limitation on a group, all devices in that group can simultaneously only use the bandwidth allocated. But you can also set limitations for a specific devices - which means that other devices in the same group can still use as much bandwidth as they want. 

 

250% funding - Access your home network from anywhere

Connect to your home network from wherever you are. This stretch goal includes us building VPN server functionality - allowing you or other users to access your home network from any location. 

 

300% funding - Add support for Wireguard

Vilfo currently only supports OpenVPN. When reaching 300% funding, we'll include functionality for Wireguard - enabling even faster speeds. Wireguard is an up-and-coming VPN protocol, known for it's efficiency, security and speed.  

 

400% funding - Deep packet inspection

With deep packet inspection, you can get even better insights into your network. See how much bandwidth is consumed for a variety of different media - as well as what each device in your network is actually up to.

 

Videos

 

By organizing devices into groups you get full control of how each device should be protected by a VPN connection or not.

 

 

Ensure a lag-free gaming experience even though your devices are connected to a VPN server. Vilfo allows you to bypass the VPN connection for specific IP addresses or ports, allowing you to still be connected to your VPN server while gaming.

 

 

Watch geo-restricted content on any device in your network, even those that natively don't support VPN connections. By using Vilfo, you can give your AppleTV an IP address in the US to access Netflix, your iPad an IP address in England to access BBC iPlayer, and your TV an IP address in Norway.

All at the same time.

 

 

Timeline

We've been working on Vilfo for a long time. Here's what has happened so far.

 

 

 

NOW SHIPPING

We're happy to say that we're now available to ship new orders within 1-2 business days. 

 

 

 

The Vilfo Team

We're a geographically distributed team of privacy enthusiasts whom have poured our soul into developing Vilfo. 

 

 

 

FAQ

 

1. When is the expected delivery?

According to our current production schedule we believe the first 500 pre-orders will be delivered in May.

2. Where can I learn even more about Vilfo?

To learn more about Vilfo, check out vilfo.com. Documentation is available here and the API reference can be viewed here.

3. Which wireless capabilities does Vilfo offer?

Vilfo supports 802.11ac and can transmit up to 867 Mbit/s. The wireless network can either be on 2.4 Ghz or 5 Ghz, but not simultaneously. The antennas are 8 dBi.

4. Is it a one-time purchase or is a subscription necessary?

It's a one-time purchase. You will however need a subscription with an OpenVPN provider.

5. Which VPN protocols does Vilfo support?

Currently, we've only added support for OpenVPN. Depending on feature requests well make sure to add additional VPN protocols going forward, such as Wireguard & PPTP.

6. Can I replace my modem with Vilfo?

Vilfo requires an ethernet cable (RJ45) for the WAN uplink. If you have a coaxial cable as feed in your home, you will need to use your modem first. Otherwise, you should be able to replace the modem with Vilfo.

7. Where will Vilfo ship?

We offer worldwide shipping. We'll make sure to include the correct power adapters to your shipment.

8. Can I use additional routers or Mesh networks with Vilfo?

Yes! It's however important that Vilfo handles DHCP for all devices. Configure the other routers or mesh devices to work as access points.

9. What is the Indiegogo campaign close date?

The deadline to support our campaign is March 30th, 2018.

10. How much do you charge for shipping?

Shipping costs $20. Customs charges may apply depending on destination, Vilfo is shipped from Sweden.

11. What tech support is available?

We offer support via e-mail and live chat. We can assist via Teamviewer. We'll offer support plans in the future for customization and guidance.

12. Which warranty does Vilfo have?

We offer a 1 year warranty.

13. How do I get software updates?

Vilfo automatically checks for updates every night. We'll also send e-mail notifications when new updates are released.

14. What are the Risks & Challenges associated with this project?

Beta users were onboarded on November 23, 2017 and have been a big role during the development. Over 200 beta testers are using Vilfo every day. The software is very polished and has few bugs.

The steel moulds have been ordered and the motherboard has been decided. All related components have been decided as well.

We mainly see one specific challenge as we've gotten very far in the process. And that is:

1) We rely on 3rd party suppliers for specific components. We need to ensure all suppliers stick to the decided schedule to prevent any shipping delays.

15. Why is flexible funding chosen instead of fixed?

We have received over 100 pre-orders via our own channels before launching on Indiegogo. That, together with our own saved money covers the initial costs for the first order of units. Flexible funding enables us to still accept the orders via Indiegogo if the goal fails, and for people to not have to place a new order via our website then.

16. Is there an app for Vilfo?

Vilfo currently does not have an app. Functionality is available via the browser interface which is built to work on mobile phones as well.

17. Does Vilfo come in different colors?

Vilfo is currently only available in white.

18. Does Vilfo support VLANs?

Not right now. It's on our roadmap and should be finished before July.

19. Can Vilfo run a VPN server in order to allow "phoning home"?

Integrating a VPN server in Vilfo is a stretch goal. If we receive 200% funding, we'll make sure to include it.

20. Love it - or return it 

We're confident that you'll love Vilfo. If you don't, contact us within 14 days after receiving Vilfo and we'll refund you entirely. You will however need to pay for the return shipping.

Currently, we've only added support for OpenVPN. Depending on feature requests well make sure to add additional VPN protocols going forward, such as Wireguard & PPTP.
6. Can I replace my modem with Vilfo?
Vilfo requires an ethernet cable (RJ45) for the WAN uplink. If you have a coaxial cable as feed in your home, you will need to use your modem first. Otherwise, you should be able to replace the modem with Vilfo.
7. Where will Vilfo ship?
We offer worldwide shipping. We'll make sure to include the correct power adapters to your shipment.
8. Can I use additional routers or Mesh networks with Vilfo?
Yes! It's however important that Vilfo handles DHCP for all devices. Configure the other routers or mesh devices to work as access points.
9. What is the Indiegogo campaign close date?
The deadline to support our campaign is March 30th, 2018.
10. How much do you charge for shipping?
Shipping costs $20. Customs charges may apply depending on destination, Vilfo is shipped from Sweden.
11. What tech support is available?
We offer support via e-mail and live chat. We can assist via Teamviewer. We'll offer support plans in the future for customization and guidance.
12. Which warranty does Vilfo have?
We offer a 1 year warranty.
13. How do I get software updates?
Vilfo automatically checks for updates every night. We'll also send e-mail notifications when new updates are released.
14. What are the Risks & Challenges associated with this project?
Beta users were onboarded on November 23, 2017 and have been a big role during the development. Over 200 beta testers are using Vilfo every day. The software is very polished and has few bugs.
The steel moulds have been ordered and the motherboard has been decided. All related components have been decided as well.
We mainly see one specific challenge as we've gotten very far in the process. And that is:
1) We rely on 3rd party suppliers for specific components. We need to ensure all suppliers stick to the decided schedule to prevent any shipping delays.
15. Why is flexible funding chosen instead of fixed?
We have received over 100 pre-orders via our own channels before launching on Indiegogo. That, together with our own saved money covers the initial costs for the first order of units. Flexible funding enables us to still accept the orders via Indiegogo if the goal fails, and for people to not have to place a new order via our website then.
16. Is there an app for Vilfo?
Vilfo currently does not have an app. Functionality is available via the browser interface which is built to work on mobile phones as well.
17. Does Vilfo come in different colors?
Vilfo is currently only available in white.
18. Does Vilfo support VLANs?
Not right now. It's on our roadmap and should be finished before July.
19. Can Vilfo run a VPN server in order to allow "phoning home"?
Integrating a VPN server in Vilfo is a stretch goal. If we receive 200% funding, we'll make sure to include it.
20. Love it - or return it 
We're confident that you'll love Vilfo. If you don't, contact us within 14 days after receiving Vilfo and we'll refund you entirely. You will however need to pay for the return shipping.

story:
Update: 11/24

After a full redesign of the Coldwave with lots of testing along the way to make sure it won't let you down, we are happy to announce that your Coldwaves have shipped! A big thanks to all our supporters for their patience. Happy Thanksgiving!!

 

 

Cool drinks down quicker than you can heat them up!

The Coldwave is the quickest and easiest way to chill any temperature beverage to under 38F (3C) in about a minute, while having no impact on the flavor or dilution. Now you have the ability to make great tasting ice coffee (using any blend), ice tea, wine, martinis and other cold beverages at home, without sacrificing time and taste.

 

 

Features:

  • Steaming hot to ice cold in about a minute
  • Room temp. to ice cold in about 30 seconds
  • 12 oz. fluid capacity
  • Preserves freshly brewed flavor
  • No dilution, consistent taste
  • Designed to fit your single cup coffee maker
  • Cools 2 hot beverages or 6 at room temperature before refreezing
  • Stores in freezer, refreezes quickly
  • BPA-Free
  • 100% safe, contains purified water
  • Manufactured in the U.S.A.
  • Patent pending

 

Size:

  • Smaller than a quart of ice cream
  • Diameter:        4.75 in (120 mm)
  • Height:           5.3 in (134.6 mm)
  • Capacity:        12 oz. (355 ml) 
  • Empty weight: 1.5 lbs. (0.68 kgs)

  

Pays for itself many times over:

A regular coffee drinker could save $1000 / year if they switched from retail coffee to the Coldwave today. The average cup of iced coffee at retail is over $2.50, while the cost of making it at home is about 50 cents, providing a savings of $2.00 per cup. Priced at retail for $40, the payback time is 20 days.


Simple and easy to use:

Just pour in, wait about a minute, and pour out. Has the cooling capacity to chill two 16oz cups of hot coffee or 3 bottles of wine. 

  

How Does it Work?

The Coldwave's revolutionary design cools beverages fast by spreading the hot beverage into a thin layer over a large area of ice. By increasing surface area and decreasing the thickness of the beverage layer, cooling time is dramatically reduced. Dilution is avoided by sealing ice in channels. 

 

How does the Coldwave compare?

Cooling with ice dilutes the beverage and changes its flavor.

 

Perks:

$1 - Backer: Every bit of funding helps! By being a Backer you're not just helping us make the Coldwave a reality you'll also be involved in our entrepreneurial journey with regular updates and an inside look at our progress.

$20 - Coldwave T-shirt: You've got our back, so we've got yours.  Get everything a Backer gets plus an awesome Coldwave T-shirt.  Made from high quality 100% cotton.

$35 - Early Adopter (Limited Quantity): One "Investor Series" Coldwave with Free Shipping anywhere in the continental US! (Add $10 for international shipments.) You'll be one of the first to have your very own Coldwave, plus you get subscribed to all of our Updates! Quantity of this perk is limited to 200, so get it while it lasts!

$55 - Coldwave + Lookin' Good: One "Investor Series" Coldwave + T-shirt + Updates. Free shipping anywhere in the continental US. Add $10 for international shipments.

 

$150 - 4 Pack: Four "Investor Series" Coldwave + 1 T-Shirt + Updates. Free shipping anywhere in the continental US. Add $10 for international shipments.

 

$300 - 10 Pack: For those who really love us (mom? dad?), this perk includes: 10 Coldwaves + Updates. Buy additional Coldwaves for $30 each. Free shipping anywhere in the continental US. Add $20 for international shipments.

 

 

Use of funds:

Over the past 2 years we have been designing, prototyping, testing, and optimizing the Coldwave to get it to where it is today. We have lined up manufacturers in the US to help us mass produce Coldwaves and begin saving the world from over-priced iced coffee.  Crowdfunding is an important step to help us pay for the high-precision tooling (expensive) required to manufacture the Coldwave and our initial purchase order costs to bring the Coldwave to market.  It also reduces financing requirements which will keep our overhead costs down and will help keep manufacturing of the Coldwave in the USA.

Please help us achieve this goal by ordering one or more Coldwaves today and sharing our product with your friends, family, and drinking buddies!  Use the Indiegogo share tools, above, to spread the word. 

 

Schedule*:

*Expected. (We need your help to make it happen! Support us now!)

 

About Us

The creation of IceColdNow (parent company of the Coldwave) was inspired by Dave Dussault, a coffee loving engineer with a background in heat transfer, who was tired of inconsistent, diluted, ice coffee that took a long time to make so he decided to do something about it. He developed the Coldwave through a number of design iterations and prototypes, and filed a patent. Finally, he assembled a team to assure the success of the Coldwave by IceColdNow.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Safety

▶ Is the plastic BPA free?

Yes, the plastic we use is BPA free and is the same kind that's found in ice cube trays and baby's bottle.

▶ What liquid is sealed inside the Coldwave?

We seal 100% safe purified water inside the Coldwave. 

General

▶ Is it easy to clean?

Yes, the Coldwave can be easily separated into two components and rinsed out with water. We recommend washing it by hand / rinsing out right after use, to save yourself the time of refreezing the Coldwave.

▶ Will my beverage freeze if I forget to pour out my beverage after the recommended cooling time?

No, it’ll just be really really cold. You’re welcome.

▶ Can the starting temperature of the beverage be too hot?

Nope, bring it on.

▶ How will I know when my beverage is cold?

Wait at least 90 seconds and it will be cold.

▶ Do I have to change out the water sealed inside the Coldwave?

Nope, just let it do its thing.

▶ Can I drink straight from the Coldwave?

Sure, go for it, but it’s probably more comfortable to drink out of the appropriate cup, glass, or mug for your beverage.

▶ Does it have to be stored upright?

Nope, store it any way you want but you'll get better cooling results if its stored upright.

▶ Can I use the Coldwave to cool beer?

Yes! Just take the edge off the Coldwave first by cooling 16 oz. of cold/warm water for about 10 seconds. 

▶ How many times can I use the Coldwave before it needs to be refrozen?

It all depends on how hot your bevereage is so we've made the following guidelines:
  • Hot beverage: 2 x 16 oz.
  • Room temp. beverage:  6 x 16 oz.

▶ How long can I leave my Coldwave out before it doesn’t work anymore?

The Coldwave's cooling ability diminishes with time. After 2 hours of sitting out at room temperature it will only cool 1 (16oz.) coffee or 6 glasses (6 oz. per glass) of wine. After 4 hours of being left out the Coldwave will no longer cool beverages.

 

 

If you have any questions or comments, please drop us a line in the comments section or contact us through our website:  www.icecoldnow.com

story:
At NEMUIX, we set out to make sure that every reader is able to read anywhere and at anytime with ease and comfort without the harmful blue-rays most light source emits. 

That's where NEMUIX comes in, a lightweight and portable light to compliment your night.

 

We use special low blue-light emitting LED units for NEMUIX. It minimizes the quantity of High Bio wavelength emitted by artificial light and digital devices, allowing you to read at ease without tripping your melatonin shut-off switch.

 

NEMUIX is designed to be powered by a single lithium coin battery which can last for a minimum of 8 hours continuously. Designed as an open circuit, NEMUIX does not use energy when used as a bookmark. Only when you place it in a 'night-stand' position does it start.

 

 

NEMUIX is made from reinforced plastic film which allows it to achieve the "night-stand" position and back to its "bookmark" position perfectly without any flex nor stress markings.

 

Use NEMUIX at anywhere as you see fit for your night activity

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

This is our Generation 2 of NEMUIX. Our manufacturers are ready to go once the campaign is funded.

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.

story:
FuzeDrive Smart NVMe SSD is ideal for replacing your boot drive, so you can enjoy maximum performance, capacity and endurance using Artificial Intelligence.

FuzeDrive SSD solves the capacity + performance problem with AI that utilizes SLC and QLC—2 SSDs in one.

By utilizing SLC for true primary storage (not as a Cache), you take advantage of premium NAND technology and QLC capacity to store large volumes of games and applications.

Yes, we’re certain.

FuzeDrive SSD combines SLC and QLC on a single physical board, but unlike any other consumer-grade SSD, the SLC is actually used as permanent primary storage, which has 20x the endurance of QLC.

Your active and write intensive data is move to the SLC, where you need it most.

For data drives, add another SSD or even a 18TB HDD, for example, to expand your storage to 32TB or higher without having to reinstall anything. 

FuzeDrive’s AI will manage everything from the ‘hot’ data in the SLC, ‘warm’ data in the QLC and ‘cold’ data on the hard drive—all without reducing its speed or power!

Every FuzeDrive SSD ships with FuzionX expansion software, so expanding your build is painless!

We all know QLC drives wear out fast, but not this one.

FuzeDrive Gold has 3,600 TBW and a 5-year warranty. It’s built to withstand video editing, 3D-rendering tasks and high-performance computing.

Artificial Intelligence maintains performance and endurance over the life of the product by keeping writes off the QLC, rather than degrading like other SSDs do after prolonged use.

Never worry about SSD “sudden death” again.

FuzeDrive delivers this unrivaled gaming experience with faster booting, shorter game load times and seamless shifting from one game to another using Artificial Intelligence (AI) software.

AI learns how you use your system and automatically optimizes the SSD by moving your frequently accessed data to 128GB of SLC. It uses the high capacity QLC to store infrequently accessed data (like all those Steam Summer Sale games you bought and never played).

FuzeDrive SSD stays cool under pressure and maintains optimal operating temperatures using a 3M Heat Dissipating label so your performance never suffers (at least not from lack of cooling).

Spice up your desktop with an optional heatsink that has an LED light. If you have a clear case on your system, even better!

 

FuzeDrive was created with heavy users and hardcore gamers in mind. Its low latency at low-queue depths gives users instantaneous response. Plus, it’s an easy integration on any PC or notebook and it can handle the biggest, baddest files that cause most heavy users fear when they try to launch.

128GB of SLC and 3,470 MB/s read and 3,000 MB/s write give you slick video/sequential performance while 3,600 TBW delivers solid reliability. Bandwidth is nice, but performance really comes down to latency and FuzeDrive SSD delivers like no other drive.

There’s no other NVMe SSD on the market that has this perfect balance of performance, endurance and price.

A pure SLC drive of this capacity could cost upwards of $2,000 but the QLC enables affordable high capacity and SLC enables uncompromised performance and drive endurance. The only negative? You can’t blame lag every time you lose now!

FuzeDrive SSD was created with the goal of being a more reliable SSD that can survive everyday use, while taking advantage of modern, higher-density SSD chip technology. FuzeDrive’s breakthrough technology enables a profound change in how SSDs work, ditching drive-managed SLC caching in favor of host-managed tiered storage.

FuzeDrive is the first Smart NVMe SSD that enables SLC performance along with the large capacity demanded by gamers at an affordable price.

 

1. Turn off your computer and remove case

2. Insert FuzeDrive SSD into an available M.2 slot and power up your PC/notebook

3. A new disk drive appears in your PC which you can either install a new operating system to or start using as a new, fast and reliable storage device for games, data libraries, etc.

4. Install the AI software or let Windows do it for you via Microsoft update

*Want to install as a boot drive to convert your existing system over to FuzeDrive? Instructions and extra migration software are included!

We are Storage Rebels that don’t settle for the Status Quo.  Our mission is to solve key technological challenges around PC storage using our patented Artificial Intelligent algorithms that overcome the physical challenges associated with an increase in capacity demands while still providing optimal performance.  We want to enable consumers with affordable no compromise products that dramatically improve the end user experience.
