story:
We’ve studied the science of habits. It turns out, you don’t need to work on a hundred different things to be healthy. You just need to start with one habit, a keystone habit! Drinking  fresh juice is the easiest form of healthy living.

The problem with juicing is that it’s way too much work!!! Drinking is easy, but the cleaning that comes after is a nightmare!! This is why we created JUISIR, the innovative juicing machine that does not require any cleaning.

In order to make JUISIR cheaper to the mass market and make healthy living accessible to everyone, please back us!!! Join the juicer revolution and be one of JUISIR’s first users.

Check out what the media are saying on social media!

  • The Machine

JUISIR is an innovative cold press juicer that extracts juice from fresh fruit and vegetables through a press with about eight-tons of force (approximately equal to the size of two adult elephants) in only 90 seconds. It’s powerful, fast, and effortless—with no cleaning required.

  • The Juicing bag

JUISIR offers two types of juicing bags - single use or multiple use,which are made from either biodegradable or recyclable materials. You can simply recycle or reuse the juicing bag - it's entirely up to you. DIY your juice packs and vary your juice recipes to different preferences and health needs.

Chop fruit and vegetables into pieces roughly the size of a dollar coin for maximum yield. Put about 300g-350g (0.7lb-0.8lb) raw products per bag, you can get approximate 200-250ml (6.8oz-8.5oz) juice. 

  • The Juice

JUISIR exerts about 8 tons of force so that the fruit is squashed to a paper-like thinness and virtually every drop of nutritious juice is captured in the glass.

  • The Machine

How does JUISIR produce approximately 8 tons of force?

Our engineers have ingeniously utilized the patent-pending leverage principle to create torsion and hence produce a juicer that can exert up to 8 tons of force.

JUISIR works with our uniquely designed juicing bags which completely separate fruit and vegetables from the machine, meaning JUISIR itself never needs to be cleaned.

  • The Juicing Bag

 How do I buy the juicing bags after the Indiegogo campaign?

You will be able to find JUISIR on Amazon soon and we offer worldwide shipping at low cost. The cost-per-use can keep as low as 0.2 USD. In order to reduce the delivery cost and make juicing bags cheaper, we are looking for qualified local manufacturers of our juicing bags from all over the world.

  • The Machine

What are cold press juicers?

Unlike traditional juicers such as centrifugal juicers, cold press juicers press fruit and vegetables using large amounts of force to produce a higher juice yield than traditional juices. The cold-pressing technique allows juice drinkers to enjoy maximum nutrition (especially maintain more than 50% enzymes in the cold-pressed juice) from fruits and vegetables as there is no heat produced during the juicing process.

Comparing JUISIR with other types of juicers

Further Comparing JUISIR with other cold press juicers 

  • The Juice

Why juice?

Pure fresh fruit and vegetable juice contains vital vitamins, minerals and nutrients. It is the easiest and most effective way to supplement nutrients and boost your energy.

Why Cold-Pressed juice?

There are minimal air contact and heat produced during the cold press juice process which helps reduce the oxidation and decomposition of nutrients. This, therefore, allows juice drinkers to enjoy maximum nutrition (especially maintain more than 50% enzymes in the cold-pressed juice) from fruit and vegetables. Cold-pressed juice also delivers a better taste and texture as there is no pulpy residues or bubbles left.

Mystery of fiber

Fiber comes in two varieties, both are beneficial to health:

Soluble fiber, which dissolves in water, can help lower glucose levels as well as help lower blood cholesterol.

Insoluble fiber, which does not dissolve in water, can help food move through your digestive system, promoting regularity and helping prevent constipation. There are sufficient soluble fibers in the fresh juice. If you are seeking to supplement nutrition for optimum health and boost your energy, drinking juice is the easiest and best solution.

Balanced Diet

Include more vegetables and low sugar fruits in your juice recipes for optimal health. Also, pay attention to the daily intake. Choose MyPlate - the official dietary guideline in the USA, recommends an adult male has maximum 16 ounces (about 450ml) fresh juice every day.

Recommended Juice Recipe

  • Sustainability

Save Water

Do you know how many liters of water is used each time you clean a juicer? It accounts for around 200 liters (52.83 US gallons) of water for a 20-minute cleaning! Here at JUISIR, as the machine requires no cleaning after each use, you are not only saving yourself time and effort but you’re also helping to save water and look after the environment.

Eco-friendly materials

The inner bags of both single-use and multiple-use juicing bags are made from 100% natural cotton, which are biodegradable and renewable. Cotton, especially 100% cotton can biodegrade within as little as a week to average 5 months. The outside sections of the bags are recyclable too. We are finding professional bodies for recovery of the outer bags worldwide.

  • Patents

As the first tabletop cold press juicer that requires no cleaning and provides juicing bags that allows you to DIY juice packs, JUISIR has several patents pending.

 

  •  Video 1: Juisir with Pomegranate

Weight: 300g Juice: 236g Juice yield: 79%

 

 

Please wait, we have more videos coming soon...

When this campaign is finished, we will send out a Reward Survey by email to ask for your mailing address and the JUISIR color you love. Based on the voting result, all backers might receive a big surprise in the future. Once you receive the email from us, you will have a few days to order and adjust the type. For those who have already pledged juicing bags sets, we have made notes for you and will double check with you through Reward Survey, so no worry for that.

 

Stretch Goals

 

We brought JUISIR to attend CES 2017 in Las Vegas and successfully released JUISIR to the public.

Let's see what the global buyers are saying in CES 2017

Our team comes from Singapore, Hong Kong and Mainland China. Our company was founded in 2012 and based in Shanghai, and has already successfully launched our first healthy drink product in the Chinese market and secured investment from well-known VC firms. Using our wealth of experience, excellent reputation and passion for delivering health drinks in the pursuit of healthy living, JUISIR was born and now we are ready to bring JUISIR to the world.

 

International shipping is included in the price, so you do not need to pay extra fees for shipping and delivery.

JUISIR developed strategic partnership with OPTIMUM and FROOTHIE.

Optimum, the leading brand of juicing machines globally. With JUISIR, Optimum will take its obsession for cold press juicing and health products to a completely new level.

Froothie International, Optimum’s global partner and a leading brand in the sale of health and wellness products will be distributing and servicing two years warranty for JUISIR customers in Europe (excluding Russia), UK, Australia, New Zealand, United States and Latin America.

We are looking for partners in the rest of regions and promise to provide at least one year warranty. We are devoting to extend our warranty in the near future.

We are aiming to build a global network of distributors, fresh fruit and vegetable suppliers, manufacturers of juicing bags, professional bodies for recycling of plastics and silicon products and technical support teams to provide better service and make JUISIR accessible to everyone.

If you are interested in JUISIR and would like to become our partner, Please email us (contact@juisir.com) for further information.

  •  How to DIY my juice pack by using the juicing bag?

It is super easy. Choose either single-use or multiple-use juicing bags, simply chop fruits and vegetables according to your recipe, and put them into the juicing bag, if you want to make juice immediately, then directly place the juicing bag into the machine, but if you want to use it later, then use food sealed clips to seal the juicing bag and store it in the fridge.

  • Can I use other plastics bags to replace the juicing bags?

As JUISIR will produce a force of about 8 tons, our juicing bag is specially designed to withstand such large pressure. Other plastics bags that you can find in stores would burst if you use them with JUISIR.

  • How to use the multiple-use juicing bags?

The multiple-use bags are split into two individual parts - the silicone outer bag and the 100% cotton filter. Place the cotton filter into the silicone outer bag and then follow the usual procedures. After juicing, take out the used cotton filter and discard it. The outer bag? Simply rinse it and you’re good to go again. All in all, there is no cleaning required for the machine.

  • How many times can the silicone outer bags be used before it needs replacing?

A few hundred times under normal use.

  • Can I buy silicone outer bags and cotton filters separately? How much do they cost respectively?

Of course, you can, both silicone outer bags and cotton filters would be available on Amazon soon. The recommended retail price for silicone outer bags is around 29 USD each and cotton filters will cost as much as 0.2 USD each.

  • As insoluble fiber is also important, how to utilize the pulpy residues?

Fruit and vegetables residues are pressed to a paper-thinness. You can directly add them into your baking (work perfectly with biscuits) and help to increase your daily insoluble fiber intake. OR reuse them as organic fertilizer.

  • When can I receive JUISIR after I placed the order?

For those who are super early birds or early birds, the original silver JUISIR will be delivered to you in May and June 2017 respectively. Once our stretch goals are reached, new colors will be introduced. If you want to have JUISIR in new colors, all backers need to wait until July 2017, while all JUISIR would be ready and sent out during that time. You will receive email from us to confirm the color of JUISIR.

If you are interested in JUISIR and want to report and introduce JUISIR to others, feel free to download JUISIR’s media pack from GOOGLE DRIVE. The media pack including the introduction of JUISIR, logos, pictures and videos. If you want more, please contact us at any time: media@juisir.com Here is the link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BwnVwggkke34Zk5JdzNTZ0t1Mzg
story_txt:
How many new diets have you started but never stuck to? How many times have you declared you will eat healthier but still find yourself snacking on those cookies late at night? Truth is, most of us struggle to follow through on what we know is good for us. So, we asked ourselves, ‘Why are healthy habits so hard to form?’We’ve studied the science of habits. It turns out, you don’t need to work on a hundred different things to be healthy. You just need to start with one habit, a keystone habit! Drinking  fresh juice is the easiest form of healthy living. The problem with juicing is that it’s way too much work!!! Drinking is easy, but the cleaning that comes after is a nightmare!! This is why we created JUISIR, the innovative juicing machine that does not require any cleaning. In order to make JUISIR cheaper to the mass market and make healthy living accessible to everyone, please back us!!! Join the juicer revolution and be one of JUISIR’s first users.

 Check out what the media are saying on social media! 
 The Machine JUISIR is an innovative cold press juicer that extracts juice from fresh fruit and vegetables through a press with about eight-tons of force (approximately equal to the size of two adult elephants) in only 90 seconds. It’s powerful, fast, and effortless—with no cleaning required.
 The Juicing bag JUISIR offers two types of juicing bags - single use or multiple use,which are made from either biodegradable or recyclable materials. You can simply recycle or reuse the juicing bag - it's entirely up to you. DIY your juice packs and vary your juice recipes to different preferences and health needs.Chop fruit and vegetables into pieces roughly the size of a dollar coin for maximum yield. Put about 300g-350g (0.7lb-0.8lb) raw products per bag, you can get approximate 200-250ml (6.8oz-8.5oz) juice. The Juice JUISIR exerts about 8 tons of force so that the fruit is squashed to a paper-like thinness and virtually every drop of nutritious juice is captured in the glass. The Machine How does JUISIR produce approximately 8 tons of force?Our engineers have ingeniously utilized the patent-pending leverage principle to create torsion and hence produce a juicer that can exert up to 8 tons of force.Why does JUISIR require no cleaning? JUISIR works with our uniquely designed juicing bags which completely separate fruit and vegetables from the machine, meaning JUISIR itself never needs to be cleaned.The Juicing Bag How do I buy the juicing bags after the Indiegogo campaign? Potential DelaysAs with any physical product, there are challenges involved in getting it perfect and there is always the possibility of delays (sometimes outside of anyone's control). As part of JUISIRS efforts to avoid delays and ensure products are perfect for our supporters and customers, we work closely with our technical team, carefully select our partners and conservatively set time frames. Quality control remains a major focus for us. With our partners, we are implementing systems to ensure no product issues and perfect our machine before JUISIR makes its way into your hands.

story:
MIRAVAC robotic vacuum cleaners come in two models: Loop (designed for all surfaces with a mopping option) and Swerve (designed for all surfaces and optimal thick carpet cleaning). The clean design, attractive price point, and varying features are there to suit your needs. 

 

 

 

 

You can choose your desired cleaning pattern that most suits your space, OR you can put the robot on AUTO cleaning mode and let it do the job for you.

 

 

 

The Dust Sensor feature detects the dirtiest parts of the floor and guides the robot to spend more time cleaning those parts. Perfect for pet owners who need to clean their space from pet hair on a daily basis.

 

 

 

With a pressure of 1800 Pa, the HyperClean suction will securely and rigorously collect dust and tiny particles to keep floors immaculately clean. The Turbo Suction mode of MIRAVAC robots are the most powerful in their class. 

 

 

 

The Smart Adaptive Detection System adequately equips MIRAVAC robots for automated cleaning and charging for any home or office floors: hardwood, carpet or tile. With the height of 3.15”, MIRAVAC robots can also clean under your objects and furniture.

 

 

 

With sensors that detect cliffs, MIRAVAC robots are able to avoid cliffs and unexpected drops.

 

 

 

LOOP is your floor’s new best friend. With the smart adaptive system for any environment, great suction power from 800 Pa to 1800 Pa, and contour following nozzle to ensure accurate cleaning results, LOOP is the most affordable advanced robotic vacuum for thin carpet and hard floors on the market.

 

  1. Dual rotating brushes vigorously sweep dirt and dust into the vacuum’s patch. 
  2. The debris are then securely trapped using its dynamic vacuum motor. 
  3. The click-on mopping pad collects even the finest dust particles to leave floors spotless.

 

 

 

 

LOOP comes with Dry Mop Pads to be attached to the robot for shiny cleaning performance.

 

 

 

 

The sleek design of the SWERVE model makes a great looking cleaning companion at your home or office. 

 

 

SWERVE comes with large wheels and a multi-surface roller brush that will pick up any large debris on the floor. This helps with the optimal deep cleaning of thick carpets and rugs. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Contains the vacuum within the desired space blocked by an invisible wall, available only for the SWERVE model. 

 

 

 

Easily schedule cleaning time for 30, 45, or 60 minutes with the button on the device or through the remote control. 

 

 

You can also set a cleaning time with the 24H button on the docking station. Simply push the 24H button at a certain time of day and the robot will go out and start cleaning at that set time every day.

 

 

 

Control your Loop OR Swerve from a distance – Start and stop, change cleaning patterns, times, and types with a click of a button. OR guide your vacuum along a particular path with manual directional controls. You can also easily direct it back to the charging station with one click. 

 

 

 

With the docking button, the robot can go back to its charging station to recharge the battery on its own.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We appreciate the support of the crowdfunding community. To give a bit more background on the people behind this project, Adam and David are the co-founders of MIRAVAC and have been friends since childhood. Their paths crossed several times before they realized they need to make something out of it. Since one lives domestically and the other internationally, they decided to partner on this business when presented with this unique opportunity. The rest is history.

 

 

 

 

The Miravac team believes Indiegogo is the right platform to launch and bring our idea to life because this is where innovative ideas are welcomed and where the status quo is challenged. Although this involves risks, we believe these risks are worth it and we believe that our backers will support Miravac as an affordable and innovative technology that makes at-home robots more accessible to everyone. We understand that dirty floors will probably affect most people’s lives at some point. Because of this, we believe the Loop and Swerve robots by Miravac are useful to everyone. 
To offset the risks and challenges involved with creating Miravac, we developed and tested 2 generations of prototypes using our experienced robotics team and quality product materials. We also spent considerable time measuring the many scenarios and preferences of our users to ensure that the product will address their needs. We also have secured patents and manufacturing relationships to make sure that we deliver Loop and Swerve to backers as quickly as possible. 
Our goal is to minimize the chances of unforeseen production issues that sometimes can happen. Our brand stands for quality - a promise from our founders to each and every customer who supports us and our mission to make stress-free home cleaning faster, more realistic, and more affordable for all.

story:
What if you could eliminate drain clogs forever?..

Say hello to...
Drain Strain. 

The Revolutionary NO-CLOG drain stopper.



Why was Drain Strain™ invented?

My wife and daughter have long hair and ended up clogging our bathroom sinks with their hair. I am plumbing challenged so I had to hire a plumber to unclog it. After paying him $151, my wife asked what we could do to prevent the clogs from happening again. He thought for a second and said “I don’t know”.  

I searched everywhere to find a solution. Everything I found required the removal of the stopper to replace with a basket so the stopper functionality was gone AND it was ugly. My wife wouldn’t let me put those solutions in our sinks.  So I thought to myself “THERE’S GOT TO BE A BETTER WAY”.

And so began the quest to create the I-pod of Drain Stoppers.

Introducing:


What is Drain Strain™?

It is a revolutionary drain stopper that prevents clogs in your drain by catching hair and other foreign objects before they get to the p-trap. Once the basket is full, simply “Turn, lift and click” and you’re done.



Will it work in my sink?

It will work in most sinks and drain sizes. It’s easy to retrofit into your existing sink. Just pull out your existing stopper and replace with the Drain Strain Drain Stopper™ and let the patented system start working.


Environmentally Friendly

Today there is over $200 Million in annual drain cleaner sales going down the drain and into our environment. We will use 100% recycled plastics to make our basket and with your help we can create a bio-degradable basket that will even further protect our environment.


The Problem - Bathroom Sinks Today.



  • Exploded View


  •  Unique Features

  • Hotel and Landlord Benefits


HELP US PREVENT CLOGS AND CRACK!

Please help us raise funds to get to market! We have a functioning prototype. 

With your backing we can get final engineering, pay for tooling costs and get our initial production run to our early backers to get your feedback. Once we get feedback from our early backers, we can make adjustments and get final production out to our other backers.

The Drain Strain Campaign

This is where we need your support. If you back Drain Strain, it will tremendously help with all the costs and to raise money for the final design and engineering, tooling costs, testing, and initial production run. 

The Campaign is designed to raise money, and gage demand. If people support  Drain Stain, it would validate the need and serve as proof of concept.
 


Featured T-Shirt:


Rewards/Pricing:

For any questions, feel free to email us at info@disruptbydesign.com

Simply "turn, lift, click" and you're done!

Back to top.

Copyright 2014 © Disrupt by Design

This is where we need your support. If you back Drain Strain, it will tremendously help with all the costs and to raise money for the final design and engineering, tooling costs, testing, and initial production run. 
The Campaign is designed to raise money, and gage demand. If people support  Drain Stain, it would validate the need and serve as proof of concept. 

Featured T-Shirt:




Rewards/Pricing:

For any questions, feel free to email us at info@disruptbydesign.com

Simply "turn, lift, click" and you're done!

Back to top.
Copyright 2014 © Disrupt by Design

story:
We need gift cards that jump up and say, "Hello!"

As a child I collected pop-up books. In high school, I became fascinated by origami. In college, I was inspired by Escher and designed complex geometric solids that could be cut and folded from a single piece of paper. I know, dweeb.

When designing a direct mailer for a bank it occurred to me that delivering credit cards stuck on a flat piece of cardboard with booger glue was boring. Very boring. So, I invented a fun way for the credit card to jump up and say, "hello!"

                                                                                                    Fig. 1 – how it works

And then the gift card thing took off. People stopped buying gifts. Now they give out an impersonal piece of plastic. So, my pop-up card carrier suddenly had a chance for a real life. And so did I. Please help me get a life. (For my pop-up.)


But the darn things won't fold themselves.

Okay, I invented something cool. I even have a patent pending. That was on my bucket list. (I have a very shallow bucket.) And I produced a commercial  version of this pop-up card carrier to deliver gift cards for a retail shop. So the thing is real. 

I created a brilliant variable template for my patent to fit every envelope known to man (and woman). I designed a die-line to automate cutting. But, after they are die cut, we still have to glue and fold them by hand. Yes, by hand!

Fig. 2 – patent drawings


So I went to one of those big-ass greeting card companies and said, "You wanna buy this? And you know what Daddy Cardbucks said to me? "Can you mass produce these things, kid?" I said, "Well, um, er, no..." Then he said, "Well come back when you can." Then he gave me a nice sympathy card. And I said something to the effect, "I could make this piece of sympathy into a pop-up." (Just before I was escorted from the building.)

So we need to build a custom folding machine.

So, the only thing standing in the way of fame and fortune is a piece of machinery. A mechanical folding machine would turn me into Henry Ford. That is, if Henry Ford had wanted to transform the delivery of gift cards, credit cards, member cards and well any kind of card really... instead of mass producing horseless carriages. 

So, I need the funds to design and build a custom folding machine. This will cost about $50,000. And then WE will make millions. Of cards. Not dollars. That is just silly.  But, when I do go back to that greeting card weasel (a synonym for executive) with my mass production solution, I WILL PAY YOU BACK for helping me say, "In your face greeting card man!" I mean, I will say, "See how this pops up right in your face? I can mass produce these, now, sir."

We know how to do it. We're just short on scratch.

I work for a company that prints plastic cards, so we know what we're doing.

  • We have experience in printing and bindery production.
  • We know people who build cutting and folding machines.
  • We can design the custom piece of equipment we need.
  • We already have customers for the pop-up once we do.
  • But, we just don't have an extra $50k laying around.
  • If we can raise just half of the funds we need, we'll borrow the difference (or sell our souls to the big greeting card company) to pull this off.

But, you don't really want me to have a pop-up folder but no soul... do you? So, we will pay you back if I can keep my soul. Thank you.


Did I mention the perks?

Just for starters, we will actually give you MORE than you contribute in redeemable discounts.

Because our business is printing gift cards, we can give away free sample cards from national retailers. We have hundreds of them. No, we are NOT stealing them. It is part of our printing contract with clients. But, we can't use that many discounts ourselves. So, we'll give EVERY contributor of $25 or more, a gift card worth at least 10X your contribution in discounts! You'll get more than you give! How cool is that

And, for a big-cheese contributor, we'll also give you 20 of our own prototype pop-ups, handmade just for you! Blank. You can color them as you see fit and send out gift cards in them. Because you're too lazy to pick out gifts. Am I right?

story:
This is a short story of the Gordon family.
Like many families in the heartland of America, the Gordons had a big family. Not much money for "The Finer Things In Life" but did the best they could to provide for their family. Seven wonderful kids who live together and dine together and care for each other...especially in the hard times.

Tragically, in 2012, the mother passed away after giving birth to the last child, Kashle. All 7 kids were taken in by their grandmother, and over the past two years, they have struggled just to make ends meet. They have to cut corners and sometimes they do not get enough to eat. The saddest part is, their 7 year old told me one day while she was at my house playing with my children: 

"We don't celebrate Christmas anymore, We don't have enough money". 

This broke my heart beyond what i thought was possible. Sure, we all hear the stories about some family far away with next to nothing and begging for food, but when it is in your own neighborhood, it is hard to swallow! These children go to school with their books in plastic bags because they can not afford back-packs. They often wear the same clothes two days in a row because they can not afford to wash laundry everyday as we all know how expensive it is. Often times, i feed them at my house because there just is not enough at their home. Nevaeh, whom is 7 years old, is one of those children that makes you smile even when you have a bad day. I asked her, "Are you hungry?" (as i heard her stomach growling) she told me "No sir" Even as a child, her manners are outstanding! She would rather starve than take someone else's food.  

Life is so precious and there are 7 children who do not have any luxuries to speak of... not even something as simple as a stove to cook on. (Their meals are either cold or have to be microwaved.) Most of their clothes are "hand-me-downs" and what kills me, is they are all so grateful for the things they do have. The children don't see themselves as "poor" as children do not know the meaning, all they know is what they have and it means the world to them!

My wife and I are doing all we can to help but it is just not enough as we are providing for our family as well. Once a week, my wife or myself drive Mrs. Carla to the grocery store because her car is broke down and she does not have the money to get it fixed.

I'll be collecting any money raised here, and I'll use it to buy them items for Christmas. I'll buy them items including toys, clothes, plates, install a stove, cookware, towels, cleaning supplies, tooth brushes. Things they need but can't afford.

In closing, I TRUELY hope that you can help make a difference in this family's life. You don't know them, and you may never have the pleasure of doing so, but i hope through your contribution, you will come to know them through their story and help to brighten this families holiday season with the first Christmas they have had in 2 years.

Thank you and bless you for what you are about to do for the Gordon family!






An Additional message from Mecha Galaxy:

Hi there!

Thanks a lot for reading this, it's great to see people come together and help these kids. And a HUGE thank you to Moe Lee for organizing this whole thing.

Just to be clear: This campaign is run by Robert "Moe" Lee, not by Mecha Galaxy, or Game Craftsmen.  Game Craftsmen does not handle the receipt of these funds. Although we are very proud to use our resources to spread the word, and to and give out the virtual "Thank You" prizes, these donations do not go to Mecha Galaxy. These are not Niode purchases.  Any funds raised here will be sent from indiegogo (minus fees) directly to Robert Lee, who will then use them to buy goods for the needy. Game Craftsmen has no legal or financial involvement in this campaign. 


Q: When will I get my Mech?
A: Everyone will receive their mechs at the same time, a few days after the campaign ends.

Q: How do you know who to send the mech to? This indiegogo page isn't linked to my Facebook account (or whatever)
A: Moe Lee will contact you directly through Indiegogo. He will ask for your in-game player ID. 


Thanks again!

Now enough of this reading, let's help these kids! :)

story: Our friend Melanie needs our HELP! After 2 years of unemployment, she is on the verge of losing her apartment. For over 20 years, she has worked tirelessly for the Indiana Arts Community. It is time for us to support her and give something back!

story:
"In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed." - Khalil Gibran. 

As a little appreciation to Zaher for being the great friend, not just to me but to all of us, me (Yaser) and Khalil thought of giving him something special on his 19th birthday.    

The surprise gift for Zaher's gift will be determined according to the fund that we raise before his birthday on October 8th: 

If we reach ..

  •  $200 - $300, we will give him Game of Thrones Dragon Eggs Collectible Set and portable speaker. 

- GoT Dragon Eggs: http://store.hbo.com/game-of-thrones-dragon-eggs-collectible-set/detail.php?p=465000

- Portable speaker depends on the fund that we collect. 

  • $800, we will be able to give him the ultimate prize, The brand new iPhone 6 !

story:
LUXERA Story

LUXERA was founded in Silicon Valley, California by two LED Lighting and Semiconductor engineers with a vision to enable the world of LED lighting with Smart Controls and Connected Solutions. We simplify LED lighting and connected systems to enhance safety, convenience and create a unique lifestyle experience for our customers.

LUXERA Website


Inspired by Awareness for Lifestyle, we have invented LUXERA SmartSwitch, as we wanted to create a unique Experience for everybody:

  • Improving Quality of Life with Illumination Grade LED Lighting;

  • Creating Convenience through Control and Connectivity;

  • Increasing Safety in our Homes and Working Spaces

LUXERA SmartSwitch LED Dimmer

LUXERA introduces the most modern wall switch dimmer– ” LUXERA SmartSwitch”. LUXERA technology brings another quantum leap into the world of LED lighting.

The LUXERA SmartSwitch is a revolutionary stepping stone into LED power management, dimming and connectivity, which is powered by LUXERA proprietary dimming control and bringing dimming levels down to 0.1%.

We guarantee no flicker, no delayed turn on, no overheated lamps, AND no high voltage hazard. LUXERA SmartSwitch delivers customer benefits beyond LED lighting – higher system efficiency, more reliability of LED light sources, low voltage DC-based installation, the ultimate dimming control and remote connectivity with your smart devices.

What Makes LUXERA Smart Switch Different?

First, life-long Low voltage DC LED lamps; the most energy efficient, reliable and safe LED product on the market. 

Second, flicker-free operation and deep dimming with smooth transition from 100% to 0.1% of light output. 

Third, unique Bluetooth control with enhanced connectivity distance up to 200 feet, and access to multiple dimmers simultaneously. 

Finally, free Luxera application is available from Apple App Store, which provides two-way synchronization with Luxera SmartSwitch dimmer by iOS device and adds numerous smart lighting preset features to enhance your lifestyle.

Key Features

  • Customize your preferences and settings with innovative LUXERA SmartSwitch App
  • Enjoy the convenience of the dual synchronization between the Wall Switch and the App
  • Watch your energy bill going down as you use 14 Watt of LED power per lamp compared to typical 75 Watt per incandescent lamp
  • Save money. Luxera LED Low Voltage lamps are 5 times more efficient than incandescent lamps and 30% more efficient than traditional LED lamps
  • Receive the quality of light with flicker free performance over the entire dimming range
  • Reduce your total cost of ownership through installation, operation and maintenance savings
  • Secure your safety with LUXERA SmartSwitch low voltage and DC (direct current) driver in your LED lamps and luminaries
  • Impress your friends and neighbors with LUXERA SmartSwitch new look and fresh design

LUXERA Smart Control

The LUXERA SmartSwitch App is available today at the Apple App Store for instant downloading. We are currently working on the development of compatible versions of this App for Google and Windows powered devices.

With LUXERA SmartSwitch App, you can:

  • Control the dimming of any connected lights in the house
  • Turn lights on and off distantly from the comfort of your Smart device
  • Customize the name of each connected LUXERA SmartSwitch
  • Schedule the lights to turn on and off at a given time based on easily programmed settings with LUXERA PRESETS
  • Set the lights to dim at a chosen time or at a predefined schedule, i.e. enjoy slight dimming levels in the kitchen when you get there for morning coffee
  • Enjoy the comfort and convenience of Wake-UP and SLEEP modes with LUXERA LED Lamps
  • Take a full control of your daily busy schedule with LUXERA LIFESTYLE features. You will never miss an important appointment, home chores or to pick up your kids from the baseball practice
  • Leave your home with a piece of mind using LUXERA SECURITY.
  • Take full and complete control of the amount of light used in your home at any given point in time, and even save more energy from dimming LED lights, because LUXERA stands for ECO FRIENDLY.

Below you may review LUXERA User Guide and Programming instructions:

http://luxera-led.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/iOS-user-guide.pdf

http://luxera-led.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/SmartSwitch-Dimming-Threshold-Programming-Guide.pdf


LUXERA LOW VOLTAGE DC LED Lamps

With each LUXERA SmartSwitch you will be able to choose the desirable types of LED lamps of  a total output power up to 85 Watts, which is the equivalent of 600 Watts of incandescent lamps.

We currently offer LUXERA  LOW Voltage 14W PAR30 LED lamps.

Additionally, several types of LED lamps: LUXERA PAR 38, LUXERA 11W BR30, LUXERA PAR 20, LUXERA GU10and LUXERA 7W MR 16 are in the pipeline.

We also plan to introduce LUXERA Troffers for the office and commercial space.

The most commonly used  3,000 Kelvin color (warm-white, 83 CRI) has been chosen.


Features:

  • Voltage: 48V Max DC
  • Actual Wattage: 14W
  • Replacement Wattage: 75W
  • Life (Hours): greater than 25,000; 22 Years based on 3 hours per day
  • Brightness (Lumens): 1025lm
  • Color Temp: 3000K
  • Earth Friendly Attributes: Energy Saving, Long Lasting, Mercury Free
  • Base Type: E26 PAR30
  • Usage: Indoor, Dimmable
  • Common Applications: Indoor, Track and Recessed Lighting
  • Other: TRIAC Free (No flicker or strobing)

Convenience at Your Fingertips

With the simple installation of our App, LUXERA Smart Switch presents a unique dual synchronization between the Wall Switch itself and your smart device. As you control the dimming level on your device, the Wall Switch dial moves in the precisely same manner as the image displayed on your device. Similarly, if you choose to control the LED lighting manually through the Wall Switch, the image displayed on your device will move with the Wall Switch dial.

LUXERA Sustainability Commitment

Sustainability and respect for the Environment are core values of LUXERA. With the combination of LUXERA SmartSwitch and LED based lighting solutions, we take a major step towards achieving both objectives. When considering sustainability of LEDs, the issue of paramount importance is low energy use. Low voltage DC LED Lamps from LUXERA save min. 80% of electrical energy and significantly reduce the carbon footprint of your home, office and living environments.

In addition, the dimming function of LUXERA SmartSwitch, as well as, its efficiency and power factor are able to further reduce the energy used by another 90%, when dimmed to the minimum level. However, there are plenty of other aspects, including waste reduction, recyclability, the use of materials & resources and the effect on building and design practices that make LUXERA sustainable and environmentally-friendly. 

In fact, LED lighting supports sustainable design in several ways., which uses less energy than all other types of lamps, lasts longer (which means less frequent replacement and, therefore, reduced waste), is mercury-free, and can be packaged in all possible lamp and luminaire form factors, which are easier to disassemble and to recycle.

One LUXERA SmartSwitch LED Lighting System saves 18,000 kWh electrical energy in 10 years, or $4,200, the system pays for it self in 6 months avoids a significant amount of non-LED lamp replacements while improving Quality of Life and Safety.

Specifications

  • Input voltage: 90-132VAC
  • Input frequency: 47-65Hz
  • Max output effective power: 88W
  • Output voltage range: 40-47VDC
  • Dimming levels: 0.1%
  • High efficiency: ≥ 92%
  • Bluetooth low energy protocol 4.0
  • Types of LED lamps:
    • LUXERA PAR 38, LUXERA 11W BR30,
    • LUXERA PAR 20, LUXERA GU10,
    • LUXERA 7W MR 16, LUXERA Troffers.
  • Ambient temperature: -40⁰C  +50⁰C
  • Overvoltage protection
  • Overload, short circuit protection
  • Under-voltage lockout
  • CSA Certified Product

Helpful links about LUXERA SmartSwitch

Luxera jumps into LED lighting, smart switches

VIDEO: weVISION SmartLED, the next step in lighting, Interview with Leonard Livschitz, Luxera

Luxera SmartSwitch brings Bluetooth LE to $20 smart LED bulbs

Where Can I Set-up These Lights?

Take full and complete control of the amount of light used in your home at any given point in time, and even save more energy from dimming LED lights, because LUXERA stands for ECO FRIENDLY.
Below you may review LUXERA User Guide and Programming instructions:http://luxera-led.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/iOS-user-guide.pdfhttp://luxera-led.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/SmartSwitch-Dimming-Threshold-Programming-Guide.pdfLUXERA LOW VOLTAGE DC LED LampsWith each LUXERA SmartSwitch you will be able to choose the desirable types of LED lamps of  a total output power up to 85 Watts, which is the equivalent of 600 Watts of incandescent lamps.We currently offer LUXERA  LOW Voltage 14W PAR30 LED lamps.Additionally, several types of LED lamps: LUXERA PAR 38, LUXERA 11W BR30, LUXERA PAR 20, LUXERA GU10and LUXERA 7W MR 16 are in the pipeline.We also plan to introduce LUXERA Troffers for the office and commercial space.The most commonly used  3,000 Kelvin color (warm-white, 83 CRI) has been chosen.Features:
Voltage: 48V Max DC
Actual Wattage: 14W
Replacement Wattage: 75W
Life (Hours): greater than 25,000; 22 Years based on 3 hours per day
Brightness (Lumens): 1025lm
Color Temp: 3000K
Earth Friendly Attributes: Energy Saving, Long Lasting, Mercury Free
Base Type: E26 PAR30
Usage: Indoor, Dimmable
Common Applications: Indoor, Track and Recessed Lighting
Other: TRIAC Free (No flicker or strobing)
Convenience at Your FingertipsWith the simple installation of our App, LUXERA Smart Switch presents a unique dual synchronization between the Wall Switch itself and your smart device. As you control the dimming level on your device, the Wall Switch dial moves in the precisely same manner as the image displayed on your device. Similarly, if you choose to control the LED lighting manually through the Wall Switch, the image displayed on your device will move with the Wall Switch dial.LUXERA Sustainability CommitmentSustainability and respect for the Environment are core values of LUXERA. With the combination of LUXERA SmartSwitch and LED based lighting solutions, we take a major step towards achieving both objectives. When considering sustainability of LEDs, the issue of paramount importance is low energy use. Low voltage DC LED Lamps from LUXERA save min. 80% of electrical energy and significantly reduce the carbon footprint of your home, office and living environments.In addition, the dimming function of LUXERA SmartSwitch, as well as, its efficiency and power factor are able to further reduce the energy used by another 90%, when dimmed to the minimum level. However, there are plenty of other aspects, including waste reduction, recyclability, the use of materials & resources and the effect on building and design practices that make LUXERA sustainable and environmentally-friendly. In fact, LED lighting supports sustainable design in several ways., which uses less energy than all other types of lamps, lasts longer (which means less frequent replacement and, therefore, reduced waste), is mercury-free, and can be packaged in all possible lamp and luminaire form factors, which are easier to disassemble and to recycle.One LUXERA SmartSwitch LED Lighting System saves 18,000 kWh electrical energy in 10 years, or $4,200, the system pays for it self in 6 months avoids a significant amount of non-LED lamp replacements while improving Quality of Life and Safety.Specifications
Input voltage: 90-132VAC
Input frequency: 47-65Hz
Max output effective power: 88W
Output voltage range: 40-47VDC
Dimming levels: 0.1%
High efficiency: ≥ 92%
Bluetooth low energy protocol 4.0
Types of LED lamps:
LUXERA PAR 38, LUXERA 11W BR30,
LUXERA PAR 20, LUXERA GU10,
LUXERA 7W MR 16, LUXERA Troffers.


Ambient temperature: -40⁰C  +50⁰C
Overvoltage protection
Overload, short circuit protection
Under-voltage lockout
CSA Certified Product

story:
Titanium + Aluminum + Steel Pan: induction-friendly with heat distribution and a healthy pure titanium liner.

Woerden Designs

We aim to help you create Michelin-star food at home with our Woerden professional kitchenware. We've raised over $150,000 with our Titanium cookware crowdfunding campaigns since 2017.

Titanium + Aluminum + Stainless Steel = The Perfect Pan

Our Chef's Pan is strong, durable, scratch-resistant, and yet light and non-toxic!

Three-player composite pan body - Pure Titanium, Aluminum, and 430 SS.

  • Food contact layer: Pure Titanium ≥96%  (1mm thickness).  The only metal that is 100% biocompatible and safe. 
  • Composite layer: Pure Aluminum - Super fast heat conduction for uniform heating, energy, and time-saving.
  • Heat layer: 430 Stainless Steel - The best choice for induction cooktops, excellent adhesion,  efficient heat storage, and durability.

Why Titanium Cookware?

Titanium is the perfect choice for kitchenware or tableware.

  • Will not alter the taste of food, used extensively in high-end kitchenware
  • No metal leaching: The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body
  • The only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it
  • Excellent resistance to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength
  • Less than half the density of steel, perfectly weighted for a quality feel

Non-porous! Safer cooking.

Pure Titanium (TA 1) cooking layer. One of the key qualities which make titanium a desirable metal for cookware is its non-porous nature. This particular property of titanium ensures that other metals such as aluminum cannot leech through it and contaminate food. This is one of the main reasons titanium is combined with metals and non-metals – to make them safer.

Perfect for healthy and flavor-rich cooking.

Titanium cookware doesn’t need butter, animal fat, or oil for cooking. This means that cooking is healthier, lighter, grease-free, and assists you to lose weight and live a healthy life.

Furthermore, titanium cookware users don’t need to add water to cook their food, as titanium is naturally non-stick. Meat cooked in titanium cookware will be tender, juicy, and retains its flavor. Vegetables cooked in titanium cookware will not lose nutrients and crispness.

This combination of quick-heating and non-stick makes titanium the perfect cooking surface. for cooking healthy. 

Self-healing Titanium Oxide layer.

Another unique benefit of titanium cookware is that when titanium is exposed to oxygen, a titanium oxide layer forms. This titanium oxide layer shields the titanium from further degradation. If titanium is scratched then the titanium oxide layer becomes a kind of healing agent which allows the scratch to fix itself. This property is helpful when metal utensils are used on titanium cookware.

It has a long-lasting and abrasion-free finish which makes it more durable. Even with daily use, the Titanium surface will remain bright and clear. 

No coating! Free of PFOA, nickel, heavy metals, and other harmful materials present in non-stick coatings.

Testing

We have been using our prototype pan for 2 months now, and we've been putting it to the test every single day.  The pan has maintained its bright color - titanium doesn't rust or corrode at all!

 

High heat meat+vegetables

The spicy soup is no problem! Since titanium won't rust or corrode, you don't have to worry.

 

Our deep pan has plenty of room for making soups.

After months of making delicious meals like these, the pan still sparkles!

Details

With the highest strength-to-density ratio, our Pure Titanium Frying Pan never dents or warps.  It is lightweight and easy to use.

Comfortable handles with ergonomic design.

It is very comfortable to handle the pan. Also, with the highest strength-to-density ratio, our Pure Titanium Frying Pan never dents or wraps.  It is lightweight and easy to use.

Each pan comes with a cover made of tempered glass and stainless steel ring.

Suitable for all kinds of stoves, such as electromagnetic stove, electric stove, coal or wood stove, gas stove, ceramic stove, etc.

Specs

Pledge now and help us bring Titanium Chef's Pan to life!

story:
Meet Trivae

A device that holds inverted lids when cooking that also doubles as a display stand and trivet for serving. With its chic, modern design, it's the perfect assistant that fits into any kitchen as that third hand you always wished you had when cooking. It's also a great complement to any meal, whether a small dinner with the family or a large gathering for the holidays both casual and formal.

 Visit us at Trivae.com for more information.

Production and Delivery

After our successful Kickstarter campaign, we've been working tirelessly with our manufacturer to bring this beautiful and functional product to life.  We're currently in full scale production and awaiting our first shipment of product, which we expect to receive early in 2016! While we don't anticipate any delays at this point, there are a number of factors outside our control such as ocean shipment and customs screening. Barring any unforeseen circumstances relating to those stages of the process, we should be able to deliver your Trivaes in February - March of 2016! 

The features:

  • Made of durable cast metal with non-slip silicone pads
  • Heat-resistant up to 475°F
  • In the Z-shape, holds up to 10 pounds of weight

The benefits:

  • Multifunctional to take the place of several tools
  • Minimizes clutter in the kitchen
  • Reduces the risk of burns from hot lids, damage to surfaces, and the spread of germs

The look (per our fans):

  • It's art, that functions - a novel idea!
  • Looks like horseshoes? That's good luck! We gave you two. :)
  • Handcuffs? Quite the opposite! Trivae doesn't tie you down in the kitchen...

The many functions:

The Z-shape is the perfect place to put hot lids while cooking. And unlike other lid holders, Trivae holds your lids in an inverted position keeping the condensation and food particles from cooking contained.

It works with lids of any shape or size and the break in the rings is wide enough for any user's hand, with any type of lid handle, while leaving it within easy reach at all times.

This means:

  • Both hands are free for cooking, stirring, and spicing your culinary creations 
  • Less risk of burns to hands and countertops from contact with hot lids 
  • Less of a mess to clean up after cooking

Trivae isn't just a safe place to rest your lids when you could use an extra hand. When your meal is ready to be served, fully collapse Trivae into a traditional trivet to protect your surfaces from any hot pot, pan, or dish.

This position is also perfect for compact storage in most standard kitchen cabinets and drawers.

In the fully expanded position, Trivae transforms into a dual trivet and can hold twice as many pots and pans or finished dishes.

It also keeps large casseroles and other irregularly shaped dishes off of your surfaces. The perfect resting spot for that piping hot tray of delicious holiday cookies!

Easy to use:

  • Each button (located on either side of the spine) operates the ring closest to it
  • Push the buttons toward the center (the arrows point the way) and rotate the rings to the desired position until you hear a click
  • The rings lock into each position to ensure stability

Serve and Entertain in Style:

Trivae is visually appealing and perfect for presenting finished dishes in an elegant and unique way whether in a casual or formal setting.

It's also quite useful in a restaurant or catering setting for elevating dishes--like a pizza!

It's the perfect kitchen accessory (and gift) for:

  • Modern-day cooks
  • Aspiring & professional chefs
  • Stylish entertainers
  • Well, just about anyone really!

Trivae in the media

We are not the only ones who love Trivae! A special thanks to everyone who has featured us and helped us to spread the word!

Svetlana and her sister, Ruslana, are avid cooks who love to experiment in the kitchen and entertain their family. One day, they finally got tired of dealing with a recurring problem in their cooking routine: the juggle of where to put the lid while stirring a pot or adding more ingredients. At first, they scoured stores in search of a device to solve this problem and were disappointed to find nothing useful. 

After many discussions between the sisters and Svetlana's best friend, Rebecca, they finally decided to make one. But nothing is ever really that easy! While working on the idea, they quickly realized that adding yet another tool to a space that is already cluttered with gadgets was solving one problem and creating another, a storage dilemma. So they set out to create a product that would not only be useful for holding lids but would also fold flat for storage and while they were at it, they added a few trivets to take the place of multiple tools. And that's how Trivae was born! 

While working with your friends isn't always easy, in some cases it can liven up the daily grind...


A Design Challenge 

We explored several different designs and made numerous prototypes while working through each functional consideration. We wanted to make a product that was sturdy enough to support a lot of weight without sacrificing aesthetics. Our earlier efforts can be seen below in the first generation prototype on the right. As you can see, Trivae has traveled a long road.  

With the help of several designers and many hours spent scrutinizing CAD models, we've gone over every detail countless times. At each stage throughout the design process, we have made it a point to test Trivae's weight-bearing abilities and select materials suitable for the product's function, such as appropriate heat resistance and durability. 

After three grueling years of testing, modifying, and re-testing, Trivae's final design and prototype are complete. Let us just say, we couldn’t be happier with it! The end result is a simple and modern tool that can be used in the kitchen or on the dining table.

The Final Product

Though we tried our best to incorporate all changes during the prototyping stage, there will be a few slight differences between the prototype you see in the video and the final manufactured product. With these tweaks we strengthened the overall structure, made the curves more streamlined, and selected the most durable finish for the product's purpose. This is a production sample showing Trivae's updated shape and finish!

Check us out online!

story:
Hello, my name is Nate Wade and I have been a real estate agent in Austin,TX for 7 years. Throughout the years in this industry I have noticed that the residential leasing is still years behind where technology is today.

Applicants still have to fill out an application by hand, then scan and email it back to the agent. The application contains their social security number, date of birth, height, weight, address, email, phone and all other personal information. This ends up in paper form, sent through a number of emails, saved on desktops, laptops and servers. On top of that they have to get two separate forms of certified funds for the application fee and the security deposit. Then deliver it all to the brokerage just to see if they get approved.

Realtors do not have an online tool for residential lease listings that allow this type of accommodation. DocuLease has created a platform where agents, tenants and landlords can come together in one spot to complete every activity in the lease.

Let me show you how DocuLease will be the new industry standard for residential leasing.

When an agent has a lease listing, they will create a property profile for it and upload the documents needed for the lease. Starting with the listing agreement they will be able to edit, sign, save and send the landlord a notification and invitation to review and sign the agreement. The agent will then upload their application for the property and be able to have a link for online listings to send to prospective applicants.

Applicants to go directly to the property profile create an account and fill out an application. The applicant can also pay all of the fees online as well, that then get distributed to the appropriate parties. The application is processed through the site so the application never has to leave that one secure location.

The agent gets a notification that someone has submitted an app and they are all notified when the background check comes in. From there the agent can write up the lease and have everyone sign, save and store all documents.

The tenant can pay the rent and upload photos of the condition of the property while filling out and signing the paperwork. All of these documents are available for the agent, tenant and landlord to access and review at any time.

DocuLease is not a subscription base model, so brokerages can have access to the software with no overhead. The income for the site comes from the application fee, while providing additional services not offered anywhere else.

My team and I have been working for three months to get the first version of DocuLease off the ground, and we are nearing completion. We are two months away from launch and are seeking additional funding to finish the site and start marketing. Your donation will go towards finishing the back end development and pairing it with the front-end design, marketing, advertising, Software licensing and website integration and legal fees

With your help, we will be able to provide a new industry standard for residential leasing at real estate brokerages. Thank you for your time and donation! I look forward to working towards making your life easier.

story:
Which is why we have created Matrix, a smart mattress that is the perfect combination of sleep technology and comfort. It is the first ballistocardiography-driven (relies on the small movements from your heartbeat) smart mattress that lets you track heart rate variability, in addition to breathing, movement, stress and sleep cycles. Matrix will let you know exactly how you slept so you can make adjustments to your lifestyle and make sure you're getting the highest quality sleep possible. It starts recording data automatically. You don't need to set reminders to turn anything on; just go to sleep and let Matrix do all the work. Whether you're a professional athlete, a CEO or a devoted stay-at-home parent, no one can afford to be off their game, which is why we created Matrix to help improve productivity day after day. With the mattress made right here in the United States and the MatrixSense sensors made in Finland, Matrix is made with the highest quality materials and textiles to bring you a superior night's sleep every time you close your eyes.

Tracking your sleep quality over time will alert you to trends and factors that impact your recovery time in bed and, ultimately, your performance when you wake up in the morning. It's the mattress you need for you, or you and your partner, if you want to get the most optimal sleep.

Does your alarm ever go off and it feels like your eyelids weigh 20 pounds and you haven't had nearly enough sleep, regardless of the amount of hours you logged? This is because you were woken up during your REM sleep cycle, your deepest phase of sleep. Matrix starts recording sleep cycle data every two minutes within the alarm range that you set. This ensures the alarm will only go off during your lightest phase of sleep, so you can wake up feeling refreshed and ready to take on the day.

Select from a range between 15 and 60 minutes before you need to wake up so you can wake feeling refreshed, not dazed and confused.

Choose from 10 alarm sounds, ranging from traditional options like Digital Alarm Clock to more unique options like Electronic Rise, Tropical Morning or Rise Tide.

Quickly and easily set and label alarms for weekdays, weekend adventures and even afternoon power naps.

Traditional sleep trackers and wearables rely only on movement detection and are not always accurate. Matrix users hyper-acute sleep sensors that rely on ballistocardiography to accurately measure a wide variety of wellness components. That data is then formulated into comprehensive graphs and automatically sent to your phone.

The MatrixSense sensors in our patent-pending mattress are so sensitive that they can detect even the slightest movement, like your heartbeat, even through something as thick as your mattress. They are so reliable that they were originally used in the medical field to monitor epileptic patients. Every Matrix mattress comes with two sensors* so that it can individually track the health stats of two different users. Each user can sync their app to the sensor on the side of the bed that they sleep on, so that only their information is displayed.

*Twin-sized Matrix mattresses only have 1 sensor. 

Heart rate variability (HRV) is a method for assessing stress levels in your body and their effects on your health. As you breathe in and out, heart rate variability is measured as the time gaps between your heart beats. That fluctuation between your beats? It's what we've dubbed the music of your heart.

 

By tracking your HRV with the Matrix app, you'll be able to see how your lifestyle choices affect your overall health and conduct experiments to see how minor changes can have a big impact on your sleep quality. 

  • Heart Rate Variability (HRV) - While high HRV is linked to good health and fitness, decreased HRV is linked to stress and fatigue. MatrixSense gives you a full night's HRV analysis producing a reliable indicator of how your body recovers during the night. 
  • Sleep Quality - Using a sophisticated algorithm MatrixSense compares your personal data with established scientific standards for quality sleep to generate a simple indicator of how well you're sleeping. 
  • Sleep Cycles - Proper sleep allows your body to recover and be ready for the day ahead. MatrixSense's analysis differentiates between Deep Sleep (when your body recovers), REM Sleep (when your brain recovers), and Light Sleep (transitionary sleep).
  • Heart Rate - Using vibration sensitive technology, MatrixSense offers a detailed breakdown of your resting heart rate and average heart rate. Understanding your heart rate is a crucial measurement of understanding your general health.
  • Breathing - MatrixSense records the number of breaths you take per minute, keeping track of your sleep quality throughout the night and monitoring for any indications of sleep disorders or irregularities.
  • Movement - Whether it's restless sleep or getting out of bed, MatrixSense factors the movement of your body throughout the night into its long-term analysis.
  • Stress - Your autonomic nervous system controls and regulates all the functions necessary to maintain life. MatrixSense's state-of-the-art metrics review the impact of stress on the balance between your sympathetic and parasympathetic nervous systems.

You can track your sleep every night and make all the changes you want to, but if you're not sleeping on a good mattress, these changes won't make a big difference in your sleep quality. At Matrix, we believe in starting at the root of the problem, which is why we spent years perfecting our ultra-comfortable, American-made, CertiPUR-US-certified memory foam mattress that addresses and solves all the common complaints.

 

The colorful, user-friendly interface of the Matrix app was designed with you in mind and is included with your mattress. The best part? The app is public and completely free! You'll receive regular updates and will never have to worry about paying subscription fees. Data from your Matrix mattress syncs automatically with your app, allowing you to ditch your wearable and just focus on deep, restful sleep.

The brains behind this beauty (aka the founders of Matrix) have been innovators in the sleep space for nearly a decade. Over the past ten years, the partnerships we've forged have allowed us to produce the highest quality smart mattress at the fairest price. From sourcing the most innovative foam in America to seamlessly integrating the most advanced sleep sensors in the world, we've done everything in our power to create a product that is as comfortable as it is intelligent.

It took years of research to get Matrix from concept to prototype to final product. With the help of our product development team and sleep testers, we've evaluated dozens of foam combinations, sensor placements and UX designs. Today, we're confident that our smart mattress will change the way you sleep, and ultimately, the way you live. 

We need your help to fund the final production processes so we can help everyone power their dreams through smarter sleep. The funds raised on Indiegogo will go toward working with developers to integrate the app with Apple Health and IFTTT, testing and quality assurance of the app, and fulfilling our initial orders. One of the first improvements we make to the app will be to make it compatible with Windows and Android. We hope you'll join us on this journey by supporting us, sharing this page and following us @matrixsense.

Which is why we have created Matrix, a smart mattress that is the perfect combination of sleep technology and comfort. It is the first ballistocardiography-driven (relies on the small movements from your heartbeat) smart mattress that lets you track heart rate variability, in addition to breathing, movement, stress and sleep cycles. Matrix will let you know exactly how you slept so you can make adjustments to your lifestyle and make sure you're getting the highest quality sleep possible. It starts recording data automatically. You don't need to set reminders to turn anything on; just go to sleep and let Matrix do all the work. Whether you're a professional athlete, a CEO or a devoted stay-at-home parent, no one can afford to be off their game, which is why we created Matrix to help improve productivity day after day. With the mattress made right here in the United States and the MatrixSense sensors made in Finland, Matrix is made with the highest quality materials and textiles to bring you a superior night's sleep every time you close your eyes.Tracking your sleep quality over time will alert you to trends and factors that impact your recovery time in bed and, ultimately, your performance when you wake up in the morning. It's the mattress you need for you, or you and your partner, if you want to get the most optimal sleep.Does your alarm ever go off and it feels like your eyelids weigh 20 pounds and you haven't had nearly enough sleep, regardless of the amount of hours you logged? This is because you were woken up during your REM sleep cycle, your deepest phase of sleep. Matrix starts recording sleep cycle data every two minutes within the alarm range that you set. This ensures the alarm will only go off during your lightest phase of sleep, so you can wake up feeling refreshed and ready to take on the day.Select from a range between 15 and 60 minutes before you need to wake up so you can wake feeling refreshed, not dazed and confused.Choose from 10 alarm sounds, ranging from traditional options like Digital Alarm Clock to more unique options like Electronic Rise, Tropical Morning or Rise Tide.Quickly and easily set and label alarms for weekdays, weekend adventures and even afternoon power naps.Traditional sleep trackers and wearables rely only on movement detection and are not always accurate. story:
ONE Product

MULTIPLE Smart Home Functions

 

ALL INCLUSIVE PERKS - 30% OFF

- the best Anyware deals you will find

 

We are proud to introduce our new Anyware Services that makes the awesome Anyware Smart Adapter™ even more awesome! 

The Smart Adaptor is a plug-and-play light bulb adapter with app control and sensors for temperature, humidity and sound monitoring. It can do all of these different things and much more:

  • Advanced light control
  • Notifications for home security
  • Indoor climate quality monitoring
  • Automatic light when you enter the room
  • ... Check out the other Anyware Services and find your personal favourites in the Anyware Services Catalogue™

 

Simple to Install and Use

 

Much More Than Lighting

 

 

And it’s ALL enabled by this

simple light bulb adapter!

 

 

Your All-in-One Smart Living Solution

ROOM by ROOM - SERVICE by SERVICE

 

Anyware works with

IFTTT, Amazon Alexa and Google Home

 

 

The Why

We are driven by an ambition to make Smart Home simpler for the many people, and part of every home in the world!

We believe that Smart Home has to be understood and offered to homeowners 'as a Service' and as easy as fitting a light bulb.

That's why the Anyware Smart Adaptor™ is designed as the world's smallest and smartest lamp socket adaptor with a broad set of sensor capabilities, geofencing, WiFi and Bluetooth (BLE) as a Smart Living Services ENABLER to constantly support the changing needs and preferences for you and your family.

Once installed, you will be able run various Smart Living Services or 'Scenes', which are small pre-programmed functions in the Anyware App™ designed to give you peace of mind and comfort in a busy everyday life.

 

That's Smarter Living!

 

Buy 2 x Smart Adaptors for your home or office

 

Each Smart Adaptor can run different Scenes depending on your need and the room it's sitting in

 

Your Benefits

 

You will find all the Anyware Services in the

Anyware Services Catalogue™

 

Featured on GoGlobie.com

 

 

How Anna benefits with the Smart Kids Room 

 

 

Help your kid stay healthy, feel safe and fall asleep

using the Anyware Services 'Indoor Climate Monitoring' and 'Baby Monitoring'

 

What is a Service?

A ‘Service’ can be a ‘Scene’ or for example 1 month extra data visualization in the graph in the app.

Scenes are small applets in the app that run automatically to serve your everyday routines.

Anyware Services let's you:

  • Monitor the temperature and humidity in the room and receive notifications when the indoor climate gets unhealthy (look for the 'Indoor Climate Monitoring' Scene)
  • Run automatic preventive burglar light, when you are away, and listen for intrusion with the built-in sound sensor (look for the 'Preventive Burglar Light' Scene)
  • Automatically turn on light when entering a room - or turn it off when no-one is in the room (look for the 'Presence Light' Scene)
  • Control and dim your light via the app - or continue to use your existing lamp/wall switches with Double-Toggle™ (this is basic light functionality in the Smart Adaptor)
  • And much more…

 

Anyware Service Catalogue™

The Anyware Service Catalogue™ is an online catalogue of in-app Anyware Services that you can get UNLIMITED access to with the Change4Free™ Service subscription.

We will continuously add new ‘Services’ to the Service Catalogue and aim to have 16 Anyware Services during spring 2019.

You can read more about each Scene in the FAQ

 

PREMIUM Perks: What You Get

All the PREMIUM perks include these three (3) Scenes in addition to 1 Month Data and the Change4Free Service*:

  • Preventive Burglar Light
  • Energy Saving Mode
  • Indoor Climate Monitoring

 

  • Change4Free™ for 1 year: Unlimited access to the Anyware Service Catalogue™
  • 1 Month Data (1 year)

 

Change4Free™

 

Change4Free™ is an annual subscription Service that allows you to change your existing Scenes as crazy and often as you want. If you want to try a new Scene for a weekend, just replace it with a few simple taps in the app.

 

Annual Subscription

You can always decide to not renew the annual subscription after the first year, and then you pay $0 going forward. There are no ties or obligations to stick with the subscriptions.

Warning: These Services are very cool, and therefore very addictive. You can check out the FAQ for more details about the annual subscription after the first year.

 

Is the Anyware Smart Adaptor™ New?

The original Anyware Smart Adaptor™ was partly funded in an Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign in 2016, and officially launched in January 2018 - after we had shipped Smart Adaptors to our Backers.

We are now launching an updated v2 of the Anyware Smart Adaptor™ together with the Anyware Services Catalogue™.

In collaboration with Arrow, we have optimized the hardware design in terms of components and production, which is a normal and obvious step when the first generation product have proven solid and compelling.

This point of departure and our current market traction means that we already have a website and webshop, in which you can read more about the Anyware Smart Adaptor™ - and buy the original Anyware Smart Adaptor™ with its 3 standard Anyware Services.

 

 

 

Why are we back on Indiegogo?

We decided to launch our new Anyware Services as an ALL INCLUSIVE Smart Adaptor PREMIUM offer on Indiegogo to give something back to the Indiegogo community.

We are immensely grateful for the backer support we received during the 2016 crowdfunding campaign, which has played a big role in bringing Anyware to where we are today.

The Anyware App™

The Anyware Smart Adaptor™ comes with the Anyware App™, which you download for free in the Apple AppStore (iPhone) or Google Play Store (Android).

It is designed to assist daily routines and create peace of mind for families, and allows you to manage your:

  • Scenes (specific functionality applets)
  • Rooms (to which Smart Adaptors are linked)
  • Smart Adaptors (light dimming and sensor data visualization in graphs)

The new Anyware Services Catalogue™ offers a broad variety of new Anyware Services in the app, and Change4Free™ allows you to freely change to any Scene you want.

 

 

"Smart Home Doesn't Get Easier Than This"

The Anyware Smart Adaptor™ fits the most prevalent lamp sockets in the world, type E27 (Europe/RoW) and E26 (US, Canada, Mexico, Japan), and works with dimmable LED light bulbs with the smaller lamp socket base, E14 (Europe/RoW) and E12/Candelabra (US, Canada, Mexico, Japan).

E14 and E12 LED light bulbs are available on Amazon, IKEA and in most retail stores.

 

"This genius little device is a wonderful addition to any smart home. It’s also the perfect gadget to begin your smart home journey"

- Jeni Hawkins, thebinderladies.com

 

Award-winning Danish Design

We proudly received the CES 2018 Innovation Award Honoree in January 2018 as the culmination of a series of international awards and nomination.

In April 2018, we received Arrow Flash Funding as the first European startup ever, and in October we were nominated as Top100 ‘Startup of the Year’ by Established and CTA (CES organizers).

 

5 Connected Products in 1

Each Anyware Smart Adaptor™ reflects a small Smart Home system with at least 5 different connected products: Temperature and humidity sensor, sound sensor (detects decibel (dB) only - no recording), light dimmer, WiFi gateway with geofencing, and Bluetooth (BLE) gateway.

Individually, each Anyware Smart Adaptor™ is a unique multi-functional Room Sensor designed to run automatic routines ('Scenes') when you leave home or arrive at home.

With the Home/Away function in the Anyware Home App™, you can set the Scenes to automatically run when you are not at home such as e.g. Preventive Burglar Light.

 

3 x Smart Adaptors for a Standard Home

You will have a compelling system with only 3 x Anyware Smart Adaptors™, as you can then place them in the main rooms such as the Living Room, Bedroom and Kids Room.

Together they will work as a system and effectively make your home look occupied with randomized light when you are away, and effectively listen for intrusion throughout the majority of the home.

Add to this, that it is super easy to move the Anyware Smart Adaptor™ if you want to for instance measure humidity in the basement or in your summer cottage.

 

Continue to Use Your Existing Light Switches

 

You can continue to use your existing light switches with the Anyware Smart Adaptor™.

All you have to do is to try to get into the habit of flicking the switch twice instead of once - i.e. flick it up AND down again - to operate the light.

In that way, the Anyware Smart Adaptor™ will remain mains powered, and will continue to measure your indoor climate and run the Scenes when you are away.

The Smart Adaptor is designed to recognize 'double-press' or 'double-toggle' as an ON/OFF light operation, and will change the light state for each Double-Toggle™.

 

About Anyware

With a mission to bring Smart Living to every home in the world, Anyware offers everyday ‘services’ for a healthy home, family safety and peace of mind.

Anyware's Smart Living Services are enabled by the award-winning and unprecedented Anyware Smart Adaptor™, which is a Smart Living system in ONE product that you install in a lamp as easy as you fit a light bulb.

 

The Founders

As Featured In...

 

Why Wait? Go Anyware Now!

 

Get in touch via support@anyware.solutions if you have any questions at all!

 

Thank you so much for your interest,

Team Anyware
